text: Hashishe Yakoba wakatshina bikole, mutshima wandi wakazakala wakatahulula bintu biandi bisumbu bibidi, ne bantu ne mikoko ne bimuna ne tumelo
Abimeleke ne Ahuzata, muanda wandi, ne Pikola, kamanda ka masalayi andi, bakumuka ku Gelâ, bakaya kudiye
Eu udi mukenji wa mukashi udi ulela nansha muana wa balume nansha muana wa bakashi
Yakoba wakatabala ku tulu tuandi, wakamba ne Bulelela, Yehowa udi kunoko ne meme tshiakamanva bualu ebu
Nafatale udi bu ntole musulula, udi Wamba mei malengele
Kanulu ku mesu kuanyi ne bianza bituhu

Binuasangana muntu mu misoko idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, nansha mulume nansha mukashi udi wenza bualu bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ushiha tshihungidi tshia Yehowa, wakaya bua kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu, ne wakayitendelela, nansha diba nansha ngondo, nansha bintu bikuabo bia mu diulu bindi muhidie; bikalabo banuambile dî edi anyi binuikala bunvue lumu lua bualu ebu ku matshu, nenukebakebe tô ne bikala bualu ebu bua bundu buenjibue bulelela mu Isalele, hashishe nenulue ne muntu wakenza bualu bubi ebu ku bibi bia musoko, nansha mulume nansha mukashi, nenubakume ne mabue, nenubashihe
Yeye kakasumba buloba bua babuki, bualu bua babuki bakadi ne tshituha tshiabo kudi Palo, ne bakadila bintu biakabaha Palo nunku bobo kabakahana buloba buabo
Hashishe Bena Isalele bakimba musambu eu ne, Mai abande, nuenu nuimbile musambu; mpokolo wa mai wakumbulabo kudi bakelenge, ne kudi miloho ya bantu ne dikombo dia bukelenge ne milangala yabo
Nenuanyike milambu ha kahia, nenuyidie mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula; nenualukile dinda, nuhingane mu ntenta yenu
dienza, diambula, dienzela ne dipaana dia nzembu;
Nunku Lota wakasungula mpata wonso wa Yadene, wakaya biandi ku esete, bakaha ndulukangana nunku
Bielabo mai ha bintu ebi bia kukuna ne biahona tshituha tshia mubidi yabi mufue ha mutu habi, bintu ebi nebikale ne bukoya kunudi
Dina dia muakuny andi diakadi Yubala, yeye wakadi nkambua wa badi bimba bisanji ne nshiba
Ku luseke lua ku esete wakenza bilulu tô ne ku coudées makumi atanu
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Vulukai dituku edi dinuakuhatuka mu Ejipitu, mu nsubu wa lukanu, bualu bua Yehowa wakanuhatula mu muaba eu ne bukole bua tshianza tshiandi, kanudi bidia bidi ne luevene
Kanungu ka Badi bâsa Tshibutshilu tshia ditunga tshiabanyi tshia mpetu ne bintu

Yakoba wakaditshiha ne Bikala Nzambi n anyi, biandameye bimpe mu nshila mundi nya ne biampeye bintu bia kudia ne bia kuluata, bua meme kuhingana kabidi ku nsubu wa tatu wanyi talala, hashishe Yehowa neikale Nzambi wanyi, ne dibue edi dinakuimanyika nebikale bu nsubu wa Nzambi ne bintu bionso biwampa nempingashe tshia dikumi kudi bulelela

Lewitiki Matuku a Masanka Majalame Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nakasungula matuku andi musue bantu badie bidia bia Yehowa anudi mua kumanyisha bantu, matuku au neikale matuku a tshijila
Nansha bia munyi , kabeena mwa kulombola muntu mu ditunga dia Mbulamatadi mudibo mwa kumunyanga, kumukengesha anyi kumukisa, kumupwekesha mushinga ne kumumona bu nyama
Yakoba wakalamba bintu bia kudia, Esau wakahingana mu tshisuku, wakadi muhungila
Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu ke kadi kamanyisha dibumbusha adio
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona, Shafata, muana mulume wa Holi
Kanuluhuki ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusangakena matuku muanda mutekete tô ne hanuashikisha matuku a kujidila kuenu, bualu bua Yehowa neanujidile matuku muanda mutekete
Lakele wakafua, bakamujika mu nshila wa ku Efelata eu udi Beteleheme

Dishiya dia Yadene mu buloba bua Moaba, Mose wakabanga kubamanyisha bua mikenji ne, Yehowa Nzambi wetu wakatuambila mu Holeba ne, Nuakumana kushikama musangu mule mu mukuna eu: bishai luendu luenu, yai bienu ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, ne ku miaba yonso idi hehi n abo mu Alabâ ne mu mikuna ne mu bibanda, ne mu luseke lua ku Sude, ne hehi ne muelelu wa mai manene, mu buloba bua Bena Kanâna ne mu Lebanona tô ne ku musulu munene dina diau Pelata
mêyi adi alongolola mianda ya malaba ne majimba, bulongolodi bwa mwaba wa kusomba, ngikadilu wa mâyi ne meetu;
Mose wakamba ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Undeshe butumbi buebe
Biangateye mukashi mukuabo, yeye kena mua kuhuekesha bidia biandi ne bilulu biandi ne bilele bia bantu bia kubakangana
Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi badi munkatshi muabo udi ulemba nyama anyi nyunyu bua kudia neahongolole mashi andi hanshi, neajibikile ne dinfuenkenya dia buloba
Hashishe bantu bakumuka ku Haselota, bakashikama mu tshihela tshia Palana

Wakaluhuka mu ntenta wa Lea, wakabuela mu ntenta wa Lakele Kadi Lakele wakamana kumusha mpingu, wakayiteka muinshi mua biseba bia tumelo, wakashikama ha mutu hai Labana wakakeba ne bianza, kakayisangana
Mu dîba edi, badi banji kwimanyika manyooka
Ka dina dia musoko diakadi Babela, bualu bua Yehowa wakatompakashaku muaku wa ba ha buloba bonso, ne Yehowa wakabamuangalashaku ha buloba buonso
Palô wakamba ne, Monai, bantu bakukumbana ba bungi mu buloba, ne nuenu nudi nulekesha midimu yabo
Bualu ebu nebuikale bu mukenji wa tshiendelele mu nsubu yenu yonso mu bikondo bienu bionso kanudi nansha dianyi nansha mashi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile tshisumbu tshonso ne, Umukai ku nsubu wa tshitendelelu wa Kola ne Datana ne Abilama
Muntu udi ushiha nyama neafute muena nyama ne mundi udi ushiha mukuabo nebamushihe
Yeye wakambila Balaka ne, Wimane ha buihi ne mulambu webe wa kuosha ha kahia, nenye kusangakena ne Yehowa kuaka
Mose wakambila Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena ne, Nudi basue bana benu baye ku nvita, ne nuenu nushikame kunoko, anyi
Buowa ne ditshina biakubakuata, bualu bua bukole bua diboko diebe bobo badi bashikama holâ bu mabue, to ne hasabuka bantu bebe, Yehowa, tô ne hasabuka bantu bawakahikula
Mutshi udi hankatshi ha mabaya neuhite ku ditumba dimue tô ne ku ditumba dikuabo
Yeye wakatangila kudi Bena Kene, wakabela lusumuinu ne, Muaba unudi nushikama udi mukole, udi munkatshi mua mabue
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi Kumanda mupite bônso wa bilwilu
Bana balume ba Yuda, Ele ne Onana; Ele ne Onana bakafua mu buloba bua Kanâna
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Buonso buabo nebafile bintu biabo, mukelenge dituku, mukelenge dituku, bua kujidila tshioshelu
Nuenu nutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, bienza muntu nunku, neikale ne muoyo
Ada wakalela Yabala, yeye wakadi nkambua wa badi bashikama mu nsubu ya ntenta ne badi ne bimuna
Kadi tuakadiangatshila bimuna ne bintu bionso bia mu misoko
Bakimana ditutu nansha matuku abidi nansha ngondo nansha tshidimu, Bena Isalele bakashala mu tshitudilu, kabakaya ku luendu, hakumukadi, bakaya ku luendu

Kalongo ka kumpala : Bidi bitangila bampulushi ba ditunga dijima Kanungu ka Bampulushi ba ditunga dijima badi babimikila dikuba dia bantu bônso, dikuba dia bantu ne bintu biabo, dilaminyina ne dipingaja dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso pamwe ne dilama pabwipi dia bamfumu banene
Mose wakolola mula ngala wandi ha buloba bua Ejipitu, ne Yehowa wakatuma luhehele luaku esete dituku adi to ne hakatshia butuku, ne dinda luhehele lua ku esete luakatuma mikumbi
Kanungu ka Bukalenga bwa polovensa badi babutwangaja kudi Nguvelenela, tshindonda tshia Nguvenêla ne ba minisitila ba polovensa

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kubisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Gamaliele, muana mulume wa Pedasû
Isaka wakasua Esau bualu bua yeye wakamudisha munyinyi wa ntole, Lebeka wakasua Yakoba

Lewitiki Kulengeshibua kua Mukashi Mumane Kulela Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bimita mukashi difu, bialeleye muana wa balume, yeye neikale mundi udi kayi muakane tô matuku muanda mutekete, bu muakadiye mu matuku a tshijila a disama dia lulelu luandi, yeye neikale bu mundi udi kayi muakane

Dilama dia bâna ne dibalongesha maalu didi dikala, bwa baledi, dipa dia kwa nzambi ne kabidi dikanyika didibo ne tshia kulonda,bamfumu ba mbulamatadi bikala babatangila ne dîsu dikole ne babambulwisha
Dutelonone Kanushihedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ngombe anyi mukoko bidi kabiyi biakane, anyi tshintu tshikuabo tshidi tshibi; bualu ebu budi bundu ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kanungu ka Mapangadika a Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu kabeena mwa kuatontolola to ne badi ne tshia kuakumbaja diakamwe
Nahô wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi abidi ne tshitema, wakalela Tela
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakalua kudi Mose, wakamuambila ne, Alona, muan enu mulume, muena Lewi, kenaku, anyi
Bualu bua bobo badi bantu banyi banakuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, kababahanyi bu bahika
Bakumuka mu Limona pelese, bakashikama mu Libina
Yeye wakumukaku, wakaya ku mukuna wakadi ku esete wa Betele, wakashimikaku ntenta wandi, Betele wakadi ku wesete ne Ai wakadi ku esete
Ekesode Tshioshelu tshia Musenga wa Manananshi Ek
Bakangata butue bua mu tshikutu, bakimana ku mpala kua Palô, Mose wakabumiamina mulu, buakenzesha bantu ne nyama mputa ya mbalanga ham bidi
Biwahidia kubalekela, ne biwabakanda, Yehowa neateke tshianza tshiandi ha bimuna bidi mu budimi, ha tubalu ne nyama ya mpunda ne nyama ya tumelo ne ngombe ne mikoko, dishina dikole nedibikuate

Bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; nunku nudilengeshe, nuikale bantu ba tshijila bualu bua meme ndi wa tshijila, kanudinyangi ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba Bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua kuikala Nzambi wenu; nuenu nuikale bantu ba tshijila bualu bua meme ndi wa tshijila

Nushikame ku butshika bua tshitudilu matuku muanda mutekete, muntu yonso wakashiha mundi mukuabo, anyi wakalenga muntu mufue tshianza, adilengeshe ku dituku disatu ne dituku dia muanda mutekete ne nuenu ne bantu banuakukuata
Wakenzaku tshioshelu wakabikila mua ba au ne, Ele betele bualu bua mu muaba eu Nzambi wakamueneka kudiye hakadiye unyema ku mesu kua mukulu andi
Meme nakabambila ne, Muntu yonso udi ne or akuohole, ne bobo bakafua or kundi, nakuela mu kahia ne kana aka ka ngombe ka or kakahatuka mu kahia
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Ungambile Udi ne muaba mu nsubu wa tatu webe bua tuetu kulalamu, anyi
Au mmena abo wa mu tshisamba tshia Lubena, Shamua, muana mulume wa Zaku
Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Tangila, nakukuteka ha mutu ha buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Balombodi ba bibambalu bibidi ebi badi ne tshia kwikala beena Kongo ba bangabanga

Biafila muntu nansha nyama wa mpunda nansha ngombe nansha mukoko nansha nyama mukuabo kudi mukuandi bua kumiamina, ne biafua nyama, anyi biamutahabo mputa, anyi biamuihatabo ne muntu kayi mumutangile, ditshiha dia Yehowa nedikale hankatshi ha bubidi buabo bua kujingulula ne, Yeye kakalenga bintu bia mukuandi tshianza, ne bitabusha mukelenge wa nyama au nunku, mukuandi kena ne bualu bua kumufuta
Ebi mbintu bionso bia mu mai binudi mua kudia: bintu bionso bidi ne mialala ne mabamba nudi mua kudia; kanuena mua kudia bintu bidi kabiyi ne mialala ne mabamba; kabiena biakane kunudi
Nunku bobo ne bantu bonso bakalamata kudibo bakaya mu Muaba wa Bafue hakadibo ne muoyo, ne buloba buakabuikila mukana muabu ku mutu kuabo, ne bobo biakajimina munkatshi mua tshisumbu
Badi Basungula Balumbuluishi Dut
Ekesode Bintu bia mu Tshitendelelu Ek

Muakuidi wakelabo manyi ha mutu ne wakajidilabo bua kubuela mu mudimu wa tatu andi yeye neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, nealuate bilulu bia lin bilulu bia tshijila, neafile mulambu bua kujidila nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bua ntenta wa kusangakena ne bua tshioshelu ne bua kubuikila n au bubi bua bakuidi ne bua bantu bonso
Nzambi wakamba ne, Bulelela, nengikale n ebe, nenkuhe tshimanyinu etshi tshidi tshilesha ne nakukutuma hawahatula bantu badi mu Ejipitu, nenutendelele Nzambi ha mukuna eu
Abalahama wakashikama mu buloba bua Bena Peleshete matuku a bungi
Nzambi wa tatu ebe udi ukukuatshisha, Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso udi ukusankisha ne masanka adi afuma mu diulu, ne masanka adi afuma muinshi mua buloba, ne masanka adi afuma ku mabele ne mafu
Muntu yônso udibo bafunda ne udi ne tshibawu udi anu mwânji kwikala mubingisha too ne dîba dikala dikosa dia tshilumbu dia ndekelu dileeja dipiila diende
Yeye wakalua ne Shimeona kudibo

Mikenji Neyitekibue mu Mushete wa Tshihungidi tshia Mei Hakashikisha Mose kufunda mei a mikenji ei mu mukanda, hashishe Mose wakadimusha Bena Lewi bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa ne, Nuangate mukanda eu wa mikenji, nûteke ku luseke lua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, newikaleku bu mumanyi wa bualu buanyi

Yehowa Nzambi wakamba ne, Monai, mulume wakulua bu umue wetu, udi mumanye malu mimpe ne malu mabi, bua yeye kolodi tshianza tshiandi bua kuangateye mamuma a mutshi wa muoyo, wadia, wikala ne muoyo tshiendelele, Yehowa Nzambi wakamuihata mu budimi bua Edene, bua kuihileye buloba buakafumeye

Bana bakashi ba Selofehada bakenza muakambila Yehowa Mose, bualu bua Mahala ne Tîza ne Hogela ne Mileka ne Noa, bana bakashi ba Selofehada, bakadi babakibua kudi bana balume bakadi bana babo ne tatu abo

Kabadi Tshisangilu tshinene Tshisumbu tshia badi kabayi benza tshidiidi Ditangilula Tshisangilu Tshibutshilu tshinene tshia diabanyinangana bintu ne lupetu Bukalenga bwa nkaya Kamuyi ditontolola, kamuyi dikonka Assemblée provinciale Accord global et inclusif Autorité Administration Ambassadeur Bureau Bugdet Barreau Civique Campagne Coopération Constitution CEI Citoyen, citoyenne Chef de l Etat Conseil Culture Cas échéant Communication moyen de Composantes et entités Capitale Cour Congrès Civile société Censure Conférence Caisse nationale de péréquation Dictature De plein droit Détention Droit s Droits de l homme Délit d initié Décentralisation Démocratie Député Décret Économie Etat Etat des droits Etat de siège Etat d urgence Entités administratives Election libre transparente démocratrique Finances Forces de l ordre Fonction publique Général e Génocide Gouvernement Garantie Haute trahison Hymne Infraction information justice juridiction Judiciaire pouvoir , autorité,ordre Loi législature législation Logistique Média Motion magistrat Ministère Mandat Minorité muntu bwaalu Dikwata, diela dia mu lukanu Bukookeshi,mapa, maneema a bu muntu, mianda idi mitangila mêyi ne mikandu
Bakanuisha tatu wabo nvinyo butuku abu kabidi, ne muan a mukala wakabika, wakalala n andi, ne tatu wandi kakamanya hakalaleye ne hakabikeye
Alona wakalela Nadaba ne Abihu ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ
Basatu aba bakadi bana balume ba Noa ne tunkanuniuna tuabo tuakamuangalaka ha buloba buonso
Yeye wakasangisha bimuna biandi bionso ne bintu bionso biakangateye mu Padana alama bua kuyeye kudi tatu andi Isaka mu buloba bua Kanana
Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Bena Lewi bakabuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena bua kuenza mudimu ku mpala kua Alona ne kua bana bandi balume, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose bua Bena Lewi, bakabenzela nunku
Muan a Ngombe wa Or Dut
Utshiteke hehi ne tshilulu tshidi ku mushete wa Nzambi, ku mpala kua tshibuikilu tshidi ha mutu ha mushete, kundi nsangakena n ebe
Bintu bia kudia kabiakadi mu buloba, bualu bua tshiole tshiakatamba bukole, nunku bantu bonso ba mu Ejipitu ne ba mu buloba bua Kanana bakamba kufua ne nzala
Hakafua Mose, yeye wakadi ne bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi: mesu andi kâkadi bileshileshi ne bukole buandi kabuakahua
Aba mbantu bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona, ne kudi bakelenge ba Bena Isalele dikumi ne babidi, muntu ku nsubu wa batatu abo muntu ku nsubu wa batatu abo

Mose wakabambila ne, Hafika bidimu muanda mutekete, mu tshikondo tshidibo bahingashangana bintu, hadiabo bidia bia disanka dia bitandatanda, halua Bena Isalele bonso ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu muaba udiye usungula, hashishe nenubadile Bena Isalele bonso mikenji ei mu matshu abo
Hakashikishabo kudia bintu bionso biakaluabo n abi ku Ejipitu, tatu wabo wakabambila ne, Yai bienu tshiakabidi nutusumbileku ba kudia tukese

Anyi Nzambi wakamba kuya bua kudisunguila tshisamba munkatshi mua tshisamba tshikuabo, kudi mateta ne kudi bimanyinu ne kudi malu a kukema ne kudi nvita ne ku tshianza tshikole ne diboko diandi diolola ne kudi malu manene adi atshinyisha bantu bu muakanuenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu Ejipitu ku mesu kuenu, anyi
Yeye neambule dianza dia bukula bubotesha tente budi busangisha ne manyi ne musenga wa manananshi, neabuoshe ha tshioshelu bu tshintu tshidi tshima dihembu, bu tshivulukidi kudi Yehowa
Kadi bikalaku muen andi, yeye kena ne bualu bua kumufuta

Bualu bua ndi musue Bena Isalele bangate milambu idibo basue kushihela mu tshisuku, balue n ai kudi Yehowa, ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena kudi muakuidi, bayifile bu mulambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala kudi Yehowa
Mukenji wa Bamonyi Kanuitabushi dî dia mumonyi umue udi utumpila mukuabo tshianana bua dihambuka diandi anyi bua bubi buakenzeye; malu neajalame anu ku mei a bamonyi babidi anyi basatu
Kahia katemene ha tshioshelu ku dituku ne ku dituku, kakajimi nansha

Bikala muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadihamu dina diandi, udi kule, hashishe nenushale ngombe wa mu ngombe yenu ne mukoko wa mu mikoko biakanuha Yehowa, bu munakanuambila; nudi mua kudia ku mbelu kuenu bintu bionso bidi mitshima yenu misue
Bualu bua yeye wakalengulula dî dia Yehowa, wakashiha mukenji wandi, nebamûmushilemu bulelela, neadituadile bubi buandi

kadi kamungutuka padi Dîyi dikulu edi dipeta Kanungu ka Bulongolodi bwa kalongo ka kumpala ka kanungu ka Dîyi dikulu edi nebupeta bwenzeji mu ngondu makumi asatu ne isambombo yalonda diteeka dia bishimikidi bia tshidiidi mu nkwaasa bidibo balongolola kudi Dîyi dikulu edi
Biahana muntu nsubu mu musoko udi munyungulula ne lumbu yeye udi mua kuhikula nsubu diambedi tshidimu tshimue katshiyi tshianze kuhita, tô tshidimu tshijima yeye udi mua kumuhikula

Mu ngondo muibidi mu dituku dia dikumi ne anai ku dilolo nebakuvuluke, nebadie mampa adi kâyi ne luevene ne matshitshi adi ne bululu, kabashiyi tshintu to ne ku dinda, kabatshibudi nansha mufuba umue, nebenze bu mudi mikenji yonso ya kuhita kua Yehowa
Nusangishe bakulu benu bonso ba mu bisamba bienu ne tuhita tuenu kundi, bua meme kubambila mei â onso ku matshu abo, nembikile diulu ne buloba bu bamonyi ba bualu kudibo
Yai bienu, enzai mudimu, katuena tunuha bisonsa, kadi nuenu nenulue ne bungi bua tushola bu mutuakuamba
Bobo batshidi bantu bebe ne buhianyi buebe, bawakahatula ne bukole buebe bunene ne diboko diebe diolola
Bena Ejipitu bakenzesha Bena Isalele mudimu bikole

Abalahama wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakangata bidia ne mulondo wa mai, wakabika kudi Haga, wakabiteka ha diaha diandi, wakamuha muana, wakabatuma ha bule, wakaya biandi, wakendakana mu tshihela tshia Bê sheba
Nsongalume kakahidia bualu ebu bualu bua mutshima wandi wakadi muele kudi muana wa bakashi wa Yakoba, butumbi buandi buakatamba bua bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu andi
Hashishe nebâteke dina dianyi ha Bena Isalele, meme nembavudishile disanka
Munyinyi udi mushale ne mampa adi mashale nubioshe mu kahia
Nomba Mikenji ya Kuditshiha Mose wakambila bakadi ku mutu kua bisamba bia Bena Isalele ne, Edi ndî diakutuambila Yehowa
Bantu bakuabo ba munkatshi muabo bakadi ne lukuka be Bena Isalele bakadila kabidi, bakamba ne, Nganyi neatuhe munyinyi wa tuetu kudia
Nuenu nenudie bidia bia disanka ku mesu kuanyi misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Mishindu ya kuludika ne kupeshangana buloba bwa Mbulamatadi butedibwa mu kalongu kadianjila aka idi mifidibwa kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Kanuhendi muena mahaha, kanuteki tshintu tshia ku lenduisha n atshi muntu mufofo, kadi nuenu nutshine Nzambi wenu meme ndi Yehowa
Mu Gêshona muakadi diku dia Bena Libini ne diku dia Bena Shimei, au mmeku a bena Gêshona
Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne tshia kukuba bintu, biûma ne makasa a bantu bônso ne kuneemeka bintu bia bende
Kanukudimunyi mitshima yenu kudi mpingu, kanudienzedi mpingu ne tshiamu tshiakengululabo mu kahia ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Kanungu ka Dipitshishila mu ditunga, dibweeja, diteeka, dijika, ditshikija mu mâyi a munkatshi mwa ditunga ne mu bitupa bia mbuwa bidi ku bukookeshi bwa ditunga, dimwangalaja mu lupepela dia bishakata bia lulengu, biboleshi, biladioaktif anyi dia tshintu tshikwabo tshiônso tshia njiwu, tshifumina anyi katshiyi tshifumina ku matunga meenyi, didi tshibawu tshinene tshidi mêyi ne mikandu anyooka

Minyinyi ya mu mai yakadi mu musulu bakafua, musulu wakamuha muhuya mubi, ne Bena Ejipitu kabakamanya mua kunua mai a mu musulu, mashi akadi mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, Bena bilengulengu ba mu Ejipitu bakenza muomumue ne manga abo, mutshima wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye kakabunvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Yehowa wakaha bantu dikasa dimpe kudi Bena Ejipitu Muntu eu Mose wakadi muntu munene be mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ku mesu kua bena mudimu ba Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi
Mose wakabika, wakaya kudi Datana ne Abilama, ne bakulu ba mu Isalele bakamulonda ku nyima
Kadi Abalama wakambila Salai ne, Mona, muena mudimu webe udi mu tshianza tshiebe, umuenzele bu mûdi musue Salai wakamuenzela bibi ne yeye wakanyema ku mesu kuandi
Tuetu nkayetu tudi basue kuenza nunku kabidi
Mose wakafua argent ya buhikudi buabo kudi Alona ne bana bandi balume bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Genese Tunkanunuma tua Esau Kul

Diambedi tshiyi muanze kushikisha kuamba mei au mu mutshima wanyi, Lebeka wakaluhuka ne mulondo wa mai ha diaha diandi, wakaya ku mushimi wa mai, wakasuna mai, meme nakamuambila ne, Umpeku mai a kunua

Kadi bikala Yehowa wenza bualu buhia buhia, ne buloba bubulula mukana muabu bubamina ne bantu bonso hadibo n abo, ne bobo baya ku Muaba wa Bafue hatshidibo ne muoyo, nunku nenumanye ne bantu aba bakalengulula Yehowa

Mu dîba adi, Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshidi mwa kulunguluja nansha mukanda uvwabo beenza kudi Kasumbu kakese kasanga ka bantu bûngi bwa momumwe, nansha mukanda wa ndekeelu uvwatshi tshielele tukanda, mushintulula pikalabio bienzeka kudi diakajilula dia dîyi dimwe anyi a bûngi adibo banyisha kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe
Udi ne ngikadilu wa Polovensa
Kushihianganyi
Enza dihu ne tshituha tshimue tshia or hankatshi ha mahu abidi, hankatshi ha mahu abidi ku mahu asambombo a ha tshitekelu tshia minda

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu kadi katangila malomba a ditangilula ngumvwilu wa Dîyi dikulu, pa dilomba dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga , dia Bukalenga bunene, dia Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe, dia Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia Batshipwita munwamfwanka, dia tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia beena tshibambalu tshimwe ne tshimwe tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga, dia banguvenêla ba polovensa ne dia balombodi bia bimamwenda wa bukalenga bia polovensa
Bilulu bia ku luseke lua tshibi nebikale coudées dikumi ne itanu, ne makunshi abi asatu ne nkanu isatu

Nakamueneka kudi Abalahama ne kudi Isaka ne kudi Yakoba bu Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso, kadi bobo kabakamanya dina dianyi Yehowa nansha Meme kabidi nakajadika n abo tshihungidi tshianyi bua kubaha buloba bua Kanana, buloba buakadibo bashikamamu bu benyi
Hakatshia butuku bakatuma balume aba ne mpunda yabo kuabo
Hakabandisha Mose tshianza tshiandi Bena Isalele bakatamba bukole, ne hakahuekesheye tshianza tshiandi, Bena Amaleka bakatamba
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima, Hoshea, muana mulume wa Nuna

Muntu yonso udi mudijidile udi mua kudia munyinyi eu, kadi mundi udi kayi mudijidile udi udia munyinyi wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala udibo bafila kudi Yehowa, nebumushe mundi eu munkatshi mua bana babo

Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi uya ku mpala kuenu, yeye neanuluile nvita yenu, bu muakenzeye ku mesu kuenu mu Ejipitu, ne mu tshihela, nuakatangila ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanutuala mu maboko, bu mudi tatu utuala muan andi mulume, mu nshila yonso inuakaya tô ne hanuakalua ku muaba eu
Abalahama wakakuna mutshi ku Be sheba, wakabikilaku dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Kashidi
Muan a bute wakambila muan a mukala ne, Tatu wetu udi mununu, ne kakuena mulume mukuabo udi mua kulua kutudi bu mudi tshilele tshia bonso ba ha buloba
Bituenza mikenji ei ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bu muakabambileye, netubadibue ne mbakane

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi katangila tshilumbu tshia dibenga kumvwangana dia Dîyi dikulu ne dipangadika diônso dia mêyi ne mikandu anyi dia buludiki, difila ku anyi kudi tshilumbulwilu kampanda
Mulau wa Buihi Matuku akakumbana muanda mutekete ku nyima kua dituta dia mai a mu musulu kudi Yehowa
Eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele
Enza mbote ya or makumi atanu ku mubangu wa tshilulu tshimue, ne mesu a mbote makumi atanu ku mubangu wa tshilulu tshikuabo, bua kutuangasha bilulu, tshitendelelu netshikale bu tshilulu tshimue
Nunku bana bakashi ba Lota babidi bakimita mafu kudi tatu wabo
Udi mwa kujuka anu padibo bamuteeka mwaba mupiamupia anyi ku didilombela diende anyi mu dikombolangana ditookesha ne dipangadika kudi Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya bakoshi ba nsambu
Mifundu yaadi mmienza ne mutu wa nkashama mweela munkatshi, ku dia bakaji ne ku dia balume kudi mubanga wa kapumbu ne difuma,biônso biteeka pa dibwe
Bialenga muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi tshivuadi tshia dima tshianza, nebatshishihe, ne nguvu yonso yakasongabo ya mabaya nebayuvuwe ne mai
Badi badinyooka bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu

Dilomba Ndumbulula Minisitele Tshipungu tshia ditumibwa Kasumbu ka bantu badi bashadila ku bûngi Majorité Nation Nationalité Organisation observateur Opposition Parlement Peuple Pouvoir Pluralisme politique Parti Parti unique Personnalité juridique Programme Plan Président de la République Procédure pénale Politique Pénal Réfugié Recours

Bikalaku mushikankunde utshidi kamama, udi mubangila kudi mulume, ne muntu mukuabo udi usangakena n andi mu musoko, udi ulala n andi; hashishe nebalue n abo bubidi buabo ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko au, nenubakume ne mabue tô ne hafuabo; mushikankunde, bualu bua yeye kakadila hakadiye mu musoko, ne mulume, bualu bua yeye wakanyanga mukashi wa muena mutumba n andi: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Aba mbana ba balume ba Lakele bakaleleleye Yakoba buonso buabo dikumi ne banai
Nenkuhe wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe buloba buonso bua Kanana bûdi wendakanamu, bu buhianyi buenu bua tshiendelele, nengikale Nzambi wabo
Mose ne Eleazâ bakenza muakambila Yehowa Mose

Mu tshitendelelu ku mpala kua tshilulu tshidi ku mpala kua mushete wa Nzambi Alona ne bana bandi balume nebalame muinda dilolo tô ne dinda ku mesu kua Yehowa, bualu ebu nebuikale bu mukenji ku bikondo bienu tshiendelele kudi bana ba Isalele
Bena Isalele bakambila Mose ne, Mona

Mu dituku diakashimikabo nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ntenta wa dimanyisha dia Yehowa, ditutu diakabuikila nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ku dilolo tô ne ku dinda diakakenka bu kahia ha mutu ha nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Yakoba wakambila Labana ne, Bualu bua nakatshina, nakelangana meji ne wewe neunyenge bana bebe ba bakashi ku bukole
Butumbi bua Yehowa buakikala ha mukuna wa Sinai, ne difutu diakaubuikila matuku asambombo Dituku dia muanda mutekete yeye wakabikila Mose munkatshi mua ditutu

Hakafikabo, bakalua kudi Mose ne kudi Alona ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele mu tshihela tshia Palana ku Kadesha, bakalua kudibo ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso ne dî diabo, bakabalesha mamuma a buloba abu
bwa kwenzeja padibo babeenga Kanungu ka Lungenyi lwa kwenzeja mêyi ludi lufumina kudi Bukalenga bunene, kudi tshipwita munwamfwanka yônso bipalakana ne kudi tshipwita mukulumpa yônso
Tshidimu tshia makumi atanu netshikale tshidimu tshia disanka dinene kunudi, kanukunyi bintu, kanuhuodi bintu bidi bidimenena anyi tumuma tudi tudimenena
Wewe neuhe bantu ba bungi buhianyi bunene, ne bantu bakese buhianyi bukese muntu ne muntu wakabalabo wewe neumuhe buhianyi
Bobo bangate or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin mutambe buimpe

Hashikishabo kuvuwa tshintu atshi, muakuidi neatangile ne ditoba dia disama kadiyi diandamuke mekala, nansha bikaladi kadiyi ditampakane, tshintu atshi katshiena tshiakane, nebatshioshe mu kahia edi ndisama dia nsudi, bikala disama ku mutu kua muena dibala anyi ku mpala hadi dibala
Nuenze mudimu wenu matuku asambombo, kadi nuikishe dituku dia muanda mutekete: nuikishe mu tshidimu tshia kukuna bintu ne mu tshidimu tshia kuhuola bintu
Bilongelu bia ditunga bidi, mu diumvwangana ne bamfumu ba ditabuuja, mwa kupeesha balongi ba mabeela pa ludimi, pa dilomba dia baledi baabo, dimanya dia maalu didi dilonda ditabuuja diabo
Dîba adi tshilumbulwilu tshidi tshipangadika bwa kutangila nsambu bantu kabayipu to
Yakoba wakabikila muaba wakayikidileye ne Nzambi ne Betele

Kanungu ka : Mu tshikondo tshia midimu yabo, Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne beena Bukalenga bunene kabeena, bôbo nkayabo anyi batuma muntu, mwa kusumba anyi kwangata mu mushindu kampanda, anyi kufutshila tshintu tshia Mbulamatadi, tshia polovensa anyi tshia bitupa bidikadile bia teletwale to
midimu ne bisalu bia bantu bônso idi yambulwisha polovensa ne misoko;
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nulue ne milambu, ne bintu binudi nuosha ha kahia, bidi bitua dihembu kundi, mu matuku anakasungula
Yeye wakasangakena n andi mu muaba wa hatuhu, mu tshihela muakadi luhehele nkayalu; yeye wakamunyunguluka, wakamulama bimpe, wakamuenzela bu kamonyi ka disu diandi
Bakalekela bidia tô ne ku dinda bu muakamba Mose, ne bidia kabiakabola, ne bishi kabiakabuelamu
Isalele udi ushikama biandi talalâ, mpokolo wa Yakoba udi ha nkayandi mu madimi a blé ne a nvinyo mihia mihia: ne matutu andi adi amatshisha dibungi

Bikaleye mubaka kudi mulume hatshidiye ne kuditshiha kuandi anyi mei makuabo akaditshiheye n au ne biunvua mulume wandi ne biahuweye mu dituku diakunveye kuditshiha kuandi, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso nebijalame
Yuda ne bana babo bakalua ku nsubu wa Yosefe, yeye wakadiku, bakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua ndi
Neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô matuku onso a disama diandi, yeye kena muakane, neashikame ha nkayandi ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Ndi nkutendekena ne, Unsungile mu bianza bia mukulu anyi Esau, ndi mmutshina ne yeye nealue kunshiha ne bamamu ne bana

Bikala mulume ne bakashi babidi, udi musue umue, udi ukina mukuabo, ne bubidi buabo ne mukashi wakadiye musue ne mukuabo wakadiye ukina, hakamulelela bana; ne bikala mukashi wakadiye ukina mumulelele muan a bute wandi; hashishe mu dituku didiye uhianyisha bana bandi balume bintu bidiye n abi, yeye kena mua kuteka muana wa mukashi wakadiye musue ku mpala kua muan a bute wandi wa mukashi wakadiye ukina
Udi umanyisha beena Ditunga mu mukenji
Tuye kumuhana kudi Bena Yishemaele, katumulengi tshianza, bualu bua yeye udi muan etu, udi musunyi wetu Bana babo bakamunvuila
Mukelenge wa Edome wakalua ne bantu ba bungi, ne tshianza tshikole
Bantu bakabalabo, bana balume ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu, bakadi binunu muanda mutekete ne nkama itanu
Bu meme muolole tshianza tshianyi, mufume disama dikole kudi bantu bebe, wewe wakadi kujimina ha buloba
Gada, tshisumbu tshia bantu netshimunguile, kadi yeye neabakume ku bikankanyi biabo

Yeye neangate nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo ne mitshi ya cèdre ne bintu bikunze kunzû ne mabeshi a hisopa, nealue bintu ebi ne nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo mu mashi a nyunyu wakashihabo ha mutu ha mai adi ahueka, yeye neamiamine mashi ham bidi ha muena nsudi udiye musue kulengesha misangu muanda mutekete, neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, nealekele nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo mu tshisuku
Katataka, tangila, muadi wa Bena Isalele Wakafika kundi, Hakatangila kabidi dikenga diabo didi Bena Ejipitu babakengesha n adi
Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu tshidi tshidikookela mu buludiki ne mu mianda ya lupetu ne tshidi ne lwatshi lupetu lwa nsungansunga
Aba mbana ba balume ba Seî, Muena Holi, bena buloba Lotana ne Shobala ne Sibiona ne Ana, ne Dishona ne Eze ne Dishana, aba mbakelenge ba Bena Holi, bana ba Sei, mu buloba bua Edome
Mu tshituha tshia Bena Isalele nenuangate umue kudi makumi atanu, wa bantu ne wa ngombe ne wa nyama wa mpunda ne wa mikoko, nubifile kudi Bena Lewi badi balama nsubu wa Yehowa
Bantu bakadi ne nyota, bakatontolola Mose, bakamba ne, Wakuluila n etu ku Ejipitu bua kutushiha ne bana betu ne bimuna bietu ne nyota munyi
Au mmeku a Manashe, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi atanu ne bibidi ne nkama muanda mutekete
Enza biebe nkanu ya or ibidi, uyiteke muinshi mua bilulu bia efoda bia ha maha, ku mpala kuabi ne ku mutu kua mukaba wa efoda
Nenudie mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku asambombo; ne dituku dia muanda mutekete nedikale dia tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; kanuenji mudimu nansha

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, yeye neabeye nsuki yandi yonso idi ku mutu wandi ne muedi wandi ne makiki andi ne miosa yandi yonso, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neoweshe mubidi wandi ne mai, neikale muakane
Nzambi wa kashidi udi muaba webe wa kushikama talalâ, ne maboko andi a tshiendelele atu akubisha: yeye wakihata bena lukuna ku mesu kuebe, ne yeye wakamba ne, Bashihai
Nzambi wakafuka muntu ne tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, wakamufuka ne tshifuanyikishi tshia Nzambi, wakabafuka balume ne bakashi
Bena Isalele bakadila Mose matuku makumi asatu mu mpata wa Moaba; nunku matuku a kudila kua Mose akashika

Tudi tuvuluka bua munyinyi wa mu mai utuakadia mu Ejipitu tshianana, concombres ne melona ne poireaux ne matungulu ne ail, kadi katataka mioyo yetu idi minyane, katuena ne tshintu tshikuabo tshia kutangila anu mana â
Kanungu ka Bukookeshi bwa kwikala ne nzubu wa nsongu, bwa kupeta mâyi a kunwa ne nzembwa budi bujadikibwa
Wakantuma bualu kai
bûngi bwa bantu, bintu ne dibadika;
Genese Yakoba wakunvua mei a bana ba balume ba Labana bamba ne, Yakoba wakakongolola bintu bionso bia tatu wetu wakadiangatshila bubanji buakadi bua tatu wetu
Kanungu ka Dibweela dia bilumbulwilu didi dienzeka ku mêsu a bantu bônso, pa kumbusha pikala ngenzelu ewu mwa kwikala ne njiwu ku bulongama bwa bantu bônso anyi ku bibidilu bia mulowu
Mêyi a ditunga ke adi aakaja bûngi bwa lupetu lwa Ditunga bônso
Bialua muakuidi ne hatangileye ne disama kadiena ditampakana mu nsubu hashikishabo kumujinguila, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Nsubu eu udi muakane bualu bua disama diakashika

Lemeke wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu ne bibidi, wakalela muana mulume, wakamuidika dina ne, Noa, wakamba ne, Yeye neatusambe mu mudimu wa bianza bietu, bualu bua buloba buakedibua mulau kudi Yehowa
Yeye wakadi mukelenge wa mu Yeshuluna, hakasangishabo bakadi ku mutu kua bantu ba bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele
Bana ba balume ba Yuda Ele ne Onana ne Shela, ne Pelese ne Zela kadi Ele ne Onana bakafuila mu buloba bua Kanana Bana ba balume ba Pelese, Helelona ne Hamula
Nakuikala n ebe to bidimu ebi makumi abidi, mashina a mikoko ne mashina a mbushi kakatula mafu nansha, ne meme tshiakudia mbushi yebe ya bimpanga
Kudisongedi luhingu anyi tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu tshia mu diulu anyi tshia tshintu tshia hanshi ha buloba anyi tshia tshintu tshia mu mai adi muinshi mua buloba

Yisakâ udi bu nyama wa mpunda mukole, udi ulala hankatshi ha mpangu ya mikoko, wakatangila muaba wa kulala ne, Mmuimpe wakatangila buloba ne, Mbuimpe, wakahuekesha diaha diandi bua kumema bujitu, wakalua bu muhika wa mudimu mukole
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne bisatu ne nkama mai

Lewitiki Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Biasambuka muntu ku mikenji bua kuenzela Yehowa bualu bubi, ne bienzeleye muena mutumba n andi bualu bubi ne bintu biakafileye mu bianza biandi anyi hendululeye n abi mushinga anyi bibeye bintu biandi, anyi biakengesheye muena mutumba n andi, anyi bianguleye tshintu tshiakajimishabo kudi mukuabo mumudinge bua bualu ebu ne muditshiheye ne mashimi, bienzeye malu mabi â onso, bienzeye bibi, bikaleye muhile, yeye neahingishe bintu biakibeye anyi tshintu tshiakanyengeye ku bukole anyi bintu biakufileye mu bianza biandi anyi bintu biakadi bijimina biakuanguleye anyi tshintu tshiakaditshiheye n atshi ne mashimi, neahingishe tshintu atshi ne tshituha tshitanu ha mutu katshi, neatshihingishe kudi muen atshi mu dituku didibo bamuhisha
Dîyi, meyi ne mikandu Bukalenga Mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga Bia kwenza nabi mudimu Bimwangalaji bia mianda, bia ngumu
Mona, meme ndi n ebe, nenkulame kuonso kuwaya nenkuhingashe ku buloba ebu kabidi, tshiena nkulekela tô ne hanashikisha kukuenzela malu onso anakukuambila
Nzambi wakasangakena ne Belâma, ne Belâma wakamuambila ne, Nakasa bioshelu muanda mutekete, nakosha mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga ha tshioshelu ne ha tshioshelu
Abalahama wakafua bintu bionso biakadiye n abi kudi Isaka

Dinda adi mutshima wandi wakabanga kubungama, wakatuma dî, Wakabikila bena majimbu ne bena meji bonso ba mu Ejipitu, Palô wakabamanyisha bilota biandi, kadi nansha umue wabo wakamanya mua kujinguluila Palô bilota biandi

Hashishe hakambikila Nzambi, wakangumusha ku nsubu wa tatu wanyi, meme nakamuambila ne, Elu nduse lundi musue wewe kundesha, ku miaba yonso itudi tuya n ebe ubambile bua bualu buanyi ne, Yeye udi mukulu wanyi wa balume
Biahatuka tufina mu mubidi wa muntu, biatuidileye muntu udi muakane lute, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ubale bungi bua bintu biakangatabo ne bia bantu ne bia bimuna, ne wewe ne Eleazâ muakuidi ne ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo mu Isalele
Bua bualu ebu nakambila Bena Isalele ne, Muntu wa munkatshi muenu kadi mashi nansha muenyi udi munkatshi muenu kadi mashi
Nzambi wakabimona ne, Mbimpe
Kadi binuikala kanuyi baditshiha, bualu ebu kabuena bubi kunudi
Kalongo kisambombo : Bidi bitangila lwendu lwa tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa

Muntu au, mukelenge wa buloba, wakabambila ne, Ku bualu ebu nemmanye ne, Nudi nuamba mei malelela, nushiye umue wenu kundi, bakuabo benu bangate bia kudia bia kumana n abi tshiole tshidi mu nsubu yenu, yai bienu
Bana ba balume ba Lewi, Geshona ne Kohata ne Melah
Di dia Yehowa kudi Mose ne Alona Mose wakahingana kudi Yehowa, wakamba ne, Yehowa, wewe wakenzela bantu aba bibi nunku bualu kai

Muakuidi neamutangile, ne bikala tshiuja etshi tshitoke tô ku mutu kua muena dibala, anyi ha mpala hadi dibala, bu nsudi udi umueneka mu dikoba diandi, yeye udi muena nsudi, kena muakane, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane, udi ne disama dia nsudi ku mutu kuandi
Meme nendue n enu mu buloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, nennuhebu bu buhianyi ndi Yehowa
Bana ba balume ba Zebuluna, Selede ne Elona ne Yalele
Kanungu ka Pikalabo babapiisha, badi bumbusha Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne Minisitila Kavulambedi ku mudimu
Bikala tshintu atshi ha bulalu buakadiye anyi ha tshintu tshiakashikameye hakatshilengeye, yeye neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Nakunvua kutontolola kua Bena Isalele kudibo bantontolola n aku
Bakalua ne Mose ne Alona kudi Palo, ne yeye wakabambila ne, Yai bienu nutendelele Yehowa Nzambi wenu kadi badi bamba kuya mbanganyi
Musombuedi kalondi mushihianganyi eu hadiye ne tshiji tshikole, kamuhetshi, bualu bua nshila udi utamba bule, kamushihi diambedi kabayi banze kumuhisha, bualu bua yeye kakadi n andi tshiji diambedi
Kadi biasumba muakuidi muntu, muntu eu udi mua kutshidia, ne bana baledibue mu nsubu muandi nebadie bidia biandi
Kanukunyi ntete ya mishindu ibidi mishilangane mu budimi bua tumuma tukese, anyi nebajidile bintu bionso biakadiundamu ne ntete inuakukuna ne tumuma tukese tudi mitshi ei ikuama
Bana babo bakaya kudiye kabidi bakafua mpala yabo hanshi ku mesu kuandi, bakamba ne, Mona, Buonso buetu tudi bahika bebe
Bobo nebikale ba tshijila kudi Nzambi wabo, kabanyangishi dina dia Nzambi wabo, bualu bua bobo badi bafila milambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia nunku bobo nebikale ba tshijila
Muanjelo wa Yehowa Mutumibue bua Kulomboleye Bena Isalele Mona, ndi nfuma muanjelo ku mpala kuebe, bua kukulama mu nshila ne bua kulua n ebe mu muaba unakakulongoluela
Hakashika argent yonso ya mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ya mu buloba bua Kanana, hashishe Bena Ejipitu bonso bakalua kudi Yosefe, bakamuambila ne, Utuhe bia kudia, netufuile ku mesu kuebe bualu kai
Mose wakamba ne, Nenumanye ne Yehowa wakatuma bua kuenza malu au onso, tshiakadienzela bualu bua mutshima wanyi

Yakoba wakamukudimuna ne Bidimu bia luendu lua bukole buanyi bidi lukama ne makumi asatu, matuku anyi adi makese, akadi mule tente ne malu mabi, kaena manze kufika ku bungi bua bidimu bia bankambua banyi mu luendu lua bukole buabo

Biatshidiabo dituku disatu, bualu ebu budi bubi, tshiena ngitabusha mulambu, muntu yonso udi ûdia neadituadile bubi buandi, bualu bua yeye wakuona tshintu tshijila tshia Yehowa, nebumushe muntu au munkatshi mua bana babo
Bantu ba mu Sodoma bakadi babi, bakatamba kuhidia Yehowa
Bakenza bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzu bia kuenza n abi mudimu mu muaba wa tshima, bakenzela Alona bilulu bia tshijila bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Au mmeku a Bena Lewi ku nsubu ya batatu abo

Nakafila Bena Lewi kudi Alona ne bana bandi balume bu kuha kuabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bua kukuatshila Bena Isalele mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne bua kubuikidila Bena Isalele bubi buabo, bua bualu bubi kabukuatshi Bena Isalele haluabo ha buihi ne ntenta wa kusambakena
Bakangata bintu biakadiunda mu buloba mu bianza biabo, bakalua n abi kutudi, bakatuambila ne, Buloba budi Yehowa mutuhe budi buimpe
Nenvudishangane tunkanunuina tuebe bungi bu mitoto ya mulu, nempe tunkanunui na tuebe buloba ebu buonso bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisankishibue bua tunkanunuina tuebe
Noa Udi Wenza Buatu Eku nkulondolola kua malu a Noa
Mahalelela wakikala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asambombo ne bitanu, wakalela Yalede

Mose wakambila Alona ne Eleazâ ne Itama ne, Kanutudi bifulu ku mitu yenu, kanuhandi bilulu bienu, bua kanufu bienu, ne bua tshiji tshia Yehowa katshilu kudi bantu bonso, kadi bana benu, tshisamba tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, badile bualu bua kahia kakatemesha Yehowa
Pa kubeenga kufila dimanyisha edi, mu matuku makumi asatu, muntu mweena bwaalu ebu badi bamutangila bu muntu mubeenga mudimu
Mose wakolola tshianza tshiandi mulu ne midima mikole be yakadi mu buloba bua Ejipitu to matuku asatu

Bana ba Ashê ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Ashê binunu makumi anai ne tshimue ne nkama itanu

Bakenza nkanu ya or ibidi, bakayiteka muinshi mua bilulu bia ha maha, ku mpala kuabi ne ku mutu kua mukaba muimpe wa efoda Bakasanka tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi ne nkanu yatshi ku nkanu ya efoda ne muonshi wa bleu muhindakana tshilulu etshi tshiakashala hehi ne mukaba wa efoda, kabakatshisulula, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nengikale n enu luse, nennuleleshe bana ba bungi, nennuvudishangane, nenjadike tshihungidi tshianyi munkatshi muenu

Biabuikila bena buloba mesu abo kudi muntu au hafileye bana bandi kudi Moleke, kabayi bamushihe, meme nengumushe mesu anyi kudi muntu au ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu muandi, nemmumushe ne bantu bandi bonso badi benza handi malu a masandi ne Moleke, munkatshi mua bana babo
Abimeleke wakakonka Abalahama ne, Meji kai akadi munda muebe a kukuenzesha bualu ebu
Yosefe wakatuebesha ne, Kujingulula kua malu kakuena kudi Nzambi, anyi

Yeye neoshe mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, dianyi didi dibuikila bintu bia munda ne dianyi dionso dia ha mutu ha bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi didi ha mutu hatu hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne tumuma tubidi yeye neanumushe
Bena Lewi bakadilengesha ku bubi buabo, bakuvuwa bilulu biabo, Alona wakabanyukula bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, Alona wakadia mulambu wa kubabuikidila n au bubi, bualu bua kubalengesha
Mulume wakabuela mu nsubu, wakumusha biseba ha nyima ha tumelo, wakalua ne mashinde ne manvua bia tumelo, ne mai a kuvuwa n au makasa andi ne makasa a bantu bakadi n andi
Hadada wa kafua, ne Samala wa ku Maseleka, wakadia bukelenge buandi
Yeye wakamukonka ne, Nenkuhe tshinyi

Mu mianda idi ku bukookeshi bupalakaja bwa Bukalenga bunene ne bwa polovensa, dîyi dia polovensa diônso didi kadiyi diumvwangana ne mêyi ne tuludiki twa ditunga twa ngenzelu didi tshianana anyi ndifwa kakuyi bwaalu to, bu mudiku kakuyi diumvwangana

Mulubu wa mu katoba mu katoba wa dishintakaja dia ngenyi pamwe ne mikanda ya tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe badi bayipatula mu bibejibeji bia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga

Bobo bakalua ha buihi n andi, bakamba ne, Netuashile mpangu ya bimuna bietu kunoko, ne misoko ya bana betu bakese, kadi tuetu nkayetu netuye ne bintu bia nvita ku mpala kua Bena Isalele to ne hatualua n abo ku miaba yabo, ne bana betu bakese nebashikame mu misoko idi ne ngumbu bualu bua bena buloba
Aba mbana balume ba Gêshona bakabalabo ku meku abo, buonso buabo bakenza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona bu muakamba Yehowa
Hakalela Nahô Tela, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne dikumi ne tshitema, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Hakashikisha Yakoba kubadimusha nunku, wakateka makasa andi ha bulalu, wakahuola muoyo wandi, wakasangishibua kudi bankambua bandi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi, bua yeye angate malonga munkatshi mua kahia, ne wewe utangalashe kahia kuaka ebi mbintu bia tshijila, malonga a bantu aba babi bakadijinushila mioyo yabo, wenze n au tshibuikilu tshia tshioshelu bobo bakâfila ku mpala kua Yehowa, nunku adi bintu bia tshijila, neikale bu tshivulukidi kudi Bena Isalele
Nuenu ba bisamba bionso, sankai ne bantu bandi, bualu bua yeye nealombe mashi a bantu bandi, neasombuele badi n andi lukuna, udi umusha dihila dia buloba ne dia bantu bandi
Kumukeye mu nsubu wandi, yeye udi mua kuikala mukashi wa munga muntu
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi ubiikija ne ulombola Tshipangu tshia baminisitila anyi bameena
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nenjimishe bantu banakafuka ha buloba, ne bantu ne nyama ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ne nyunyu ya mulu, bualu bua mutshima wanyi udi munyingalale bua nakabifuka

Wa kafila bu mulambu wandi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Netanele, muana mulume wa Sua
Mulume wakidika bimuna bionso ne nyunyu yonso ya mu diulu ne bimuna bionso bia mu madimi mena abi, kadi mulume kakadi ne mukuatshishi wa bu muakadiye nansha
Yosefe wakavuluka bua bilota biandi biakabaloteleye, yeye wakabambila ne, Nudi batentekedi, nuakuluila bua kutangila ne buloba budi butuhu
Ekesode Bena Isalele badi ne Bualu bua Kufila Bintu Biabo Ek
Enza biebe bakeluba babidi ne or mutudibue, ubateke ku matshika a tshibuikilu tshia mushete

Tshipwita nansha umwe kabeena mwa kumufunda anyi kumukwata munkatshi mwa midimu to, pa kumbusha bôbu bamukwata tshianza mu tshisaka, ne dianyisha dia Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi batshipwita bakulumpa bilondeshila mwanda
Sipola wakangata dibue ditue, wakatengula muan andi mulume, wakateka dikoba ku makasa a Mose, wakambila Mose ne, Bulelela, wewe udi bayanyi wa mashi

Muakuidi neamutshihishe, neambile mukashi ne, Bikala mulume kayi mulale n ebe, ne wewe kuyi musesuke mu malu mabi kudi mundi udi kayi mulume webe, wewe wikale mubingishibue kudi mai a bululu adi elesha mulau
Nudi mua kudia bintu ebi bia mu mai bintu bidi ne mialala ne mabamba bidi mu mai manene ne mu misulu
Nfue bianyi lufu lua muntu muakane, ne kunshikidilu kuanyi kuikale bu kuandi
Yeye wakambila bantu bandi ne, Tangilai, Bena Isalele badi batuhita bungi ne bukole
Bakambila Mose ne, Bualu bua kakuakadi nkita mu Ejipitu, wewe wakulua n etu bua tuetu kubala mu tshihela, anyi
Yosefe wakumuka ku mpala kua Palô, wakendakana mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso

Nansha nanku, tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa tshidi mwa kupeesha Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa bukookeshi, biumukila ku dîyi, bwa kweela mêyi pa mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene
Mulambu wonso wa bukula budi busangisha ne manyi, anyi mulambu wa bukula nkayabu, newikale wa bana balume ba Alona, muntu tshituha tshiandi muntu tshituha tshiandi
Yeye wakamba ne, Katataka Yehowa wakutuenzela muaba, netukumbane mu buloba
Dîyi diônso didi dikeba mwa kufila dipangadika ku tshilumbu tshitshidi tubadi tulonga didi dia patupu ne kadieena ne tshididi dienza to

Muntu yonso udi udia tshintu tshidifuile anyi tshidi tshihandulule kudi nyama, bikaleye muledibue mu nsubu yenu anyi muenyi, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne mai, neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne dilolo, hashishe yeye neikale muakane
Wewe neuhange bulelela, ne wewe ne bantu badi n ebe bujitu bua bualu ebu budi bukutamba bukôle, wewe nkayebe kuena mua kubuenza
Nudimuke mu malu onso anakanuambila, kanuambilanganyi dina dia nzambi mikuabo, bantu bakuabo kabunvu dina adi mukana muebe
Kutedi dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi webe, tshitelatela, bua Yehowa kena ubingisha muntu udi utela dina diandi tshitelatela
tulasa twa bâna bateketa, tupwekela, tubandila, twa midimu ya bianza ne twa nsungansunga pamwe ne twa bakulumpa tulongayi bilondeshila mêyi mafila kudi bukalenga bunene;
Mamu a ndi wakamuambila ne, Mulau webe wikale ha mutu hanyi, muan anyi, anji kutumikila di dianyi, Ulue ne nkungulu ya mbushi

Bualu bua muntu udi ne tshilema kena mua kulua ha buihi muntu mufofo anyi tshibombo anyi muntu udi ne diulu dibatama anyi tshioka tshitambe bule, anyi muntu udi ne dikasa ditshibuka anyi udi ne tshianza tshitshibuka anyi muntu udi ne nyima mutuntamana anyi muntu mushunguke anyi udi ne disu disama anyi udi ne mpusu anyi udi ne bilamulamu anyi udi ne mihesa yandi mitshibuke, muntu wa munkatshi mua bana ba Alona muakuidi udi ne bintu ebi ham bidi handi kena mua kulua ha buihi bua kulaleye mulambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, yeye udi ne tshitema, kena mua kudia mulambu kudi Yehowa
Kadi balume babidi bakashala mu tshitudilu, dina dia umue ne Eladada ne dina dia mukuabo ne Medada
Wewe neusumbe bahika balume ne bahika bakashi kudi bisamba bia bantu badi hehi n ebe
Kanubatshinyi, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuluila nvita
Nuenu, Bena Kamoshe, nudi bajimine
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele bua bobo balue kûdi ne manyi akatuabo bua kutemesha n au minda ku dituku ku dituku
Mukenji eu newikale kunudi bikondo bienu bionso tshiendelele
Bakashiha Hamo ne muan andi Shekeme ne muele wa nvita, bakangata Dina mu nsubu wa Shekeme, bakaluhuka n andi
Haleha matuku muanda mutekete nendokeshe nvula ha buloba munya ne bufuku to matuku makumi anai, nenjimishe bintu bionso binakafuka ha buloba

Bakambilangana ne, Tuetu tuakudihisha bulelela mu bualu bubi butuakenzela muan etu hatuakatangila kanyinganyinga ka mutshima wandi hakadiye utusengelela, kadi tuetu katuakamunvuila, bua bualu ebu dikenga diakatukuata
Amalama wakabaka Yokebede, muan abo wa bakashi ne tatu wandi, ne yeye wakamulelela Alona ne Mose, bidimu bia Amalama biakadi lukama ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete
Mose wakamba ne, Nenye kutangila bualu ebu bua kukema ne, Munyi katshi kakena kahia
Biahona tshituha tshia mubidi yabi mufue ha bintu bidibo bakuna mu buloba, bintu ebi nebikale bilengele
Lemeke wakabaka bakashi babidi, dina dia muadi diakadi Ada, ne dina dia tshilondi ne, Sila
Dîyi dikulu didi ditabwijibwa didi dilongamangana ne ngenyi ya bikuma eyi
Mapangadika aa badi baashintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila
Udi mua kusumba bana ba benyi badi munkatshi muenu, ne bana ba benyi badi baledibue mu buloba buenu, bobo nebikale bahika benu

Aba mbakelenge ba bisamba, bakadi ku mutu kua bantu bakabalabo bakatua ne bintu biabo ku mpala kua Yehowa makalu manene asambombo ne ngombe dikumi ne ibidi dikalu dimue kudi bakelenge babidi, ne ngombe umue kudi muntu ne mundi, bakalua n abi ku mpala kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Nuenu nenuhikule muan a bute wa nyama wa mpunda ku muana wa mukoko, ne binuahanga kumuhikulai nenutshibule nshingu wandi, nenuhikule ban a bute bonso ba bantu kabidi
Kadi katataka biwasua kubabuikidila bubi buabo, kadi biwikala kuyi musue, ndi nkusengelela ne, Unjimishe mu mukanda webe uwakufunda
Isaka wakaya mu budimi dilolo bua kutendelela, wakabandisha mesu andi, ne monai, tumelo tuakadi tulua
Kadi Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Tshiakukuambila ne, Neakuambile mei onso adi Yehowa mungambile, anyi
Dina dia mukuabo ne, Eliezê, bualu bua Mose wakamba ne, Nzambi wa tatu anyi wakadi mukuatshishi wanyi, wakansungila ku muele wa nvita wa Palô
Mose Wakabikila bakulu bonso ba Bena Isalele, wakabambila ne, Nusungule bana ba mikoko bungi buai buikale bungi bua meku enu, nuyishihe bua kuhita kua Yehowa
Bena Isalele, nuenu nudi ne disanka, banganyi badi bu nuenu basungidibue kudi Yehowa
Wambile bantu mu matshu abo ne, Mulume yonso alombe muena mutumba n andi, ne mukashi yonso alombe mukashi muena mutumba n andi bilenga bia argent ne bilenga bia or

Kusombesha Bahele Bintu Bikalaku muntu muhele, umue wa bana benu, ku mbelu kua muntu yonso mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe, kanukoleshi mitshima yenu, kanubuikidi tshianza tshienu kudi muan enu udi muhele; kadi nubulule tshianza tshienu kudiye, numusombeshe bintu bidiye musue bua kushikisheye n abi malu andi

Katataka wewe wakuedibua mulau mufume ha buloba buakubulula mukana muabu bua kumina mashi a muakuny ebe ku tshianza tshiebe, hawadima buloba, kabuena bukumeneshila bintu bimpe, wewe newikale munyemi ne muena tshiendenda ha buloba
Nunku bantu bakatandangana ne Mose, bakamba ne, Utuhe mai a kunua Mose wakabambila ne, Nudi nutandangana n anyi bualu kai
Diimanyika kadieena mwa kupita matuku a midimu idi yenzeka ku bûngi to
Bana babo bakadi n andi mukau, kadi tatu wandi wakateka mei au mu mutshima wandi
Muakuidi neatonde milau ei mu mukanda, neanumushe mu mai a bululu, neamushe mukashi mai a bululu adi elesha mulau, ne mai adi elesha mulau neabuele munda muandi, neikale mai a bululu
Mulombodi wa Ditunga wa tshimpitshimpi udi wimanyina pa bulongolodi bwa disungula dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga mupiamupia bilondeshila makanyika ne tshipungu tshidi Dîyi dikulu dikosa

Muntu yônso udi pende ne bukookeshi bwa kuleeja ditabuuja diende anyi majadika ende, bu mudi mu ngakwilu, mu mifundu ne bimfwanyi, anu mwikala kabidi uneemeka mêyi ne mikandu, bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne bibidilu bia mulowo
Bakamukudimuna di ne, Mu buloba bua Kanana, tuakuluila bua kusumba bia kudia
Yeye wakakenzakana, wakamona Benyamina, muakuny andi, muana wa mamu wandi, wakabakonka ne, Eu udi muakuny enu unuakungambila, anyi
Wewe neubiluatshishe Alona muan enu ne bana bandi balume badi n andi, wewe neubele manyi ha mutu, ubalengeshe, ubajidile, bua bobo bankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi
Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kudikuba
Milonda yebe ya bibi bia musoko neyikale ya tshiamu tshifike ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, bukole buebe nebuikale bule bua matuku ebe onso
Hakukonkabo kudi muan ebe mulume ne, Mei au ne mikenji ne malu biakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bidi tshinyi
Kanudi tshintu ne mashi atshi, kanutempi mbuku, kanuenji bilengulengu

Yehowa neanutumme tshisamba tshia kule kuakua ku ditunga dikuabo bu nyunyu wa mukanku; kanuena bamanye muaku wa tshisamba atshi; badi ne luonji ku mpala kuabo, kabena banemeka bantu banunu, kabena ne luse kudi bana batekete; bobo nebadie kukumbana kua bimuna bienu, ne bintu biakadiunda mu buloba buenu tô ne hanuajimishibua; kabena banushila kabidi manvua anyi nvinyo mihia mihia anyi manyi anyi kukumbana kua bimuna bienu anyi bana ba mikoko yenu tô ne hanuajimishibua kudibo

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Dituku dia matuku dikumi a ngondo eu wa muanda mutekete ndituku dia kubuikila bubi bua bantu, nebikale dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila, nenujinge mu mitshima yenu, nenufile mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia

Ku luseke lua ku nôde kabidi, enza bilulu bidi bituangane to ne ku coudées lukama, ne makunshi makumi abidi ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku makumi abidi; bitubuidi bia ku makunshi nebikale bia argent
Nunku kabamatshishi mashi a muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu ha buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nnuha bua nuenu nubuhiane; mashi au kaikadi ham bidi henu
Yakoba wakunvua lumu ne, Yeye wakamana kunyanga muan andi mukashi Dina
Kanungu ka : Kabeena mwa kutumina muntu nansha umwe dîyi bwa kwenzayi bwaalu bumweeneka ne kabweena bulonda mêyi ne mikandu
Yeye neadie munyinyi wa mulambu wandi wa kubisha n au ditalala bua kusakidileye n au Nzambi mu dituku didiye ufila mulambu wandi, kashiyi nansha katuha kakese tô ne dinda
Nunku nubueshe mei â munda mua mitshima yenu ne muoyo wenu; nuasuika ku tshianza tshienu bu tshimanymu ne hankatshi ha makiki enu
Nakufila midioko yonso bu bia kudia kudi nyama yonso ya ha buloba ne nyunyu ya mulu ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi, tshionso tshidi ne muoyo; bualu buakenjibua
Yehowa neanuihate ku mesu kua bena lukuna benu; nuenu nenuye kudibo mu nshila umue, kadi nenunyeme ku mesu kuabo mu nshila muanda mutekete; nebanuendakashe munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia ha buloba
Bakabala tshiamu tshia argent bu bungi bua bantu, ntalanta lukama ne nshekele tshinunu tshimue, nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu bu muakadi nshekele wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi

Melekisedeke Udi Uvudishila Abalama Disanka Mukelenge wa Sodoma wakaluhuka bua kumuakidila hakahinganeye ku dishiha dia Kedolaome ne bakelenge bakadi n andi, mu tshibanda tshia Shawe etshi ntshibanda tshia Bakelenge
Hanakehesha bintu bienu bia kudia, bakashi dikumi nebalambe bidia mu luesu lumue, bobo nebanuhimine bintu bia kudia mu tshihimu, nuenu nenuhidie kadi kanuena nukuta

Muntu yônso udiku pende mwa kwindila bwa se nzuji udi ne bukookeshi atangila tshilumbu tshiende mu tshipungu katshiyi tshipita bule Badi balongolola ne bajadika bukookeshi bwa kudisungila bwa muntu yônso
Bena Isalele bakenza mudimu wonso wakambila Yehowa Mose
Mose wakashikisha mudimu wonso nunku

Wewe ubambile ne, Muntu yonso wa mu bisamba bia Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi badi munkatshi muabo udi ufila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia anyi mulambu mukuabo ne udi uhidia kulua ne mulambu ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena bua kûshihela Yehowa nebumushe muntu au munkatshi mua bana babo
Bualu bua bena nvita bonso bakadiangatshila bintu mundi ne mundi
Genese Badi Bahanyisha Yosefe Badi Baya n Andi mu Ejipitu Yakoba wakashikama mu buloba buakadi tatu andi mushikame mu buloba bua Kanâna

Hanuahuola bintu bia mu madimi enu, ne kafulaminyi kadi kanukuata bua kushiya bisumbu bikuabo mu madimi enu, kanuhinganyi bua kubiangata; nebikale bia benyi ne bia bana ba nshiya ne bia bakashi ba mu lufuila; nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Nuakatontolola mu ntenta yenu, nuakamba ne, Bualu bua Yehowa wakadi n etu tshiji, yeye wakatuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bua kutufila mu bianza bia Bena Amole, bua bobo batushihe
Ei idi ndelanganyi ya Esau, nkambua wa Bena Edome ba mu mukuna wa Sei

Tshipwita munwamwanka yônso wa ditunga anyi tshipwita mukulumpa yônso udi udiumbukila ku diswa diende mu tshisumbu tshiende tshia tshidiidi mu tshikondo tshia bukalenga mudiye amu badi bamutangila bu udi mubeenga butshipwita budiye mupetela mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi atshi
Mose wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso, wakabambila ne, Unvuai, Isalele, mei ne mikenji bindi nnuambila mu matshu enu lelu, bua nuenu nubimanye ne nubienze
Muan a mukala wakalela muana mulume kabidi, wakamuidika dina ne, Beneami, yeye wakadi nkambua wa Bena Amona tô ne lelu
Yehowa wakatangila bualu ebu, wakadi n abo tshiji, bualu bua mateta a bana bandi balume ne a bana bandi bakashi
Seluga wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu, wakalela Nahô
Bualu bua kahia kakatemeshibua mu tshiji tshianyi, kadi katema tô ne mu Muaba wa Bafue, kadi kosha buloba ne bintu biakadiundamu, kadi kosha makunshi adi muinshi mua mikuna mile
Kuvudi muana mukashi wa mukashi wa tatu ebe bilulu, yeye udi muan enu mukashi
Bena Isalele bakumuka mu Lamesese bakashikama mu Sukota
Nzambi wakambila Mose ne, MEME NDI MUNDI
Dutelonone Tshidimu tshia Buhikudi Hahita bidimu muanda mutekete nenulekelelangane bintu
Nuenu nuakahingana, nuakadila ku mpala kua Yehowa; kadi Yehowa kakunvua dî dienu, kakateleja matshu andi kunudi
Nunku Bena Isalele nebajidile dituku dia Lumingu ku bikondo biabo bionso bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula; ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia; ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuyifila n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Abidana, muana mulume wa Gideoni
Wakamona ngombe muanda mutekete yakadi ne manyi a bungi, yakabanda mu mai, yakadi idia mashinde malehe
Wakalua ne mulambu wa bukula, wakabuambula dianza tente, wakabuosha ha tshioshelu hehi ne mulambu udibo bosha ne dinda
Nunku nenumushe mashi adi kâyi ne tshilumbu munkatshi muenu hanuenza malu adi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa
Badi babashikika mu nkwaasa kudi olodonase wa Mulombodi wa ditunga
Yakoba wakasemena ha buihi ne Isaka tatu andi, yeye wakamulengela tshianza tshiandi, wakamba ne, Dî ndia Yakoba kadi bianza mbia Esau
Badi babiaasa ne bidi bienza midimu yabi bidilekelela, mu dineemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne dia bibidilu bîmpe
Nuenu nenuikale bu bantu bajidila kundi kanudi munyinyi wakahandabo kudi nyama ya mu mpata, nuwele kudi mbua
Kahia bakahatuka kudi Yehowa, kakabosha, bakafua ku mpala kua Yehowa
Bana ba balume ba Uziele Mishaele ne Ehsafana ne Siteli
Hakaheta Labana Yakoba, wakamusangana mumane kushimika ntenta yandi ku mukuna, Labana ne bantu bandi bakalala ku mukuna wa Gilada

Mose wakamba ne, Katuena mua kuenza nunku, bituashihela Yehowa Nzambi wetu nyama, netuenze bualu budi bufuisha Bena Ejipitu bundu, bituenza bualu budi bufuisha Bena Ejipitu bundu ku mesu, bobo kabena batukuma ne mabue, anyi
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Nansha, mukelenge wetu, bantu bebe bakuluila anu bua kusumbabo bia kudia
Nunku tuakahita bana betu, bana ba Esau, bakadi bashikama mu Sei, mu nshila wa ku Alabâ ku Elata to ne ku Esione gebê
Bakumuka mu Kehelata, bakashikama ku mukuna wa Shefe

Bakamuha bidia ha buandi, bakabaka bidia ha buabo, ne bakaha Bena Ejipitu bakadi badia n andi ha buabo, bualu bua Bena Ejipitu kabatu badia bidia ne Bena Ebelu, bualu ebu budi bufuisha Bena Ejipitu bundu
Mose wakambila Yoshua ne, Utusunguile bantu baye kuluangana ne Bena Amaleka
Kuendeshi muan ebe mukashi masandi, malu a masandi neikale mu buloba, ne buloba nebukale ne malu mabi tente
Nuvuluke dituku dia Lumingu, didi dituku dia tshijila kunudi, mundi yonso udi wona dituku adi nebamushihe, mundi yonso udi wenza mudimu dituku adi, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Meku a Bena Gêshona nebashikame ku nyima kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu ku wesete
Bualu bukuabo kabidi, meme, muntu webe nakadieyeka bu tshieya tshia nsongalume eu kudi tatu wanyi

Mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji udi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, mukenji umue udi wisuika, muakindi udi ufila mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu neangate tshituha tshia munyinyi tshidi tshishale
Kadi bobo bakaya ku mutu kua mukuna ku bukole, kadi Mose ne mushete wa Yehowa kabiakumuka mu tshitudilu
Kanungu ka Pa kumusha bulongolodi bwa mushindu mukwabo bwa ngelelu wa mêyi, makalenga a polovensa adi alonda mêyi ne tuludiki twa ditunga mu midimu yawu

Nunku badi belangana nsumuinu ne, Luai bienu ku Heshebona, musoko wa Sihona wikale muibakibue, Bualu bua kahia kakumuka ku Heshebona, ludimi lua kahia ku musoko wa Sihona, luakosha Ala wa Moaba ne bakelenge ba ku mikuna ya mai a Ânona
Labana wakabuela mu ntenta wa Yakoba ne mu ntenta wa Lea ne mu ntenta ya bena mudimu babo ba bakashi, kakasangana mpingu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Etshi ntshilele tshia kuhita kua Yehowa muenyi kena mua kutshidia
Kabuyi bunyangakaja bulongolodi bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi, bulongolodi bwa tunungu , , , , ne budi butangila, bilondeshila dishintuluka dia maalu, Bimamwenda wa bukalenga bia mu polovensa

Buloba ebu buakadi buloba bua Bena Lefa: Bena Lefa bakashikamamu diambedi; kadi Bena Amona badi bababikila ne, Bena Zamazuma, bantu bakole, bantu ba bungi, bule bua Bena Anaka; kadi Yehowa wakabashiha ku mpala kuabo, bobo bakabalonda ku nyima, bakashikama mu muaba wabo; bu muakenzeleye bana ba Esau, bakadi bashikama mu Sei, hakashiheye Bena Holi ku mpala kuabo; bobo bakabalonda ku nyima, badi bashikama mu muaba wabo tô ne ku dituku edi

Bwa kujadika mungalata mu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata, Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi didi dimanya anu bishimikidi bikwatshishi bia mungalata bibidi: Kasumbu kadikadila kimikila mianda ya Masungulangana, kadi ne tshia kulongolola midimu ya masungulangana kamuyi dikosoloja ne Kapangu ka ku mutu kimikila mianda ya ngumu ne ya dishintakaja ngenyi, kadi ne tshia kushindika budikadidi ne dikubiba dia batshikuma mbila ne dia bia kumanyisha nabio bantu bônso mianda, mu dinemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu
Bakangata bintu bionso bia bantu ne bia bimuna kabidi
Mose kakamanya mua kubuela mu ntenta bualu bua difutu diakimana ha mutu ha nsubu, ne butumbi bua Yehowa buakula nsubu tente
Wakakenzakana, kakamona muntu, wa kashiha Muena Ejipitu, wakamusokoka mu lusenga

Muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mbushi wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi miena mashi akaluabo n au bua ku buikila bubi mu muaba wa tshijila nebaye n ai ku butshika bua tshibi dilu, neboshe biseba biai ne munyinyi wai ne tuma tuai mu kahia
Bena Isalele Badi Bahita Oga wa ku Bashana Bukole Dut
Badi mwa kumusungula tshia kabidi
Yehowa wakahueka mu difutu, wakimana ku mbelu kua Ntenta, wakabikila Alona ne Mîyama, bobo bakaluhuka
Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu kadi ku bukookeshi bwa Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga
Bakumuka mu Kibelota hatawa bakashikama mu Haselota
Tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele netshienze tshilele etshi
Muntu yonso udi uhidia kujinga mu mutshima wandi dituku adi nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Bobo bakamba ne, Netubikile nsongakashi, netumuebeshe yeye
Yehowa wakatuma luhehele lukole lua ku wesete, bakabandisha mikumbi, luakayihata mu Dishiba Dikunze, nansha mukumbi umue wakashala mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Muntu yônso wendenda udi pende ne tshia kwikala ne moyo wende ne mubidi wende katakata ne kabidi udi pende mwa kutantshisha bumuntu bwende mu dineemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso, dia mapa a mukwende ne dia bibidilu bîmpe
Nealue ne muana wa ngombe ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena ku mesu kua Yehowa, neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha muana wa ngombe, neashihe muana wa ngombe ku mesu kua Yehowa
Bua Dana yeye wakamba ne, Dana udi bu muana wa nyama wa ntambue: udi muhika mumuke ku Bashana
Wewe newasuike bu tshimanyinu ku tshianza tshiebe, ne hankatshi ha makiki
Genese Buhidia bua Bantu Nyoka wakatamba nyama yonso yakafuka Yehowa Nzambi bidimu
Argent wa Buhikudi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Hawabala bungi bua Bena Isalele, muntu ne muntu afile bintu bia kuhikula n abi muoyo wandi kudi Yehowa; bua makenga makole kâbakuatshi hawababala
Wewe neufue Bena Lewi kudi Alona ne kudi bana bandi balume bobo badi bafidibue kudi Alona, bua kukuatshishabo Bena Isalele
Kadi bikala mulume wandi mumukande mu dituku diakunvueye, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso kabiena bualame, mulume wandi wakavuisha malu au bu malu a hatuhu, Yehowa neamubiukidile bualu abu
Bakumuka mu Moselota, bakashikama mu Bene yâkana
Ebi mbiota bia bana balume ba Noa ku milongo yabo, bisamba bia bantu biakamuangalaka ha buloba ku nyima kua nvula munene biakafuma kudibo
Nzambi wakamubikila mu katshi, wakamba ne, Mose, Mose Yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Yeye kena mutangile malu mabi munkatshi mua bana ba Yakoba, yeye kena mutangile mitshima mikole munkatshi mua Isalele
Palô Wakabikila Mose ne Alona, wakamba ne, Yai bienu, nushihele Nzambi wenu nyama mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Nudi bamanye ne nakukuatshila tatu enu mudimu ne bukole buanyi buonso Tatu wenu wakundinga, wakakudimuna difutu dianyi misangu dikumi, kadi Nzambi kakitabusha bua yeye kunkengesha
Mose nealue nkayandi hehi ne Yehowa, kadi bobo kabalu hehi nansha, bantu kabayi n andi
Ku dî dia Yehowa Bena Isalele bakaya ku luendu, ne ku dî dia Yehowa bakalongolola tshitudilu, hakatshidi ditutu dimana ku mutu kua nsubu, bobo bakashala mu tshitudilu
Biabika muena mashimi bua kutumpila mukuabo bua malu mabi akadiye wenza, nunku bubidi buabo badi batandangana, nebimane ku mesu kua Yehowa ne ku mesu kua bakuidi ne balumbuluishi ba mu matuku au
Muntu yonso udi umulenga tshianza ham bidi handi neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo

Yehowa Nzambi wakambila nyoka ne, Bualu bua wewe wakuenza nunku, ndi nkuela mulau, mulau webe neutambe wa nyama yonso ya mu madimi, wewe neukoke difu diebe hanshi, neudie dinfuenkenya dia buloba matuku ebe onso
Muntu yonso udi ulenga bulalu buandi tshianza neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Nashona muana mulume wa Aminadaba neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Yuda

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Eu udi mulambu wa Alona ne bana bandi balume udibo bafila kudi Yehowa mu dituku didibo bela manyi ha mutu tshia dikumi tshia épha wa bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula, neafile tshituha dinda ne tshituha tshikuabo dilolo
Yeye wakakonka Yakoba ne, Dina diebe nganyi
Adama wakamanyangana ne mukashi wandi kabidi, Wakalela muana mulume, wakamuidika dina ne, Sheta Wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpa muana mukuabo mu muaba wa Ebele, bualu bua Kana wakamushiha
Enza bu mundi nkuambila dituku edi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Au mmena a balume badi banutahuluila buloba bua buhianyi buenu, Eleazâ muakindi ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna
Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena mumanye, ndi mulami wa muakuny anyi, anyi
Bobo bakadikuma hanshi, bakamba ne, Nzambi, Nzambi wa mioyo ya bantu, wewe newikale ne tshisumbu tshonso tshiji bua bubi bua mundi umue, anyi
Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe
Yehowa wakakonka Abalahama ne, Sala wakaseka bua tshinyi, wamba ne, Meme nendele muana, hankadi mukoke aha, anyi
Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena bakambila Mose ne, Bantu bebe nebenze bu mudi mukelenge Wamba
Difutu edi badi badilongolola mu dîyi dia mianda ya lupetu

Hakatangila Yosefe ne tatu wandi wakatentekasha tshianza tshiandi tshia balume ha mutu ha Efelayima, bualu ebu kabuakamusankisha, ne yeye wakabisha tshianza tshia tatu wandi, wakamba kutshiumusha ku mutu wa Efelayima, wakamba kutshiteka ku mutu wa Manashe

Yeye wakabadimusha, wakabambila ne, Nkadi ha kudisangisha ne bankambua banyi, nunjike mu muaba wakajikabo batatu anyi mu lubuebue ludi mu budimi bua Efelona, Muena Hiti, mu lubuebue ludi mu budimi bua Makepela, ku mpala kua Mamale mu buloba bua Kanana, buakasumba Abalahama kudi Efelona, Muena Hiti, bu muaba wa kujikabo bantu bafue
Hakakumbana ngondo yandi, mona, bana ba mahasa bakadi munda muandi

Biajidila muntu Yehowa tshituha tshia budimi bua buhianyi buandi, wewe neutuangane n andi mushinga ku bungi bua bintu bidiye mukunemu, biakuneye homer wa orge, mushinga wai newikale nshekele ya argent makumi atanu
Kalongu kisâtu : Bidi bitangila lukongu lwa bilumbulwilu bia nsambu pankatshi pa bantu ne Mbulamatadi
Padibo babenga mukanda wa ditangilula nansha wa didiombola, bavwa bawutwa tshiâla badi mwa kulongolola mukanda mukwabo munkatshi mwa midimu imwe ayi
Bana balume ba Alona nebabioshile ha tshioshelu, ha nkunyi idi mu kahia tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Kanungu ka Mudimu udi dipa ne dikanyika dia mushinga mukole bwa mweena Kongu yônso

Mose wakashikisha kuambila Bena Isalele bonso mdi â onso; yeye wakabambila kabidi ne, Tekai mei onso anakunuambila lelu mu mitshima yenu, mei onso a mikenji mene mudi nuambila bana benu bua bobo kuyenza
Hakamona Alona bualu ebu, Wakenza tshioshelu ku mpala kua luhingu, Alona wakela dî, wakamba ne, Makelela disanka dia Yehowa nedikaleku

Bikala bana balume ba difu dimue bashikame muaba umue, ne biafua umue wabo kayi mushiye muana mulume, mukashi wa muntu mufue kayi ku dibaka kudi mulume mukuabo; muan abo ne mulume wandi neamuangate, alue bu mukashi wandi; neamuenzele bualu buakadiye ne bualu bua kuenza bu muan abo

Yeye neamukuate ku mahuahua andi, neamuhande hankatshi, kadi kahanduludi bituha bibidi nansha, ne muakuidi neamuoshile ha tshioshelu, ha nkunyi idi mu kahia bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa

Wakazola bilongo bia amande ne tuhanza tusatu tuakadi ku mutu kua mahu a tshitekelu, ne tshihunga tshia or ne tshilongo, wakazola bilongo bia amande ha tuhanza tuakadi ku luseke lukuabo, ne tshihunga ne tshilongo, wakenza matu asambombo nunku
Wewe neuteke mu mushete mabue a dihungila andi nkuha
Kanusuiki ngombe ne mpunda ku mutshi wa tshikokedi umue
Bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi abidi ne bisatu ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu, kabakababala munkatshi mua Bena Isalele bualu bua kabakadi ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Abalahama wakamba ne, Nenditshihe nunku
Muntu wikale mukoonga tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia mêyi, ke wajadikabu ne badi bamusungula mu musangu mwibîdi

Nebateke tshilulu tshia bleu ha mutu ha mesa a mampa, nebâteke ha mutu hatshi malonga ne nkutu ne mpanza ne makoho adibo balongolola n au, ne mampa neikalehu, nebatekehu tshilulu tshikunze, nebâteke tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge ha mutu hatshi, nebabueshemu mitshi ya mesa
Neutuishe milambu yonso ya bukula ne luehu, kanulekedi luehu lua tshihungidi tshia Nzambi mu milambu yenu ya bukula, tuishai milambu yonso ne luehu
Nakukuha wewe tshituha tshikuabo tshia buloba ku mutu kua bana benu, tshinakanyenga mu bianza bia Bena Amole ne muele wanyi wa nvita ne buta buanyi
Kanungu ka Mbulamatadi udi ujadika budikadidi bwa kudisangisha ne bakwabo
Yosefe wakabumusha hankatshi ha binu biandi, wakatua mpala wandi hanshi
Wakamba ne, Bialua Esau ku tshisumbu tshimue bua kutshishiha, tshisumbu tshikuabo netshihanduke
Alona wakambila Mose ne, Tangila, bakulua lelu ne mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buabo, ne mulambu wabo wa kuosha ha kahia ku mesu kua Yehowa, malu au onso akunkuata
Yehowa wakadi ne disanka bualu bua batatu benu, yeye wakahasua, yeye wakasungula bana babo bakabalonda ku nyima, wakanusungula nuenu mene mene munkatshi mua bantu bonso, bu mutshidi bualu lelu
Newafunde ha minoko ya bibi bia nsubu webe, ne ha bibi bia mishiku ya luhangu luebe
Tshidi tshimanyina pa dineemeka dia makanyika a mianda ya ngumu ne ya dipitshisha dia mushindu wa momumwe dia bisumbu bia tshidiidi, bisumbu ne beena mwabo ku tudiomba twa ditunga
Ushimbule bioshelu biabo, utshibule bibumba biabo, ukose mpingu yabo ya Bashela

Nuenu nutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, kanuenji bilele ebi bidi bitambe bubi, nansha bana baledibue mu nsubu yenu nansha benyi badi munkatshi muenu bualu bua bena buloba bakadi ku mpala kuenu bakenza malu mabi â onso, ne buloba buakoneka , buloba kabunuluki kabidi hanuabuona, bu muakadi buloba buluka tshisamba tshiakadi ku mpala

Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, ne Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, bakaya ne bantu bakatentekela buloba, bakadihanda bilulu biabo, bakambila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele ne, Buloba butuakahita bua kutentekela budi butambe buimpe

Dutelonone Bintu Bifila kudi Bena Lewi Bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi, ne tshisamba tshionso tshia Lewi kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele; bobo nebadie munyinyi wa milambu ya Yehowa idibo bosha ha kahia bu buhianyi bua Yehowa

Yeye wakambila mulume wandi mei onso ne, Muhika webe, Muena Ebelu, uwakulua n andi mu nsubu, wakabuela kundi bua kunfuisha bundu, ne hanakela di dianyi, yeye wakashiya tshivualu tshiandi kundi, wakanyema
Bikala malu a onso kayi akudimuna mitshima yenu kundi, binuampidia, meme nennuhidie kabidi, nennukume misangu muanda mutekete bualu bua mibi yenu

Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kukolesha ne kujadika, ne diambulwisha dia tulasa, dimanya dia maalu ne ditangalaja, dineemeka dia mapa a bantu bônso, budikadidi bwa nshindameenu ne makanyika a mweena mwaabo adibo bafunda mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi
Bualu bua Bena Isalele badi bantu banyi banakahatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Mose wakatshiawila, wakangata mashi atshi, wakâlaba ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia Alona ne ku tshiala tshia ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku munu munene wa dikasa diandi dia balume
Bualu bukuabo, nakunvua mikemu ya Bena Isalele badi mu butaka kudi Bena Ejipitu, ndi muvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi
dikebulula dia mamanya ne bia kwenza nabi mudimu pamwe ne bulusa bwa balongi, bwa dishikuluja dia lungenyi ne bwa dikolesha dia mu maboko mu dikebulula;
Yakoba wakatangila mpala wa Labana, kakadi bu muvueye dia mbedi

Bia momumwe Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa tshidi mwa kufila bukookeshi, biumukila ku dîyi, kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa bwa kweela mêyi pa mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa polovensa
Bualu ebu nebuikale bu tshimanymu ku tshianza tshiebe ne bu tshmilukidi hankatshi ha mesu ebe bualu bua Yehowa wakabihanda mu Ejipitu ku bukole bua tshianza tshiandi
Biasanganabo mulume mulale ne mukashi wa muntu mukuabo, nebashihe bubidi buabo, ne mulume wakadi ulala ne mukashi eu ne mukashi kabidi: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi mua Isalele
Nenushikame munkatshi muetu, buloba nebuikale ku mpala kuenu, nuikalemu, nuendulukemu mushinga, nuangatemu bintu
Unvuai, Isalele, nubienze; bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nukumbane ba bungi, bu muakanulaya Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu enu, mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bikala tatu wandi mumutuile lute ku mesu, yeye wakadi kushala ne bundu matuku muanda mutekete, nansha
Bena Lubena bakasa Heshebona ne Eleale ne Kiyatayima, ne Nebo ne Bâla meona bakidika misoko ei mena mahia mahia ne Sibema; bakidika misoko mikuabo yakasabo mena mahia mahia
Nzambi wakamba ne, Kulu ha buihi, umushe bisabata biebe ku makasa, bualu bua muaba udi muimane udi buloba bua tshijila
Bana ba balume ba Kola: Asi ne Elekana ne Abiasafa, â mmeku a Bena Kola
Bikala muana mukashi wa muakuidi mubaka kudi muenyi, yeye kena mua kudia tshintu tshia tshijila tshifila kudi Yehowa

Kanungu ka Kabeena mwa kwangata muntu mu Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu: a padiye kayi mweena Kongu; b padiye kayi uleeja ne udi ne dimanya dipiluke dia bidimu dikumi ne bitanu mu mianda ya bukoshi bwa nsambu anyi ya tshidiidi
Nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numuenzele mudimu, nulamate kudiye, nuditshihe kudi dina diandi

Nenuambe ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne, Tuakumusha bintu bia tshijila mu nsubu yetu, tuakabiha Bena Lewi ne benyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila, bu mukenji uwakutuelela, katuakashiha mikenji yebe, katuakuhua mikenji muoyo
