Kana wakamanyangana ne mukashi wandi, yeye wakimita difu, wakalela Hanoka, yeye wakasa musoko, wakidika musoko dina dia muan andi Hanoka
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi upatukila mu masungulangana menza kudi bônso musangu umwe bwa tshipungu tshia mvula itanu idibu mwa kwambulula musangu umwe
Bantu baka tontolola Mose ne, Netunue tshinyi
Alona wakolola tshianza tshiandi ku mutu kua mai a mu Ejipitu, biula biakabaha, biakûsha buloba bua Ejipitu tente
Sànka ukole mu mikolu, bwà kukèba mudimu, Nansha makenga, nansha mabika ni malu eee Ndi anu muku nangà
Hanuakuna bintu tshidimu tshia muanda mukulu, nenudie bintu bia diambedi biakadi bishale mu nsubu yenu, tô ne ku tshidimu tshia tshitema hanuahuola bintu, nenudie bintu bia diambedi biakadi bishale
Abalahama wakalomba Nzambi, ne yeye wakakolesha Abimeleke ne mukashi wandi ne bena mudimu bandi ba bakashi, ne bobo bakalela bana
Muhika wakambila Isaka malu onso akenzeye
Dileeja dia tshiji diônso mu miaba ya bantu bônso anyi mu tshibwaasha didi dikanyika badi badilongolola bwa se bafunda mukanda bwa kumanyisha bamfumu baludiki badi ne bukookeshi abu
Kudisombuedi, kuikadi ne lukuna kudi bana ba bana benu, kadi sua mukuenu bu mûdi mudisue, meme ndi Yehowa
Katataka, bingikala ne luse ku mesu kuebe, undeshe bienzedi biebe, bua meme kukumanya wewe, ne bua kusangana luse ku mesu kuebe, uvuluke ne tshisamba etshi tshidi bantu bebe
Muntu yonso wakatshina di dia Yehowa munkatshi mua bena mudimu ba Palô wakatuma bantu bandi, bakasangisha bimuna biandi mu nsubu

Ubambile kabidi ne, Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua bana benu ku bikondo biabo bionso udi ulua ha buihi ne bintu bidi Bena Isalele bajidile Yehowa ne mubidi wandi kauyi muakane, nebamumushe ku mesu kuanyi meme ndi Yehowa

Kanungu ka Ndondu ne diumvwangana ne matunga makwabo bidibo benza mu njila mululama idi, padibo bayipatula, ne bumfumu bupita bwa mêyi ne mikandu, pa kumbusha diswa dia ndondu ne ndondu anyi diumvwangana kudi tshitupa tshikwabo
Muakuidi udi ulengesha muntu neashikike muntu udiye musue kulengesha ne bintu ebi ku mpala kua Yehowa ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena

Wewe neubale bidimu bia kubanda kua buloba muanda mutekete, bidimu muanda mutekete misangu muanda mutekete, neubale nunku bidimu muanda mutekete bia kubanda kua buloba misangu muanda mutekete tô ne ku bidimu makumi anai ne tshitema
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kukuba mwaba wa kusomba wa bantu ne bukola bwabu bwa mubidi
Mose ne Yoshua bakaya, bakadisangisha mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Hashishe Abimeleke Wakabikila Abalahama, wakamukonka ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi tshinyi
Ehaba, muana mulume wa Helona, mukelenge wa bana ba Zebuluna, wakafua bintu dituku disatu

Aba mbana ba balume ba Luele Nahata ne Zela ne Shama ne Miza, aba mbana ba balume ba Basemata, mukashi wa Esau Aba mbana ba balume ba Oholibama, muana wa bakashi wa Ana muana wa bakashi wa Sibiona mukashi wa Esau, yeye wakalelela Esau Yeusha ne Yalama ne Kola
Kushihianganyi

Bakalua ne bana balume ba Alona; Mose wakateka mashi ku nsongo ya matshu abo ya ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku biala biabo bia ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku bana banene babo ba ku makasa a balume, Mose wakantumina mashi ku tshioshelu

Bakulu bonso ba mu musoko eu udi utamba ha buihi ne muntu mufue, nebuvuwe bianza biabo ha mutu ha kana ka ngombe kadi ne nshingu waku mutshibula mu tshibanda; bobo nebitabe ne, Bianza bietu kabiakamatshisha mashi au, mesu etu kaena mâmone
Nashona, muana mulume wa Aminadaba wa tshisamba tshia Yuda, wakafua bintu biandi dituku dia kumudilu

Muakuidi neashikike mukashi ku mpala kua Yehowa, neasulule nsuki ya mukashi, neateke mulambu wa bukula wa tshivulukidi mu bianza biandi, eu udi mulambu wa mukau, muakuidi neangate mai a bululu adi elesha mulau mu tshianza tshiandi

Enza mutu wa buatu, ushiye muaba wa coudée umue hankatshi ha mutu ne buatu buashi ku nseke yonso, ushiye mushiku ku luseke lukuabo lua buatu, lungakasha nsubu isatu, nsubu wa kumudilu ne nsubu muibidi ha mutu ne nsubu muisatu ha mutu
Bintu bidi bana balume ba Melali balama bidi mabaya a nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne mitshi ne makunshi ne nkanu ne bintu biabi bionso; ne makunshi a ku luhangu ne nkanu yai ne mitanda yai ne nshinga yai
Ku ndekeelu wa tshipungu tshidibu baleeja ku tulongo twa kumpala twa kanungu aka, padi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga katshiyi tshianyisha mapangadika dîyi aa wôwo adi ajika bukookeshi bwa kwenzeja

Biadieye tshituha tshia munyinyi wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala tshidi tshishale tô ne ku dituku disatu, kabena bitabusha mulambu wandi, kabena baubala, netshikale bu tshintu tshibole, ne mundi udi udia munyinyi neadituadile bubi buandi
Wakela Alona manyi ha mutu handi, wakamujidila
Binuamba mu mitshima yenu ne, Nemmanye dî didi Yehowa kayi mutuambile munyi
Kabeena mwa kupatula midimu ya Mbulamatadi mipiamipia anyi kuyikudimuna pambelu pa ndongamu ya mêyi a mpetu
Yeye ulualua mu nshila bua kusangakena hebe, ne hakatangileye, yeye neasanke mu mutshima wandi

Muntu udi ulenga bianza ha mubidi wa muntu mufue neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô matuku muanda mutekete, yeye neadilengeshe ne mai au dituku disatu, ne halua dituku dia muanda mutekete yeye neikale muakane, kadi biahidieye kudilengesha dituku disatu, halua dituku dia muanda mutekete yeye kena wikala muakane

Ndi mumutangile kadi tshiena mumutangile katataka, ndi mumumone kadi yeye kena ha buihi, Mutoto nebiluhuke kudi Yakoba, ne dikombo dia bukelenge nedibike munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, nedikume ku matshika a Moaba, nedishihe bana bonso ba Shete
Ulue ne Alona ne bana bandi balume ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusangakena, uboweshe mai
Kanungu ka Badi bênza lukongu lwa bilumbulwilu bia nsambu pankatshi pa bantu ne Mbulamatadi ludibo bakumbaja kudi Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi ne bilumbulwilu bia mianda ya mbulamatadi

Dutelonone Mikenji ya Nvita Hanuaya kuluangana nvita ne bantu badi n enu lukuna, ne hamutangila tubalu ne makalu ne bantu badi banuhita bungi, kanubatshinyi bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, udi n enu
Kadi Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bua bualu buenu, yeye kena mungunvuile; Yehowa wakangambila ne, Kuakushika, kungambidi bualu ebu kabidi
Kumpala kwa yêye kubanga mudimu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi utshipa tshieeleka, kumpala kwa beena Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu, wâmba tshifingu ne : Meme
Kanungu ka Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidi tshianyisha mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwaatshi
Diabanyangana dia makookeshi pankatshi pa Mbulamatadi ne polovensa didi ne tshia kwenzeka mu bulongolodi bwa mutu wa mukanda IV bwa Dîyi ditudi nadi edi
Mukalu wenu wa luseke lua ku wesete neutuangane ne muelelu wa mai manene, eu newikale mukalu wenu wa ku wesete

Neafue mulambu wandi bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, neumushe dianyi didi dibuikila bintu bia munda ne dianyi dionso didi ha mutu ha bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi didi ha mutu hatu hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne lua tumuma kabidi neabiumushe
Mose wakolola mulangala wandi mulu ne Yehowa wakatuma makubakuba ne mabue a nvula, miele ya nvula yakakuma ha buloba, Yehowa wakama tshisha mabue a nvula ha buloba bua Ejipitu
Bikondo bikuabo ditutu diakimana ku mutu kua nsubu matuku makese, hashishe bakashala mu tshitudilu bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa, ne bakaya ku luendu bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa
Yeye wakasungula bantu batanu ba munkatshi mua bana babo, wakabafila kudi Palô
Musulu wa mai wakaluhuka mu Edene bua kumiamina midioko mai, wakahanduluka maboko anai

Yeye neikale bu nyama wa mpunda udi ne luonji munkatshi mua bantu, tshianza tshiandi netshiluishe muntu yonso, ne tshianza tshia muntu yonso netshimuluishe kabidi, yeye neikale mutangilangane ne bana babo bonso Yeye wakidika Yehowa wakamuambila malu au ne, Wewe udi Nzambi udi utangila, bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Nakamana kumona Nzambi, munyi mundi nshala ne muoyo
Hashishe, yeye wakebesha balume ba mu musoko ne, Mukashi au wa masandi wakadi ku Enayima udi kudi kunyi
Bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Wakangata makalu nkama isambombo masungula, ne makalu onso makuabo a mu Ejipitu ne tuhita tua makalu onso
Yeye wakambila bana babo ne Bakumpingashila argent yanyi, idi mu tshibombi, mitshima yabo ya kahandika, bakazakala, bakambila ngana ne, Bualu ebu buakutuenzela Nzambi budi tshinyi

Halua Yehowa n enu mu buloba bua Bena Kanana ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Amole ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse buakalayeye batatu enu ne, Nennuhebu, buloba budi ne mabele ne buitshi bia bungi, nuenu nuvuluke tshilele etshi mu ngondo eu
Kanudi mashi; bua nukume dikasa dimpe ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima, hanuenza malu adi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa
Monai, di dia Yehowa diakalua kudiye ne, Muntu eu kena wikala muhianyi wa bintu biebe nansha, kadi yeye uwalela nkayebe neikale muhianyi wa bintu biebe
Hanuasombesha mukuenu tshintu, kanuyi mu nsubu wandi bua kudiangatshila tshieya tshiandi
Hakalua Yosefe ku nsubu kuandi, bakalua ne matabisha mu bianza biabo, bakamukukuila hanshi
Wewe neufunde dina dia Alona ha mulangala wa tshisamba tshia Lewi, bualu bua wewe neusungule mulangala umue kudi muntu ne muntu udi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo
Lua, tunuishe tatu wetu nvinyo, netulale n andi, bua tuetu tulelele tatu wetu bana
Eu udi mudimu wa meku a bana balume ba Bena Gêshona mu ntenta wa kusambakena ne bintu bidibo n abi bualu nebikale mu tshianza tshia Itamâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi
Ebê wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu ne binai, wakalela Pelege
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu bualu ebu wewe neumanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa tangila, nenkume mai adi mu musulu ne mulangala udi mu tshianza tshianyi, ne mai onso neakudimuke mashi
Genese Yakoba Udi Udilongoluela bua Kusambakena ne Esau Yakoba wakaya mu nshila wandi ne banjelo ba Nzambi bakasambakena n andi
Yuda wakambila Onana ne, Uye kudi mukashi wa mukulu ebe, umuangate bu mukashi webe, yeye nealelele mukulu ebe bana
Ku mbelu kua luhangu tshilulu netshikaleku tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin mutambe buimpe, tshienjibue kudi mundi wa lungenyi lule, enza makunshi anai ne nkanu mai
Bikala mukuenu kayi ha buihi n enu, anyi biwikala kuyi mumumanye, hashishe nuye n abi ku nsubu kuenu, nushale n abi tô ne halua mukuenu bua kubikeba, nuenu nubihingashe kudiye

Wewe neutusumbishe bia kudia ku argent bua tuetu kudia; Utuhe mai a kunua ku argent, bua tuetu kunua, anji kuitabusha bua tuetu tuhite ku makasa; bu muakatuenzela bana ba Esau ne Bena Moaba badi bashikama mu Ala, tô ne hatuasabuka Yadene mu buloba buakatuha Yehowa, Nzambi wetu
Monai, nakuteka buloba ebu buonso ku mpala kuenu: nubuelemu, nuhiane buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu etu Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bua kubahabu ne tunkanunuina tuabo tudi tubalonda ku nyima
Bikaleye kayi muhikudibue nunku, yeye neumuke halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, yeye ne bana bandi
Kadi nuvuiuke Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua yeye utu wanuha bukole bua kuangata n abu biuma; bua yeye akashe n enu tshihungidi tshiandi tshiakahungeye ne batatu benu: bu bualu buakuenjibua lelu
Wakashimika luhangu ludi lunyunguluka nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne tshioshelu tshia milambu ya kuosha, wakakudika tshilulu ku mbelu kua luhangu
Bimuna biakadi bimita mafu ku mpala kua mitshi ei biakalela bana bakadi ne matoba
Wakidika muana mukuabo dina ne, Efelayima, bualu bua wakamba ne, Nzambi wakunkumbasha mu buloba bua dikenga dianyi
Nsenji kena muakane kunudi bualu bua udi uhingishilula bintu mukana, kadi kena ne mikono mihanduluke
Biwenza bimpe, kuena ubanduluka, anyi
Yoshua wakahita Amaleka ne bantu bandi bukole ne muele wa nvita
Lulengu elu kaluena lusokoma kundi, luteka mu tshibutshilu tshianyi, anyi

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, muakuidi neamutangile kabidi, bielanganeye meji ne disama didi diamba kushika, kadiena ditampakana, nunku muakuidi neamubueshe mu nsubu ha nkayandi matuku muanda mutekete makuabo

Numanye bienu ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi mene; Nzambi utu walamata dî diandi, utu watumikila tshihungidi tshiandi ne luse luandi kudi bantu badi bamusue ne batu batumikila mikenji yandi tô ne ku bihungu tshinunu; utu wafuta bantu badi n andi lukuna difutu diabo ku mesu kuabo, bua kubashiha: yeye kena uhanga muntu udi n andi lukuna, neamufute ku mesu kuandi

Hakatangila bena buloba, Bena Kanana mene, madilu makole a ku tshituilu tshia Atada, bakambilangana ne, Â mmadilu makole a Bena Ejipitu, nunku bakidika muaba au ne, Abele miselayima, udi dishiya dia Yadene
Yehowa wakahueka mu dî ditu, wakasomba n andi, wakangata tshituha tshia Nyuma wakadiye n andi, wakamuteka kudi bakulu makumi muanda mutekete, hashishe hakalua
Yehowa wakunvua
Bualu bua kahia aka kanene nekatuoshe; bitunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, kabidi, hashishe netufue

Bualu bua mitshi yabo ya tumuma tukese idi bu mitshi ya mu Sodoma ne ya mu madimi a Amola: tumuma tuabo tudi bu nyongangandu, ne tshisumbu tshia tumuma tshidi ne bululu: nvinyo yabo idi bu lulengu lua nyoka, bu lulengu bikole lua nyoka wa ntoka
Wakenza efoda ne or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzu ne bia lin muimpe

Hashishe hanatuma matutu mulu, muanzankongolo neumueneke mu matutu, nenvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi tshidi hankatshi hetu ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo, ne mai kaena avulangana kabidi bua kujimishau bintu bionso Muanzankongolo wanyi newikale mu matutu, hanaumona, nenvuluke tshihungidi tshia kashidi tshidi hankatshi ha Nzambi ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo ha buloba
Kanungu ka Badi batwa Mêyi tshitampi tshia mbulamatadi ne baapatula mu tshibejibeji tshia mbulamatadi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ubale bungi bua bana balume ba Gêshona kabidi ku nsubu ya batatu abo ne ku meku abo; ba bidimu makumi asatu tô ne ku bidimu makumi atanu wewe neubabale, buonso buabo badi bakuata mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Yehowa neanuluile nvita yenu, nenuikale holâ

Kanungu ka Ngenzelu miteela ku kanungu kadi kadianjila aka pamwe ne mateta ayi, nansha mikale imweneka mishindu kayi, pikalayi ifumina kudi muntu mwimikila bukalenga bwa mbulamatadi badi bayinyoka bu tshibawu tshia dipangila dia ditunga
Tshipungu tshia beena Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu tshidi tshia bidimu tshiteema kabayi batshiambulula
Yalede wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne makumi asambombo ne bibidi, wakalela Hanoka
Au mmai a Meliba mu Kadesha mu tshihela tshia Sina
Bana ba balume ba Yisehâ: Kola ne Nefege ne Zikeli
Matuku makumi anai akashika, matuku adibo balongolola tshitalu akakumbana, Bena Ejipitu bakamujinga matuku makumi muanda mutekete

Dutelonone Masanka Alualua kudi Batumikidi ba Mikenji Binuananukila kutumikila mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kuenza mikenji yandi yonso indi nnuambila lelu, hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuteke ku mutu kua bisamba bionso bia hanshi ha buloba; ne masanka â onso nealue kunudi, neanuhete, binuatumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Semena biebe ha buihi, unvua mei onso adi Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, musue kubambila: utuambile bietu mei onso adi Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, mukuambile; tuetu netulue dî diandi, netudienze
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi ufila mpeta mu milongu ya ditunga ne bitadi, bu mudibio mu mêyi a ditunga
Noa wakadi muntu muimpe, wakadi muakane tshishiki mu tshikondo tshiandi, Noa wakendakana ne Nzambi
Badiku bwa beena ditunga bônso ba Kongu
Meme nempueke, nensombe n ebe, nengangate Nyuma udi kûdi, nembaheye, nenukuatshishangane bua kutuala bujitu bua bantu aba, wewe kuena ubutuala nkayebe
dikosa dia bibawu bia lupetu anyi bia lukanu bwa kuneemekija mêyi bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga;
Yosefe wakamba ne, Numpe bimuna bienu, nennuhe bia kudia ku bimuna bienu bikale argent yenu mishike
Luhanza alu kaluena luhanza lua mukelenge wanyi ludiye unua n alu ne ludiye utempa n alu matempu anyi
Kanuenji mudimu dituku adi, edi ndituku dia kubuikila bubi buenu ku mesu kua Yehowa

Mikenji ya Milambu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Elela Alona ne bana bandi balume mukenji ne, Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, mulambu wa kuosha newikale ha nkunyi ha tshioshelu butuku buonso tô ne dinda, kahia nekikalehu butuku buonso, kakajimi nansha
Bobo bakalumbuluila bantu bilumbu matuku onso, bakalua ne bilumbu bikole kudi Mose, ne bobo bakakosa bilumbu bikese
Muntu udi utaha mukuabo mputa nebamuenzele muomumue mputa ku mputa, disu ku disu, dinu ku dinu bu muakenzeleye mukuabo nebamuenzele yeye
Â mmena a bana ba Isalele bakalueye n abo mu Ejipitu Lubena, muan a bute wa Yakoba
Mose wakambila Nzambi ne, Meme ndi nganyi bua kuya kudi Palo ne bua buhatula Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu
Neboshe munyinyi ku kahia butuku abu, nebaudie ne mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, nebaudie ne matamba adi ne bululu
Udi walamina bu nyama wa ntambue, udi ulala hanshi bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, nganyi neamubishe
Kaleba wakakolesha bantu ku mesu kua Mose ne, Tuyai katataka, tunyenge buloba abu, tudi bamanye mua kuhita bena buloba abu bukole
Yeye neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha ngombe wa mulambu ne Yehowa neawitabushe bua kubuikidila n au bubi buandi
Nakangata mabue au abidi akadi mu bianza bianyi, nakashiha ku mesu kuenu
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi bialueye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neajidile nsubu wandi
Nudi mua kudisumbila bia kudia kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kudia; nenudisumbile mai a kunua kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kunua

Kanungu ka Polovensa ibidi anyi ya bûngi idi mwa kulongolola, mu diumvwangana, mwaba wa kubotakajila ne wa kutwangajila tshidiidi tshiayi ne kabidi kuludika pamwe bitupa bikwabo bidi midimu yabi mikala itangila bu mianda idi ikumbanangana ne makookeshi ayi

Manyi a Tshijila ne Manananshi Yehowa wakambila Mose kabidi ne, Angata bintu bia manananshi bidi bitambe buimpe myrrhe bujitu bua nshekele nkama itanu, ne cinnamone bujitu bua nshekele nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, ne canne aromatique bujitu bua nshekele nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, ne nkashia bujitu bua nshekele nkama itanu bu idiho bafila mu tshitendelelu ne tshihiminu tshia manyi a olive
Yakoba wakatuma miloho ku mpala kuandi kudi Esau mukulu andi mu buloba bua Seî, buloba bua Edome
Nenulele bana balume ne bana bakashi, kadi bobo kabena benu, bualu bua bobo nebaye mu buluka

Wewe newambile Palô ne, Yehowa udi Wamba ne, Isalele udi muan anyi wa balume, muan a bute wanyi, ne meme nakamana kukuambila ne, Ulekela muan anyi wa balume, bualu bua kunkuatshila mudimu, kadi wewe wakahidia kulu ulekela, nunku meme nenshihe muana webe, muan a bute webe
Wewe newambile Bena Isalele ne, Biafua muntu udi kayi ne muana wa balume, nunku yeye neaheshe muan andi wa bakashi buhianyi buandi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata bintu bia manananshi a mushinga mukole bia stacte ne onyx ne gabanum, bintu bia manananshi matambe buimpe, widikishe bintu bionso ne tshihiminu tshimue
Mena onso a mai akimbabo kudi bahika ba Abalahama, tatu wandi, Bena Peleshete bakajibikila, bakelamu buloba
Badi ne tshia kumukuba kabidi kudi dîku diende, bantu ba mu bamfumu ba mbulamatadi
Kanudi munyinyi mubishe, anyi mulamba mu mai a kahia, kadi nuoshe munyinyi mu kahia, mutu wandi ne bibelu biandi ne bia munda biandi
Bana balume ba Isalele bakenza nunku, Yosefe wakabahesha makalu bu muakamba Palô, wakabaha bintu bia kudiabo mu nshila
Kanuitabushi tshintu tshia mbueshilu, bualu bua tshintu tshia mbueshilu tshidi tshifofomesha muntu udi ne mesu matabale, tshidi tshikudimuna mei a muntu muakane

Bialuangana balume ne biakuma umue mukuabo ne dibue anyi biamututeye tshisusu, kena umushiha kadi yeye udi ulala ha bulalu, biabikeye kabidi ne udi wenda ne mulangala wandi, muntu wakamukuma neabinge, kadi yeye neamufute bua matuku akalaleye hanshi, ne mushinga wa kuondahibua kua ndi
Hakadi Alona wambila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele nunku, bakatangila ku tshihela, ne monai, butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka mu ditutu
Nenuikale ne mitshi ya olive mu madimi enu onso, kadi kanuena nudilaba manyi ai ham bidi; bualu bua mamuma neahohoke
Bakumuka mu Haselota, bakashikama mu Litema

Ekesode Mulayi wa Dimueneka dia Yehowa Kudibo Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bikai, yai bienu, ne wewe ne bantu bawakaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ku buloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba ne, Nembuhe bana benu
Baka muela mu lukanu bua kuindila mei a kudi Yehowa

Padi tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia mpetu tshivwabo bafila mu tshipungu tshianyisha kudi Dîyi dikulu, kabayi batshielela tukanda kumpala kwa diunzulula dia tshikondu tshipiatshipia, mulombodi wa ditunga udi utshilondeshisha, mu dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene, dikala dishintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, kayi upwa mooyi makumbaja meelela tukanda kudi Tshibambalu ne Tshimbambalu
Nuenu nuvuluke ne nuakadi bahika mu buloba bua Ejipitu; bua bualu ebu nakunuelela mukenji eu
Ekesode Mikenji Dikumi Dut

Biumuka Muena Lewi ku umue wa misoko ya mu Isalele, muakadiye ushikama, bua kubuela ne mutshima wandi wonso mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula, hashishe yeye neanuenzele mudimu mu dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wandi; bu mudi bana babo, Bena Lewi, batu bimana ku mesu kua Yehowa, benza

Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Bualu bua Nzambi wakakulesha bualu ebu buonso, kakuena muntu udi mua kukutamba budimu ne lungenyi, wewe newikale mulami wa nsubu wanyi, ne bantu banyi bonso nebakokeshibue anu ku dî diebe, anu bua nkuasa wa bukelenge nenkutambe
Nakadi ne dikenga nunku, munya wakangosha, mashika akankuata butuku, tshitabala tshiakankuata
Shelumiele, muana mulume wa Sulishadai, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia bena Shimeona
Eu newikale mukenji kudibo bikondo biabo bionso
Enza biamu bidi ne mahoka ne tshiamu tshia argent makumi anai ku mabaya makumi abidi, mahoka abidi ku dibaya ne ku dibaya, bualu bua kuelamu tutshi tua tutuhu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Lewi ne, Hanuangata tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bintu bia Bena Isalele tshinakunuha bu buhianyi buenu, nenutshinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, tshintu tshia dikumi tshia tshintu tshia dikumi tshiakanuhabo

Dutelonone Mikenji ya Mamuma a Diambedi ne ya Tshia Dikumi Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana, hanuabunyenga ne hanuashikamamu, hashishe nenuangate bintu bionso bidi biboba diambedi mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, nubiteke mu tshisaka, nulue n abi mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, usungula, bua kujadikamu dina diandi
bulongolodi bwa bungenda mushinga bushaadila ku mikalu ya ditunga;
Abalahama wakamba ne, Muan anyi, Nzambi nkayandi neatuhe muana wa mukoko wa kuosha ha kalua, nunku bubidi buabo bakaya hohamue
Nunku ndi nkutendekena ne, Witabushe bua muntu webe ashale kunoko bu muhika webe mu muaba wa nsongalume, ne nsongalume ahingane ne bana babo
Bakumuka mu Abalona, bakashikama mu Esione gebê, Bakumuka mu Esione gebê, bakashikama mu tshihela tshia Sina dina dikuabo ne Kadesha
Mêyi a ditunga adi afila mishindu ya kwaasa ne ya kwendesha bilongelu ebi

Hakahita matuku asatu, ne bobo bakadi ne kusama, bana ba balume ba Yakoba babidi, Shimeona ne Lewi, bana babo ne Dina, bakangata muntu muele Wandi wa nvita muntu muele wandi wa nvita, bakalua ku musoko ne mitshima ya dikima, bakashiha balume bonso
Nunku Belâma wakaya ne miloho ya Balaka
Kanungu ka Budikadidi bwa muntu ne muntu budi bujadikibwa

Hashishe hanuakunvua dî diakadi munkatshi mua midima, hakadi mukuna mutema kahia, nuenu nuakalua kundi, ne ba ku mutu kua bisamba bienu ne bakulu benu; nuakamba ne, Tangila, Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafuisha butumbi buandi ne bunene buandi, tuakulua dî diandi munkatshi mua kahia: tuakatangila lelu ne Nzambi udi usomba ne muntu, ne yeye udi wikala ne muoyo
Mose ne Alona bakaya, bakasangisha bakulu bonso ba Bena Isalele
Wewe neushimike tshitendelelu bu mudi tshileshilu tshinakukulesha mu mukuna
Ekesode Mikenji ya Dia Lumingu Mose Wakabikila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, wakabambila ne, Â mmalu adi Yehowa musue nuenu nuenze
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, umuambile ne, Lekela Bena Isalele bahatuke mu buloba buebe
Muntu wakuosha bintu ebi neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne ku nyima neuhingane mu tshitudilu
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Ashe, Pagiele muana mulume wa Okelana
Bobo kabanyangishi bintu bia tshijila Nakafila Bena Isalele kudi Yehowa, bua kabatekedi bantu bujitu bua bubi bua bakuidi hadia bakuidi bintu bia tshijila bia bantu meme ndi Yehowa wakabajidila
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi mwa kuselangana ne muntu ônso udiye musungula; wa bulume anyi bukaji bushilangana ne bwende,ne udi mwa kwaasa dîku
Bakulu ba Bena Moaba ne bakulu ba Midiyana bakaya ne bintu bia kumubila n abi mu bianza biabo, bakatua kudi Belâma, bakamuambila mei onso a Balaka
Binualua ne mulambu wa kusakidila n au Yehowa, nufile bua nuikale bitabushibue
Kakahanda mume mu tshitudilu butuku, mana akamueneka n au
Mai adi ha mutu habo, bakadina mu mai a dijimba bu dibue

Bukookeshi bwa kudiludika nkaya Autonomie Budiludiki Amnistie Dikupula dia manyooka Accords et traités internationaux Ndondu ne diumvwangana pankatshi pa matunga Diumvwangana dia mu kabujima ne tshikongu Bukalenga , mukalenga Buludiki Mweena mpala wa ditunga Bilo Ndongamu wa lupetu Tshisumbu tshia bakwidianganyi a mweena mwabo Diswisha, didiswisha Dikwatshishangana, bukwatshishanganyi Dîyi dikulu Kasumbu kadikadile komekela Mianda ya Masungulangana
Bialua mukuenu mundi muhele, biateketa maboko andi ha buihi hebe, wewe neumukuatshishe, yeye neikale kûdi bu muenyi anyi bu muena luendu
Kanudi munyinyi wa nyama ei, kanulengi tshianza ham bidi hai, kayena miakane kunudi
Yehowa wakamujika mu tshibanda tshia buloba bua Moaba tshiakatangilangana ne Bete peô; kakuena muntu udi mumanye kudi lukita luandi tô ne ku dituku edi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata bintu biabo bua kuenza n abi mudimu wa ntenta wa kusambakena, ubifile kudi Bena Lewi mundi ne muntu ku mudimu wandi
Biabaka mulume mukashi ne mamu andi, bualu ebu budi bubi, nebaboshe mu kahia, busatu buabo, bualu bubi kabuikadi munkatshi muenu
Dilama dia muntu mu tshimana kadieena mwa kupita mêba makumi anayi ne mwanda mukulu to
Tshitupa : Bidi bitangila bumfumu bwa kabukulu Kanungu ka Bumfumu bwa kabukulu budi bumanyika
Wewe neutelele bana balume ba Alona bikowelu ne mikaba ne bifulu bia butumbi ne buimpe
Bintu bionso bidi ne mahuahua bidi bienda ne mikolo mai bidi bibi kunudi
Samala wakafua, ne Shaula wa ku Lehobota, hehi ne musulu wa Pelata, wakadia bukelenge buandi
Binuahidia kunvua mei anyi bua malu a onso, binuampidia, meme nennuhidie kabidi, nengikale n enu tshiji nennukengeshe misangu muanda mutekete bualu bua mibi yenu
Bakabika ku mukuna wa Yehowa, bakaya mu luendu matuku asatu, ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa wakaya ku mpala kuabo matuku asatu bualu bua kubakebela muaba wa kuikisha
Enza mahu asambombo ha tshitekelu, mahu asatu ku luseke lumue, mahu asatu ku luseke lukuabo
Mose wakamba ne, Halua Yehowa kunuha munyinyi dilolo ne kunukutshisha bidia ne dinda, bualu bua Yehowa udi munvue bu munudi numujiana, tuetu tudi banganyi
Shekeme wakambila tatu wandi Hamo ne, Ungangatshile nsongakashi eu bu mukashi wanyi
Uyaya kudi kunyi
Bungi bua ban a bute balume ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi ne nkama ibidi ne makumi muanda mutekete ne basatu
Bualu buakenzeye buakadi bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne yeye wakamushiha kabidi

Eu udi mukenji wa Munazi udi uditshiha, ne mulambu wa tshijila tshiandi kudi Yehowa, ha mutu ha bintu bidiye mumanye mua kufila bu kuditshiha kuakaditshiheye n aku mbudiye n abu mbua kuenza bu mudi mukenji wa tshijila tshiandi
Noa Udi Ukuatshika Maluvu Bana balume ba Noa bakaluhuka n andi mu buatu bakadi Sheme, Hama ne Yafete Hama wakadi nkambua wa Kanâna
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Mose wakaluhuka ku mpala kua Yehowa ne milangala yonso kudi Bena Isalele bobo bakatangila ne muntu yonso wakangata mulangala wandi
Abimeleke wakabika ne dinda dionso, Wakabikila bantu bandi bonso, wakabambila malu au onso ku matshu abo; ne bantu bandi bakatamba kutshina

Bena musoko bakamukonka bua mukashi wandi, ne yeye wakabambila ne, Yeye udi muan etu wa bakashi Bualu bua yeye wakatshina mua kuamba ne, Yeye udi mukashi wanyi, bua bena musoko kabamushihi bua Lebeka, bualu bua yeye wakadi miumpe kumona
Wakambila tatu wandi ne mamu wandi ne, Tshiena mumumone; kena mumanye bana babo, kena mumanye bana bandi, bualu bua bobo bakatumikila dî diebe ne tshihungidi tshiebe
bweena ditunga,ngikadilu ne bukubi bwa beenyi;
Mukanda wa didiombola mutumina Bukalenga bunene badi bawangata ne mushinga padiwu mutwa tshiâla kudi tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia beena tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka
Meme nengumushe mesu anyi kudibo dituku adi bulelela, bua malu mabi akenzabo, hakakudimunabo mitshima yabo bua kutendelela nzambi mikuabo
Bu bungi bua milambu mudi nu fila nenulongolole bintu ebi
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Dutelonone Yoshua Udi Musungula bu Muhinganyi wa Mose Mose wakaya biandi, wakambila Bena Isalele bonso mei â
Esau wakaya lubilu bua kumuakidila, wakamuela tshituha ku nshingu, wakatuangana n andi mishiku, bakadila
Uluhuke n abo, bua tuetu tubamanye

Nomba Badi Bakuatshisha Bakuidi ne Bena Lewi Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Wewe ne bana bebe balume ne ba mu nsubu wa ba tatu ebe nenutuale mahambuka a ku buakane a bantu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, wewe ne bana bebe balume nenutuale mahambuka a mudimu wenu wa buakuidi
Balaka Wakenza muakamba Belâma, Balaka ne Belâma bakosha ngombe ne tshimpanga ha tshioshelu ne ha tshioshelu
Bualu bua bantu bonso nebikale ne mukenji umue kunudi ne kudi muenyi udi munkatshi muenu ku bikondo bienu bionso: muenyi neikale bu nuenu ku mesu kua Yehowa

Nukuate mudimu matuku asambombo kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete ndituku dia lumingu dia kuikisha, dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, edi ndituku dia lumingu dia Yehowa mu nsubu yenu yonso
Nenkoleshe mutshima wa Palô, nennudishe bimanyinu bianyi ne malu anyi a kukema mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona, mukulu webe, ne, Kulu nusangu yonso mu muaba wa tshijila udi ku nyima kua tshilulu tshikudika ku mpala kua tshibuikilu tshia mushete wa Nzambi, kufu biebe, bualu bua meme nemmueneke mu difutu ku mutu kua tshibuikilu tshia mushete wa Nzambi
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama mai
Lufu lua Isaka Matuku onso a Isaka akadi bidimu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu
Kanungu ka Bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Tshibutshilu tshinene tshia Kongu badi babuleeja kudi mêyi malongolodi
Meku onso a Bena Shuhama, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi asambombo ne binai ne nkama mai
Yehowa wakakengesha Palo ne ba mu nsubu wandi ne bihuhu bikole bualu bua Salai, mukashi wa Abalama

Nebashihe muprofete au anyi mulotshi au wa bilota, bualu bua yeye wakamba mei adi anutombuesha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanu; hatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, wakanuhikula mu nsubu wa lukanu; udi musue kunusesuisha mu nshila wakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenubua nuenu kuendamu
Wakangata mukanda wa dihungila, wakaubala ku mpala kua bantu, bobo bakamba ne, Mei onso akuamba Yehowa netuênze, netuatumikile
Mu luse luebe wewe wakalombela bantu bawakuhikula, wewe wakabenzesha mu bukole buebe to ne ku muaba webe wa tshijila
Yehowa wakamueneka kudiye, wakamba ne, Kuyi mu Ejipitu, ushikame mu buloba bundi nkuambila
Padiku tshipumbishi, udi ufila bukookeshi kudi Minisistila kavulambedi
Netudibingishe munyi
Labana Wakabikila dina dia muaba au ne, Yegâsahaduta, kadi Yakoba wakaubikila ne, Galede
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi ne tshia kusanganyibwa mu mwaba wa kusomba kauyi ufila masama ne mwikala wambulwisha ditantamana diende dipungakana
Bakamba ne, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu wakasangakena hetu, witabushe ne tuetu tuye luendu lua matuku asatu mu tshihela bua kushihela
Kanulombi mukuenu bintu bia kasombela ka bintu biwakamusombesha: kasombela ka argent ne ka bia kudia ne ka bintu bionso biwakamusombesha
Yeye wakadi wambila Yosefe bualu ebu ku dituku ku dituku, kadi yeye kakamunvuila bua kulaleye n andi, anyi bua kushala n andi

Mu dituku dinudi nuhuola bintu bia kumudilu, hanuafila mulambu wa bukula buhia buhia kudi Yehowa, nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, hadi nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa bana balume ba ngombe babidi ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, bintu bisatu bia dikumi ku muana wa ngombe yonso, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko tô ne ku bana ba mikoko muanda mutekete, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi
Mukenji wa Tshia Dikumi Nufile kudi Yehowa tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso binudi nuhuola ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Tuetu tuakadi tuiba argent anyi or mu nsubu wa mukelenge webe munyi
Mose wakahingana kudi Yehowa, wakamba ne, Bantu aba bakuenza bualu bubi bunene, bakudienzela nzambi wa or
Bana babo bakaya ku Shekeme bua kudishabo bimuna bia tatu abo Isalele wakebesha Yosefe ne, Bana benu kabena badisha bimuna ku Shekeme, anyi
Yeye kena udinyanga nansha, bualu bua yeye udi muntu munene munkatshi mua bana babo
Yehowa wakamba ne, Wele hanshi Nunku wakawela hanshi ne wowo wakakudimuka nyoka, Mose wakamunyema
Matuku onso a Adama akadi nkama tshitema ne makumi asatu, yeye wakafua biandi
Kabundi ka mputu kakena kakane kunudi, bualu bua kadi kahingishilula bintu mukana, kadi kakena ne mikono mihanduluke
Mêyi ne mikandu adi aleeja mishindu ya kusanka ne budiikadidi ebu
Kadi nenjadike tshihungidi tshiandi ne Isaka, wakulelela Sala tshidimu tshialua hakumbana ngondo yandi

Uzole tukoho tusatu bu bilongo bia amande mu ditamba dimue, dihu ne tshilongo dihu ne tshilongo, uzole tukoho tusatu bu bilongo bia amande mu ditamba dikuabo, dihu ne tshilongo dihu ne tshilongo, uzole nunku ku matamba asambombo adi masa ku tshitekelu
Abalahama ne Sala bakadi ne bidimu bia bungi, bakadi bakoke, miloû ya bakashi yakashika kudi Sala
Biwasua kusangisha bantu hohamue, wewe newele mpungi, kadi kuedi bikole nansha
Hakalua tshikondo tshidi bimuna bimita mafu, nakabandisha mesu anyi mu tshiota, nakatangila ne mbushi ya bimpanga yakadi ne matoba yakaya kudi mashina a mbushi akadi ne mihola mihola ne matoba matoba
Neahatuke bua kuya ku tshioshelu tshidi ku mpala kua Yehowa bua kutshilengesha neangate mashi a muana mulume wa ngombe ne mashi a mbushi, nealabe ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu
Yeye wakatula mulondo wandi lubilu ha diaha diandi, wakamba ne, Nua biebe, nensunyine tumelo biebe mai kabidi, nunku nakunua ne yeye wakumusha tumelo mai kabidi
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kulubulula miakulu yônso eyi kakuyi kansungansunga
Mose wakinama mutu wandi lubilu, wakatendelela
Kabeena mwa kukosela muntu tshibawu tshinene tshipita etshi tshidibo mwa kukosa dîba didi tshilema tshienzeka
Isaka wakambila Yakoba ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Lua ha buihi, nenkulengele tshianza tshianyi, muan anyi, nemmanye ne, Wewe udi muan anyi Esau bulelela

Bobo nebikale bu buhianyi bua bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima bua kubahiana tshiendelele, nudi mua kuangata bahika benu munkatshi muabo, kadi kabakokeshi bana benu ba Bena Isalele ne tshianza tshikole

Hashikameye ha nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge, yeye neadifundile mukanda wa mikenji idi mifunda mu mukanda au udi mu bianza bia bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi; yeye neashale ne mukanda eu, neaubale matuku andi onso; nunku yeye neamanye mua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, ne mua kutumikila mei onso ne mikenji yonso bidi bifundamu, bua kubienza; nunku mutshima wandi kaudibandishi ku mutu kua bana babo, nunku yeye kasesuki mu nshila wa mikenji nansha ku tshianza tshia balume nansha ku tshianza tshia bakashi; nunku nebavudishe matuku a bukelenge buandi, ne a bana bandi mu Isalele

Bakatshitekahu milongo ya masoso a mabue mai mu mulongo wa kumudilu bakateka mabue a sardoine ne topaze ne émeraude, mu mulongo muibidi mabue a rubis ne saphir ne calcédoine, mu mulongo muisatu mabue a opale ne agate ne améthyste, mu mulongo muinai mabue a chrysohthe ne onyx ne jaspe
Genese Abalahama Udi Usumba Buloba bua Kujikamu Sala Sala wakadi ne bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete, ebi mbidimu bionso bia muoyo wa Sala

Lewitiki Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Eu udi mukenji wa muena nsudi mu dituku didibo bamulengesha, nebalue handi kudi muakuidi, ne muakuidi neaye biandi ku butshika bua tshitudilu, ne muakuidi neatangile, ne bikala disama dia muena nsudi dishike, neambile bantu bua bamuangatshile nyunyu ibidi idi miakane ne mitshi ya cèdre ne bintu bikunze kunzû, ne mabeshi a hisopa; muakuidi neambile bantu bua bashihele nyunyu umue mu tshivuadi tshia dima ha mutu ha mai adi ahueka
Bantu bakamusangana hakadiye wangula nkunyi, bakalua n andi kudi Mose ne Alona ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele
Kuakungambila ne, Eu udi mukashi wanyi bualu kai

Balume bonso bakadi ne lungenyi lule munkatshi mua bena mudimu bakenza nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bilulu dikumi bia lin muimpe ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû, bakenza bakeluba kudi bena mudimu bakadi ne lungenyi lule
Kanungu ka Tshipwita munwamfwanka kêna mwa kwikala popamwe tshipwita mukulumpa nansha tshipwita mukulumpa popamwe tshipwita munwamfwanka to
Udi ne tshia kulondolola bîmpe ditantamana diaatu
Misoko neyikale bu binyemenu kudi musombuedi, mushihi wa mundi kafu biandi tô ne himaneye ku mpala kua tshisumbu tshia bantu bua kumulumbuluishabo
Yehowa neanumuangalashe munkatshi mua bantu bakuabo, nenuikale bantu bakehe munkatshi mua bisamba mudi Yehowa unutuma

Lewitiki Mikenji ya Bintu Bidibo Bajidila Yehowa Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Biasua mundi kushikisha kuditshiha kua kudifila kuandi, wewe neubale bungi bua bintu bidiye ufila kudi Yehowa
Meme kabidi nengumushe mesu anyi kudi muntu au, nemmumushe munkatshi mua bana babo, bualu bua yeye wakafua muana wandi kudi Moleke bua kuona nsubu wanyi ne kunyangisha dina dianyi dia tshijila
Bana ba Dana, Hushima
Ku nyima Bena Isalele bonso bakafua ha buihi ne yeye wakabamanyisha mikenji yonso yakamuambila Yehowa ha mukuna wa Sinai

Bulalu buonso budiye ulala hatshidiye ne disama, nebuikale bu bulalu bua mu tshikondo tshiandi tshia katshetshi, tshintu tshionso tshi diye ushikama netshikale ne bukoya bu muditshi mu tshikondo tshiandi

Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne bukookeshi bwa kutumina bukalenga bwa mbulamatadi mukanda udiye mufunda yêye nkayende anyi mufunda mu tshibûngi bwa kubumanyisha idi mwenda munda, bukalenga abu budi ne tshia kufila diandamuna mu ngondo isatu idi ilonda
Muntu kena mua kujidila Yehowa muan a bute wa nyama, nansha muana wa ngombe nansha muana wa mukoko etshi ntshintu tshia Yehowa
Wewe newenze tshibuikilu ne tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe, buludi buatshi nebuikale coudées ibidi ne tshituha ne butshiama buatshi nebuikale coudée umue ne tshituha
Minyinyi ya mu mai idi mu musulu neyifue, mai neanunke muhuya mubi, mai a mu musulu neatonde Bena Ejipitu
Belâma wakambila mpunda ne, Bualu bua wewe wakansekesha, bu meme muikale ne muele wa nvita mu tshianza, nakadi kukushiya

Yeye udi mua kudia bidia bia Nzambi wandi ne bidia bidi bitambe tshijila ne bia tshijila, kadi yeye kena mua kubuela mu muaba wa tshijila anyi mua kulua ha buihi ne tshioshelu, bualu bua yeye udi ne tshilema, kanyangishi nsubu wanyi nansha, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa wakabajidila
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele nunku kadi bobo kabakatumikila dî dia Mose bualu bua kanyinganyinga ka mutshima, ne bua dikenga dia buhika
Dikombo dia bukelenge kadiena diumuka kudi Yuda, tshibangu tshia bukokeshi katshiena tshiumuka hankatshi ha makasa andi to ne halua Shilo, ne bantu bonso nebakukukuile
Aba mbana ba Ana Dishona ne Oholibama, muana mukashi wa Ana Aba mbana ba Dishona Hemedana ne Eshebane ne Yitelana ne Kelana
Dishintakaja dia ngenyi ne dieela dia tukanda didi mwa kwenzeka amu panyima pa mêba makumi anayi ne mwanda mukulu a difila dia mukanda

Binunvua mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, inakunuambila lelu, nenuhete disanka; binuahidia kunvua mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, binuasesuka mu nshila unakunulesha lelu bua kulonda nzambi mikuabo, Nudi kanuyi bamanye, nenuhete mulau
Kudisongidi mpingu
Enza mabaya makumi abidi a kutoka ku luseke lua tshitendelelu lua ku nôde, ne biamu bia mahoka ne tshiamu tshia argent makumi anai, mahoka abidi ku dibaya dimue, bualu bua kuelamu tutshi tua bituhu
Noa wakatabala ku muoyo wandi, wakamanya bu muakenza muan andi wa mukala

Dutelonone Malu Adibo ne bualu bua Kuenza bua Kuheta Buhikudi ne Masanka Halua malu au onso kunudi ne disanka ne mulau, binakuteka ku mpala kuenu, ne hanuayuluka malu au munkatshi mua bisamba bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unutuma munkatshi muabi, ne hanuakudimuna mitshima yenu kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mei andi ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso, bu munakunuambila lelu, ne nuenu ne bana benu; hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neakudimune buluka buenu, neanuleshe luse, neahingane kunudi, neanusangishe ba munkatshi mua bantu bonso muakanumuangalasha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Wakenza mesu a mbote makumi atanu mu tshilulu tshimue, ne mesu a mbote makumi atanu mu tshilulu tshikuabo mesu a mbote akadi atuangana
Yeye wakadi kayi muitabushe di dia Yehowa wakashiya bantu bandi ne bimuna biandi mu mpata
Bana balume ba Yakoba bakadi dikumi ne babidi

Nomba Mulangala wa Alona Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ela dî kudi bana ba Isalele, usungule bantu dikumi ne babidi badi bakelenge ba nsubu ya batatu abo, wewe wangata milangala kudibo, muntu ne mulangala wandi muntu ne mulangala wandi, wewe ufunde dina dia muntu ne muntu ha mulangala wandi
Kanungu ka Dikokangana pa bulongolodi bwa dîyi, kumpala kwa Tshibambalu tshia kumpala tshidibo bamanyisha, didi ditangila mukanda udibu batuma kudi Bukalenga bunene
Pagiele, muana mulume wa Okelana, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Ashê
Yehowa Nzambi wakakuma bintu mu budimi ku esete, mu Edene, wakatekamu mulume wakafukeye
Hashishe Sihona wakalua kutudi ne bantu bandi bonso bua kuluangana n etu nvita ku Yahasa
Bingenyingenyi bia dîyi bidibo banyisha ku Bukalenga bunene mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila badi babifila ku Bilo bia tshimwe tshia ku Bibambalu

Mikanda miludiki idiye utwa biâla mu mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bunene anyi idibo batangila kudi ministêla, idi kabidi yangata tshiâla tshindonda tshia Minisitila wa kumpala ne , padibio bienzeka, biâla bia baminisitila badi ne tshia kwenzeja midimu ayi ne bikale kabidi bambula bujitu ebu ku mêsu a Tshimamwende wa bukalenga
Kanukengeshi mukuenu, kanuibi bintu biandi, kanushadi ne difutu dia muena mudimu butuku tô ne dinda

Isalele wakolola tshianza tshiandi tshia balume, wakatshitentekasha ha mutu ha Efelayima, wakadi muan a mukala wakatentekasha tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi ha mutu ha Manashe wakashintakasha bianza biandi bu muakasueye, bualu bua Manashe wakadi muan a bute Yeye wakavudishila Yosefe disanka, wakamba ne, Nzambi wakadi batatu anyi Abalahama ne Isaka bendakena ku mesu kuandi, Nzambi wakandisha matuku anyi onso tô ne ku dituku edi, muanjelo wakampikula ku malu mabi onso, avudishile bansongalume aba disanka, dina dianyi ne dina dia batatu anyi, Abalahama ne Isaka, ashale kudibo, bakumbane ba bungi mu buloba

Hakunvua Labana lumu lua Yakoba muana wa muan abo mukashi, yeye wakaya lubilu bua kumuakidila, wakamuhukila, wakatuangana n andi mishiku, wakalua n andi ku nsubu wandi Yeye wakambila Labana malu onso Labana wakamuambila ne Bulelela, wewe udi mufuba wanyi ne musunyi wanyi Yeye wakashala n andi to ngondo mujima
difila ne dilama mikanda ya nzubu mu dineemeka dia bulongolodi bwa ditunga;
Bakwiidi badi kabidi mwa kumulumbulwila kumpala kwa beena midimu ya bukubi bwa ditunga
Abimeleke Wakabikila Isaka, wakamuambila ne, Bulelela, yeye udi mukashi webe, bualu kai wewe wakuamba ne, Yeye udi muan etu wa bakashi
Wakakanga nkata ya makalu, kabakamanya mua kuya bimpe, Bena Ejipitu bakamba ne, Tunyeme bietu ku mesu kua Bena Isalele, bualu bua Yehowa udi ubaluila nvita yabo, udi uluangana ne Bena Ejipitu
Wewe newenze mesa a mutshi wa acacia buludi buau nebuikale coudées ibidi, ne butshiama buau nebuikale coudée umue, ne bule buau bua mulu nebuikale coudée umue ne tshituha

Kanungu ka Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidi tshitwilangana mudibio bikengedibwa mu midimu ya pabwayi mu dituku dia dikumi ne ditânu panyima pa dipatula dia bipeta bia masungula a batshipwita kudi Kasumbu kadikadile komekela mianda ya Masungulangana mu ditunga dijima bwa kumona mwa: a kuteeka bilo bia tshitupa tshîpi bidibo balombola kudi mukulu ku bidimu mwambulwisha kudi bantu babidi ba bidimu bishaadila; b kwitabuuja makookeshi; c kusungula ne kuteeka bilo bia kashidi; d kwenza ne kwanyisha mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda
Bena Eme bakashikamamu diambedi, bantu banene, bantu ba bungi, bule bua Bena Anaka: badi bababikila kabidi ne, Bena Lefa, bu Bena Anaka; kadi Bena Moaba bakababikila ne, Bena Eme
Yeye wakaditshiha kudiye, wakahana bintu bia buan a bute kudi Yakoba

to, Tshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshipwita mukulumpa kêna mwa kwikala popamwe: a mweena Bukalenga bunene; b mweena tshishimikidi tshia ditwa mpanda ku mungalata c mweena bilwilu, bumpulushi ne midimu ya bukubi bwa bantu; d bundumbulula; e mweena mudimu mushindame wa mbulamatadi; f mulombodi mushindame wa telitwale, pa kumusha bamfumu ba musoko, bisamba ne bifuku; g mutumibwa wa mbulamatadi mwikala utshidi ku mudimu, h mweena mu nzubu wa mudimu wa Mulombodi wa Ditunga, wa minisitila kavulambedi, wa Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia ba tshipwita munwamfwanka , wa Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa, wa beena mu bukalenga bunene ne, mu tshibûngi wa mfumu wa tshidiidi anyi wa buludiki bwa mbulamatadi, mweena mudimu mu kumpanyi wa mbulamatadi anyi mu kumpanyi ya bubanji busanga; i mudimu mukwabo ônso udibo bateeka muntu musungula
Eu udi mukenji wa muena nsudi udi kayi mua kusangisha bintu bia mushinga mukole bia kudilengesha n abi
Wewe wakungenzela bualu bubi, budi kabuyi buimpe bua kuenza
Buludi buatshi nebuikale coudée umue, ne butshiama buatshi nebuikale coudée umue, utshidikishe ne luidi lumue, bule buatshi bua mulu nebuikale coudées ibidi; wenze nsengu yatshi ne mutshi au umue

Bikala balume babidi baluangane, ne mukashi wa umue wabo ulualua bua kusungila mulume wandi mu tshianza tshia muntu udi umukuma, udi wolola tshianza tshiandi, udi umukuata ku biaha mesu, ku nyima nebamukose tshianza tshiandi, kabamuleshi luse nansha

Bualu bua buloba bunuyaya kuhiana kabuena bu buloba bua Ejipitu munuakumuka, bunuakakuna ntete yenu, nuakayimiamina mai nuendakana ku makasa, bu tshibanda tshia midioko; kadi buloba bunuyaya kuhiana mbuloba bua mikuna ne bibanda, buloba ebu budi bumina mai a nvula ya mu diulu, buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ulama; mesu a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, atu atangila ha buloba abu ku tshibangidilu tshia tshidimu tô ne kunshikidilu kuatshi
Belâma wakabandisha mesu andi, wakatangila Bena Isalele bashikama ku milongo ya bisamba biabo, Nyuma wa Nzambi wakalua kudiye
Mu dituku diakadi Yehowa uyikila ne Mose mu buloba bua Ejipitu, Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Wambile Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, mei onso anakuambila

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne bana bandi balume ne, Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu mu muaba udibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia nebashihe mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu ku mesu kua Yehowa, eu udi mulambu mutambe wa tshijila
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Wakakuma mpunda webe misangu isatu bualu kai
Yeye neanutumine masama onso a mu Ejipitu anuakatshina; masama au neanulamate nuenu
Bualu bua mashi adi bu muoyo wa tshintu nakanuha mashi ha tshioshelu bualu bua kunubuikidila n au bubi buenu mashi adi anubuikidila bubi bualu bua muoyo wau
Yeye wakatuma bansongalume ba Bena Isalele, bakoshila Yehowa nyama, bakamushihela ngombe ya milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala
Yeye wakambila tshisumbu tshia bantu ne, Umukai, ndi nnusengelela, ku ntenta ya bantu aba babi, kanulengi tshintu tshiabo tshianza, kabanushihi bua mibi yabo

Biatangila muakuidi ne disama diakuamba kushika hashikishabo kuvuwa tshintu atshi, yeye neahande tshituha tshia tshilulu anyi tshia tshiseba anyi tshia milongo ya buludi anyi tshia milongo ya butshiama tshidi ne disama
Sala wakadi useka munda munda, wamba ne, Meme nakulua mukoke ne mukelenge wanyi muikale mununu kabidi, nengikale ne disanka, anyi
Yehowa neatahulule bimuna bia Bena Isalele ne bimuna bia Bena Ejipitu, nansha tshintu tshikese tshia Bena Isalele netshifue
Bakabisha luendu luabo ku Kibelota hatawa, bakaya ku Haselota, bakashikama mu Haselota
Yosefe wakalota tshilota, wakatshiawila bana babo, bobo bakatamba kuikala n andi lukuna
Kanungu ka Tshingenyingenyi tshiônso anyi bulongolodi bwa dîyi bônso badi babujooja bilondangana kudi bibambalu biônso bibidi bwa kwanyisha mukanda wa momumwe
Kanulambi muana wa mukoko mu mabele a mamu wandi
Nzambi wakatabasha mesu andi, yeye wakamona mushimi wa mai, yeye wakaya, wakasuna mai mulondo tente, wakanuisha nsongalume mai
Kadi bikala mulume wandi mumukande mu dituku diakunvueye kuditshiha, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso nebikale tshianana, Yehowa neamubuikidile bualu abu
Hakalela Sheme Âpakashada, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama itanu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Tubakilangane n enu, nuenu nufîle bana benu ba bakashi kutudi ne nuangate bana betu ba bakashi kunudi
Nomba Alona Udi Utemesha Minda Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Hawatemesha minda minda muanda mutekete neyikale ku mpala kua tshitekelu tshia muinda
Kanungu ka Padi tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshianyisha mukanda wa ditangilula,badi bangata Bukalenga bunene bu bulekela mudimu

nenubambile ne, Tshidi tshintu tshituha tshia kuhita kua Yehowa, yeye wakahita ha mutu ha nsubu ya Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu, hakashiheye Bena Ejipitu, ne wakasungila nsubu yetu Bantu bakinama mitu yabo, bakatendelela Yehowa
Kadi bantu bakaya n andi bakamba ne, Katuena bamanye mua baluangana ne bantu aba, bualu bua badi batutamba bukole
Mampa a Kuteka ku Mpala kua Yehowa Wangate bukula bubotesha, ulambe n abu mikata dikumi ne ibidi, ulambe mukata umue ne bituha bibidi bia dikumi bia épha
Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Lua biebe, nenkuleshe muaba mukuabo, bumue Nzambi neitabushe bua wewe ubangelele mulau ku muaba au

Mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda udi uleeja: a bule bwa matuku ne tuludiki twa lwendu lwa bilo, makookeshi ne mapa a mulombodi watshi pamwe ne a bakwabo beena Bilo; b bûngi, mushindu wa dibasungula, dibatwangaja,mudimu ne bukookeshi bwa tusumbu twabi twa tukese twa matuku male pamwa ne diaasa ne lwendu lwa tusumbu tukese twa pa bwatu ne twa mpoolu mikese; c bulongolodi bwa midimu ya munda idibo baludika kudi mufundi wa mukanda wa dipoku wa buludiki bwa mianda ya munda mwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu; d bulongolodi bwa nnemeekelu wa mêyi ne manyooka mateekela batshipwita munwamfwanka ne batshipwita bakulumpa; e mishindu mishilangana ya dieela dia tukanda , pa kumusha idibo bateeka, bajaadika bîmpe kudi Dîyi dikulu edi
Kanuikadi ne Muena Edome lukuna, bualu bua yeye udi muan enu; kanuikadi ne Muena Ejipitu lukuna, bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba buandi
Kanungu ka Bantu bônso badi baledibwa badikadila ne bikala ne mushinga ne mapa a momumwe
Buonso buetu tudi bana ba muntu umue, tudi bambe mei a bushuwa, katuena batentekedi
Mose wakabala ban a bute bonso ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bu muakamuambila Yehowa
Mulume wakidika mukashi wandi dina ne, Eva, bualu bua yeye udi muledi wa bonso badi ne muoyo

Bilondeshila bulongolodi ebu, pikalabo kabayi bapatula dîyi ditangila lupetu lwa tshidimu mu dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu wa lwîshi wa tshikondu tshia ndongamu wa lupetu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga, mu dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene dikala dishintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, udi upeesha tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia lupetu bukola, kayi upwa mooyi makumbaja meelela tukanda kudi Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu
Bakajikamu Abalahama ne Sala, mukashi wandi, ne Isaka ne Lebeka, mukashi wandi, nakajikamu Lea kabidi, bakasumba budimi ne lubuebue ludimu kudi bana ba Hete
Ditutu dia mu munya diakadi ne dinkenke butuku kadiakumuka ku mpala kua bantu

Bikala mulambu wa mundi mbushi, nealue handi ku mesu kua Yehowa, neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu handi, neamushihe ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, ne bana balume ba Alona nebamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu
Nzambi yenu ibike, inukuatshishe, inulame
Kadi kabakabala Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Yeye wakalota tshiota, wakamona tshibandilu tshi shimika hanshi ne mutu watshi wakateka to ne mu diulu ne mona banjelo ba Nzambi bakadi babandahu, bahuekahu: Wakamona ne Yehowa wakadi muimane ku mutu watshi, wamba ne Ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Abalahama, kaku webe ne Nzambi wa Isaka buloba budi ulalahu nenkuhebu wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe
Matuku onso a Noa akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne makumi atanu, yeye wakafua
Wakenza tshintu tshia or bunene bua butshiama bua tshianza ku matengu onso
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen

Genese Tunkanunuina tua Adama Eu udi mukanda wa ndelanganyi ya Adama Mu dituku diakafuka Nzambi bantu mu tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, wakabafuka mulume ne mukashi, wakabasankisha, wakabidika ne, Adama, mu dituku diakabafukeye
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe ha mai, mai ahingane kabidi ha mutu ha Bena Ejipitu ne ha makalu abo ne ha masalayi abo adi enda ha tubalu

Lebeka wakambila Ya koba muan andi ne, Tangila, nakunvua tatu ebe wambila Esau, mukulu ebe ne, Ulue kundi ne munyinyi wa ntole, undambile munyinyi muimpe wa dihembu, bua meme ngudie, nkuvudishile disanka ku mpala kua Yehowa diambedi tshiyi muanze kufua
Bantu bakuabo ne bunvue, nebatshine, kabena benza malu au mabi munkatshi muenu kabidi
Nenfunde ha mabue au mei akadi mafunda ha mabue awakashiha, wewe wabueshe mu mushete
Ku nyima Lea wakalela muana wa bakashi wakamuidika dina ne, Dina

Mu dituku disambombo bana balume ba ngombe muanda mukulu ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Muenyi kena mua kudia tshintu tshia tshijila, nansha muenyi wa muakuidi nansha muena mudimu kabena mua kudia tshintu tshia tshijila
Lubena wakabambila ne Tshiakanuambila ne, Kanuenzedi muana bualu bubi, kadi nuenu kanuakangunvuila, anyi
Tatu wandi wakamudila
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Ubambile ne, Kanuyi, kanuluanganyi; bualu bua meme tshiena munkatshi muenu; kanuhonyi ku mpala kua bantu badi n enu lukuna
Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Ya biebe mu tshihela bua kusangakena ne Mose Yeye wakaya, wakasangakena handi mu mukuna wa Nzambi, wakatuangana n andi mishiku

Bikala muntu mudioshe ne kahia, ne bikala munyinyi wa mu muaba muandamuke mutoke anyi mukunze, muakuidi neatangile ha muaba au, ne bikala miosa ya mu muaba au miandamuke mitoke tô, ne bikala disama dimane kubuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, edi ndisama dia nsudi diakumueneka mu muaba wakadiosheye muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi
Kuvudi muan enu mukashi bilulu, bikaleye muana wa tatu ebe anyi muana wa mamu ebe udi muledibue mu nsubu muenu, anyi muaba mukuabo
Tukanda badi mwa kutweela kabidi mu mushindu wa biamwa udi utamba kukolesha mutshima
Sheme ne Yafete bakangata tshilulu, bakatshiteka ha makaya abo, bakaya tshianyima, bakabuikila butaka bua tatu abo, mpala yabo yakadi mitangile kukuabo, kabakatangila butaka bua tatu abo nansha
Neafile nyunyu muibidi bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, bu muakadi mikenji, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kumubuikidila n au bubi buandi ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Nyoka Idi Isuma bu Kahia Bakumuka ku mukuna wa Hô, bakaya mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze bualu bua kunyunguluka ku nyima kua buloba bua Edome, mitshima ya bantu yakahanga bualu bua nshila
Tshibanda tshia Sidima tshiakadi tshiule tente ne bina bia bitume ne bakelenge ba Sodoma ne Amola bakanyema, bakahonamu, bakuabo bakashala bakanyemena ku mukuna

Mose wakabanda ha mukuna kudi Nzambi, ne Yehowa wakamubikila mu mukuna, wakamba ne, Wewe newambile ba mu nsubu wa Yakoba nunku, neumanyishe Bena Isalele ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nuenu nuakutangila malu anakenzela Bena Ejipitu, ne bu munakanutuala ha mahuahua a nyunyu wa mukanku, bu munakalua n enu kundi meme
Kimoko kakuena bintu bia kukuna nansha mamuma a nfigi nansha tumuma tukese nansha mamuma a grenade, kakuena mai a kunua
Wewe newambile bantu dituku adi bua dituku adi dikale dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila kunudi, kanuenji mudimu eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu nsubu yenu yonso tô ne mu bikondo bienu bionso
Bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; Yehowa wakanusungula munkatshi mua bantu bonso ba ha buloba bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi
Nunku bakasangisha ku bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele bantu tshinunu ku tshisamba, bantu tshinunu ku tshisamba, bena nvita binunu dikumi ne bibidi
Uvuluke ne wewe wakadi muhika mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakakubikula: ka nunku ndi nkuelela mukenji eu lelu
Yeye udi bu ngabu wa dikuatshisha dienu; udi bu muele wa nvita unudi nutamba n au bakuabo
Bakumuka mu Tahata, bakashikama mu Tela

Wakamuluatshisha tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi, wakateka Ulima ne Tumima mu tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi, wakasa tshifulu ku mutu kuandi, wakasuika tshitotolo tshia tshiamu tshia or, tshintu tshia tshijila, ku mpala kua tshifulu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

bitadi bia mbulamatadi pa makookeshi a bantu,bitadi bia mbulamatadi pa midimu ya bantu ne bitadi bia kufuta polovensa ne misoko bu mudi tshitadi tshia malaba, tshitadi tshia pa makasa a mushinga wa difutshisha ne tshitadi tshia pa tudiendelandela;
posete ne dimanyishangana dia mianda dia kule mudi mwikale telefone ne telekalema, dimwangalaja dia ngumu ku tshisanji ku televizio ne ku satelita;
diumbula dia bifidi bia mudilu udi kawuyi utudika ne dipatula dia mâyi bwa majinga a polovensa

kwikala anyi bwa bangabanga, anyi bupeta Udi mweena Kongu, mmuntu yônso mweena bisamba bieena bantu ne maloba avwa mênza tshidi tshilwa Kongu mpindiewu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata mu tshikondo tshiakapeteka budikadidi

Enza biebe tshilulu tshinene tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzu ne bua lin udi mutambe buimpe utshienzeshe kudi bantu badi ne lungenyi lule badi bamanye mua kuenza tshifuanyikishi tshia bakeluba mu tshilulu atshi

Mose ne Alona ne bana bandi balume nebashikame ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena ku luseke lua ku esete kudi diba dihatuka, bua kulama nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bintu bia Bena Isalele; bialua muenyi ha buihi nebamushihe
bukookeshi, bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Njila mwitanu : Bidi bitangila Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu Kanungu ka Kudi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu
Bua bualu ebu mulume neashiye tatu andi ne mamu andi, nealamate mukashi wandi, bubidi buabo nebikale mubidi umue
Bobo nebanuteke tshikokedi tshia tshiamu ha nshingu yenu tô ne hanuajimishibua kudibo
Wakenza minda muanda mutekete ne biamu bia kujimisha n abi minda ne malonga ai ne or nkayandi
Bakabisha luendu luabo ku Sukota, bakashikama mu Etama, ku butshika bua tshihela
Bantu bonso bakabalabo ba mu tshitudilu tshia Efelayima bakadi binunu lukama ne muanda mukulu ne lukama lumue ku bisumbu biabo
Mose wakamuambila ne, Wewe udi ne mukau ku bualu buanyi, anyi

Nealabe mashi ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshidi mu ntenta wa kusangakena ku mesu kua Yehowa, yeye neahongolole mashi onso ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu tshia kahia tshidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Ngombe yakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bisambombo, ne mulambu wa Yehowa wakadi makumi muanda mutekete ne ibidi
Bantu bakatandangana ne Mose, bakamba ne, Biakadi bimpe bua tuetu kufua bu muakafua bana betu ku mesu kua Yehowa
Njila mwinâyi : Bidi bitangila bukalenga bukoshi bwa nsambu Kalongu ka kumpala
Bakaya nunku, bakatentekela buloba ku tshihela tshia Sina tô ne ku Lehoba udi mu nshila wa ku Hamata
Dituku edi nedikale dituku dia lumingu dia kuikisha, ne nuenu nenujinge mu mitshima yenu, nuikishe bienu ku dilolo dia matuku tshitema a ngondo eu tô ne ku dilolo dia matuku dikumi
Bakashikama ku mpala kuandi, muntu ku mulongo wandi muntu ku mulongo wandi, wakatuadishila ku muan a bute to ne ku muan a mukala, balume aba bakakemangana
Yeye wakamba ne, Makelela Mose wakamba ne, Bualu buikale bu mu dî diebe, bua kukumanyisha ne, Kakuena nzambi mukuabo bu Yehowa Nzambi wetu
Wakamutuma ku tshibanda tshia Hebelone, ne yeye wakalua ku Shekeme Mulumiana wakamusangana ne, mona, wakadi wendakana mu tshisuku, wakamuebesha ne, Udi ukeba tshinyi
Mose ne Eleazâ muakuidi ne bakelenge bonso ba mu tshisumbu bakaya bua kusangakena n abo ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Bana balume ba Alama badi Usa ne Hula ne Gete ne Masha
Aba mbantu badi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo
Bintu ebi mmajitu a bana balume ba Kohata mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Buhidia Buabo Hashishe halua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, n enu mu buloba buakalayeye batatu benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bua kunuhabu, misoko minene ne miakane mudi kanuyi bibake, ne nsubu miule tente ne bintu bimpe mudi kanuyi bûshe, ne mena a mai akumbulabo, anudi kanuyi bumbule, ne madimi a tumuma tukese ne mitshi ya olive, binudi kanuyi bakune; nuenu nenudie, nenukute mafu tente; hashishe nudimukai, bua kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa buluka
Dina dia diboko dinai didi Pelata

Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila bilwilu Kanungu ka Mu bilwilu mudi bilwilu bia pabuloba,bilwilu bia mu lupepela, bilwilu bia mu mâyi ne midimu yabi mibikwatshishi; bidi ne mudimu wa kusungidila bujima bwa tshipaapu tshia ditunga ne mikalu yadi
Tshisamba tshia Lewi Ebu mbungi bua Bena Lewi ku meku abo Gêshona ne meku a Bena Gêshona, Kohata ne meku a Bena Kohata; Melali ne meku a Bena Melali

Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi ufikisha bamweenampala ne batumibwa ba pabwabo ku matunga a beenyi ne ku malongolodi a bukwa matunga, bamwena mpala ne batumibwa ba pabwabo ba matunga makwabo padibo banyishibwa kudiye
Yeye wakabatendekena bikole, bobo bakaya n andi bakabuela mu nsubu wandi, yeye wakabalambishila bintu bia bungi ne bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene ne bobo bakabidia
Nentume nyama ya muitu munkatshi muenu, neyinunyenge bana benu bakese, neyishihe bimuna bienu, nuenu nenulue bantu banya banya nshila yenu neyikale hatuhu
Yehowa wakakudimuna mutshima wandi bua malu akeleye meji bua kuenzela bantu bandi

Abalama wakambila mukelenge wa Sodoma ne, Nakamana kubisha tshianza tshianyi bua kuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu, mufuki wa diulu ne buloba, ne, Tshiena ngangata nansha nshinga nansha muonshi wa bisabata nansha kantu kebe kamue, bua wewe kuambi ne, Nakavuisha Abalama bubanji
Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi, mianda idi ilonda eyi idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa polovensa:
Abalahama wakamba ne, Tangila, nakukuata bualu bua kusomba ne Yehowa, meme ndi bu luhuishi ne butue
Nufile ban a bute ba balume kundi
Yehowa Nzambi wakafuka mulume ne dinfuenkenya dia buloba, wakela muhuya wa muoyo mu diulu diandi, ne mulume wakalua ne muoyo
disomba dia munda mwa ditunga bwa majinga a Ditunga;
Wakakonka bana bandi ba bakashi ne, Yeye udi kudi kunyi
Wewe neulamike tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe ha nyima honso ne munda mua mushete kabidi, neuteke tshiamu tshia or ku mibangu ya mushete
Yehowa wakaluhuka n andi mu nsubu, wakamba ne, Tangila mutu bala mitoto, biwamanya mua kuyibala Yeye wakamuambila ne, Tunkanunuina biebe netuikale bungi nunku
Utshilembeleshe ha makunshi a acacia anai adi ne or ku nseke yonso, teka nkanu ya or ku tshilulu, ku bitubuidi binai bia argent bia ha makunshi

Bikaleye kayi ne mushinga wa muana wa mukoko, alue biandi ne nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi anyi mputu nyunyu ibidi, umue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, muakuidi munene neayifile bua kumubuikidila n au bubi, ne yeye neikale mulengeshibue
Yeye wakatubuesha mu lukanu, mu nsubu wa kapitene ka masalayi malami, mu muaba muakadi Yosefe musuikila
Hashishe Yosefe wakambila ba ntu bandi ne, Nubushile bibombi biabo tente ne bia kudia, nuhingashe argent wa muntu ne muntu mu tshibombi tshiandi, nubahe bintu bia kudiabo mu nshila, bakenza nunku

Kanungu ka Bukalenga bwa mbulamatadi budi ne tshia kwenza mwaabu mônso bwa kujimija kashidi mishindu yônso ya kansungansunga pa bidi bitangilla mukaji ne kabidi bwa kukuba ne kukolesha makookeshi ende
Dîyi didi dileeja mishindu ya kubweeja malomba aa ne bipeta biawu mudibio babiâmba mu tunungu tudi tudianjila
Tshidi ne mudimu wa kufila ngenyi ne kwambulwisha mwa kupeta ngenyi idi itangila tshidiidi tshia kwenza ne idi itangila mêyi adi ditunga mwa kweela
Nakanulombola mu tshihela tô bidimu makumi anai: bilulu bienu kabiakasunsuka ham bidi henu, ne bisabata kabiakasunsuka ku makasa enu
Wakamukudimuna ne, Tshia kuheta n atshi luse kudi mukelenge wanyi Esau wakamuambila ne, Ndi ne bintu bikumbane, muakunyi anyi ushale ne bintu biudi n abi
Yeye neabake mukashi utshidi kamama

Yeye wakamubandisha ha mutu ha miaba mile ya ha buloba, wakadia bintu biakaboba mu madimi, wakamunuisha buitshi buakadi mu mabue, ne manyi akadi mu mabue makole; Wakamudisha manteke a mabele a ngombe, ne mabele a mbushi, ne dianyi dia mikoko ne bimpanga bia mu Bashana ne mbushi, ne blê yakatamba buimpe, nuakanua nvinyo ya tumuma tukunze tuakadi bu mashi
Nzambi wakasokolola bubi bua bantu bebe, tangila, buonso buetu tudi bahika bebe, ne tuetu ne muntu wakasanganabo ne luhanza

Beena ku Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu badi ne tshia kujadika ne badi bamanyi bapiluke mu mianda ya lupetu, ya mêyi ne mikandu ne ya diludika dia mianda ya mbulamatadi ne badi ne tshia kujadika kabidi ne bakaadi bênza midimu eyi bidimu kabiyi bishadila ku dikumi
Enza biebe nkanu ya or ibidi, uyiteke ku nseke ibidi kuinshi kua mutu watshi; neyikale bu miaba ya kubueshamu mitshi ya kutshituadila
Eu udi mulambu wa tshiendelele unakanuelela mukenji mu mukuna wa Sinai, mulambu udi utua dihembu, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa
Wakenza malonga onso a tshioshelu ne bivuadi ne nkasu ne malonga ne bitubuidi bia kukuata n abi munyinyi ne bihanza bia kahia ne bintu biatshi bionso ne tshiamu tshia mitaku
Udi kabidi ne tshia kulama ne kutantshisha bisumbu bia bantu bidi kabiyi ne bukola pamwe ne tusumbu twa bantu twa tukesa
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bika, uye biebe ku mpala kua bantu, nebabuelemu, nebahiane buloba bunakalaya batatu babo bua kubahabu
Nutumikile, nuenze malu onso ne mei onso anakuteka ku mpala kuenu lelu
Nunku nuenu kanuakantuma kunoko, kadi Nzambi wakantuma; nyeye wakanvuisha bu tatu wa Palô ne mukelenge wa nsubu wandi wonso, ne mukokeshi wa buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Yehowa nea nuvudishile disanka mu bisasa bienu, ne mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu; neanuvudishile disanka mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nnuha
Au mmena a bana ba balume ba Alona bakuidi bakadi ne manyi mela ha mitu, bakajidilabo bua kuenza mudimu wa buakuidi
Tshipwita wa ditunga udi uleeja mpala wa ditunga
Kubuelakanyi ne bantu babi bualu bua kuikala bu mumanyi wa malu adi kayi malelela
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Bena Isalele bakenza nunku, mu malu onso akambila Yehowa Mose, nunku bakashikama ku mabendele abo, ne bakaya ku mpala ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo

Yeye neangate bintu bia kulengesha n abi nsubu nyunyu ibidi ne mitshi ya cêdre ne bintu bikunze ne mabeshi a hisopa, neashihele umue wa nyunyu mu tshivuadi tshia dima ha mutu ha mai adi ahueka, neangate mitshi ya cêdre ne mabeshi a hisopa ne bintu bikunze ne nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo, neafue bintu ebi mu mashi a nyunyu wakashiheye ne mu mai adi ahueka, neâmiamine ku nsubu misangu muanda mutekete
Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kubumbusha mu njila wabo bwa kumwenzelabo yêye nkayende mudimu to
Sala wakamona muana mulume wa Haga, muena Ejipitu, wakadi muledibue kudi Abalahama, wakadi useka biandi
Nyama yonso idi ne mikono mihanduluke ne idi kayiyi mihingishilula bintu mukana udi mubi kunudi, muntu yonso udi ulenga tshianza ham bidi hai neikale ne bukoya
Kana wakumuka ku mesu kua Yehowa, wakashikama mu buloba bua Nodo, ku esete kua Edene
Yosefe wakabambila ne, Adi ndi dinakunuambila ne, Nudi batentekedi, nennutete ku bualu ebu, ndi nditshiha ku muoyo wa Palô ne, Kanuena numuka kunoko anu hanualua ne muan enu, muan a mukala kunoko
Wewe neulue ne muana wa ngombe ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusambakena, Alona ne bana bandi balume nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha muana wa ngombe
Kababeyi muaba wa dibala ha mutu habo, kabahungi miedi yabo, kabatahi nsalu ham bidi habo

Pikala Kasumbu kakese kasanga ka bantu bûngi bwa momumwe kakayi kafika ku dianyisha mukanda umwe anyi pikala mukanda ewu kabayi bawanyisha mu mushindu udibo balongolola kudi tulongo twapitshi etu, Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshidi tshiangata mapangadika bwa kashidi
Nenukune maminu a bungi mu madimi, nenuhuole makese, bualu bua mikumbi neyadie
Dituku dikuabo Kana wakalua ne bintu biakamena mu buloba bu mulambu kudi Yehowa

Muakuidi udi ku mutu kua bakuabo udi ne manyi mele ha mutu ne udi mujidila bua kuluata bilulu bia tshijila, kalekedi nsuki yandi tshianana, kahandi bilulu biandi nansha, kabuedi kudi muntu mufue nansha, kadinyangi bua tatu andi anyi mamu andi, kahatula ku nsubu wa tshitendelelu, kanyangishi nsubu wa Nzambi wandi nansha, bualu bua manyi a tshijila a Nzambi wandi adi ha mutu handi, meme ndi Yehowa
Kadi yeye wakahidia, wakambila mukashi wa mukelenge wandi ne, Mona, mukelenge wanyi kena mumanye bintu bindi n abi mu nsubu muandi, yeye wakashiya bintu bionso bidiye n abi mu tshianza tshianza
Mose wakolola tshianza tshiandi ha mai, ne Yehowa wakatuma luhehele lukole lua ku esete, wakahingasha mai butuku abu buonso, buloba bûme buakamueneka kuakadi mai, mai akahanduluka
Mei au anakukuambila lelu eu ikale mu mutshima webe; wewe newayishe bana bebe, wewe neusombelele n abo bua mei au, hawashikama mu nsubu webe, ne hawenda mu nshila, ne hawalala, ne hawabika
Bakumuka ku mikuna ya Abalima, bakashikama mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mitangilangane ne Yeleko

Yehowa wakahita ku mpala kuandi, wakela dî ne, Yehowa, Yehowa, Nzambi wa luse ne dinanga, kena ukuata tshiji lubilu, udi mûle tente ne luse lujalame ne bushuwa, udi ulesha binunu bia bantu luse lujalame, udi ubuikidila bantu malonga abo ne kusambuka kuabo kua mikenji ne malu mabi abo; kadi kena ubingisha muntu udi uhila; udi utumina bana ba tshikondo tshisatu anyi tshinai mibi ya batatu abo

udibo basungula Mulombodi wa Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata, ndi ngamba kumpala kwa Nzambi ne Ditunga ne : nendondesha ne nensungidila Dîyi dikulu ne mêyi ne mikandu ya Ditunga; nenshindika budikadidi ne bujima bwa tshipaapu tshia Ditunga; nendaminyina bobumwe bwa Ditunga; nendonda amu dijinga dia bantu bônso ne kaneemu ka mapa a bumuntu; nendifila ne bukole bônso mu dilengeja dia nsombelu wa bantu ne mu difila dia bupole; nenkumbaja midimu minene idibo bampeesha mu dilonda dia mêyi ne anu bu mupika menemene wa bantu
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Ebu mbualu buakamba Yehowa bua tuetu tuenze
Utuangashe bilulu bitanu ha buabi, ne utuangashe bilulu bisambombo ha buabi, tshilulu tshisambombo netshikale tshihitakane ku mushiku wa tshitendelelu
Wewe newangate tshiadi tshia tshimpanga tshia kujidila kua Alona, utshinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, netshikale tshituha tshiebe
Biula nebiumuke kûdi ne ku nsubu yebe, ne kudi bahika bebe ne kudi bantu bebe, nebishale anu mu musulu nkayau
Nzambi wakamona Bena Isalele Nzambi wakamanya dikenga diabo
Ahiezê muana mulume wa Amishadai neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Dana
Gamaliele muana mulume wa Pedasu neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Manashe
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina, Abidana muana mulume wa Gideom

Hakahita matuku asatu Abalahama wakabandisha mesu andi, wakamona muaba kule kuakua Abalahama wakambila bansongalume bandi babidi ne, Nuenu nushale kimoko ne nyama wa mpunda, tuetu netuye ne nsongalume, netutendelele, netuhingane kunudi
Kabalambi tshituha atshi ne luevene

Aba mbana ba Esau bakamulelelabo mu buloba bua Kanana Esau wakangata bakashi bandi ne bana bandi ba balume ne bana bandi ba bakashi ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wandi, ne bimuna biandi, ne nyama yandi yonso, ne bintu bionso biakamueneye mu buloba bua Kanana, wakumuka kudi muakunyi andi Yakoba, wakaya ku buloba bukuabo
Bishimikidi bipiabipia bia Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata mbiôbi ebi: Mulombodi wa Ditunga; Tshimamwende wa bukalenga; Bukalenge bunene; Tubadi ne tubinadi
Tshiole tshiakashala mu buloba bidimu bibidi, ne bidimu bitanu bidi bishala bidibo kabayi badima, kabayi bahuola bintu

Kanushihi milambu ya kuhita kua Yehowa munda mua misoko idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe; anu mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi, nenushihe milambu ya kuhita kua Yehowa dilolo habuela diba, ha diba mene dinuakahatuka mu Ejipitu

Tshisangilu tshia banguvenêla ba polovensa tshidi tshikumbajibwa, pa kumbusha banguvenêla ba polovensa, kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga, kudi minisitila Kavulambedi ne kudi minisitila mwimikila mianda ya munda mwa ditunga
Kanungu ka Dîyi dikulu edi, didibo banyisha mu dieebeja dia beena ditunga, didi dipeta bwenzeji padibo badipatula kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga

Neubale mushinga wa bintu bionso bu mushinga wa nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu guéras makumi abidi idi nshekele umue

Budi kaludiki, dieedibwa mu lukanu ke didi tshiumusha
Ditangilula didi dilwa dia kashidi anu padibo banyisha tshingenyingenyi, dilomba anyi difwanyikija kudi beena ditunga

Nyunyu ei idi mibi kunudi, kanudi nyunyu ei nyunyu wa mukanku ne nyunyu wa gypaête ne nyunyu wa orfraie, ne nyunyu wa milan mufike ne wa milan mukunze ne mushindu wonso wa tshikololo ne nyunyu wa autriche ne nyunyu wa chat huant ne nyunyu wa mouette ne wa nkumbikumbi ne nyunyu wa tshihungulu ne nyunyu wa choutte ne nyunyu wa ibis, ne nyunyu wa pélican ne nyunyu mutoke utu wadia bintu bibole ne nyunyu wa cormoran ne nyunyu wa cigogne ne nyunyu wa ya héron ne nyunyu wa huppe ne nyunyu wa mudima
Yosefe wakadi ne bidimu makumi asatu hakimaneye ku mpala kua Palo, mukelenge wa Ejipitu
Biamatshila bilumi tshilulu anyi tshiseba nebatshiuvuwe ne mai, netshikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo

Lewitiki Bakuidi Bikale ba Tshijila Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile bakuidi, bana balume ba Alona, ne, Nansha umue wabo kadinyangi bua bantu bafue badi munkatshi muabo, anu bua bana babo, nansha mamu andi nansha tatu andi, nansha muan andi mulume, nansha muan andi mukashi, nansha muan abo wa balume, nansha muan andi mukashi utshidi kamama, udi kayi ne mulume, yeye udi mua kudinyanga bua bualu buandi
Nuenze mudimu wenu matuku asambombo kadi nuikishe mu dituku dia muanda mutekete, bua ngombe webe ne mpunda webe bikishe ne muana wa balume wa muhika webe mukashi, ne muenyi basangale
bafunda mukanda wa dilomba batumina tshimwe tshia ku Bibambalu bibidi

Ebele kabidi wakalua ne ban a bute ba mikoko ne dianyi diai Yehowa wakitabusha Ebele ne mulambu wandi, kadi yeye wakahidia Kana ne mulambu wandi Kana wakadi ne tshiji, wakabungama Yehowa wakakonka Kana ne, Udi ne tshiji bua tshinyi
Beena Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga badi polovensa
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bua bobo bavuluke kuhita kua Yehowa
Nebavungulule tshilulu ku mesu kua bakulu ba mu musoko
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kwikala mumanya, mu dienza dia midimu yende, dishilashilangana dia mianda ya bunkambwa mu ditunga
Kumulombi tshia kasombela, kadi utshine Nzambi webe, mukuenu neikale n ebe
Yeye waka tuma nyunyu wa nkutshi bua kumanyeye ne mai akahueka ha buloba
Bua kukuatshila Bena Ejipitu mudimu budi butamba bua kufua mu tshihela buimpe
Mose ne Alona bakenza bu muakamba Yehowa, bakenza nunku
Nenuenze nunku kudi mulume wa ngombe yonso anyi kudi tshimpanga tshionso anyi kudi bana ba balume ba mikoko anyi kudi mbushi
Mose wakaya mu tshitudilu, yeye ne bakulu ba Isalele
Kakamanya Palô bualu ebu, wakakeba kushiha Mose
Neavule bilulu ebi, nealuate bilulu bikuabo, neatuale butue ku butshika bua tshitudilu ku muaba mutoke

Masanka a mu Buloba bua Mulayi Nunku nutumikile mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne bukole, ne bua nuenu nubuelemu, ne bua nuenu nuhiane buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana; ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu bua kubahabu ne tunkanunuma tuabo, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Neangate mbushi ibidi, neayiteke ku mpala kua Yehowa ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Mose wakenza nyoka ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, wakamuteka kulu kua mutshi, hashishe bakatangila mundi musumibue nyoka wa tshiamu tshia mitaku, wakadi ne muoyo kabidi
Kuendi masandi

Meme nakimitshisha baledi ba bantu aba mafu, anyi, nakabalela, anyi, bua wewe wakungambila ne, Ubatuale ha tshiadi tshiebe, bu mudi muledi utuala muana utshidi wamua, tô ne ku buloba buwakalaya batatu abo
Wakimita difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamba ne, Katataka nentumbishe Yehowa, nunku wakidika dina diandi ne, Yuda, ne yeye wakalekela kulela
Mena a misoko ei akadi: Besê mu tshihela, mu muaba wa mpata, wa mu Bena Lubena; ne Lamota mu Gilada wa Bena Gada; ne Golana mu Bashana wa Bena Manashe

Yeye neikale ne mashi a kudilengesha kuandi tô matuku makumi asatu ne asatu, kalengi tshianza tshiandi ha tshintu tshia tshijila, kabuedi mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu tô ne hashikisheye matuku a kudilengesha kuandi

Lewitiki Milambu Ikale ya Tshijila Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne bana bandi balume ne, Nuenu nudijidile ku bintu bia tshijila bia Bena Isalele bidibo banjidila, kanunyangishi dina dianyi dia tshijila meme ndi Yehowa
Bintu bionso bia tshijila bia Bena Isalele bidibo banyukula, bidibo bafila kudi muakuidi, nebikale biandi
Nganyi udi bu wewe, udi ne butumbi bua tshijila, udi utshinyisha bantu ne bienzedi bia butumbi, udi wenza malu a kukema
ditambakana munda mwa polovensa;
Bualu ebu buakadi bujitu bukole kudi Abalahama bualu bua muana wandi mulume
Hakumuka difutu ku mutu kua Ntenta, hashishe Bena Isalele bakaya ku luendu, mu muaba wakimana ditutu, Bena Isalele bakalongolola tshitudilu
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Kanutshinyi, bualu bua Nzambi wakulua bua kunuteta, ditshina diandi dikale ku mpala kuenu, bua nuenu kanuenji malu mabi
Kadi wewe newoshe munyinyi wa muana mulume wa ngombe, ne tshiseba ne tunvi ne kahia ku butshika bua tshitudilu ebu mbualu bua kubuikidila bubi bua bantu
Belâma Udi Uvudishila Bena Isalele Disanka Dinda Balaka wakaya ne Belâma ku mutu kua mikuna ya Bâla; yeye wakatangila tô ne ku matshika onso a tshitudilu tshia bantu

Yeye wa kamba ne, Ndi Nzambi wa tatu ebe, kutshinyi bua kuya mu Ejipitu, bualu bua nenkuvuisheku tshisamba tshmene nenye n ebe mu Ejipitu, nennumusheku kabidi bulelela, Yosefe neateke bianza biandi ha mesu ebe Yakoba Wakabika ku Be sheba, bana balume ba Isalele bakatuala Yakoba tatu abo ne bana babo ne bakashi babo mu makalu akabatumma Palo

Kadi ei nyunyu mudi kanuyi mua kudia: nyunyu wa mukanku, ne nyunyu wa gypaete, ne nyunyu wa orfraie, ne nyunyu wa faucon, ne nyunyu wa milan mufike ne wa milan mukunze, ne mushindu wonso wa tshikololo, ne nyunyu wa nfiondo, ne nyunyu wa chat huant ne nyunyu wa mouette ne wa nkumbi kumbi, ne nyunyu wa tshihungulu ne nyunyu wa chouette, ne nyunyu wa ibis, ne nyunyu wa pêlican, ne nyunyu mutoke utu wadia bintu bibole, ne nyunyu wa cormoran, ne nyunyu wa cigogne, ne nyunyu wa hêron ne nyunyu wa huppe ne nyunyu ya mudima

Nunku uhingashe mukashi kudi mulume wandi, bualu bua yeye udi muprofete, neakulombele Nzambi bua wewe wikale ne muoyo, kadi biwahidia kumuhingasha, umanye biebe ne wewe ne bantu bonso baudi n abo nenufue bulelela
Enza tshiamu tshilukibue bu munyingu ne nkanu mai ya tshiamu tshia mitaku ku matumba atshi anai
Kanungu ka Mwâna wa mabela pa ludimi udi muntu yônso, kakuyi kansungansunga ka bulume ne bukaji, udi kayi mwânji kukumbaja mvula ya tshilelelu
; Dut
