Ei idi ndelanganyi ya bana ba Yishemaele, muana wa Abalahama wakamulelela Haga, Muena Ejipitu, muena mudimu wa bakashi wa Sala: au mmena a bana ba Yishemaele ku bikondo biabo muaba bute wa Yishemaele Nebayota, ne Kedâ ne Adebele ne Mibesama, Mishema ne Duma ne Masa, Hadada ne Tema ne Yetû ne Nafisha ne Kedema
Biahona bintu ebi mu tshivuadi tshia dima, netshikale ne bukoya, nebatshishihe
Wangate mulangala eu mu tshianza tshiebe, ûdi wenza n au bimanyinu ebi
Angata tshimpanga tshimue, ne Alona ne bana bandi balume nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu hatshi
Kanuluatshi tshilulu tshiakakumabo ne miosa ya mikoko misambakasha ne buanda bua lin
Yeye wakamukudimuna di ne, Ndi muana wa Betuele, muana mulume wa Mileka, wakaleleleye Naho

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi bantu, ubajidike lelu ne makelela, bobo bauvu we bilulu biabo, badilongolole ku dituku disatu, bualu bua Yehowa neahueke ha mukuna wa Sinai ku mesu kua bantu dituku disatu
Bakamba ne, Mulume au wakatukonka bua malu etu mene, ne bua bana betu ne, Tatu wenu utshidi ne muoyo, anyi
Lebeka wakunvua bakambila Isaka Esau muan andi mei au Esau wakaya mu budimi bua kukebeye ntole, ne bua kuhinganeye n andi
Halua dituku dia muanda mukulu, nebatengule muana wa balume
Newenze tukanu tua or mutambe buimpe tudi tuhindakasha bu mionshi

Bikaleye mukuambile ne, Tshiena musue kumuka kûdi, bualu bua yeye udi ukunanga ne ba mu nsubu webe, wakabela disanka kûdi, hashishe wewe newangate nkulonda, neumutuhite ditshu ku tshibi ne yeye neikale muhika webe tshiendelele
Bikaleye mumukume ne dibue mu tshianza tshiandi, ne biafileye, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu, nebashihe mushihi wa muntu
Bakenza mabue a onyx, bakabuesha mu masoso a or, bakafundahu mena a bisamba bia bana ba balume ba Isalele

didi dikosoloja makookeshi pankatshi pa bukalenga Mianda idi anyi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene anyi ku bukookeshi bupalakaja bwa bukalenga bunene ne polovensa, anyi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa polovensa

Yeye udi udianjila kudisunguila tshituha tshiandi, bualu bua etshi ntshituha tshia mukokeshi, wakalua n atshi kudi ba ku mutu kua bantu; yeye udi ujadika dilumbulula diakane dia Yehowa, ne mikenji yandi kudi Bena Isalele

Mu dituku diakamutekeye mulami wa nsubu wandi ne wa bintu biandi bionso biaka diye n abi, Yehowa wakavudishila bonso bakadi mu nsubu wa Muena Ejipitu masanka, bualu bua Yosefe Disanka dia Yehowa diakadi ku bintu bionso biakadiye n abi mu nsubu muandi ne bia mu madimi andi kabidi
Yeye wakambila Efelona ku mpala kua bena buloba ne, Biwitabusha, ndi nkutendekena ne, Ungunvuile, nenkuhe mushinga wa budimi uwangate ne meme nenjikemu tshitalu etshi
Padibio kabiyi mu midimu badi babweja midimu ya pa bwayi mudibio mu kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu adi
Yehowa, nakuindila luhandu luebe
Enza biebe buatu ne mutshi wa gopher, enza nsubu mikese munda mua buatu ne laba kamonyi munda mua buatu ne ku nyima kuabu kabidi
Bobo nebalame bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne bintu bia Bena Isalele, bua kuenzelabo mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Yehowa abandishe mesu andi kunudi, anuhe ditalala
Kabena bakesha bantu bebe bisonsa, ne badi bamba ne Enzai tushola, mona, badi bakulua bantu bebe, kadi dihila didi kudi Bena Ejipitu bebe
Tuakulua kabidi ne argent mikuabo bua kusumba bia kudia, katuena bamanye muntu wakahingasha argent ei mu bibombi bietu
Yeye neikale ne disanka bulelela Ha kunvua Esau mei a tatu andi waka dila muadi bikole ne mutshima wandi munyingalala, wakambila tatu andi ne, Unsankishe meme kabidi, tatu anyi
Nuenu nenuihate bantu badi n enu lukuna, nenubashihe ne muele wa nvita

Mukenji wa Kuhingisha Muntu Bintu bia Bubi Buandi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Henza mulumi anyi mukashi bualu bubi budi bantu benza, udi ushiha mukenji wa Yehowa, ne badi bahisha muntu au, nunku yeye neatonde bubi buakenzeye, neahingishe bintu bionso biakangateye, neasangishe tshintu tshia tshitanu ha mutu habi, neabihingishe kudi nfumu wabi wakenzeye bubi
Kalongu kinâyi : Bidi bitangila makookeshi a batshipwita ba Ditunga anyi a batshipwita bakulumpa
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nakutangila dikenga dia bantu banyi badi mu Ejipitu bulelela, nakunvua muadi wabo bualu bua tuhita tuabo, bualu bua ndi mumanye kanyinganyinga kabo
Enza mushonyi wa or bunene bua butshiama bua tshianza ku matshika onso, enza tshintu tshia or ku matengu onso

Difutu Diakadi Dikenka Butuku Bakalekela Palô bantu, Nzambi kakabalombola mu nshila wa ku buloba bua Bena Peleshete, nshila au wakatamba buihi, Nzambi wakamba ne, Bamue bantu nebakudimune mitshima yabo hatangilabo nvita, nebahingane mu Ejipitu
Binuahanyisha mukuenu bintu bienu anyi binuasumba bintu ku bianza bia mukuenu, kanuenzedianganyi bibi
Biahana muntu muahandi mukashi bu muhika, yeye kena uluhuka bu bahika balume
Badi balekela difila dia dinyooka pikala, bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu mieela panyima pa dikosa dia tshilumbu: dinyooka edi badikupula; bwaalu buvwabo badifila kabutshiyi ne ngikadilu wa tshibawu
Hashishe angata manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne ela manyi au ha mutu handi

Nzambi wakamba ne Mai adi muinshi mua diulu asangile kaba kamue, buloba bume bumueneke, bualu ebu buakenjibua: Nzambi wakidika buloba bûme ne, Buloba Mai masangile nunku yeye wakidika ne, Mai manene Nzambi wakabi mona ne, Mbimpe
Nzambi wakamueneka kudi Yakoba tshiakabidi hakafumeye ku Padana alama, wakamusankisha
Kadi kenza mudimu wa kukanyika balumbulwishi bwa kulondabu mêyi ne mikandu

Dutelonone Biabika muprofete anyi mulotshi wa bilota munkatshi muenu, udi unulesha tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema; ne hashikisheye tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema bua kunubikila ne, Tuye, tulonde nzambi mikuabo mudi kanuyi bamanye, tuyenzele mudimu; kanunvu mei a muprofete au, anyi mulotshi au wa bilota; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munutete, bua kumanya ne, Nudi basue Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne muoyo wenu wonso
Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua matuku ebe ikale a bungi, ne bua wewe ukume dikasa dimpe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ukuha
Kanungu ka Lupetu lwa bukalenga bunene ne mpetu ya polovensa idi mitapuluke
Yeye wakabebesha kabidi ne, Nudi bamanye Labana, muana wa Naho, anyi
Bualu bua bobo badi bampebue bajima munkatshi mua Bena Isalele mu miabo ya ban a bute bonso ba Bena Isalele nakadiangatshilabo
Kuaka nenutendelele nzambi mikuabo yakasongabo ne mitshi ne mabue, kayena mua kutangila anyi mua kunvua anyi mua kudia anyi mua kununkila
Bimuna bionso bidi ne mikono mihanduluke, bidi bihingishilula bintu mukana: nudi mua kudia nyama ei
Ditutu diakabuikila nsubu matuku onso, diakakenka bu kahia butuku
Nakashala ku mukuna matuku makumi anai bu munakenza diambedi: Yehowa wakangunvuila musangu eu kabidi; Yehowa kakanushiha
Nomba Mîyama ne Alona Badi Batontolola Mose Mîyama ne Alona bakasonguela Mose bua mukashi wa Bena Kushi wakabakeye, bualu bua yeye wakadi mubake mukashi wa Bena Kushi
Muakuidi neafue munu wandi mu mashi makuabo, nealabe ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshia kahia, neahongolole mashi makuabo ku tshiaku tshia tshioshelu

Njila mwibîdi : Bidi bitangila bukalenga bwenji bwa mêyi Kanungu ka : Bukalenga bwenji bwa mêyi badi nabu kudi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidi tshikala ne bibambalu bibidi: Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa ba mabala
Mabaya ikale mashilangane kuinshi ne matuangane kulu, ku dikoha dia kumudilu, bubidi buau neikale nunku, teka mabaya au ku matumba a tshitendelelu
Ditutu dia Yehowa diakadi ku mutu kuabo mu munya, hakumukabo ku tshitudilu tshiabo
Wakabandisha mesu andi, wakamona dina dia mai mu budimi ne bisumbu bia mikoko bisatu biakadi bilalaku, bualu bua bakadi banuishaku mikoko, ne dibue dinene diakadi ku mushiku wa dina dia mai
Nenuenzeleku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshioshelu ne mabue, kanuoshi tshiamu ha mutu hau

Buonso buenu nudi nuimana ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, lelu; ne ba ku mutu kuenu, bisamba bienu, bakulu benu, tuhita tuenu, ne balume bonso ba mu Isalele, ne bana benu bakese ne bakashi benu, ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, ne batatu ba nkunyi ne basunyi ba mai; bua nuenu nubuele mu tshihungidi tshidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muhunge n enu ne mu kuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muditshihe n enu lelu, bua yeye anuitabushe lelu bu bantu bandi, ne bua yeye kuikala Nzambi wenu, bu muakanuambileye, ne bu muakalayeye bankambua benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba

Yehowa wakela dî kudi Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Angata mulangala webe, olola tshianza tshiebe ha mutu ha mai a mu Ejipitu, ku mutu kua misulu yabo ne tusulu tuabo ne mashiba abo, mai onso akudimuke mashi, mashi neikale mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso ne mu milondo ya mitshi ne mu milondo ya mabue

Mukelenge wa Moaba wakambila bakulu ba Midiyana ne, Bantu aba bd bungi nebatukengeshe bu mudi ngombe ukongolesha mashinde a mu budimi ne ludimu luandi Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, wakadi mukelenge wa Moaba ku tshikondo atshi
Tshitupa tshibîdi : Bidi bitangila dikosoloja dia makookeshi pankatshi pa Bukalenga bunene ne polovensa
Tuakalota bilota bubidi bualu, muntu tshiandi tshiota muntu tshiandi tshilota butuku bumue, mutuadi wa maluvu ne mulambi wa bidia bia mukelenge wa Ejipitu, bakadi basuikila mu nsubu wa lukanu
Ditutu didi Dibuikila Tshitendelelu Ek
Kumulombi tshia kasombela ku argent iwakamusombesha anyi ku bintu bia kudia biwakamuha
Bakenza tshitotolo tshia tshijila tshia tshiamu tshia or, bakafundahu bu muakafundabo ha mabue ne, TSHINTU TSHIJIDILA KUDI YEHOWA
diteeka dia difutu dia muntu wa kwinshi mu polovensa bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga;
Mose wakaha Maki, muana mulume wa Manashe musoko wa Gilada ne yeye wakasekamamu
Nzambi wakamuambila ne, Dina diebe nYakoba, kabakubikidi ne Yakoba kabidi, nebakubikile ne, Isalele
Bitalu bienu nebikale bu bidia bia nyunyu yonso ya mu diulu ne bia nyama yonso ya ha buloba; kakuena muntu udi uyihata
Padi dia dia lumungulu anyi dia tshimungu mukaji dikale kadiyi dia mudimu anyi dikale dia lumingu, midimu idi itwadija mu dituku dia mudimu didi dilonda

Mose wakenza bu muakamuambila Yehowa, wakangata Yoshua, wakamushikika ku mpala kua Eleazâ ne kua tshisumbu tshionso, wakatentekasha bianza biandi ha mutu n andi, wakamuambila dî, muakambila Yehowa Mose

Binunvua lumu lua umue wa misoko yakanuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kushikamamu ne, Bantu bakuabo ba tshikamakama, bakumuka munkatshi muenu, bakasesuisha bena musoko wabo ne, Tuye tuenzele nzambi mikuabo mudimu, inudi kanuyi bamanye; hashishe nenuebeshangane, nenukebe, nenukonkangane bimpe; bikala bualu bulelela, bakuenza bualu bua tshikamakama munkatshi muenu, nenushihe bena musoko aba ne miele ya nvita, nenuhaule musoko; nenushihe bimuna ne bintu bidimu ne muele wa nvita
Biwasangana nansha ngombe nansha mpunda bia muntu udi n ebe lukuna biya ha bule, uhingashe nyama wandi kudiye kabidi
Hanuahuola bintu binuakakuna mu buloba, kanuhuodi ku matengu a madimi, kanusangishi bintu bionso, nenushiye bintu ebi bua kukuatshisha n abi bahele ne benyi meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Neumukume ne mabue, neumushihe; bualu bua yeye wakakeba mua kunusesuisha mu nshila wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu
Wakateka mesa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ku luseke lua ku nôde, ku mpala kua tshilulu
Muanjelo ne Mpunda wa Belâma Belâma wakabika ne dinda, wakela tshiseba ha nyima ha mpunda wandi, wakaya ne miloho ya Bena Moaba
Lakele wakamba ne, Nzambi wakundumbuluila, wakunvua dî dianyi kabidi, wakumpa muana wa balume; nunku yeye wakamuidika dina ne, Dana

Nunku halua matata ne makenga makole kudibo, musambu eu newikale bu mumanyi wa bualu, neudiambe kudibo; bana babo kabahu musambu eu muoyo, bualu bua meme ndi mumanye meji adibo n au mu mitshima yabo lelu diambedi tshiyi muanze kulua n abo mu buloba bunakabalaya
Hakalua Palo ha buihi, Bena Isalele bakabandisha mesu abo, bakamona Bena Ejipitu babalonda ku nyima, bakatamba kutshina, Bena Isalele bakadila kudi Yehowa
Wakalongolola mampa ha mesa ku mpala kua Yehowa, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Mutshima wanyi kaubuedi mu tshifufu tshiabo, ne butumbi buanyi kabubuelakanyi n abo mu disangisha diabo

Kanungu ka Mudimu wa tshipwita munwamfwanka wa ditunga anyi wa tshipwita mukulumpa udi ujika ne : a ndekeelu wa bukalenga; b lufu ; c didilekeela dia mudimu; d tshipumbishi tshia kashidi; e dipangila dinanuka; f dipumbisha kadiyi dimanyishibwa ne dianyishibwa ku mudimu mu tshia binaayi tshimwe tshia matuku a mudimu; g diumusha didibo balongolola kudi dîyi dia masungulangana; h ditabuuja dia mwânzu udi kawuyi umvwangana ne mudimu wa bu tshipwita munwamfwanka anyi wa bu tshipwita mukulumpa ; i dipiila kadiyi dia kutontolola dia dinyooka dinene dia lukanu bwa tshilema tshienza tshielela meeji
Utshidi ne muoyo, anyi
Tuetu bakamukudimuna anu bu muakatukonkeye, tuakadianjila kumanya ne, Yeye wakadi mua kutuambila ne, Luai ne muan enu wa balume kunoko, anyi
Yeye wakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, ndi mumanye ne, Nembuhiane munyi
Kanungu ka Beena Bukalenga bunene badi ne bukookeshi bwa kufila bidibo bajinga bwa kwakajilula mu mukanda udibo bakokelangana, kadi kabeena beela tukanda to
Wakuvuwa bintu bia munda ne bioku ne mai, Mose wakosha tshimpanga tshijima ha tshioshelu, eu udi mulambu udi utua dihembu, mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Misoko ya Kunyemena Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuasabuka Yadene mu buloba bua Kanâna, nenusungule misoko ya kunyemena, ne hashiha muntu muntu mukuabo ku mpukahuka, yeye neanyemenemu
Bûngi bwa batshipwita bakulumpa pamwe ne mushindu wa kubasungula ne kusungudibwa badi babuleeja kudi dîyi didi ditangila masungulangana

Bualu bua nudi bamanye bu mutuakashikama mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne mutuakahita munkatshi mua bisamba biakadi mu nshila; ne nuenu nuakatangila malu mabi abo ne mpingu yabo ya mitshi ne ya mabue ne ya tshiamu tshia argent ne tshia or yakadi munkatshi muabo; bua muntu kikadi munkatshi muenu, nansha mulume nansha mukashi nansha diku dia bantu nansha tshisamba, udi akudimuna mutshima wandi kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kukuatshila nzambi ya bisamba abi mudimu; ne bua muji udi ukuama mamuma a mulungu ne a bululu kawikadi munkatshi muenu
Ubueshemu mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ubuikile mushete ne tshilulu tshia mu nsubu
Hakatshiabu Mose wakabuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena, ne monai, mulangala wa Alona wa mu nsubu wa Lewi wakadi muele ntonga ne bilongo, wakakuama tumuma tukese tua amandes
Wewe wakolola tshianza tshiebe ne buloba buakabanda
Tshintu tshi difume anyi tshidi tshihandulula kudi nyama yeye kena mua kutshidia, yeye neadinyange n atshi meme ndi Yehowa
Nansha nanku, pa dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene, padibio bisumpakaja, badi mwa kupwekesha tshipungu etshi ku matuku mwanda mukulu
Bakamukudimuna ne, Tudi bamumanye
Biwatangila mpunda wa muntu udi n ebe lukuna muhone muinshi mua bujitu buandi, kushiya mpunda nunku, kadi umukuatshishe ne bujitu buandi
Nzambi Udi Ukengesha Bena Isalele Dut
Mêyi ne mikandu adi aleeja mishindu ya kusanka ne mapa awu
Nunku buhianyi bua Bena Isalele kabuena bumuka ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba, muntu ne muntu wa munkatshi mua Bena Isalele neashale ne buhianyi bua tshisamba tshia batatu abo
Lua biebe, nenkutume kudi Palo, Ulue biebe ne bantu banyi, bana ba Isalele, badi mu Ejipitu
Nunku Palo asungule muntu udi ne budimu ne lungenyi, amuteke ku mutu kua buloba bua Ejipitu
Yosefe wakamuambila ne, Eku nkujingulula kua tshilota tshiebe, matamba asatu adi bu matuku asatu

Kushikisha Alona ne bana bandi balume kubuikila nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bintu bionso bia mu nsubu, hayabo mu nshila, hashishe bana balume ba Kohata nebalue bua kubituala, kadi bobo kabalengi bintu bia tshijila bianza, bua kabafu

Bualu bua wakadi ne anu bintu bikese tshiyi muanze kulua kunoko mpindiu biakuvulangana tshisumbu tshinene, Yehowa wakukusankisha wewe bua malu onso anakukuenzela, ne katataka meme nengenze mudimu tshikondo kai bua kukumbasha bia ba mu nsubu wanyi kabidi
Wewe neulamike tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe mu nseke yonso, ne ku mpenge kabidi
Muhuya webe wakabandisha mai, akimana bu tshimama, mai akimana dibula

Ndi nkutendekena ne, Wamba biebe ne, Meme ndi muan abo wa bakashi, bua meme mpete diakalengele bua bualu buebe, ne mutshima wanyi wikale ne muoyo bua bualu buebe Hashishe hakalua Abalama mu Ejipitu, Bena Ejipitu bakatangila ne mukashi wakadi mulengele be

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Muntu udi ufila mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa nealue ne tshituha tshia mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala, yeye nealue ne mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia mu bianza biandi, nealue ne dianyi ne tshiadi, nebatshinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa
Pikale tshitupa tshinene katshiyi tshikumbana mu dieela dia tukanda dia musangu wa kumpala, badi balongolola mu tshikondo tshia matuku dikumi ne atanu, dieela dia tukanda dia musangu mwibîdi

Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mukelenge wanyi Abalahama, atumbishibue, yeye kakumushila mukelenge wanyi luse luandi ne bulelela buandi, hanakadi mu nshila Yehowa wakandombola ku nsubu wa bana babo ne mukelenge wanyi

Ku nyima kua malu au bakambila Abalahama ne, Mona, Mileka wakalelela muan enu Naho bana, dina dia muan a bute ne, Uza, ne dina dia muakuny andi ne Buza, ne Kemuele, tatu wa Alama ne Kesede ne Hazo ne Piledasha ne Yidilafa ne Betuele
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Ashe, Setû, muana mulume wa Mikaele

bilumbu mikala atontolola Kadi katangila, padiku kakuyi bilumbulwilu bikwaabo bidi ne bukookeshi abu, malomba a kufutshibwa bwa kulongola bubi bwa pa bwabo, bumweeneka anyi bwikala mu lungenyi lwa muntu, bufumina ku dipangadika diangata anyi dituma kudi bamfumu ba Ditunga
Palô wakabikila Mose ne Alona mu butuku, wakamba ne, Bikai, yai bienu munkatshi mua bantu banyi, ne nuenu ne Bena Isalele, yai bienu nutendelele Yehowa bu munuakamba
Nyoka wakakonka mukashi ne, Nzambi wakamba ne, Kanudi mamuma a nu tshi yonso idi mu budimi, anyi
Mulau wa Mabue a Nvula Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bika ne dinda dionso, wimane ku mpala kua Palô, umuambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu udi wamba ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye kuntendelela
Yeye wakela Benyamina tshituha ku nshingu, wakadila, ne Benyamina wakadia ku nshingu wandi kabidi
Tshituha tshibi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne Miyama ne, Busatu buenu nulue mu ntenta wa kusambakena Busatu buabo bakaluamu
Butshiama bua luhangu lua ku esete nebuikale coudées makumi atanu
Musambu wa Mose Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bonso mei a musambu eu mu matshu abo, tô ne hakashikisheye
Bantu bonso bakabalabo ba mu tshitudilu tshia Yuda bakadi binunu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu ne bisambombo ne nkama mai ku bisumbu biabo Bobo nebaye ku mpala

Ukuate mudimu webe matuku asambombo, wenza midimu yebe yonso; kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete didi Lumingu lua Yehowa, Nzambi webe: dituku adi kuenji mudimu, nansha wewe nansha muan ebe mulume nansha muan ebe mukashi, nansha muhika webe mulume nansha muhika webe mukashi, nansha ngombe webe, nansha mpunda webe, nansha bimuna biebe, nansha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuebe; bualu bua muhika webe mulume ne muhika webe mukashi nebikishe bu wewe mene
Nudi mua kulombela bantu ba bende bintu ebi; kadi bintu bionso bidi muan enu mulume n abi, nuenu nenubilekele
Wakundinga nunku bua tshinyi
Muntu yonso udi kayi ujadika mei a mikenji ei bua kuyenza udi ne mulau
Ngulube kena muakane kunudi bualu bua yeye udi ne mikono mihanduluke kadi kena uhingishilula bintu mukana; kanudi munyinyi wa nyama ei, kanulengi tshianza ham bidi ha bitalu biai
Au mmeku a Bena Gada, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi anai ne nkama itanu
Yeye wakamuitaba ne Ndi Yakoba
Bakambila Mose ne, Wakula biebe n etu, netunvue, kadi biakula Nzambi n etu, netufue
Matuku a Tela akadi bidimu nkama ibidi ne bitanu, Tela wakafua mu Halana
Bena Midiyana bakahana Yosefe mu Ejipitu kudi Potifâ, kamanda ka masalayi a Palô
Yuda udi bu muana wa nyama wa ntambue, wakalekela tshintu tshiandi tshia kudia, wakalamina ne binu biandi bu nyama wa ntambue udi bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, mundi kai wamubisha ku tulu

Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshidi tshipeepeja bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bunene anyi bwa umwe wa ku beena Bukalenga bunene pa disungula dia mukanda wa dianyisha anyi dia mukanda wa didiombola
Hakatshiabu Mose wakambila bantu ne, Nuenu nuakuenza bualu bubi bunene Katataka nembande kudi Yehowa, binamanya mua kunubuikidila bubi buenu

Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso akusankishe akukumbashe, akuvuishe bana ba bungi bua wewe ulue tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu, akuhe wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe disanka dia Abalahama, bua wewe kuhiana buloba buakalaya Nzambi Abalahama
Aba mbana balume ba Efelayima ku meku abo Shutela ne meku a Bena Shutela, Bekê ne meku a Bena Bekê; Tahana ne meku a Bena Tahana

Yeye neatangile hadi disama, ne biamueneka disama mu bimanu bia nsubu milongo mifike ne milongo mikunze, ne bielanganeye meji ne bintu ebi biakubuela munda mua tshimanu mene mene, muakuidi neahatuke ku mushiku wa mbelu wa nsubu, neinshile bibi bia nsubu matuku muanda mutekete
Biwasangana luhanza alu kudi muntu kai wa munkatshi muetu udi n alu, afue biandi, ne tuetu kabidi netuikale bahika ba mukelenge webe
Alona neoshileku musenga wa manananshi dinda ne dinda hayeye kulongolola minda

Yeye wakalamba munyinyi muimpe wa dihembu kabidi, wakalua n au kudi tatu andi, yeye wakambila tatu andi ne Tatu anyi abike biandi adie munyinyi wa ntole wa muan andi, bua mutshi ma webe unvudishile disanka
Bakafika nunku dituku dia dikumi ne ditanu dia ngondo muibidi hakumukabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidi tshiteeka Bukalenga bunene mu nkwaasa padibo banyisha ndongamu ewu kudi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia batshipwita
Au mmena a bana balume ba Esau Elifasa, muana wa balume wa Ada, mukashi wa Esau, ne Luele muana wa Basemata, mukashi wa Esau
Uluatshishe Alona bilulu bijidila, umuele manyi, umujidike, bua angenzele biandi mudimu wa buakuidi
Mushete wa Mei a Tshihungidi Ek

Bienza mukokeshi wa bantu bualu bubi ku mpukahuka budi Yehowa uhidia ne biahilabo, ne hamanyeye bualu bubi buakenzeye, neafue mpumbu wa mbushi udi kayi ne tshilema bu mulambu wandi, neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha mbushi, neamushihe kudibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ku mesu kua Yehowa, eu udi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Bualu bua meme nakangata tshiadi tshidibo banyukula ne diboko didibo bakuha munkatshi mua milambu ya Bena Isalele, nakabifila kudi Alona muakuidi ne bana bandi balume bu bituha biabo tshiendelele
Wewe wakusua kuhingana bualu bua mutshima webe wakadi ujinga ku nsubu wa tatu ebe, kadi wewe wakuiba mpingu yanyi bua tshinyi
Yeye udi Dibue; mudimu wandi wonso udi muakane, bualu bua nshila yandi yonso idi milulame: Nzambi wa kalolo udi kayi ne bubi, udi ne malu makane a bushuwa
Yeye wakamba ne, Udi tshihe kundi yeye wakaditshiha Isalele wakashindamina mutu ku mutu wa bulalu
Yakoba wakimanyika dibue dia ha lukita luandi, dibue edi didi ha lukita lua Lakele to ne ku dituku edi
Padi Mulombodi wa ditunga kayi mupatula dîyi mu bipungu biteeka kudi Dîyi dikulu, dîyi edi didi dipatuka kabayi baditontolola
Nenuhe muakuidi diboko dia balume dia nyama wa mulambu wa kuikisha n au ditalala udibo banyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa
Buloba nebukuame bintu bia bungi, nuenu nenukute mafu tente, nenushikame bienu talala
Enza biebe nkanu ya or ibidi, uyiteke ku luseke lua tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi tshituangane ne efoda

Bakangata bimuna biabo ne bintu bionso biakangatabo mu buloba bua Kanana, bakalua mu Ejipitu, Yakoba ne tunkanunuina tuandi bionso bana bandi ba balume bakaleleye, ne bana ba balume ba bana bandi, ne bana bandi ba bakashi bakaleleye, ne bana ba bakashi ba bana bandi, wakalua ne buonso buabo mu Ejipitu
Wewe newambe mei onso andi nkuambila, ne Alona mukulu ebe neambile Palo ne, Ulekele Bena Isalele mu buloba buebe
Wakatuangana mishiku ne bana babo bonso, wakadidila ku nshingu yabo, hashishe bana babo bakayikila n andi

Ekesode Badi Basabuka Dishiba Dikunze Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nuhingane, Shikamai ku mpala kua Pi hahilota, hankatshi ha Migedola ne mai manene, ku mpala kua Bâla sefona, Shikamai bienu ku mpala kua muaba eu hehi ne mai manene
Bakashala Palô misoko ya kutekelamu bintu biandi, mena ai Pitoma ne Lamesese

Muntu wakadi ne mutshima mulengele ne kalolo neikale ne disu dibi kudi muan abo ne kudi mukashi udiye munange ne kudi bana bandi bakashala; nunku yeye kena ubabanyinaku munyinyi wa bana bandi hadiye udia, bualu bua yeye kena ne tshintu tshishala kudiye mu ditshintshimika ne mu ditata didi bena lukuna banutatshisha n adi ku misoko yenu yonso
Genese Yuda ne Tamâ Mu matuku au Yuda wakumuka kudi bana babo, wakaya ku di Muena Adulama dina diandi Hila
Mêyi ne mikandu adi mwa kwaasa bilumbulwidi bipiluke mu mianda kampanda

Mêyi malongolodi, kumpala kwa kupatukau, ne Mêyi maludiki a mianda ya munda mwa Bibambalu bia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga ne mwa Tshisangilu tshiaatshi tshinene,mwa Kasumbu kadikadile komekela mianda ya Masungulangana mu ditunga ne kabidi mwa Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya Diumvwa ne dimona dia bimfwanyi ne ya dishintakaja ngenyi, kumpala kwa kutwadija mwa kualonda, badi ne tshia kuatuma ku Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu kadi ne tshia kwamba ne adi aneemeka Dîyi dikulu
Yosefe wakabuela kudibo ne dinda, wakamona ne bakadi babungame
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Nzambi akufute luse, muan anyi

Eu udi mukenji wa disama dia nsudi didi mu tshilulu tshiakenzabo ne miosa ya mikoko anyi ne bintu bia lin, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama anyi tshintu tshia tshiseba, bua kutahulula tshintu tshidi tshiakane ne tshintu tshidi ka tshiyi tshiakane
Abalahama wakadi ne bidimu makumi tshitema ne tshitema hakamutengulabo
Alona ne bia bana bandi balume bua kuenza n abi mudimu wa buakuidi
Difutu Didi Dibuikila Tshitendelelu Nom

Pa kutangila bunene ne bukole bwa ntatu idi mitangila ditanta dia bubanji ne dia nsombelu wa bantu idi ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata diakanangana nayi, mwenji wa Dîyi dikulu mmufuka Tshipangu tshimikila mianda ya Bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bantu, tshidi ne mudimu wa kufila ngenyi milomba pa mianda eyi kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga, Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga ne kudi Bukalenga bunene
Yeye wakenzaku tshitendelelu, Wakabikila dina dia Yehowa, waka shimikaku ntenta yandi, ne bahika ba Isaka bakimbaku dina dia mai

Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Nunku Bena Ejipitu nebunvue lumu elu, bualu bua wewe wakahatula bantu aba munkatshi muabo ne bukole buebe, bobo nebamanyishe bena buloba ebu Bobo bakunvua lumu ne, Wewe Yehowa udi munkatshi mua bantu aba, bualu bua wewe Yehowa udi umuenyibua mpala ha mpala, ne ditutu diebe didi dimana ku mutu kuabo, ne wewe utu waya ku mpala kuabo ne difutu didi ne diledi mu munya, ne difutu didi dikenka ne kahia butuku
Hakatangila Palô nvula ne mabue a nvula ne makubakuba biakashika, yeye wakatamba kuenza bibi, wakakolesha mutshima wandi ne yeye ne bantu bandi
Mulambu wonso udi muakuidi ufila nebawoshe ne kahia, kabadi mulambu eu
Yetelo, tatu muenu wa Mose, wakalua ne bana bandi balume ne mukashi wandi kudi Mose mu tshihela hakadiye ushikama ku mukuna wa Nzambi
Hanakadi nfuma ku Padana, Lakele wakafua mu nshila wa ku buloba bua Kanâna diambedi katuyi banze kufika ku Efelata, nakamujika kuakua mu njila wa ku Efelata eu udi Beteleheme
Bena Isalele bakaya ne bakashi ba Bena Midiyana ne bana babo bakese, bakangata kabidi bimuna biabo ne bisumbu bia mikoko ne bintu biabo bionso
Bakabisangisha mu bisumbu, ne buloba buakanunka muhuya mubi
Kuvudi mukashi bilulu hatshidiye ne tshijila tshia kulela kuandi
Sala, mukashi wa mukelenge wanyi, wakamulelela muana mulume hakadiye muntu mununu, yeye wakadia muana eu bintu bionso bidiye n abi
Nentume tuishi ku mpala kuebe bualu bua kukuihatshila Bena Hiwi ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Hiti
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kwenza mushindu wa kuvudija bûngi bwa mpala ya balema mu bishimikidi bia ditunga dijima, bia polovensa ne misoko
Nenudie bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, bu munakanuambila mu ngondo wa Abiba unakasungula; bualu bua nuakahatuka mu Ejipitu mu ngondo wa Abiba
Bakumukaku, bakaya ku Gudugoda; ku Gudugoda bakaya ku Yotebata, muakadi buloba bua tusulu tua mai
Au mmei ne mikenji bakambila Yehowa Bena Isalele mukana mua Mose mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mitangilangane ne Yeleko
Mai adi aluhuka mu milondo yandi, bana bandi nebikale munkatshi mua mai a bungi, mukelenge wandi neahite Agaga bunene, bukelenge buandi nebutumbishibue
Wakenza nsengu ku matumba anai, wakenza nsengu ne tshituha tshijima, wakalamata tshiamu tshia mitaku ku nseke yonso
Kadi Nzambi wakabalombola mu nshila wa ku tshihela hehi ne Dishiba Dikunze Bena Isalele bakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne bintu bia nvita
kulwisha dilengulula dia manyooka;

Luseka lukwabo, nansha bôbo bikale anu bôbo nkayabu ne bukalenga bwa kufuka mêyi ne kutangila Bukalenga bunene, beena Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga kabeena pa mutu pa mêyi ne mikandu to; dikandika dia kubalenga didi mwa kumbushibwa ne kabidi Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi mwa kushipa Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga pikalatshio anu katshiyi tshipetangana ne Bukalenga bunene
Nansha nanku, bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kututangila ne dîsu dikole, bilondeshila bulongolodi bufila kudi mêyi a ditunga

Nakangata bualu bubi bunuakenza, kana ka ngombe mene, nakakosha ne kahia, nakakadiata munda mua dikasa, nakakabotesha bu dinfuenkenya dia buloba: nakela dinfuenkenya diaku mu kasulu kakadi kafuma ku mukuna
Yakoba wakatuangana ne Lakele mishiku wakabandisha di diandi, wakadia
Wa munkatshi mua bana ba Yosefe, wa mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima, Elishama muana mulume wa Amihuda
Yeye wakakebulula kakasangana mpingu
Baku ne bana bebe balume ne bana bebe bakashi ne bonso baudi n abo mu musoko eu, umuke n abo mu muaba eu
Kadi biamueneka mputa mutoke tô ku mutu kua muena dibala, anyi ha mpala hadi dibala, edi ndisama dia nsudi diakumueneka ku mutu kua muena dibala anyi ha mpala hadi dibala

Kidedibua kua Esau ne Yakoba Ei idi ndelanganyi ya Isaka, muana wa Abalahama, Abalahama wakalela Isaka, hakadi Isaka ne bidimu makumi anai, yeye wakabaka Lebeka, muana mukashi wa Betuele, muena Alama wa ku Padana alama, muan abo ne Labana
Bana ba balume ba Lakele bakadi Yosefe ne Benyamina
Kuhidi kubingisha muntu muhele mu tshilumbu tshiakane tshidiye n atshi bualu bua buhele buandi
Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua kukuha buloba bua Kanâna ne bua kuikala Nzambi webe
Bilulu bitanu nebikale bituangane ne bilulu bitanu bikuabo, binga bilulu bitanu nebikale bituangane ne bilulu bitanu bikuabo
Kanungu ka Ndongamu wa lupetu lwa Mbulamatadi bu mudi lwa Bukalenga bunene ne lwa polovensa badi bamwenza musangu umwe ku tshidimu kudi dîyi
Nunku Yakoba wakaha Esau bidia ne tshiteku, yeye wakadia, wakanua, wakabika, wakaya, nunku Esau wakahatula bintu bia buan a bute
Kadi nansha bikala nanku, disanka dia ne mapa a tshidiidi ndianyishibwa anu bwa beena Kongu, pa kumbusha mapangadika makwabo adi mêyi ne mikandu mwa kwangata
Hakalua dituku dia muanda mutekete, bakuabo bakaya kusangisha bidia, kadi kabakabisangana
Wewe newangate bintu ebi ku bianza biabo, ubioshile ha tshioshelu bu mulambu udi utua dihembu dimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa, udi mulambu udibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia

Bialueye ne nyama mubi udibo kabayi mua kudia bu mulambu kudi Yehowa, yeye neateke nyama ku mpala kua muakuidi, ne muakuidi neatuangane handi mushinga bikala nyama muimpe anyi mubi, nyama neikale wa mushinga wakadiye ne muakuidi
Bakabakengesha ne mudimu mukole, mudimu wa tushola ne buloba busoha ne midimu yonso ya mu madimi
Mêyi a ditunga adi ne tshia kuleeja mushindu wa kusanka ne mapa aa

Bana ba Zebuluna ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita; bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Zebuluna binunu makumi atanu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama mai
Mu tshikondo atshi nakanuambila malu onso anudi ne bualu bua kuenza
Mose wakangata mukashi wandi ne bana bandi balume, wakabateka ha nyima ha mpunda, wakahingana mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Kadi bikala muntu udi unvua mei a mulau eu udiamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Meme nengikale ne ditalala nansha binalonda tshitshu tshia mu mutshima wanyi, bua kutenteka dikuatshika ha mutu ha nyota, Yehowa kena umubuikidila bubi buandi, kadi tshiji tshia Yehowa ne mukau wandi nebimueneke kudi muntu eu ne milau yonso idi mifunda mu mukanda eu neyimukuate, ne Yehowa nenjimishe dina diandi muinshi mua diulu

Neafile tshimpanga tshidi katshiyi ne tshilema kudi muakuidi tshia mushinga ûdi witabusha bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne muakuidi neafile mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji buakenzeye ku mpukahuka, kayi mubumanye, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua mundi wakenza bualu ku mpukahuka ku mpala kua Yehowa, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue

Mu dituku adi mene Yehowa wakahunga ne Abalama tshihungidi ne, Ndi mpa tunkanunuina biebe buloba abu ku musulu wa mu Ejipitu to ne ku musulu munene wa Pelata, buloba bua Bena Kene ne bua Bena Keneze ne bua Bena Kadamona ne bua Bena Hiti ne bua Bena Pelese ne bua Bena Lefa, ne bua Bena Amole ne bua Bena Kanâna ne bua Bena Gîgashi ne bua Bena Yebuse
Biamubakisheye kudi muan andi wa balume, yeye neamuenzele bu mu tshilele tshia bana ba bakashi
Bukalenga bukoshi bwa nsambu budi ne lupetu lwakaja kudi Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya bakoshi ba nsambu ne lutumina Bukalenge bunene bwa kulufundabo mu ndongamu wa lupetu mujima wa Mbulamatadi
Tatu wetu wakatuambila ne, Yai bienu kabidi, nutusumbile tuntu tua kudia tukese
Esau wakamba ne, Abu akadi ha kufua, ne bintu bia buan a bute nebinsankishe kudi kunyi
Hakadiye uyikila n abo, Lakele wakalua ne mikoko ya tatu andi, bualu bua yeye wakadi muyilame
Midimu ya tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwaka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe idi yenzeka pa bwashi, pa kumbusha pikalabo bapangadika ne yenzeka biibi bikanga
kufuka Mbulamatadi wa mêyi ne mikandu;
Mukelenge muhia muhia wakahingana mu bukelenge bua Ejipitu, wakadi kayi mumanye Yosefe
Genese Nzambi Udi Ulaya Abalama Muana Hakashika malu a, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Abalama mu tshilota ne, Abalama kutshinyi, meme ndi ngabu webe ne difutu diebe ditambe bunene

Kana wakambila Yehowa ne, Dikenga dianyi didi dintamba bukole Mona, wewe wakungihata lelu ha buloba, nengikale musokome ku mesu kuebe, nengikale munyemi ne muena tshiendenda ha buloba, ne hashishe yonso wansangana neanshihe

Yakoba wakambila Yosefe ne, Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso wakamueneka kundi ku Luze mu buloba bua Kanâna wakansankisha, wakangambila ne, Mona, nenkuvuishe tshisamba tshinene, nenkukumbashe, neulue tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu, nempe tunkanunuina tuebe buloba ebu tshiendelele
Mose wakavula Alona bilulu biandi, wakabiluatshisha Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, ne Alona wakafua biandi ha mutu ha mukuna, ne Mose ne Eleazâ bakahueka mu tshibanda

Bialekela muntu ngombe wandi mu budimi bua muntu mukuabo, ne biadieye mitshi yandi ya tumuma tukese, yeye neamuhingashile bintu bidi bitamba buimpe bia mu budimi buandi ne bia mu budimi buandi bua nvinyo
Au mmatuku a kudia bidia bia Yehowa, matuku a tshijila andi musue wewe ubamanyishe ku bikondo biau
Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi upatula mêyi bilondeshila makanyika adibo balongolola kudi Dîyi dikulu dia mpindiewu

Hakalua tshidimu tshia Noa tshia nkama isambombo ne tshimue, mu ngondo wa kumudilu ne dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo, mai onso akûma ha buloba, ne Noa wakumusha tshibuikilu tshia buatu, wakatangila ne monai, buloba buonso buakûma
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nebashihe muntu au bulelela bantu bonso nebamukume ne mabue ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Nenudie dituku adi mene mene, kanushiyi tshintu tô ne dinda meme ndi Yehowa
Kadi nenjadike tshihungidi tshianyi n ebe, wewe neubuele mu buatu ne bana bebe balume ne mukashi webe ne bakashi ba bana bebe
Beena ku Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu badi babateeka, babumbusha anyi babiipata ku mudimu kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga, panyima pa dianyisha dia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga
Masumpakana manene adi alombola bulongolodi bwa bishimikidi ebi ngôwu aa:
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona, Shelumiele muana mulume wa Sulishadai
Kabeena mwa kwikala nabu popamwe ne bukwabo nansha
Kadi bantu bonso bakamba ne, Tubakume ne mabue Butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka mu ntenta wa kusambakena kudi Bena Isalele bonso
Mukashi wakimita difu, wakalela muana wa balume, hakamumoneye ne muana muimpe, wakamusokoka ngondo isatu
Tshidi mwa kusopweesha, mu tshiôtshi nkayatshi, Bukalenga bunene ne polovensa pa malongolola aditshi tshimona akumbana mwa kutanshisha bubanji ne nsombelu wa beena ditunga
Bantu ba Isaka bakimba dina mu tshibanda, bakasanganamu mushimi wa mai

Alona nealue biandi mu ntenta wa kusangakena, neavule bilulu biandi bia lin biakadiye muluate hakayeye mu muaba wa tshijila, neabishiyemu, yeye neowe mai mu muaba wa tshijila, nealuate bilulu biandi, neahatuke neafile mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bantu wa kuosha ha ka hia, neabuikile bubi buandi ne bubi bua bantu
Bana ba balume ba Lubena, Hanoka ne Palu ne Heselona ne Kâmi
Bidimu bimpe muanda mutekete biakadi buloba bua Ejipitu bulua ne bintu bia bungi biakashika
Bantu bakimana kule, ne Mose wakalua hehi ne difutu difike hakadi Nzambi
Wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ku nyima ne munda mua mushete, wakateka tshiamu tshia or ku mibangu ya mushete

Mutengula wa Alona Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Hanuambila Palo ne, Nundeshe bualu bua kukema, hashishe, wewe wambile Alona ne, Angata mulangala webe, uwele hanshi ku mesu kua Palô ne mulangala neukudimuke nyoka

Uvuluke Abalahama ne Isaka ne Isalele, bantu bebe, bawakaditshiha kudibo, wakabambila ne, Nenvudishe bana benu bu bungi bua mitoto ya mulu, ne buloba ebu buonso bunakanuambila nempe bana benu, bobo nebabuhiane tshiendelele

Bana ba Hete bakambila Abalahama ne, Mukelenge, utunvuile, wewe udi bu muntu wa Nzambi munene munkatshi muetu, usungule muaba wa majambu nkayebe udi musue kujikarnu tshitalu etshi, kakuena muntu udi mua kukukanda bua wewe kuangata muaba wa kujikamu tshi tatu etshi
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, Igala, muana mulume wa Yosefe
Monai, nakanuyisha mei ne mikenji, bu muakangambila Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, bua nuenu kubienza mu buloba bunudi nubuela bua kubuhiana
Nebabanye buhianyi bunene anyi buhianyi bukese anu ku nshobo

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Utatshishe Bena Midiyana, ubashihe, bualu bua bobo badi banutatshisha ne budimu, bakanushima mu bualu bua Peô ne mu bualu bua Kozebi, muana mukashi wa mukelenge wa mu Midiyana, muan abo mukashi, wakamushihabo mu dituku diakalua disama bualu bua Peô

Yeye wakamba ne, Nempunge n enu tshihungidi; nengenze malu a kukema ku mesu kua bantu bebe bonso, malu adi kâyi manze kumueneka ha buloba buonso anyi kudi tshisamba tshikuabo; bantu bonso badi n ebe nebamone bienzedi bia Yehowa; bualu bua meme nengenze n ebe bualu bukole

Bia momumwe, dikanyika dia kuswikangana pankatshi pa bienzeji bishilangana bia Musoko didi dilomba bwa se baasa Tshibutshilu tshia ditunga tshia diabanyinangana mpetu ne bintu, tshiteeka mu bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bunene

Nenjimishe kudisua kunudi n aku bua bukole buenu, diulu nedikale bu tshiamu tshifike ne buloba nebuikale bu tshiamu tshia mitaku, nenuenze mudimu wenu tshianana bualu bua buloba kabuena bukuama bintu, ne mitshi ya mu buloba kayena ikuama mamuma
Abalahama wakangata mikoko ne ngombe, wakabika kudi Abimeleke, bubidi buabo bakafua ndondo
Wakenza mabaya mimanyike kulu a nsubu wa tshitendelelu a mitshi ya acacia
Bakalua ku Elima kuakadi mpokolo ya mai dikumi ne ibidi, ne mabue makumi muanda mutekete bakashikamaku hehi ne mai

Hashishe bantu nebambe ne, Bualu bua bobo bakahidia tshihungidi tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu babo, tshiakahungeye n abo hakaluhukeye n abo mu buloba bua Ejipitu; ne bobo bakaya bua kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu, ne bua kuyitendelela; nzambi yakadibo kabayi bamanye, idi Yehowa kayi mubahe: nunku tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakamueneka mu buloba ebu, bua kushikisha milau yonso idi mifunda mu mukanda eu; ne Yehowa wakabumusha mu buloba abu ne difika dia munda ne tshiji tshikole, wakaya n abo mu buloba bukuabo; bualu ebu budi nunku lelu
Au mmeku a Bena Shimeona, bantu binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi ne nkama ibidi
Yosefe wakalesha tatu andi ne bana babo muaba bua kushikamabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu buloba buakatamba buimpe, mu buloba bua Lamesese, bu muakamba Palô
Yeye wakabakonka bua malu abo ne, Tatu wenu, muntu au mununu unuakungambila, udi mukole, anyi

Malu Makole Adi Akuata Bashihi ba Mikenji Kadi binuahidia kunvua dî dianyi, binuahidia kutumikila mikenji yanyi, binuahidia mikandu yanyi, binuabenga mei anyi mu mitshima yenu, kanuyi nuenza mikenji yanyi, binuashiha tshihungidi tshianyi, meme kabidi nennuenzele nunku nengenze malu adi anutshinyisha, nennutumine masama adi anyanyisha mibidi yenu ne disama dia mubidi kahia, masama au neashihe mesu enu, neanyanyishe mitshima yenu, nenukune bintu bienu tshianana, bualu bua bantu badi n enu lukuna nebabidie
Wakabangata, wakabasabula ne bintu biandi bionso

Wakalongolola luhangu lua muaba wa kutendelela ku luseke lua ku sude wakenza bilulu bia lin muimpe tô ne ku coudées lukama, ne makunshi makumi abidi, ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku makumi abidi, kadi bitubuidi bia ku makunshi biakadi bia argent
Mu Luhangu lua Tshitendelelu Ek
Nunku nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kusua benyi bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Binuadikonka ne, Netudie tshinyi tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete hatudi katuyi tukuna bintu, katuyi tuhuola bintu

Dilondangana Mulombodi wa Ditunga Ndumbulwilu wa ku tubadi Tshidiidi a manyooka Mweena tshimwangi Didila Ndudiki Dibadika dia bantu Dieebeja dia dianyisha dia beena ditunga Ditunga Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa Disungudibwa kudi bantu bonso
Mose wakitabusha di dia tatu andi muenu, wakenza mei onso akambeye
Bena Amole bakadi bashikama ku mikuna bakaluhuka kunudi, bakanuihata bu mbulubulu, bakanunyemesha mu Sei tô ne ku Hôma
Bakenza bintu bia kuteka ha maha bua kutuishangana bituha bia efoda bibidi

Dutelonone Mose Udi Udimusha Bena Isalele bua Kutumikilabo Yehowa Katataka, nuenu Bena Isalele, unvuai mei ne mikenji bindi musue kunuyisha, bua nuenu kubienza bua nuikale ne muoyo, nubuelemu, nuhiane buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, unuha
Bualu bua wewe neutangile buloba budi ku mpala kuebe; kadi kuena ubuela mu buloba bundi mpa Bena Isalele
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Manashe, Gamaliele muana mulume wa Pedasû
Bena Isalele Badi Banyunguluka Buloba bua Moaba Bena Isalele bakaya, bakashikama mu Oboto

Bualu bukuabo, Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bua bualu buenu, wakaditshiha ne, Wewe kuena mua kusabuka Yadene ne kubuela mu buloba abu buimpe budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bu buhianyi buenu; kadi bûdi n abu mbua kufuila mu buloba ebu, kuena mua kusabuka Yadene; kadi nuenu nenusabuke, nenuhiane buloba abu buimpe

Aba mbana ba Bileha, wakaha Labana Lakele muan andi mukashi yeye wakalelela Yakoba bana aba buonso buabo bakadi muanda mutekete Bantu aba bonso bakalua ne Yakoba mu Ejipitu bonso bakahatuka munda mua Yakoba, kababadi bakashi ba bana bandi bakadi makumi asambombo ne basambombo, ne bana ba balume ba Yosefe bakamulelelabo mu Ejipitu bakadi babidi, bantu bonso ba mu nsubu bakalueye n abo mu Ejipitu bakadi makumi muanda mutekete
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Uhueke biebe, udimushe bantu, kabalu ha buihi bua kumona Yehowa, bungi buabo nebafue
Mose wakangata tshituha tshibidi tshia mashi, wakateka mu malonga, wakamiamina tshituha tshikuabo tshibidi ha tshioshelu

Tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia lupetu dia ku tshidimu, mudi mwikala kabidi ndongamu wa lupetu, badi batshifila kudi Bukalenga bunene ku Bilo bia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga, pikalako njingakanyi, mu dia matuku dikumi ne ataanu a ngondo wa tshiteema wa tshidimu tshiônso

Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza, ne mu kukumbasha kua bana ne mu kukumbasha kua bimuna bienu ne mu bintu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba; bualu bua Yehowa neikale ne disanka bualu buenu, bu muakasankeye bualu bua batatu benu; binuatumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kuenza mikenji yandi ne mei andi bidi bifunda mu mukanda eu wa mikenji: binuakudimuka kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso
Diswika diônso anyi dipangadika diônso badi badiangata mudibio mu mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu anyi mwa Tshisangilu tshia bibambalu biônso
Nudienzele bisele ku mpenga inai ya bilulu bienu binudi baluata
Yeye wakayambila ne, Nuambile mukelenge wanyi Esau nunku ne, Muntu webe Yakoba udi wamba ne, Nakashikama ne Labana, nakushalaku to ne katataka
Nunku halua tshidimu tshia disanka dia Bena Isalele, buhianyi buabo nebusangishibue ku buhianyi bua tshisamba tshiakayabo, nunku buhianyi buabo nebumuke ku buhianyi bua batatu etu
Katataka wewe neutangile ne bualu bunakukuambila nebuenjibue anyi kabuena buenjibua
Bungi bua matuku anuakutentekela buloba, matuku makumi anai mene, nebuikale bungi bua bidimu binudi nutuala bujitu bua bubi buenu, nenumanye ne mbualu bukole hangumuka kunudi
Yeye neafile bakelenge babo mu bianza bienu, nuenu nenjimishe mena abo hanshi ha buloba; kakuena muntu umue udi mua kuimana ku mpala kuenu tô ne hanuabashiha bonso
Bukookeshi bwa kweela mwadi pa nkoselu wa tshilumbu budi bujadikibwa bwa muntu yônso
mianda ya matunga meenyi idi munda mwayi mwikala malanda pamwe ne diumvwangana ne ndondu ne matunga makwabo;
Isaka wakambila Abalahama, tatu andi ne, Tatu wanyi, yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku, muan anyi Isaka wakamba ne, Tangila kalua ne nkunyi bidiku, kadi muana wa mukoko wa kuosha ha kalua weba
Alona neafile muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi ne bubi bua bantu ba mu nsubu muandi
Wewe wakuenza bualu buhote
Nunku yeye wakamuidika dana ne, Gada

Nebalue ne tshibelu tshidibo bakuha ne tshiadi tshidibo banyukula hohamue ne dianyi dia milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ku mesu kua Yehowa etshi ntshintu tshiebe ne tshia bana bebe balume tshiendelele, bu muakamba Yehowa
Diulu nedikale bu tshiamu tshia mitaku ku mutu kuenu, ne buloba nebuikale bu tshiamu mu makasa enu
Hakayabo n abo ha bule umue wabo wakamba ne Nyema lubilu, bua kuhandisha muoyo webe kutangidi ku nyima kuebe, kushadi ha mpata nyema ku mikuna kufu biebe

Yakoba wakambila tatu andi ne, Ndi bianyi Esau, muan ebe muan a bute, nakuenza bu mu dî diebe, ndi nkutendekena ne, Bika biebe, ushikame, udie munyinyi wanyi wa ntole, bua mutshima webe unvudishile disanka
Wewe neuwelehu manyi ne musenga wa manananshi tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia mulambu wa bukula

Kabakanji kutangila bunene buandi ne tshianza tshiandi tshia bukole, ne diboko diandi diolola, ne bimanyinu biandi, ne midimu yandi biakanuenzeleye mu Ejipitu kudi Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, ne ku buloba buandi buonso
Kadi kabena mua kuhana madimi adi ku matshika a misoko yabo, ebu mbuhianyi buabo tshiendelele
Mulume wakamba ne, Eu udi mufuba wa mifuba yanyi ne musunyi wa misunyi yanyi, nebamuedike ne, Mukashi, bualu bua bakamuangata kudi mulume
Bakumuka mu Etama bakahingana ku Pihahilota, udi ku mpala kua Bâla sefona, bakashikama ku mpala kua Migedola
Wakenza tshiowelu tshia mai ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mesa atshi ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, wakatshienza ne ndimuenu ya ba kashi bakadi benza mudimu ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Bikala muena musoko mulale ne mukashi webe, wewe wakadi kutuvuisha mu mulau

Lufu lua Ban a Bute Hakalua mundankulu Yehowa wakashiha ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu, muan a bute wa Palô wakadi ushikama ha nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge tô ne ku muan a bute wa muntu wa mu nsubu wa lukanu, ne bana bonso ba bute ba bimuna
Yehowa, tshianza tshiebe tshia balume tshidi ne butumbi ne bukole, Yehowa, tshianza tshiebe tshia balume tshidi tshisunsula bantu badi n etu lukuna
Dutelonone Badi Kabayi Mua Kubuela mu Masangisha Muntu udi mutaha mputa ku mihesa yandi anyi udi ne mihesa mikosoke kabuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa

Hashishe bakulu ba mu musoko wandi nebamubikile, nebasombe n andi; ne himaneye, wamba ne, Tshiena musue kumuangata, hashishe mukashi wa muan abo nealue kudiye ku mesu kua bakulu, neambulule tshisabata ku dikasa diandi, neamutuile lute ku mesu; neamuambile ne, Nebenzele mulume nunku udi uhidia kudiundisha nsubu wa muan abo mulume
Mikenji idi ilesha Bujitu bua Bena Bintu Biatuta muntu muhika wandi mulume anyi muhika wandi mukashi ku disu, ne biafuadi, yeye neamumushe ku butaka buandi bualu bua disu diandi
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga ke udi ne bukookeshi bwa kufwilangana luse
Tshintu tshionso tshidiye ulala hadiye ku katshetshi netshikale ne bukoya, ne tshintu tshionso tshidiye ushikama netshikale ne bukoya
Nenuikale ne disanka bua bana banudi nulela, ne bua bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba, ne bua kukumbasha kua nyama yenu ne bimuna bienu ne mikoko yenu
Yeye wakadila kudi Yehowa, ne Yehowa wakamulesha mu tshi, wakawela mu mai, mai akalua mimpe
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wewe wambila Bena Isalele ne, Nuenu nkayenu nuakumona bu munakusomba n enu mufume mu diulu
Mose wakafunda ngendu yabo bu mu dî dia Yehowa ei idi ngendu yabo
Bikala mulambu wandi wa kuosha wa nyunyu, yeye neafile nansha nyunyu wa nkutshi nansha mputu nyunyu

Nenuikale ne disanka dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne nuenu ne bana benu balume ne bana benu bakashi, ne bahika benu balume ne bahika benu bakashi, ne Bena Lewi badi ku mbelu kuenu badi kabayi ne buhianyi kunudi
Tshituha tshidi tshishale netshikale tshia Alona ne bana bandi balume ntshintu tshidi tshitambe tshia tshijila tshia mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Bua Benyamina yeye wakamba ne, Munangi wa Yehowa neashikame n andi talalâ, utu wamubuikila matuku onso, udi ushikama hankatshi ha makaya andi
Yeye neikale handi bu muena mudimu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu kamukokeshi ne tshianza tshikole ku mesu kuebe
Hakahita matuku asatu, Yosefe wakabambila ne, Enzai nunku nushale ne muoyo, bualu bua meme ndi ntshina Nzambi
Bobo bakamukudimuna ne, Muntu webe tatu wetu, udi mukole, utshidi ne muoyo Bobo bakatua mpala yabo hanshi, bakamukukuila
Ngenzelu wa mêyi a ditunga udi mutamba ngelelu wa mêyi a polovensa mushinga
Cilunga mulwesu, cikombola cikwanga Baswa kulwata, tulwata anu momumwa, Cyètù canza colola anu wa kulonda yo yo yo
Bikaleye muana wa balume udi ne bidimu bitanu tô ne ku bidimu makumi abidi, neubale nshekele makumi abidi, ne bikaleye muana wa bakashi, nshekele dikumi
Nenkande mundi udi kayi muanze kukandibua kudi Yehowa munyi
Nzambi akumbashe Yafete, yeye ashikame biandi mu ntenta ya Sheme, Kanana ikale muhika wandi kabidi
Yosefe wakamana bana babo, kadi bobo kabakamumanya
Mose wakabandisha tshianza tshiandi, wakakuma dibue ne mulangala wandi misangu ibidi, mai a bungi akabuluka, ne bantu bonso bakanua, ne bimuna biabo

BIDI BITANGILA MBULAMATADI NE BIDI BITANGILA BUDIKOOKESHI Luseke lumwe, bwa kukolesha kabumwe ka ditunga kavwa mvita milondangana mipandulula ne, luseke lukwabo, bwa kulongolola miaba ya kudisonsolwela ne ya kukolakena mu ntaku, mwenji wa Dîyi dikulu udi mwabanya buludiki bwa Mbulamatadi wa Ditunga mu polovensa , kusakidila tshimenga tshia Kinshasa, yônso mikala ne dikalaku difila kudi mêyi a mbulamatadi ne kabidi mikala ne bukookeshi bwa mianda ya bwatshia bwatshia buleeja mu Dîyi ditudi nadio edi

Bwa kumona mwa kukumbaja dijinga edi divwa batumibwa ba ku Muyuki wa beena Kongu balêja,tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulu mpe ba mabala tshivwa tshiledibwa mu diumvwangana dia mu kabujima ne dia Tshikongu tshitwateedi atshi, tshiaafidi mu Tshimamwende wa bukalenga anyi MPANGU tshia Ditunga, bilondeshile kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu dia tshisabu, tshingenyingenyi any MPANGU tshia kumpala tshia Dîyi dikulu dipiadipia; Tshimamwende wa Bukalenga tshia Ditunga tshiaatshitabiji bu tshingenyingenyi tshia Dîyi dikulu tshidi beena mwaabo ne tshia kwamba nembatshianyisha
Bana bandi ba balume bakadi ne bimuna biandi mu tshisuku Yakoba wakahuwa biandi to ne hakaluabo Hamo, tatu wa Shekeme, wakaya kudi Yakoba, wakayikila n andi
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Tangila, wewe udi ne difu, neulele muana mulume, neumuidike dina ne, Yishemaele, bualu bua Yehowa wakunvua dikenga diebe
Muena lukuna wakamba ne, Nembalonde, nembahete, nentahulule bintu bionso bidi bishala, mutshima wanyi neusanke bualu buabo, nempatule muele wanyi wa nvita, nembashihe ne tshianza tshianyi
Bena bilengulengu bakenza nunku ne manga abo bua kutuma nkusu, kadi kabakamanya mua kuenza, nkusu yakadi kudi bantu ne kudi nyama
Nzambi wakidika munya ne, Munya, wakidika mîdima ne Butuku Dinda ne dilolo biakadi dituku dia kumudilu
Kanungu ka Bukalenga bwa mbulamatadi budi ne tshia kwenza mwaabo mônso bwa kujimija kashidi tshinyangu tshia bulume ne bukaji tshienza bu njila wa kusendekela anyi wa kupandulwila nende dîku
Abimeleke wakadimusha bantu bandi bonso ne, Bialenga muntu mulume eu anyi mukashi wandi tshianza, nebamushihe
Bena Isalele bakenza bu mu dî dia Mose, bakatamba Bena Ejipitu bilenga bia argent ne bia or ne bilulu
Bakambilangana ne, Tusungulai bietu kapitene, netuhingane mu Ejipitu
Yakoba wakahi ngana ku budimi dilolo ne Lea wakaya kumualamina, wakamua mbila ne, Bûdi n abu mbua kulua kundi, bualu bua nakakusumba ku tumuma tua muan anyi
Pikalaku difwilakana dia bukookeshi pankatshi pa bukalenga bwa kumutu ne polovensa, anu Kabadi kimikila mianda ya Dîyi dikulu kôku nkayaku ke kadi ne bukole bwa kukosa nsambu
Alona nealuate tshikowelu henzeye mudimu, nebunvue tshiona tshia ndibu hayeye mu muaba wa tshijila ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne haluhukeye kabidi, bua yeye kafu nansha

Netshikale ha mpala ha Alona, ne Alona neatuale mahambuka a Bena Isalele mu muaba wa tshijila hayeye bua kubajidila ne bintu bidibo bafila kudi Nzambi, netshikale ha mpala handi matuku onso bua Yehowa abitabushe

Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Mona, meme nakakuteka ku mutu kua milambu yanyi idibo banyukula ne bintu bionso bidi Bena Isalele bajila, nakakuha bintu ebi bu tshituha tshia bintu biebe bualu bua kujidila kuebe ne kua bana bebe balume tshiendelele
Bantu bakadi benda mu makalu ne ha nyima ha tubalu bakaya n andi, tshisumbu tshinene be
Bena Yuda bakaya ku mpala ne dibendele dia tshitudilu tshiabo, Nashona, muana mulume wa Aminadaba, wakadi ku mutu kuabo
Bungi bua bana ba balume ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu buakadi binunu muanda mukulu ne nkama isambombo, bakadi balama bintu bia nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Angatai bisumbu bia mikoko ne bia ngombe, bu munuakamba, yai bienu, nunvudishe disanka kabidi

Mu nseka yônso, Bukalenga bunene budi bushindika diditangalaja diaadi mu mfwalansa ne mu mwakulu ne mwakulu wa ku inayi ya ditunga, mu tshipungu tshia matuku makumi asambombo kutwadijila ku dipatuka diaadio
Wakadi tshilembi tshikole ku mesu kua Yehowa, bantu bakadi bamba bu lusumuinu ne, Bu Nimeloda, tshilembi tshikole ku mesu kua Yehowa
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kubwabanyilula kakuyi kansungansunga ne kujadika mapa a muntu yônso a kutantamana

Kulumbulula Kuakane Nenudisunguluile balumbuluishi ne bafundi mu misoko yonso, idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe, ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba; bobo nebalumbuluishe bantu bilumbu biabo ne dilumbuluisha didi diakane
Ahila, muana mulume wa Enana, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Nafatale
Kadi Yehowa kena muanze kunuha mitshima ya kumanya n ai ne mesu a kutangila n au ne matshu a kunvua n au tô ne ku dituku edi
Njila wa kumpala : Bidi bitangila Bukalenga bwenzeji
Yosefe wakafunda mukanda bua lu bua buloba bua Ejipitu, udiku to ne katataka, ne, Tshituha tshitanu tshia bintu bionso ntshia Palo, anu buloba bua babuki nkayabo kabuakalua bua Palô

bulongolodi budi butangila: a b c mêyi maludiki a bungenda mushinga, mwikalamu dikuba, diaasa ne dianyisha dia kumpanyi; mêyi ne mikandu, bulongolodi bwa nzubu ya mashika; mêyi maludiki a bulongolodi ne bukookeshi bwa beena nsambu ne mêyi maludiki a mianda ya beena nsambu; d e f g h i j k l m n o bulongolodi budi butangila midimu ya badi baditambakeena; bulongolodi bwa mianda ya midimu butangila bu mudi mêyi adi aludika nsombelu wa bamfumu ne beena mudimu ,bukubi bwa beena mudimu,tuludiki tudi tutangila dikuba dia bantu mu musoko ne nangananga, tuludiki tudi tutangila dikubisha dia bantu ne dipangila dia mudimu, kadiyi dielela menji; bulongolodi bwa mianda ya bubanji butangila mêyi adi atangila majimba, bia mwinshi mwa buloba ne mafuta a bia mwinshi mwa buloba, matanda, bifidi bia midilu ne dilama dia makookeshi a kwa Nzambi; bulongodi budi butangila bufuki mu lungenyi ne midimu ya bianza; bulongolodi budi butangila manga ne midimu ya londapu, didimwija ku masaama, bu mudi mankenda a mubidi, mankenda a miaba ya tshinsangansanga ne dikuba dia bamamu ne bâna, bulongolodi butangila mudimu wa balambi ba manga, disumbisha dia manga, dibweela dia mu ditunga dia benda ne dipitshilamu, tuludiki twa mianda ya bukole ne makanda a mubidi tutangila matunga abidi ne tutangila bukwa matunga, bulongolodi budi butangila mankenda ku mudimu, ditwangaja dipiluke dia biâpu bia manga ne diabanya dia bangangabuka; dîyi didi ditangila mianda ya masungulangana; bulongolodi butangila dilamba, diludika, dibiikidisha, dipatula ne disumbisha dia maluvu makola mengula; bulongolodi butangila dilamba, dibiikidisha ne dipatula ne disumbisha dia maluvu makolesha ne adi kaayi makolesha; bulongolodi butangila difula, dibiikidisha ne dipatula ne dipitshisha dia biamwa bia mvita; bulongolodi butangila dimitshisha dia mukaji ku biamwa , diludika dia mamanya a pa bivuba ne a pa ditentemuna dia bitupa bia mubidi ne bia misunya ya mubidi; bulongolodi butangila beena tshimwangi,badibo bipata ne badi banyeema; bulongolodi butangila diangatshibwa ku midimu ya manga ne ku midimu mikwabo ne ditambakana
Wakenza tshilulu tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin, bakenza tshifuanyikishi tshia bakeluba mu tshilulu kudi bantu bakadi ne lungenyi lule
Binuikala nusesuka bua kulekela kulonda ku nyima kuandi yeye neabashiye mu tshihela, yeye neashihe bantu aba bonso
Muhika wandi wakamukudimuna di ne, Abu biahidia mukashi kundonda ku buloba ebu, netuhingane ne muan ebe mulume ku buloba buwakumuka, anyi
Wewe neudie bintu ebi bia tshijila, muntu mulume yonso neadie bintu ebi ebi mbintu biebe bia tshijila

Tshitupa tshisatu : Bidi bitangila mapa a mu tshibûngi Kanungu ka Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kukuba mapa ne majinga mamanya kudi mêyi a ditunga a beena Kongu badi basanganyibwa munda ne pambelu pa ditunga

Netuye ne bimuna bietu kabidi, katuena dishiya nansha mukoko umue ku nyima, bualu bua didi ne bualu bua kutendelela Yehowa Nzambi wetu ne nyama ei; katuena bamanye bintu bidi Yehowa musue anu bakafikaku
Katuena tuhingana ku nsubu yetu diambedi Bena Isalele kabayi banze kuhiana buhianyi buabo kudi mundi ne muntu
Mulami wa nsubu wa lukanu kakalama bintu biakadi mu bianza bia Yosefe, bualu bua Yehowa wakadi n andi, Yehowa wakamuendesha diakalengele mu malu onso akenzeye

Kadi katangila malomba bwa ditangilula, panyima pa mapangadika mangata kudi Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika ne kudi Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi, anu paditu mwa kupangadika mwa kufila tshilumbu ku bilumbulwilu bidi bitangila mianda ya bantu nkayabu anyi ku bilumbulwilu bidi bitangila nsambu ya pankatshi pa bantu ne mbulamatadi

Biahuekeshabo mitshima yabo idi kayiyi mitengula, bitabushabo dikenga dia mibi yabo, nenvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi ne Yakoba ne tshihungidi tshianyi ne Isaka ne tshihungidi tshianyi ne Abalahama, nenvuluke buloba ebu

Muana mulume wa munkatshi muenu, hafikeye matuku muanda mukulu, neatengudibue, muana mulume yonso wa ku bikondo bienu bionso, yeye udi muledibue mu nsubu wenu, anyi yeye udibo basumba kudi ba bende ku argent, udi kayi kankanunuina kebe
Nzambi wakamba mei â onso ne, Ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu nsubu wa buhika
Bakanua, bakasanka n andi
Hashishe hakamuangalakabo ku esete, bakasangana mpata munene mu buloba bua Shinâ, bakashikamaku

Yeye neoshe tshilulu mu kahia, bikala disama mu milongo ya buludi anyi mu milongo ya butshiama ya bintu biakenzabo ne miosa ya mikoko anyi bia lin anyi tshintu tshia tshiseba, edi ndisama dia nsudi, neboshe tshintu atshi mu kahia
Ndi mumanye ne, Yeye udi mua kuakula bimpe

Muntu ne mundi wakela beka umue udi tshituha tshia nshekele wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi, muntu ne muntu wakadibo babala, waka mana kuhita bidimu makumi abidi, bakadi balume binunu nkama isambombo, binunu bisatu, nkama itanu ne makumi atanu
Bikaleye muana wa bakashi, neubale nshekele makumi asatu
Mose wakalua, wakamanyisha bantu mei onso akamba Yehowa, ne mikenji yandi yonso, ne bantu bonso bakitaba dî dimue ne, Mei onso akutuambila Yehowa netuênze

Dutelonone Misoko ya Kunyemena Hashiha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba abi bia mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, hanuabihata, hanuaslukama mu misoko yabo ne mu nsubu yabo, nenuditahuluile misoko isatu mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Dîyi didi difila mishindu ya kusanka ne mapa aa
Muakuidi neoshe dianyi ha tshioshelu, kadi tshiadi netshikale tshia Alona ne bana bandi balume

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanusankishe bu muakanulayeye; nuenu nenusombeshe bisamba bia bungi bintu, kadi kanuena nusomba bintu kudibi; nuenu nenukokeshe bisamba bia bungi, kadi bisamba ebi kabiena binukokesha
Nuenu nenulame tshitendelelu ne tshioshelu, nunku mulau mukuabo kaukuatshi Bena Isalele

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Hanualua mu buloba bundi musue kunuha bu buhianyi buenu ne hanateka disama dia nsudi mu nsubu wa mu buloba bua buhianyi buenu, nunku muena nsubu nealue biandi, neambile muakuidi ne, Ndi ngelangana meji ne ditoba dia disama didi mu nsubu muanyi
Meme nenkoleshe mutshima wa Palô, yeye neabalonde, nempete butumbi kudi Palô ne kudi bisumbu biandi bionso, Bena Ejipitu nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa Bakenza nunku
Ku luseke lukuabo lua tshibi bilulu nebikale coudées dikumi ne itanu, ne makunshi asatu ne nkanu isatu

Halua dî diku dia muanda mukulu nealue biandi ne nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi anyi mputu nyunyu ibidi kudi muakuidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena muakuidi neafile umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, neamubuikidile bubi buandi buakenzeye bua muntu mufue, neajidile mutu wandi dituku adi mene
Matuku onso a Enosha akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne bitanu, yeye wakafua biandi
Noa wakabanga kuikala tshidime ne yeye wakakuna mitshi ya tumuma tukese
Kadi misoko ya Bena Lewi ne nsubu ya mu misoko yabo, Bena Lewi badi mua kuyihikula hasuabo
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Mose wakamba ku mesu kua Yehowa ne, Mona, Bena Isalele kabena banze kutumikila dî dianyi, Palô neunvuile muena tshikukumina kudi kunyi

Lewitiki Milambu ya Kuosha Yehowa Wakabikila Mose, wakamuambila mu ntenta wa kusangakena ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Halua muntu ne bintu bidiye musue kuoshila Nzambi, alue biandi ne mulambu wa muana wa ngombe anyi muana wa mukoko

Wewe newenzeshe tshilulu tshia dilumbulula tshia ha tshiadi kudi bantu badi ne lungenyi lule, bobo nebenze tshilulu etshi bu muakenzabo efoda, ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bilulu bikunze kunzû ne bia lin mutambe buimpe
Bena Isalele bakenza nunku, bakuabo bakasangisha bia bungi, bakuabo bakasangisha bikese
Mose wakalua ne bana balume ba Alona, wakabaluatshisha tuzaku, wakabasuika ne mikaba, wakabasa bifulu ku mitu yabo, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Bakenza ndibu ya or nkayandi, bakateka ndibu hankatshi ha tumuma tuakadi kuinshi kua tshikowelu, kadibu ne kamuma kadibu ne kamuma kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshia kuenza n atshi mudimu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Shelumiele, muana mulume wa Shulishadai
Bintu bimpe bia manyi ne bia tumuma tukese ne bia manvua ne bia mamuma adibo bahuola diambedi, bintu bionso bidibo bafila kudi Yehowa, nakukuha bintu ebi
Tuetu tuakambila mukelenge wetu ne, Nsongalume eu kena mua kushiya tatu Wandi, biamushiyeye, tatu wandi neafue
Kabeena mwa kupiisha muntu nansha umwe,nansha mu mushindu kaayi, ne bwaalu mmupeta lungenyi lwa nanku to

Bana ba Yisakâ ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba tshisamba tshia Yisakâ binunu makumi atanu ne binai ne nkama mai
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakambila Belâma ne, Ya biebe ne balume aba kadi wewe wambe anu dî dinaknambila
Bia momumwe, tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa katshieena mwa kweela mêyi pa mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa polovensa to
Ngombe midiunde muanda mutekete idi bu bidimu muanda mutekete, ne miehu miakane muanda mutekete idi bu bidimu muanda mutekete, tshilota tshidi anu tshimue
Yeye wakamba ne, Mukelenge, kukuatshi tshiji, nengakule bianyi, bikalamu bantu bakane makumi asatu Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nshiha musoko bualu bua bantu makumi asatu

Mu matuku makumi asatu adi alonda dijika dia midimu, pa kubeenga kufila dimanyisha edi, pikalaku dimanyisha dia diibila anyi manunganyi a dipeta dia biûma kadiyi dijadikibwa badi bamanyisha Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu anyi Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika bilondeshila mianda
Bana babidi bakakulelelabo mu Ejipitu diambedi tshiyi muanze kulua mu Ejipitu mbana banyi, Efelayima ne Manashe badi banyi bu Lubena ne Shimeona

Kanungu ka : Minisitila kavulambedi udi ujaadika dikumbaja dia mêyi ne udi ne bukookeshi bwa kufila tuludiki, pa kumbusha makookeshi adibo bitabijila anu Mulombodi wa Ditunga yêye nkayenda kudi Dîyi dikulu edi
dilongolola dia mishindu ya kusonsoloja ne ya kukuba mapa a muntu yônso ne budikadidi bwa nshindameenu bujaadika mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi;
Ku dituku dinakasungula nempingane kûdi, hakumbana ngondo yandi, Sala nealele muana mulume

Padi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa tshikosa difila dia bukookeshi buvwa bwimikila Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa mushindu awu, bulongolodi bwa mêyi a ditunga adibo bapatula mu mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa polovensa, bilondeshila difila dia bukookeshi edi, adi ashaala ne bwenzeji mu polovensa mweena bwaalu too ne palwa dîyi dia polovensa kujikija mianda ayi
Ngombe minyane yakadia ngombe muanda mutekete yakadi midiunde, ne hakayidia ngombe mikuabo nunku, kabakama nya ne yakayidia, yakadi anu minyane bu diambedi Nunku nakatabala
Halua dituku dinudi nusabuka musulu wa Yadene bua kubuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, hashishe nenjadike mabue manene, nenuashinguile ne nshimete

Malu a Mukelenge Wabo Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, hanuabuhiana, bakashikamamu, hanuamba ne, Tudisunguile mukelenge bua kuteka ku mutu kuetu bu bisamba bikuabo bidi bituela munkatshi; nenutekele mukelenge ku mutu kuenu anu yeye udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula; nutekele anu wa munkatshi mua bana benu bu mukelenge wenu; kanuteki muenyi udi kayi muan enu ku mutu kuenu
Wakashiha mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne bana balume ba Alona bakamulesha mashi ne yeye wakâmiamina ku tshioshelu
Minisitila kavulambedi udi udipeta penda

diteeka dia beena midimu ya diondapa nyama mu polovensa bu mudibio mu mukanda wa beena mudimu bashindama ba mbulamatadi; dienza dia ndongamu ya midimu ya dikuba dia nyama ne dilonda dia mapangadika a ba mpulushi ba mianda ya dikuba dia nyama nangananga mu bidi bitangila miaba ya mikalu ne ya dilamina nyama;
disungula ne diteeka dia batangiludi ba mu polovensa, tulasa tupwekela, tubandila, twa midimu ya bianza ne twa nsungansunga;

Mu dituku disatu bana balume ba ngombe dikumi ne umue ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema; ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila hau bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Bialua muntu ne luonji lua kushiha mukuandi mu budimu, wewe neumumushe ku tshioshelu tshianyi, bua kumushiha

Hakatangila Yakoba Lakele, muana wa Labana, muan abo wa balume ne mamu andi, ne mikoko ya Labana muan abo wa balume ne mamu andi, Yakoba wakasemena ha buihi, wakumusha dibue diakadi ku mushiku wa dina, wakanuisha mikoko ya Labana, muan abo wa balume ne mamu andi
Nenusungule mukelenge wa mu tshisamba ne tshisamba bua kunutahuluila buloba
Nunku Mose wakambila Alona ne, Ebu mbualu bakamba Yehowa ne, Nenjidibue kudi bantu balualua ha buihi n anyi, nentumbishibue ku mesu kua bantu bonso Alona wakahuwa talalâ
Kadi muanjelo wakamuambila ne, Bulelela, wewe wakaseka
Nuikale anu ne tshiamu tshimue tshidi tshiakane, ne tshihiminu tshimue tshidi tshiakane; nunku matuku enu neikale a bungi mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Lufu lua Lakele Bakumuka ku Betele, ne diambedi bobo kabayi banze kufika ku Efelata, kanyinganyinga kakakuata Lakele, wakatantamana bikole
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamusangana hehi ne mushimi wa mai wa mu tshihela, mushimi eu udi mu nshila wa ku Shû
Unvuai Isalele, Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, udi biandi Yehowa umue; sua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ne mutshima webe wonso, ne muoyo webe wonso, ne bukole buebe buonso

Mose ne Alona bakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Dilolo nenumanye ne, Yehowa wakunuluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne dinda nenumone butumbi bua Yehowa, bualu bua Yehowa udi munvue munudi numujiana, tuetu tudi banganga bua nudi nutujiana
Yeye wakamuitaba ne Ndi nkeba bana betu, ndi nkusengelela ne, undeshe kudibo badisha mikoko
Kuendi masandi
Kanungu ka Mêyi malongolodi adi aleeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa midimu ya bampulushi ba ditunga dijima
Suliele, muana mulume wa Abihayila, neikale mukelenge wa nsubu wa batatu ba meku a Melali bobo nebashikame ku luseke lua nsubu wa tshitendelelu lua ku nôde
Bana babo bakamona ne dinanga dia tatu wabo kudiye diakatamba dia kudi buonso buabo, bobo bakadi n andi lukuna, kabakamanya mua kuyikila n andi talala

Eku nkulondolola kua malu a Yakoba Hakadi Yosefe ne bidimu dikumi ne muanda mutekete, yeye wakadi udisha bimuna ne bana babo Yeye wakadi nsongalume wakadi ne bana ba balume ba Bileha ne Zilepa, bakashi ba tatu andi, Yosefe wakalua ne lumu luabo lubi kudi tatu abo

Angata muana mulume wa ngombe ne bimpanga bibidi bidi biakane, ne mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, ne mikata idi kayiyi ne luevene misangisha ne manyi, ne tukata luhehele ludi katuyi ne luevene tudi ne manyi mela ha mutu, ubilambe ne bukula buakane bua blé
Yeye wakamuambila ne Ya biebe, umone ne bana benu badi bakole ne bimuna bidi bimpe, anyi, walukila ungambile
Badi mwa kukwata bintu bia muntu anu mu dilonda dia dipangadika diangata kudi bamfumu bakoshi ba nsambu badi ne bukookeshi abu

Pa kumbusha bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu, Tshibambalu anyi Tshisangilu tshia bibambalu biônso bibidi tshidi mwa kupangadika ne tukanda twikale twa muntu pa nkayenda padibio bikengela kwanyisha mukenji kampanda
Bikala mulume anyi mukashi ne matoba matoke mu dikoba, muakuidi neamutangile, ne bi kala matoba au kâyi matambe kutoka tô, ei idi bu mpusu yakumueneka mu dikoba, muntu eu udi muakane
Mu dituku adi mene mene Yehowa wakumuka ne Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu ne bisumbu biabo
Pashishe, mianda ya matunga meenyi, bilwilu ne bukubi bwa bantu,bivwa pa kala bilamina Mfumu wa Ditunga, mbilwa miaba ya mudimu yabo bônso mu dieleshangana maboku
Lea wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpa difutu dianyi bualu bua meme nakafila muena mudimu wanyi wa bakashi kudi bayanyi, wakamuidika dina ne, Yisakâ
Mukanda wa ditangilula dia Bukalenga bunene badi bawangata ne mushinga amu padiwu mutwa tshiâla kudi tshia binâyi tshimwe tshia beena tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka
Wewe utshidi udibandisha kudi bantu banyi, udi uhidia kubalekela munyi

Kanudi mampa anyi manvua akoshabo mu kahia, anyi manvua mabishi dituku edi diambedi kanuyi banze kufila milambu yenu kudi Nzambi eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu bikondo bienu bionso mu nsubu yenu yonso
Numuke bintu bulelela; mitshima yenu kayinyingaladi, hanuamuhabi; bua bualu ebu Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Bana balume ba Isalele bakalua mu tshisumbu tshia bantu bua kusumbabo bia kudia, bualu bua tshiole tshiakadi mu buloba bua Kanana
Mose ne Eleazâ muakuidi bakangata bintu bia tshiamu tshia or tshiakatulabo ku bianza biabo
Bidi matabisha akatumineye Esau mukelenge wandi, ne mona, yeye udi kabidi ku nyima kuetu
Wakâteka ha bilulu bia ha maha bia efoda, mabue â akadi bu tshivulukidi kudi bana ba balume ba Isalele bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Tangilai, Yehowa udi muena diulu dikuabo didi ku nyima kua diulu, ne muena buloba ne bintu bionso bidimu
Wakangata dianyi dionso diakadi ha bintu bia munda ne lukutu lua mutshima ne tumuma tubidi ne dianyi diatu, Mose wakabisha ha tshioshelu
Mose wakateka milangala ku mpala kua Yehowa mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Hakumuka Mose ku mukuna wa Sinai ne mabue abidi a mei a dihungila mu bianza biandi, hakahuekeye nunku, Mose kakamanya ne musunyi wa ha mpala handi wakakonka bualu bua yeye wakadi usomba ne Yehowa
Labana wakambila Yakoba ne, Tangila mushiki eu ne dibue edi binakuimanyika hankatshi hetu
Wakaluhuka kudi Palô ne tshiji tshikole

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka , utentemuna ku mudimu ne , padibio bienzeka, umbusha ku mudimu, pa dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene ditangilula mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila : bamwenampala mu matunga meenyi ne batumibwe ba pa bwaabo; bamfumu banene ne bamfumu ba ku mutu kwa bilwilu ne kwa bampulushi ba ditunga, panyima pa dijadika dia Kapangu ka ku mutu kwa bilwilu; Mfumu wa eta majolo mujima, bamfumu ba eta majolo ne bakumanda ba inite minene ya bilwilu, panyima pa dijadika dia Kapangu ka ku mutu kwa bilwilu; balombodi ba ku mutu kwa midimu ya mbulamatadi; bamfumu ba midimu ne nzubu ya mbulamatadi; batumibwe ba mbulamatadi mu kumpanyi ne mu bishimikidi bia ditunga, pa kumbusha batangiludi ba bibutshilu
Sihona wakahidia bua Bena Isalele bahite ku buloba buandi, kadi Sihona wakasangisha bantu bandi bonso, wakaya kudi Bena Isalele mu tshihela tô ne ku Yahasa; wakatuangana nvita ne Bena Isalele
Yeye wakamita difu, wakalela muana wa balume, yeye wakamba ne, Nzambi wakungumushila bundu buanyi, wakamuidika dina ne, Yosefe, wamba ne, Yehowa ampe muana mukuabo
Ebi bidi mei mafunda ne mei majalame ne mikenji biakela Yehowa hankatshi handi ne Bena Isalele mukana mua Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai
Ekesode Bena Isalele ku Mukuna wa Sinai Hakadi Bena Isalele bamane kuluhuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu ngondo isatu, mu dituku adi mene bakafika mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Muntu udi ukuma tatu andi anyi mamu andi, nebamushihe bulelela

Mikenji ya Bamanyi ne Buhikudi Ei idi mikenji ya kuhumbulula hai malu ku bikondo bienu bionso, mu miaba yonso mudi nushikama, muntu udi ushiha mukuabo, nebashihe mushiku bu mu dî dia bamonyi; kadi kabena bamanye mua kumushiha anu ku dî dia mumonyi umue
Isaka wakahuola muoyo Wandi, wakafua, wakaya kudi bankambua bandi, wakadi muntu mununu wa bidimu bia bungi Esau ne Yakoba, bana bandi ba balume, bakamujika
Kanungu ka Minisitila udi mfumu wa tshibambalu tshienda

Padibo bitabuja ndongamu ewu kudi tshitupa tshipita bunene tshia bantu badi bakumbajija Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa, tshiôtshi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga etshi tshidi tshiteeka baminisitila mu nkwaasa
Nudi mua kumudia ku mbelu kuenu: muntu udi muakane anyi udi kayi muakane udi mua kumudia bu mudiye udia kabuluku anyi mbashi
Yosefe wakambila Palô ne, Bilota bia Palo bidi tshilota tshimue, Nzambi wakamanyisha Palô malu akadiye ha kuenza
Bakunfuisha mukau ne tshintu tshidi katshiyi Nzambi, bakunfikisha munda ne mpingu yabo ya hatuhu, meme nembafuishe mukau ne bantu ba hatuhu, meme nembafikishe munda ne tshisamba tshia bantu bahote
Au mmeku a Nafatale, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama mai
Wewe neusungule Alona ne bana bandi balume, ne bobo nebashale ne mudimu wa buakuidi, bialua muenyi ha buihi nebamushihe
Budikookeshi Dinyooka dia lukanu Dinyooka Teletwale Dibandila dia matunga ne bintu Mianda ya bia kwenza nabi mudimu Tshinyangu, tshimvundu Tshisabu Kabumwe, bobumwe Viza Dianyishibwa

Yeye nealengeshe nsubu ne mashi a nyunyu ne mai adi ahueka ne nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo ne mitshi ya cêdre ne mabeshi a hisopa ne bintu bikunze, kadi yeye nealekele nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo mu tshisuku ku butshika bua musoko, nealengeshe nsubu nunku, ne nsubu neikale muakane
diambulwishangana pankatshi pa polovensa;
Mashi neikale bu tshimanymu tshia mu nsubu munudi, ne hanamona mashi, nempite ha mutu henu, ne mulau kawena unukuata hanashiha bantu ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Yehowa neanutumme biusha bibi ku binu bienu ne ku mikolo yenu, ne ku munda mua makasa tô ne mu lubombo lua mutu: disama didi kadiyi mua kuondahibua

Abalahama wakabandisha mesu andi, wakamona ku nyima kuandi tshi mpanga tshiakadi ne nsengu yatshi mile mikuata ku mutshi Abalahama wakaya, wakangata tshimpanga, wakatshishihela Nzambi mu muaba wa muan andi
Hakashikameye mu musoko au musangu mule, dituku dikuabo Abimeleke, mukelenge wa Bena Peleshete, wakatangila ha disoso dia mu nsubu wandi, wakamona ne, Isaka wakadi usaba ne Lebeka, mukashi wandi
ubala anyi Udi wakula musangu umwe ku tshidimu kumpala kwa batshipwita munwamfwanka ne batshipwita bakulumpe batwilangana mu Tshisangilu Tshinene bwa kuleeja tshitupa tshikâdi mianda ya Ditunga

Nomba Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuabuela mu buloba bua Kanâna ebu mbuloba bua buhianyi buenu, buloba bua Kanâna mene ku mikalu yabo yonso mukalu wenu wa ku luseke lua sude newikale ku tshihela tshia Sina, ne ku mukalu wa Edome to ne kuinshi kua Dishiba dia Luehu ku luseke lua ku esete, mukalu wenu neunyunguluke mukuna wa Akalabima ku luseke lua ku sude, neutuangane ne tshihela tshia Sina tô ne ku Kadeshe bânea, tô ne ku Hasâ adâ, to ne ku Asemona, mukalu wenu neunyunguluke ku Asemona tô ne ku kasulu ka Ejipitu tô ne ku mai manene
Wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ha mutu ha mabaya, wakenza nkanu ya or ya kubueshamu mitshi, wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ha mutu ha mitshi
Nakaha Maki Gilada

Eleyasafa, muana mulume wa Deuele, mukelenge wa bana ba Gada, wakafua bintu dituku disambombo Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Eleyasafa, muana mulume wa Deuele

Nebasuike tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi ku nkanu yatshi ku nkanu ya efoda ne muonshi wa bleu muhindakasha, tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi netshikale ham bidi ha mukaba muluka bilengele wa efoda, kabasulule tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi ku efoda
