Palo enze biandi bualu ebu kabidi, asungule tuhita tua mu buloba, tusangishe tshintu tshitanu tshia bintu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba bua Ejipitu mu bidimu ebi muanda mutekete bidi buloba bulua ne bintu bia bungi
Bakamukudi muna di ne, Nansha, katuena bamanye mua kuenza nunku, anu hatuasangisha mikoko yonso ne humushabo dibue ku mushiku wa dina, hashishe netunuishe mikoko mai

Muntu kikadi munkatshi muenu udi utambisha muan andi mulume anyi muan andi mukashi mu kahia, nansha mutempi wa mbuku, nansha muena dijimbu nansha muena bilengulengu, nansha muena buloshi, nansha musesuishi wa bantu ne miloû yandi, nansha mutendeledi wa bakishi, nansha muena muhongo, nansha muena lubuku lua muzangu

Hakahanduluka Lota, Yehowa wakambila Abalama ne, Bandisha mesu ebe ha muaba ûdi muimane, utangile ku nôde ne ku sude ne ku esete ne ku wesete, buloba buonso bûdi umona nenkuhebu ne tunkanunuina tuebe tshiendelele
Yeye wakamba ne, Nakukuata bualu bua kusomba ne Mukelenge, bikalamu bantu makumi abidi Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nshiha musoko bualu bua bantu makumi abidi
Nansha nanku, bwa bidi bitangila dîyi dia lupetu, badi ne tshia kufila tshingenyingenyi mu tshipungu tshidibo balêja mu kanungu ka , ku Bilo bia Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka

Yeye wakabambila ne, Unvuai, ndi nnusengelela, tshiota tshinakulota, bualu bua monai, biakadi basuika bisumbu bia blé mu budimi, ne monai, tshisumbu tshianyi tshiakabika, tshiakimana, ne bisumbu bienu biakela tshianza munkatshi, biakatshikukuila
Lewitiki Dituku dia Dibuikidibua dia Mibi Yehowa wakayikila ne Mose ku nyima kua lufu lua bana balume ba Alona hakaluabo ku mpala kua Yehowa ne hakafuabo

Mikenji Mishilangane Binuaya kuluangana nvita ne bantu badi n enu lukuna ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ubafila mu bianza bienu, nuenu nudi nuya n abo mu buluka, ne umue wenu udi utangila mukashi udi ne mpala muimpe munkatshi muabo, ne yeye udi mumusue, udi musue kumubaka bu mukashi wandi; hashishe yeye nealue n andi ku nsubu kuandi; nebamubeye nsuki ya ku mutu, nebamukose nzadi; yeye neavule bilulu biandi bia buluka, neashale mu nsubu wa muntu eu: neadile tatu wandi ne mamu wandi tô ngondo mujima; ne ku nyima muntu eu neaye kudiye bu mulume wandi, ne yeye neikale mukashi wandi
Kadi Bena Isalele bakenda mu buloba bûme munkatshi mua mai, mai akadi bu tshimanu kudibo ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Nuvuluke matuku a diambedi, nuelangane meji a bidimu ne bikondo bia bungi: webeshe tatu webe, ne yeye neakuleshe; ne bakulu benu, bobo nebakuambile
Genese Diulu ne buloba ne bintu bionso biakashikishibua, buonso buabi
Muntu yonso udi witabusha tshintu tshia kumubueshelabo n atshi bua kushiha muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu udi ne mulau
Unvua dî dianyi, nenkuhe lungenyi, ne Nzambi neikale n ebe, wewe wikale muakuidi wa bantu kudi Nzambi, Ulue biebe ne malu onso kudi Nzambi
lupetu bwa mbulamatadi mu Ditunga;
Yeye neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha muana wa ngombe wa mulambu wandi, neamushihe ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, ne bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebamiamme mashi ku tshioshelu
Nakabaha tshituha tshia mulambu wanyi wa kuosha ha kahia, tshintu tshidi tshitambe tshijila bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu ne mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji
Bidi ne bukookeshi bwabo nkayabu pa bubanji, pa bantu, pa lupetu ne pa dimanya dipiluke
Yeye neikale muakuidi webe kudi bantu, yeye neikale bu mukana muebe ne wewe newikale bu Nzambi kudiye
Nuenu nutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, nubienze, buloba bundi musue kunuha bua kushikamamu kabunuluki
Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga tshidi kabidi mwa kutalula bujitu bwa muntu kansanga udi mu Bukalenga bunene pa ditabija dia mukanda wa didiombola

Udi usonsakaja beena Kongu mwa kwendabo mushinga mushadila, kufuka bintu mu lungenyi, kwenza midimu ya bianza ne kabidi udi wenza mwende mônso bwa kukuba ne bwa kuvulula mamanya mapiluke ne makookeshi adi mu ditunga
Kanungu ka Bukookeshi bwa kwimanyika midimu bwa kutontomona budi bumanyike ne bujadikibwe
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bantu aba nebampetule musangu bule munyi
Bulongolodi bwa mu kabujima
Udi kabidi ne tshia kukuba ne kukolesha dikwatangana mu mikaba dia beena ditunga, nangananga dîba dididio mu njiwu
kwepuka matandu ;
Bia bisatu bibidi bia beena Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu badi ne tshia kwikala bamanyi ba mêyi ne mikandu bafumina mu midimu ya bukoshi bwa nsambu, ya diakwilangana ku bilumbulwilu anyi ya tulasa tukulumpe
Âpakashada wakalela Shela ne Shela wakalela Ebe
Genese Badi Bahetela Isaka Mukashi Abalahama wakadi muntu mununu mukoke, ne Yehowa wakasankisha Abalahama mu malu andi onso
Mose wakadimusha bantu dituku adi mene ne, Bantu aba nebimane ha mutu ha Gelizima bua kuvudishila bantu disanka hanuasabuka Yadene: Shimeona ne Lewi ne Yuda ne Yisakâ ne Yosefe ne Benyamina
Wakahingana kudi bana babo, wakamba ne, Nsongalume kenaku, ne meme nenye kudi kunyi
Nunku nushale bana ba balume bakese bonso badi munkatshi muabo ne mukashi yonso ukadi mumanyibue kudi mulume
Yuda wakatuma muana wa mbushi mu tshianza tshia mulunda wandi, Muena Adulama, bua kuangateye tshieya tshia keyekeye mu tshianza tshia mukashi, kadi yeye kakamusangana
Buowa bua Bantu Dut
Yeye wakahingasha kahita ka bena maluvu mu mudimu wandi kabidi, ne yeye wakaha Palo luhanza luandi mu tshianza tshiandi kabidi
Esau wakambila Yakoba ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Undisheku bintu bikunze biudi mulambe bualu bua meme ndi muhungila
Kadi kapatula tshidimu tshiônso mulubu udiku kenzela Mulombodi wa Ditunga, Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga ne Bukalenga bunene

Anu kabidi bwa kutangilula lungenyi lwa Dîyi dikulu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga, Minisitila Kavulambedi, Mulombodi wa Tshimbambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka, Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe anyi tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi batshipwita bakulumpe,badi mwa kutuma mêyi ne mikandu ku Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu, kumpala kwa kuapatulabo
Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka beena bukalenga bunene bakwabo ne udi ubumbusha mu midimu yabo padibo bamulomba kudi Minisitila kavulambedi

Bualu bua hanakamana kulua n abo mu buloba bunakalaya batatu abo, budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, ne hakamanabo kudia, kukuta ne kuvunda, hashishe nebakudimune mitshima yabo bua kutendelela nzambi mikuabo, nebayikuatshile mudimu, nebampetule, nebashihe tshihungidi tshianyi
Tshintu tshionso tshia dikumi tshia buloba anyi tshia bintu biakakuama mu buloba anyi tshia mamuma a mitshi, etshi ntshintu tshia Yehowa, ntshintu tshia tshijila kudi Yehowa
Nakakubikila bua kungelela bantu badi n anyi lukuna mulau, ne mona, wewe wakubavudishila disanka
Kanungu ka Mêyi a maalu a mpetu adi aleeja makookeshi ne majitu a Mbulamatadi

Mose ne Eleazâ bakabambila mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne mai a Yadene batangilangane ne Yeleko ne, Nubale bungi bua bantu ba mu bidimu makumi abidi to ne ha mutu bu muakambila Yehowa Mose ne Bena Isalele bakaluhuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Hakalela Ebê Pelege, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama mai ne makumi asatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Yeye wakabela lusumuinu luandi ne, Balaka, mukelenge wa Moaba, wakumbikila ku Alama ne ku mikuna ya ku Esete ne, Lua biebe, ungelele bana ba Yakoba mulau, lua biebe kukanda Bena Isalele

Kanuena nudia dituku dimue anyi matuku abidi anyi matuku atanu anyi matuku dikumi anyi matuku makumi abidi, kadi ngondo mujima, tô ne hanuaulukila mu diulu, neunutonde, bualu bua nuenu nuakuhidia Yehowa udi munkatshi muenu, nuakudila ku mpala kuandi ne, Tuakaluhuka mu Ejipitu bualu kai

Nomba Buhianyi bua Bena Lewi Yehowa wakambila Mose mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mitangilangane ne Yeleko ne, Wele mukenji kudi Bena Isalele, bua bobo bahe Bena Lewi misoko ya kushikamamu bu buhianyi buabo, bobo bahe Bena Lewi kabidi tshituha tshia buloba budi bunyunguluka misoko ei
Muntu yonso udi ukuma mukuabo mu musokoko udi ne mulau

Eu mmukenji kudi muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi ne wa bintu bidi bilumi bimatshila bua kumuvuisha mukoya, ne kudi mukashi hamoneye katshetshi, ne kudi muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi, ne kudi muntu udi ulala ne mukashi hatshidiye ha katshetshi

Biwatutuma ne muan etu, netuye, ne tukusumbile bia kudia, kadi biwahidia kututuma n andi, katuena tuyaku, bualu bua mulume au waka tuambila ne, Kanuena nuntangila ku mesu, binuikala kanuyi nulua ne muakunyi enu kundi
Dituku dia kumudilu nenuangate mamuma a mitshi mimpe ne bikola bia mabue ne matamba a mitshi ne ntuhu ya mu mai, nenusanke ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, matuku muanda mutekete

Bakaluangana ne Kedolaomê, mukelenge wa Elama, ne Tidala, mukelenge wa Goyima, ne Amalafele, mukelenge wa Shinâ, ne Aliyoka, mukelenge wa Elasa, ku luseke lukuabo bakelenge banai, ku luseke lukuabo batanu
Badi mwa kwitaba dilomba adi anu pikalabu bafila ditontolola dia tshilumbulwilu ku Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika anyi ku Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi
Esau wakamuebesha ne, Tshisumbu atshi tshinene tshmakusangakena n atshi mu nshila ntshia bualu kai
Lekela tshiji tshiebe tshikole, ukudimune mutshima bua malu audi musue kuenzela bantu bebe
Kadi nebabanye buloba anu ku nshobo, bobo nebahiane buloba ku mena a bisamba bia batatu abo
Yehowa wakenza bu mu dî dia Mose yeye wakumusha bisumbu bia tuishi kudi Palô ne kudi bena mudimu bandi ne kudi bantu bandi, nansha kishi kamue kakashala
Nuenu nuakalua kundi, buonso buenu muakamba ne, Tutume bantu ku mpala kuetu, bua hobo batentekele buloba, bahingane, batumanyishe bua nshila utudi tuyamu, ne misoko itudi tubuelamu
Bule bua dibaya dimue buakadi coudées dikumi, ne butshiama buadi buakadi coudée umue ne tshituha
Hakahongololabo bintu biakadi mu bibombi biabo, bakasangana argent ya muntu ne muntu mu tshibombi tshiandi, hakamonabo, bobo ne tatu wabo argent yabo bakatshina
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita, badi bangata dîyi bu diumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu

Pa mwânzu ewu, mudimu watshi udi wa: a bulami bwa lupetu lwa mbulamatadi; b dikuba ne dishindamija dia bulongolodi bwa mianda ya kashintu; c disunguluja ne dikumbaja dia bulongodi bwa mianda ya kashintu; d ditangilula dia bujima bwa mianda ya tshibutshilu; e difila dia ngenyi mitangila bubanji ne lupetu kudi Bukalenga bunene

Biangata mulume muan abo mukashi, muana wa tatu andi anyi muana wa mamu andi, biavuleye bilulu biandi, ne biamuvula mukashi bilulu, ebu mbualu bua bundu, nebumushibue munkatshi mua bana babo, yeye wakavula muan abo mukashi bilulu, yeye nendituadile bubi buandi
Nenuikale ne mukenji umue ne dî dimue kunudi ne kudi muenyi udi munkatshi muenu
Lebeka wakadi ne muan abo wa balume dina diandi Labana, Labana wakaya lubilu kudi mulume wakadi ku mushimi wa mai
Ditumibwa diônso dia ku makanda didi tshianana
Nembihate bilulu bitulu tô ne hakakumbana ba bungi ne hanuahiana buloba
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Yalede, Mahalelela wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi asatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Mose wakenza muakamba Yehowa, bakaya ku mutu kua mukuna wa Hô ku mesu kua bantu bonso
Mapangadika a tubadi ne tubinadi badi baakumbaja mu dîna dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga

Bantu bine aba badi bamanyisha majinga abo mu tshibûngi tshia bisumbu bia tshidiidi tshishindika kudi dîyi dikulu didi kabidi dijadika ne kwenza tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi tshia mu kabumwe kudi tshibawu tshia dipàangila dia ditunga
Mukashi wa masandi kikadi munkatshi mua bana bakashi ba mu Isalele, ne muena Sodoma kikadi munkatshi mua bana balume ba mu Isalele

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu badi bakakumbaja kudi bantu tshiteema bateeka kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga, yêye nkayende mudisungwila basatu ba ku bôbu abu, Tshimamwende wa Bukalenga patshi, mu tshisangilu tshiatshi tshinene, tshifila bantu basatu ne Kapangu ka kumutu ka bakoshi ba nsambu kafila bantu basatu
Kadi dî edi didi ha buihi n enu ne mukana muenu ne mu mitshima yenu, bua nuenu kudienza
Numanyishe bana benu mei â, nubambileu hanuashikama mu nsubu yenu ne hanuenda mu nshila ne hanuaya ne hanuabika

Yeye neoshe mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, yeye neumushe dianyi dionso ne dianyi dia mukila didi hehi ne muongo ne dianyi didi ha mutu ha bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi didi ha mutu hatu hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne lua tumuma kabidi yeye neabiumushe

Mukashi wakadi ne mutshima mulengele ne kalolo munkatshi muenu wakatshina mua kuihata makasa ha buloba bualu bua kalolo ne kanemu kakatamba, neikale ne disu dibi kudi mulume udiye munange, ne kudi muan andi mulume ne kudi muan andi mukashi, ne kudi muana muhia muhia wakaleleye ha binu biandi ne kudi bana bonso hadiye mulele; yeye neabadie mu musokoko bua kuhanga kua bia kudia mu ditshintshimika ne ditata bidi bena lukuna banutatshisha n abi ku misoko yenu

Bualu bua Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Kubadi tshisamba tshia Lewi nansha, kubadi bungi buabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, kadi usungule Bena Lewi bua kuenzabo mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne wa bintu bionso bidimu bobo nebatuale nsubu ne bintu bionso bidimu, bobo nebabibale, nebashikame ha buihi ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita, badi batangila mukanda wa tuludiki twa mumana kukumbana
Nuenu kanuikadi ne luse kudi muntu eu, kadi nenumushe mashi a muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bua nuenu nuikale ne diakalengele

Enza biebe tshilulu tshia kuteka ku mbelu kua tshitendelelu tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin mutambe buimpe, utshienzeshe kudi muntu udi ne lungenyi lule lua kulengesha
Yehowa wakasangakena ne Belâma, wakateka dî mukana muandi, wakamba ne, Uhingane kudi Balaka, umuambile nunku
Dilekedibwa anyi dipeepeja dia bitadi didi mwa kwenzeka anu mu diswa dia mêyi a ditunga
Wakaya kuakenzeye tshioshelu diambedi, ne Abalama wakahitaku dina dia Yehowa
Mai a Bulalu ku Mala Mose wakalombela bantu bua kuyabo ku mpala bumuke ku Dishiba Dikunze, bakaya mu tshihela tshia Shû bakaya mu tshihela matuku asatu, kabakasangana mai
Hakashikisheye kumunuisha mai, yeye wakamba ne, Nensunyine tumelo biebe mai kabidi to ne hukutatu
Kababaki mukashi wa masandi ne munya nguke anyi mukashi wakahidiabo kudi mulume wandi yeye udi wa tshijila kudi Nzambi wandi

Mose wakamba ne, Etshi ntshintu tshiakuamba Yehowa ne, Nushale ne tshihiminu tshia bintu ebi tô ne ku bikondo bienu bionso, bua nuenu numone bidia binakanudisha n abi mu tshihela, hanakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Nakatuma bamessager mu tshihela tshia Kedemota kudi Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona, ne mei a ditalala ne, Witabushe bua tuetu tuhite mu buloba buebe: netuye anu mu musesu munene, katuena tusesuka ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi

Mose wakambila Kola ne, Unvuai, bana balume ba Lewi: nudi nuelangana meji ne bualu ebu budi bukese bua Nzambi wa Isalele wakamujidila munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bua nuenu nulue ha buihi n andi kumukuatshia mudimu mu nsubu wa Yehowa, ne bua kukuatshila tshisumbu tshonso mudimu kabidi, yeye wakanuhatula ne bana benu bonso ba Lewi ha buihi n andi, nuenu nudi nudikebela mudimu wa buakuidi kabidi, anyi
Yuda wakamuambila ne, Mulume au wakabambila bikole ne, Kanuena nu ntangila ku mesu, binuikala kanuyi nulua ne muakuny enu kundi
Kadi baleleshi bakatshina Nzambi, kabakenza muakabambila mukelenge wa Ejipitu, kadi bakasungila bana balume
Labana wakebesha Yakoba ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi tshinyi, wakunyema kundi mu musokoko, wakuya ne bana banyi bakashi bu bahika bakuata mu nvita, anyi
Muntu yonso udi ubuelakana ne bena muhongo ne batempi ba mbuku bua kulonda malu abo a masandi, nengumushe mesu anyi kudi muntu au, nemmumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Bakamukonka ne, Sala, mukashi webe, wehi

Dutelonone Yehowa Neabuele Bisamba bia Bena Kanâna Unvuai, Isalele, nenusabuke Yadene lelu, bualu bua kuihata bisamba bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole, ne misoko minene idi ne mpangu mile idi mihite mulu, bantu banene badi bale, bana balume ba Anaka, banudi bamanye; nuakulua lumu luabo ne, Nganyi udi mua kuimana ku mpala kua bana balume ba Anaka
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele bua kumpeshabo bintu bia kuntendelela n abi, nenuangate kudi muntu ne muntu bintu bidi mutshima wandi musue bua kuntendelela n abi
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bualu bua Yehowa Nzambi webe wakungendesha dikasa dimpe
Lakele wakambila tatu andi ne, Mukelenge kanfuidi tshiji, bualu bua meme tshiena mbika ku mpala kuebe, bualu bua ndi mujingakana tshilele tshia bakashi tshidi n anyi
Bua Ashe yeye wakamba ne, Ashe asanke biandi ne bana, ikale ne diakalengele kudi bana babo: atue dikasa diandi mu manyi
Mala ne Noa ne Hogela ne Mileka ne Tîsa
Kuladi ne mulume bu mudibo balala ne mukashi, bualu ebu budi bubi
Kadi yeye wakahingasha tshianza tshiandi, ne mona, muana mukuabo wakaluhuka

Biamueneka ditoba ditoke tô mu dikoba diandi, ne bikaladi kadiyi dibuela mu munyinyi wandi mene, ne bikala miosa kayiyi mianze kuandamuka mitoke tô, nunku muakuidi neabueshe muntu udi ne disama ha nkayandi mu nsubu tô matuku muanda mutekete
Kuhungi n abo tshihungidi anyi ne nzambi yabo

Biasangakena mulume ne mushikankunde utshidi kamama, kayi mubangila kudi mukuabo, biamukuateye ku bukole bua kulala n andi, ne bantu badi babasangana; hashishe mulume wakalala n andi, neafute tatu wa mushikankunde nshekele ya argent makumi atanu, ne yeye neikale mukashi wandi, bualu bua yeye wakamunyanga, kena mua kumuhidia matuku andi onso
Bualu bua mikenji ei inakunuambila lelu kayena minuhite bukole bua nuenu kuyenza; kayena kule
Anu bintu bia kudia bia bansongalume ne bia bantu bakaya n anyi, Anê ne Eshekola ne Mamale, bobo bangate tshituha tshiabo
Mai akahuekahueka ha buloba, hakakumbana matuku lukama ne makumi atanu, mai akadi ahueka

Nzambi wakambila Abalahama ne, Kabena babikila mukashi webe, Salai kabidi, nebamubikile ne, Sala, nemmuvudishile di sanka, yeye neakulelele muana mulume, nemmusankishe bulelela, yeye neikale nkambua wa bisamba bia bungi, ne bakelenge ba bantu nebaluhuke munda muandi
Yakoba wakamukuatshila mudimu to bidimu muanda mutekete bualu bua Lakele, ne bidimu ebi biakadi bu anu matuku makese bualu bua dinanga diakamunangeye n adi
Mêyi malongolodi adi aleeja bulongolodi, Kapangu ka kulu ka disungidila dia ditunga

Kulondi ku nyima kua tshisumbu tshia bantu tshinene bua kuenza malu mabi, kuikadi bu mu manyi wa bualu munkatshi mua bantu badi basangisha dî diabo bua kudibingisha mu tshilumbu tshidi ka tshiyi tshilelela

Hanuahanga kuluangana, muakuidi neasemene ha buihi ne bantu, neabambile ne, Bena Isalele, unvuai, nuakusemena hehi ne bantu badi n enu lukuna bua kuluangana n abo lelu: kanuikadi ne mitshima mitekete, kanuikadi ne buowa, kanuzakadi, kanubatshinyi; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuluila, bua kuluangana ne badi n enu lukuna ne bua kunusungila
Biwalua ne mulambu wa bintu bia kumudilu binudi nuhuola kudi Yehowa, nufile bintu bidi mu miehu biosha mu kahia, miehu mihia mihia idibo ba tua diambedi

Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne tshia kuneemeka ne kwangata bakwende beena mwabo kakuyi kansungansunga nansha kakese ne kusheemesha nabo malela adi ambulwisha mwa kusungila, kulubulula ne kukolesha bumwe bwa ditunga, kaneemu ne dilengulula dia mibi ya bakwende
Nunku hanuahuola bintu, nenufile tshi tuha tshitanu kudi Palô ne nuenu nenushale ne bituha binai bua kukunaku kabidi ne bua kudidisha ne bonso banudi n abo mu nsubu yenu, ne bana benu bakese
Yehowa wakamba ne, Teka tshianza tshiebe mu tshiadi kabidi
Bu meme muebe mulambu wa kubuikila n qu bubi bua bantu lelu, bualu ebu buakadi kuikala buimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa, anyi
Yeye wakambila Sala ne, Mona, nakuha mukulu webe bituha bia argent tshinunu, ntshintu tshiebe tshia kutokesha n atshi munda ne bantu bonso badi n ebe, wewe wakubingishibua ku mesu kua bantu bonso

Kanungu ka Bukalenga bunene badi babwiimanyika kudi Minisitila kavulambedi, baminisitila, baminisitila bindonda ne padibio bienzeka, kudi bindonda bia Minisitila kavulambedi, baminisitila ba Mbulamatadi ne baminisitila batumibwa
Kanungu ka Mu dilonda dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi, bulongolodi bwa mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi momumwe ne bwa mbulamatadi wa bilwilu,badi babuteeja kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga
Yeye wakamba ne Lua n au kundi nendie munyinyi wa ntole wa muan anyi bua mutshima wanyi ukuvudishile disanka
Nu nku Mose wakela di, bakamanyi shangana mu tshitudilu ne, Nansha mulume nansha mukashi kalu ne bintu bikuabo bia tshitendelelu
Hanuahuola bintu binuakakuna mu buloba, kanuhuodi ku matengu a madimi, kanusangishi bintu bionso binudi nuhuola
Yosefe wakumuka lubilu, bualu bua mutshima wandi wakajinga bua muakunyi andi, wakakeba muaba wa kudidileye, wakabuela mu nsubu wandi wa bulalu, wakadidilamu
Kadi Yehowa wakadi ne Yosefe, waka mulesha luse, wakamuendesha diakelengele kudi mulami wa nsubu wa lukanu
Kadi bintu bikuabo bidi ne mahuahua ne bidi ne mikolo mai bidi bibi kunudi
Badi Butamba Bena Isalele Bukole ku Homa Dut
Kadi bakatangila Palô ne, Bualu buakushika, wakakolesha mutshima wandi, kakabinvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Muena nsudi eu neahande bilulu biandi, neashiye nsuki ya ku mutu kuandi tshianana, neabuikile mushiku wandi wa ha mutu, nêle mbila ne, Tshiena muakane, tshiena muakane
Tunkanunuina tuebe netuikale bu dinfuenkenya dia buloba netumuangalale ku wesete ne ku esete ne ku nôde ne ku sude bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bualu buebe ne bua tunkanunuina tuebe

Nenulekelelangane bintu nunku: muena dibanza yonso nealekele bintu biakasombesheye muena mutumba n andi; yeye kena wenzesha muena mutumba n andi ne muan abo mulume bua kuhingishabo bintu ebi; bualu bua etshi ntshidimu tshiakabambila Yehowa bua kulekelelangana bintu

Dutelonone Mukenji Mutambe Bunene Ei mmikenji ne â mmei ne â mmalu wakangambila Yehowa bua kunumanyisha, bua nuenu nubienze mu buloba bunudi nuhiana: bua nuenu nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mei andi onso ne mikenji yandi, binakanuambila, ne wewe ne muan ebe mulume, ne muana wa muan ebe mulume, matuku onso a muoyo wenu; bua wewe uvudishe matuku ebe
Katataka ndi mumanye ne, Yehowa udi utamba nzambi yonso buene, bualu bua wakahatula bantu mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu hakabaleshabo dikamakama
Kumpala kwa kusomba mu nkwaasa, nguvenêla udi umanyisha Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa ndongamu wa bukalenga bwende

Numanye kabidi ne, Nendombe bulami bua mashi enu, nembulombe kudi nyama yonso ne kudi muntu yonso, nendombe bulami bua muoyo wa muntu hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu Muntu yonso udi umatshisha mashi a munga muntu hanshi, nebamatshishe mashi andi hanshi, bualu bua Nzambi wakafuka bantu mu tshifuanyikishi tshiandi

Masanka a tatu webe akuhita masanka a batatu anyi bunene tô ne ku mukalu wa mikuna minene idiku tshiendelele, masanka au neikale ha mutu ha Yosefe ne ha lubombo lua mutu wa yeye wakadi muhandulula kudi bana babo
Hashishe Palô wakatabala Wakalala tulu kabidi, wakalota tshiota tshikuabo, wakamona miehu ya mponda muanda mutekete minene, miakane idiundile ku lubalabala lumue

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, muakuidi neamutangile kabidi, ne biamba disama kushika, bikaladi kadiyi ditampakana mu dikoba diandi, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, disama edi didi bu tshilamulamu, muntu eu neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale mua kane

Dutelonone Hangata mulume mukashi bua kumubaka, ne bikala mukashi kayi muimpe ku mesu kuandi bualu bua yeye wakamusangana ne malu adi kayi mimpe, hashishe yeye neamufundile mukanda wa kushiha dibaka, neamuheu mu bianza, neamûmushe mu nsubu wandi
Alona wakabambila ne, Nukuohole nkanu ya or idi ku matshu a bakashi benu ne a bana benu ba balume ne a bana benu ba bakashi, nulue n ai kundi

Yeye nênze nunku ne muana mulume wa ngombe, bu muakenzeye ne muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buabo nunku, ne bubi buabo nebuikale bubuikidibue

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, yeye neangate bana balume ba mikoko babidi badi kabayi ne tshilema ne muana mukashi wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue udi kayi ne tshilema ne bituha bisatu bia dikumi bia épha bia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ne dikoho dia manyi
Muakuidi neamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, neoshe dianyi bu mulambu udi ulua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Wewe ne bantu baudi n abo nuakudisangisha bua kuelangana ne Yehowa

Nomba Hakatangila Belâma ne bualu ebu buakusankisha Yehowa bua kuvudishila Bena Isalele disanka, yeye kakaya kabidi kutempa mbuku bu muakenzeye misangu mikuabo, kadi wakatangisha mpala wandi ku tshihela

Nzambi Udi Ubalaya Muprofete Mufuanangane ne Mose Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanubishile muprofete munkatshi mua bana benu bu meme, nenunvue dî diandi: bu munuakalomba Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu Holeba mu dituku dituakasambakena n enu ne, Katunvu dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, kabidi, katutangidi kahia aka kanene kabidi, bua katufu
Bamuteke ku butshika bua tshitudilu matuku muanda mutekete, ne ku nyima nebamuhingishe kabidi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuabuela mu buloba bundi nnuha, ne hanuahuola bintu bia mu buloba, nulue bienu ne bintu binudi nuhuola diambedi kudi muakuidi, yeye neanyukule tshisumbu tshia bintu ku mpala kua Yehowa, bualu bua kunuitabushisha kudi Yehowa, muakuidi neatshinyukule dituku didi dilonda dia lumingu
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Mukelenge wetu udi wamba mei au munyi
Hakalua dituku disatu ne dinda, makubakuba ne miele ya nvula ne difutu difike biakadi ha mukuna, ne di dia mpungi diakatamba bukole, bantu bonso bakadi mu tshitudilu bakazakala
Nunku wewe neumujidile bualu bua yeye udi ufila milambu kudi Nzambi webe, bualu bua meme Yehowa wakamuidika, ndi wa tshijila
Yeye wakamba ne, Bakuetu, ndi nnusengelela ne kanuenji bualu bubi nunku

Mose wakaha Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe muana mulume wa Yosefe buloba bua Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole ne buloba bua Oga mukelenge wa Bashana, bungi bua misoko yabo to ne ku matshika abo onso
Belâma wakabika, wakahingana kuandi, Balaka wakaya kuandi kabidi

Uvuluke ne wewe wakadi muhika mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuhatulamu ne tshianza tshia bukole ne diboko diandi diolola: nunku Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakalelela mukenji bua wewe uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu
disonsola dia midimu ya dikolesha lungenyi ne ya manaya mu polovensa;
Nakukunvuila bualu bua Yishemaele kabidi, mona, nakumusankisha, nemmukumbashe, nemmuvuishe bisamba bia bungi, yeye nealele baminyampala dikumi ne babidi, nemmuvuishe tshisamba tshinene
Nenunyukule mulambu wa bukula buakaboteshabo diambedi kudi Yehowa, ku bikondo bienu bionso

Yehowa wakela n abo tshifufu, wakabateta, wakabambila ne, Binuatumikila di dia Yehowa Nzambi wenu, binuenza malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuandi, ne binuateleja matshu kudi mikenji yandi, binuenza mei andi onso, tshiena nnutumina nansha disama dimue dinakatumina Bena Ejipitu, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa udi unuondaha
Nenukune mitshi ya tumuma tukese, nenuyilame bimpe, kadi kanuena nunua nvinyo, kanuena nuhuola tumuma; bualu bua bishi nebitudie
Nunku bakashikisha mudimu wonso wa tshitendelelu, ntenta wa kusangakena, Bena Isalele bakenza malu onso akambila Yehowa Mose
Bua bualu ebu bakamuidika dina ne, Edome

Esau wakabaka bakashi ba bana bakashi ba Bena Kanana: Adamuana wa bakashi wa Elona, Muena Hiti, ne Oholibama, muana wa bakashi wa Ana, muana wa bakashi wa Sibiona, Muena Hiwi, ne Basemata, muana wa bakashi wa Yishemaele, ne muan abo wa bakashi wa Nebayota
Mose ne Alona bakenza bu muakamba Yehowa, Alona wakabisha mulangala, wakakuma mai akadi mu musulu, ku mesu kua Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi, mai onso akadi mu musulu akakudimuka mashi
Bua bualu ebu nakanuambila ne, Nuditahuluile misoko isatu
Abalahama Udi Wihata Hagâ ne Yishemaele Muana wakadiunda, wakalekela mabele, mu dituku diakalekeleye mabele Abalahama wakalambishila Isaka bidia bia bungi

Eu udi mudimu wa bana balume ba Kohata udibo benza ne bintu bia tshijila mu ntenta wa kusambakena, hayabo ku luendu Alona neabuelemu ne bana bandi balume nebatuhe tshilulu tshikudika, nebabituale hatshi mushete wa Nzambi, nebâteke tshibuikilu tshia biseba bia nkonge ha mutu hatshi, nebâteke tshilulu tshifike ha mutu hatshi kabidi, nebabueshemu mitshi ya mushete

Nakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa matuku makumi anai bu munakenza diambedi, tshiakadia bidia, tshiakanua mai, bualu bua mibi yenu muakenza, hanuakenza bualu ebu bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufuisha tshiji
Wakenza nkanu ya or mai, wakateka nkanu ei ku matumba anai ku mikolo ya mesa mai
Minisitila kavulambedi udi mwa kulebeka amwe makookeshi enda kudi ba meena
Hakalela Seluga Nahô, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama ibidi, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi

Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia diumvwangana ne ndondo ne matunga makwabo, tshinyangu tshiônso tshia bulume ne bukaji tshienzela muntu bwa kusendekeja, kupandulula dîku ne kubutula tshisamba tshijima badi batshitangila bu tshibawu tshienzela bumuntu tshidibo banyooka kudi mêyi ne mikandu

Bena Isalele bakabambila ne, Biakadi bimpe bua tuetu kufua mu Ejipitu ku tshianza tshia Yehowa hatuakashikama hadi bivuadi bia munyinyi ne hatuakukutshika mafu ne bidia, kadi nuenu nuakuluila n etu mu tshihela etshi bualu bua kushiha tshisumbu etshi tshionso ne nzala
Nzambi wakamubadila mu Ejipitu, yeye udi ne bukole bua nyama wa mbowa, yeye neamine bisamba bia bantu badi n andi lukuna, neatshibule mifuba yabo bituha, yeye neabatubule ne mikete
Kabeena mwa kukanyika muntu nansha umwe bwa kubwelayi mu milongo ya dileeja dia tshiji to
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuelela mukenji lelu bua nuenu nuenze mikenji ei ne mei au; nunku nubienze ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso
Muntu umue wakadi kumanya mua kuihata tshinunu tshia bantu, ne bantu babidi bakadi kumanya mua kuihata binunu dikumi bia bantu munyi, bikala Dibue kadiyi dibahane, ne Yehowa kayi mubafile kudibo
Nuenu nenutendelele Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, yeye neayudishe disanka ku bidia bienu ne ku mai enu, nennumushile disama munkatshi muenu
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kubambulwisha bwa kusankabo ne mapa aa
Enza makoha makumi atanu ku mibangu ya tshilulu, ne makoha makumi atanu ku mibangu ya tshilulu tshikuabo tshidi tshituangane katshi
Meme tshiena mumanye mua kukuha butumbi bulelela, anyi
Hawamulekela, kumutumi ne bianza bituhu; umuhe bintu bia bungi munkatshi mua mikoko yebe, ne bia bintu biwakuhuola ne bia nvinyo; bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, mukusankishe, wewe neumuhe
Badi banji kupingana baminisistila bakwabo padibo kabayi popu anyi padiku tshipumbishi
Kanungu ka Midimu ya Mulombodi wa Ditunga kayeena yikumbanangana ne mudimu mukwabo ônso wa basungudibwe, mudimu ônso wa mbulamatadi, wa busivile anyi wa busalâyi ne wa ditambakana dikwabo diônso
Hashishe nennuenzele bu munakelangana meji bua kubenzela bobo
Ekesode Kujidila kua Alona ne Bana Bandi Balume Lew
Tatu muenu wa Mose wakamuambila ne, Bualu ebu bûdi wenza kambuimpe

Mu dituku dia dikumi ne atanu dia ngondo wa muanda mutekete nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, nenudie bidia bia Yehowa matuku muanda mutekete, nenufile milambu ya kuosha ha kahia idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa bana ba balume ba tshidimu tshimue ba ngombe dikumi ne basatu ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, bintu bisatu bia dî kunu ku muana wa ngombe tô ne ku bana ba ngombe dikumi ne basatu, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko to ne ku bana ba mikoko dikumi ne banai, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha ha kahia buatshia buatshia, ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Tshintu tshionso tshidi tshituangane ne munyinyi au netshikale tshia tshijila, hamiaminabo mashi a mulambu, biamatshilau ha tshmialu, wewe neutshisukule mu muaba wa tshijila
Bantu bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi ne nkama ibidi
Neoshe dianyi dionso ha tshioshelu, bu muakenzeye ne dianyi dia mulambu wa kuikisha n au ditalala, muakuidi neafue mulambu wa ku buikila n au bubi buandi ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Noa wakenza muanda yonso yakamuambila Yehowa
Bua bualu buenu nuenu nuakasua kungenzela bibi, kadi Nzambi wakasua kuenza bimpe, wakakudimuna malu bua kusungileye bantu bu muakuenzeleye lelu
, Besalele Wakenza mushete wa acacia Buludi bua mushete buakadi coudées ibidi ne tshituha, ne butshiama buau buakadi coudée umue ne tshituha, ne bule buau bua mulu coudée umue ne tshituha

Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne tshia kupangisha muntu yônso anyi tshisumbu tshia bantu mwa kwangata bukalenga ku bukole anyi mwa kudia bukalenga bikala badiaata ku makasa bulongolodi budi mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi
Mulambu wa kunua newikale tshituha tshinai tshia dikoho ku muana wa mukoko yonso, nebahongoluele Yehowa mulambu wa nvinyo udibo banua mu muaba wa tshijila
Bantu badi ne bimanyinu bia dibendele dia tshisamba tshia Yuda ku tshisumbu ne ku tshisumbu nebashikame ku luseke lua ku esete kudi diba dihatuka

Neafile umue wa nyunyu wa nkutshi anyi wa mputu nyunyu udiye mua kuangata umue wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo wa mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bukula, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua muntu udiye musue kulengesha ku mpala kua Yehowa
Yakoba wakamukudimuna ne, Kambualu bua kumpa tshintu nansha, biwitabusha bualu ebu, meme nendishe bimuna biebe, nembilame kabidi
Kanungu ka Beena bukalenga bunene badi babweela mu midimu ya Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe pamwe ne ya tusumbu tukese twabi

Bikaleye muntu muhele udi kayi mua kusangisha bintu ebi bionso, neangate muana mulume wa mukoko umue bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji bua kunyukula kudi Yehowa bua kumubuikidila n au bubi buandi, ne tshituha tshimue tshia dikumi tshia épha tshia bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi ne dikoho dia manyi ne nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi anyi mputu nyunyu ibidi, bu bintu bidiye mua kuangata, nyunyu umue neikale bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Bantu ba mu tshisamba tshia Manashe nebashikame hehi n andi
Biasanganabo muibi mubuele mu nsubu ne biamukumabo ne biafueye, kabena benze mushiku bualu
Lea wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpa bintu bia bungi, katataka bayanyi neashale n anyi bualu bua meme nakamulelela bana ba balume basambombo, wakamuidika dina ne, Zebuluna

Lota wakabambila ne, Mukelenge wanyi, kuenji nunku, tangila, muntu webe wakamana kusangana luse ku mesu kuebe, ne wewe wakavudisha luse luebe kundi hawakasungila muoyo wanyi, tshiena mua kunyemena ku mikuna, bua bualu bubi nebunkuate, nenfue bianyi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mona, ndi mulue kudi mu ditutu difike, bua bantu bunvue hanayikila n ebe, bobo bitabushe di diebe tshiendelele
Nomba Isalele Udi Usombuela Midiyana Yehowa Wakambila Mose ne, Usombuele Bena Isalele bualu bua Bena Midiyana, ku nyima wewe neusangakene ne bankambua bebe
Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku dinai
Ndi mumanye mua kukuambila bualu, anyi
Muntu mulume udi kayi mutengula nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo, bualu bua yeye wakashiha tshihungidi tshianyi

Yehowa wakangambila ne, Kumutshinyi nansha; bualu bua nakumufila ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buandi mu tshianza tshiebe; wewe neumuenzele yeye bu mu wakenzela Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi ushikama mu Heshebona
Kanungu ka Beena Kongo bônso badi ne bukookeshi bwa kusanka ne bubanji bwa mu ditunga
Wakatshidi uya ku Sude to ne ku Betele kuakashimikeye ntenta wandi diambedi, hankatshi ha Betele ne Ai
Lea wakimita difu kabidi, wakalelela Yakoba muana muisambombo
MUTU WA MUKANDA MWISÂTU III : BIDI BITANGILA BULONGOLODI NE NGENZELU WA BUKALENGA
Wakateka tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kuosha ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshiendelele wakoshahu mulambu wa bukula bua manvua bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Bobo nebenze bungi bua tushola buakenzabo diambedi, kanuena nuhuekesha mudimu, nansha kakese, bualu bua bobo badi bafuba, badi bamba ne, Tudi basue kuya kushihela Nzambi wetu nyama
Sala wakamba ne, Nzambi wakansekesha ne bantu bonso badi bunvua lumu elu nebaseke n anyi
Elisu muana mulume wa Shedeu neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Lubena
Mose wakitabusha bua tatu andi muenu ahingane, yeye wakaya mu nshila wa ku buloba buandi
Nenubale mbingu muanda mutekete: ku tshikondo tshinudi nuhuole bintu nenubange kubala mbingu ei muanda mutekete
Elisû muana mulume wa Shedeu, mukelenge wa bana balume ba Lubena, wakafua bintu dituku dinai
Kuvudi mukashi ne muan andi mukashi bilulu, kuvudi muana mukashi wa muan andi mulume, anyi muana mukashi wa muan andi mukashi bilulu, badi bana benu, bualu ebu budi bubi
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Ubuikidile bantu aba bubi buabo, bu mudi bunene bua luse luebe lujalame, bu muwakababuikidila bubi buabo ku Ejipitu to ne katataka
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Hueka mu tshibanda, bualu bua bantu bebe bawakaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bakudiona

Mose wakambila Bena Isalele ne, Ebu mbuloba bunudi nuhiana hanuela nshobo, buloba buakuha Yehowa kudi bisamba tshitema ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshikuabo, bualu bua Bena Lubena ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ne Bena Gada ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe bakamana kuangata buhianyi buabo; bisamba bibidi ne tshituha tshia tshikuabo bakamana kuangata buhianyi buabo dishiya dia Yadene, batangilangane ne Yeleko, ku esete, kudi diba dihatuka

Bualu bua yeye wakasua batatu benu, nunku yeye wakasungula bana babo bakabalonda ku nyima, yeye nkayandi wakanuhatula mu Ejipitu ne bukole buandi bunene; bua kunuihatshila bisamba bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole ku mesu kuenu, ne bua kulua n enu mu buloba buabo bu buhianyi, bu mudi bualu ebu lelu
Bobo nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, wakabahatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua meme kuikala munkatshi muabo, ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi wabo
Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Bena Lewi nebabale mu mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena, wewe neubalengeshe, neubanyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula
Bena Isalele bakatangila bualu bukole buakenzela Yehowa Bena Ejipitu, ne bantu bonso bakatshina Yehowa, bakeyemena Yehowa ne muntu wandi Mose
Bakunvua lumu elu mu nsubu wa Palô ne, Bana babo ne Yosefe bakalua; lumu elu luakasankisha mitshima ya Palô ne ya bantu bandi
Yehowa wakambila Mose mu Midiyana ne, Ya biebe, uhingane mu Ejipitu bualu bua bantu bonso bakasua kukushiha bakafua
Bualu bukuabo, wewe kuena muanze kulua n etu mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, kuena mutuhe buhianyi bua madimi ne madimi a tumuma, udi musue kuvuisha bantu aba bafofo, anyi
Ekesode Tshioshelu tshia Milambu ya Kuosha Ek
Enza makoha makumi atanu ku mibangu ya tshilulu ne makoha makumi atanu ku mibangu ya tshilulu tshikuabo tshidi tshituangana n atshi, makoha ikale makanangane

Yeye wakavula bilulu bia mu lufuila, wakaluata bilulu bikuabo, wakadibuikila ne tshilulu tshikudika, wakashikama ku tshibi tshia ku Enayima, hehi ne nshila wa ku Timena, bualu bua yeye wakamona ne, Shela wakamana kudiunda ne kabena banze kumbakisha kudiye

Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Wambile bana benu ne, Enzai nunku, tekai majitu ha nyima ha mpunda yenu, yai bienu ku buloba bua Kanâna; nuangate tatu enu ne bantu badi mu nsubu yenu, nuhingane kundi nennuheshe bintu bimpe bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu, nenudie bintu bidi bitamba buimpe bia mu buloba

Balombodi ba kumpala ba Tubadi twa basalayi; Banzuji ba basalayi ba kulu; Balumbulwishi basomba mu nkwaasa babidi; pa bukookeshi ne bukookeshi bwa kabadi ka kabwendela, basungula kudi balumbulwishi bônso ba mu tshitupa etshi bwa tshipungu tshia bidimu bisatu; Balumbulwishi ba palake babidi, pa bukookeshi ne bukookeshi bwa Kabadi ka kabwendela, basungula kudi balumbulwishi bônso ba mu tshitupa etshi bwa tshipungu tshia bidimu bisatu; Mulumbulwishi musomba mu nkwaasa umwe, pa bukookeshi ne bukookeshi bwa Kabadi ka basalayi; Mulumbulwishi wa palake umwe pa bukookeshi ne bukookeshi bwa Kabadi ka basalayi
Bualu bua Abalahama wakitabusha dî dianyi, wakanemekela kudimusha kuanyi, ne mikenji ne mikandu yanyi ne mei anyi
Bena Peleshete bakadi n andi mukau
Yosefe udi bu ditamba dia mutshi diakakuama mamuma a bungi, udi bu mutshi hehi ne mushimi wa mai, matamba andi adi asambuka ha mutu ha lumbu
Kakahanda dime diakadi hanshi, monai, tshintu tshikese tshibulunge tshiakadi ha tshihela, tshiakadi tshikese bu dime dikuatakane ha buloba

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu edi, dîyi didi difila ngenyi miludiki mishindame idi itangila: a buludiki budikadila bwa polovensa ne bwa bitupa bia teletwale bidikadila, bwa makookeshi abio ne bwa mishimi ya mpetu yabi; b diasa dia kumpanyi,nzubu ne bishimikidi bia mbulamatadi; c bulongolodi bwa maalu a malaba, a majimba, a meetu ne a nzubu; d diambulwishangana ne dilamisha dia lupetu; e bilongelu ne bukola bwa mubidi; f bulongolodi bwa nzubu ya lukanu: g tshibûngi tshia tshidiidi ne tshia diakwila dia beena mudimu; h bukookeshi bwa kwimanyika mudimu; i bulongolodi bwa ditangalaja dia ngumu; j dikebulula dia mamanya ne dia bia kwenza nabi mudimu; k didisanga dia basumbi, basumbishi anyi bapatudi; l mianda ya dikolesha dia lungenyi ne ya difuka dia bintu; m mianda ya manayi ne lutetuku; n mianda ya madimi, ya bumunyi bwa nyama, ya bulobi bwa mishipa ne ya bumunyi bwa bia mu mâyi; o dikuba dia mwaba wa nsombelu ne dibandila dia ditunga ne bintu; p dikuba dia bisumbu bia beena butekete
Nenufile bintu ebi bidi kabiyi ne tshilema ku mutu kua milambu idibo bosha buatshia buatshia, ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Neufile muana wa mukoko mukuabo dilolo, neumufile ne mulambu wa bukula ne mulambu wa kunua, bu muwakenza dinda, bu mulambu wa dihembu dimpe, mulambu udibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia
Sala wakimita difu, wakalelela Abalahama muana mulume mu bununu buandi mu tshikondo tshiakamuambila Nzambi
Yeye wakamba ne, Dina dia Yakoba kadiena dimukumbane, anyi

Alona neamiamine mashi a nyama mishiha ha nsengu ya tshioshelu etshi bua kubuikidila bantu mibi yabo, yeye nênze bualu ebu musangu umue ku tshidimu ku tshidimu bikondo bienu bionso, tshidi tshia tshijila tshitambe kudi Yehowa
Hakalua Yosefe kudi bana babo, bakamukohola tshikowelu tshiandi, tshikowelu tshiandi tshia maboko male tshiakadiye muluate, bakamukuata, bakamuela mu mukela, mukela wakadi mûme, kamuakadi mai
Ekesode Wakenza tshioshelu tshia kuosha nyama ne mabaya a acacia
Kadi biahidieye kuvuwa bilulu biandi anyi mubidi wandi, yeye neadituadile bubi buandi
Udi ufuka bena kamama ne bena mahaha ne bantu badi mua kumona ne bantu badi bafofo nganyi
Ulekele bantu banyi baye kuntendelela
Milambu ya Masanka Majalame Dituku dia dikumi ne anai dia ngondo wa kumudilu ndituku dia kuhita kua Yehowa
Nomba Bisamba Bibidi ne Tshituha Bidi Bishikama ku Esete wa Yadene Dut
Yeye wakalala n andi butuku abu
Nzambi Wakenza nyama ya ha buloba bu mudi mishindu yai, ne bimuna bu mudi mishindu yabi, ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi bu mudi mushindu watshi
Esau wakamuambila ne, Tuyai bietu, meme nenye ku mpala kuebe
Yakoba wakamba ne, Yehowa Nzambi wa kaku wanyi Abalahama, ne Nzambi wa tatu anyi Isaka, wewe wakungambila ne, Uhingane kuebe, ne kudi bana benu, nenkuenzele bimpe
Yehowa wakambila Mose mu tshihela tshia Sinai ne, Ubale bana ba Lewi ku nsubu ya batatu abo ne ku meku abo ubale bana ba balume bonso ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu
Nuenu kanumuki ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena bua kanufu nansha, bualu bua manyi akela Yehowa adi ham bidi henu Bakenza bu muakamba Mose

Nzambi wakamuambila kabidi ne, Ndi Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso, uvulangane ukumbane ba bungi, bisamba bia bungi nebifume kudi, bakelenge nebaluhuke munda muebe Buloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka, nenkuhebu ne tunkanunuma tuebe tualonda ku nyima kuebe
Hakumukabo ku Lefidima ne hakafikabo ku tshihela tshia Sinai, bakashikama mu tshihela, Bena Isalele bakashimika ntenta ku mpala kua mukuna

Yeye wakadi ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ, bana balume ba Alona bakadi bashala, tshiji, wakamba ne, Bualu kai nuenu kanuena banze kudia mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ntshintu tshia tshijila, tshiakanuha Yehowa bua kumusha n atshi bubi bua bantu ne bua kubabuikidila n atshi bubi buabo ku mesu kua Yehowa
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nuambile Bena Isalele ne, Ebi mbintu bidi ne muoyo binudi mua kudia munkatshi mua nyama yonso idi ha buloba
Shela wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu, wakalela Ebê

Kuhita ka bena maluvu kakambila Yosefe tshilota tshiandi ne, Mu tshilota tshianyi, nakumona muonshi wa tumuma tua nvinyo ku mpala kuanyi, mudishi eu wakadi ne matamba asatu akasampila ntonga, ne bilongo biakabaluluka, biakakuama tumuma tuhia

Aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Bena Holi, mukelenge Lotana ne mukelenge Shobala ne mukelenge Sibiona ne mukelenge Ana ne mukelenge Dishona ne mukelenge Eze ne mukelenge Dishana, aba mbakelenge ba Bena Holi mu buloba bua Sei
Nenudie munyinyi wa bana benu balume ne wa bana benu bakashi

Ebi mbintu biakajidilabo n abi tshioshelu mu dituku diakelabo manyi ha mutu hatshi kudi bukelenge ba mu Isalele malonga masalame a argent dikumi ne abidi, ne malonga a ndondo a argent dikumi ne abidi, ne nkutu ya or dikumi ne ibidi; bujitu bua dilonga disalame dimue buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne bua dilonga dia ndondo dimue nshekele makumi muanda mutekete, ne argent yonso ya bintu ebi bionso yakadi nshekele binunu bibidi ne nkama mai bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu; ne nkutu ya or dikumi ne ibidi yakadi miule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, bujitu bua nkutu ne nkutu buakadi nshekele dikumi bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, or yonso ya nkutu ei yakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi abidi; ne mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia wakadi balume ba ngombe dikumi ne babidi, bimpanga dikumi ne bibidi, ne bana balume ba mikoko ba tshidimu tshimue dikumi ne babidi, ne mulambu wabi wa bukula, ne mbushi ya mpumbu ya mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi dikumi ne bibidi; ne mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala wakadi balume ba ngombe makumi abidi ne banai, ne bimpanga makumi asambombo ne mbushi ya mpumbu makumi asambombo ne bana balume ba mikoko makumi asambombo ba tshidimu tshimue
Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu etu, anukumbashe tô ne hanuahita bungi buenu bua katataka misangu tshinunu, anusankishe bu muakunulayeye
Nuenu nutumikile, nuenze mei onso anakunuambila; kanutentekashi dî dikuabo ha mutu ha mei au, kanûmushi dî ku mei au
Biamuha mukelenge wandi mukashi ne biamulelela mukashi nansha bana ba balume nansha bana ba bakashi, mukashi ne bana bandi nebikale ba mukelenge wandi, yeye muhika neaye nkayandi
Meme nembutule misoko yenu, ne bitendelelu bienu nebikale hatuhu, bintu bienu kabiena bi tua dihembu kundi
Mulau wa Midima Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe mulu, midima ikale mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bantu babubute mu midima
Au mmena a balume bakatuma Mose bua kutentekelabo buloba Mose wakidika Hoshea, muana mulume wa Nuna ne, Yoshua
Munyinyi wabi newikale webe bu mudi tshiadi tshidibo banyukula ne tshibelu tshia ku tshianza tshia bukole
Yehowa wakamba ne, Mpala wanyi neaye n ebe, ne meme nenkuhe dikisha
Bantu bonso ba ha buloba nebamanye ne, Nuenu nudi nubikidibua ku dina dia Yehowa; bobo nebanutshine
Biula nebilue ham bidi hebe ne ham bidi ha bantu bebe ne ham bidi ha bahika bebe bonso

Padi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa kabiyi bifila diandamuna pa dipatula dia lupetu lwa nzanzanza mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga, mu dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene dikala dishintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, udi wenzeja bulongolodi bwa Tshingenyingenyi budi butangila dipatula dia lupetu
Yeye wakalekela Mose
Hakashikisha Yehowa kusangana ne Abalahama yeye wakaya biandi ne Abalahama wakahingana kuandi
Kanuangatshi bintu bia buhikudi kudi mushihi wa muntu udi muhile bulelela, bualu bua nebamushihe bulelela
Yeye wakamuandamuna dî ne, Ndi munyeme ku mesu kua mukelenge wanyi mukashi Salai
Tuakanyunguluka, tuakaya mu nshila wa ku Bashana: ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakalua ne bantu bandi bonso bua kuluangana n etu ku Edelei
Badi mwa kumusungula tshia kabidi
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Kababikidi dina diebe ne Yakoba kabidi bakubikile dina ne Isalele bualu bua wewe wakuluangana ne Nzambi ne bantu, wakahatula bukole
Udi ulombola Kapangu ka ku mutu ka bilwilu
Bobo bakanyingalasha mutshima wa Isaka ne wa Lebeka

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bikala mundi wa munkatshi muenu anyi wa munkatshi mua tunkanunuma dienu munyanguke ku dilenga dia mundi mufue, anyi bikaleye muye ku luendu kule yeye neavuluke kuhita kua Yehowa
Tshidi ne bwikadi bufila kudi mêyi a ditunga
Tshituha tshia buhianyi bua Yehowa mbantu bandi; Yakoba udi buhianyi buandi
Kanudi bintu bidi kabiyi biakane

Butumbi buandi budi bu muan a bute wa ngombe, nsengu yandi idi bu nsengu ya ngombe wa mu mpata; yeye neatue bantu bonso ba ha buloba nsengu yandi, ne ba binunu makumi bia bantu ba mu Efelayima ne binunu bia bantu ba mu Manashe
Abalahama wakabela Abimeleke bualu bua dina dia mai diakanyengabo kudi bahika ba Abimeleke ku bukole
Palô wakambila Mose ne, Umuka kundi, udimuke biebe, kuntangidi kabidi, mu dituku diudi utangila mpala wanyi wewe neufue
Yeye wakateka tshianza tshiandi mu tshiadi, ne hakatshiumusheye, monai, tshianza tshiandi tshiakadi ne nsudi mutoke bu neige
bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa midimu ya mbulamatadi, nzubu ne midimu ya mbulamatadi ya mu polovensa mu dineemeka dia bulongolodi bwa ditunga;
Ei ngendu ya Bena Isalele ku bisumbu biabo, bakaya ku mpala
Bena Amaleka ne Bena Kanâna badi ku mpala kuenu, nunku nenufue ku miele ya nvita, bualu bua nuenu nuakuhidia kulonda Yehowa, nunku Yehowa kena wikala n enu
Genese Tunkanunuina tua Bana ba Noa Kul
Meme ndi ne bukole bua kukukengesha n abu, kadi Nzambi wa tatu ebe wakungambila butuku bua lelu ne, Udimuke, kuambidi Yakoba nansha dî dimpe nansha di dibi

Muntu yonso udi ulenga tshianza ham bidi ha bintu ebi neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo; muntu yonso udi utuala tshituha tshia mubidi mufue wa bintu ebi, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo

Kanungu ka Padi bibambalu biônso bibidi bitwilangana mu Tshisangilu Tshinene, bilo bia batshipwita munwamfwanka ke bidi bishaala bilo bia Tshisangilu Bulombodi badi babushiilangana kudi Mulombodi wa batshipwita munwamfwanka bamukombola kudi Mulombodi wa batshipwita bakulumpe
Tshiole tshiakadi ku nseke yonso ya buloba, ne Yosefe wakunzulula bibi bia mayeba onso, wakamanyisha Bena Ejipitu, tshiole tshiakatamba bukole mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Nzambi Udi Umueneka kudi Yakoba ku Betele Yakoba wakabika ku Be sheba wakaya mu nshila wa ku Halana Hakafikeye ku muaba mukuabo yeye wakalalaku butuku abu, bualu bua diba diakamana kubuela, yeye wakangata dibue diakadi ku muaba au, wakasamahu mutu wandi, waka lala tulu
Mu Kohata muakadi diku dia Bena Amalama ne dia Bena Yisehâ ne dia Bena Hebelone ne dia Bena Uziele au mmeku a Bena Kohata
Enza biebe nkanu ya or mai, witeka kû mikolo ya mushete, ibidi ku luseke lumue, ibidi ku luseke lukuabo
Bualu bua netubutule musoko eu, bualu bua muadi wabo wakulua munene ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne Yehowa wakatutuma bua kûshiha
Bantu bonso ba mu tshisumbu bakalua n andi ku butshika bua tshitudilu, bakamushiha ne mabue, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Genese Isaka Udi Ku Gelâ Tshiole tshiakadi mu buloba ku nyima kua tshiole tshia diambedi tshiakadiku mu matuku a Abalahama Isaka wakaya kudi Abimeleke, mukelenge wa Bena Peleshete, mu Gelâ
Bungi bua misoko mudi nuha Bena Lewi neyikale makumi anai ne muanda mukulu, nenubahe misoko ei ne buloba budi buyinyunguluka
Enza biebe bilulu bia miosa ya mbushi dikumi ne tshimue bualu bua kuteka ha mutu ha tshitendelelu
Bana balume ba Lewi bakenza bu mu di dia Mose, bantu bakafua dituku adi bu binunu bisatu
Muntu yonso udi udia dianyi dia nyama udibo bafila bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
makookeshi a bweena mwabo ne a bunkambwa;
Nunku Yehowa wakabamuangalasha ha buloba buonso, bakalekela kuasa musoko
Nakatendelela Yehowa, nakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, kushihi bantu bebe ne buhianyi buebe buwakahikula ne bukole buebe, bantu bawakahatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole
Kanuenji bilele bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu bunuakadi bashikame, kanuenji bilele bia mu buloba bua Kanâna bundualua kunuha, kanulondi mikenji yabo
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bika biebe, uhueke lubilu bualu bua bantu bebe bawakahatula mu Ejipitu, bakoneka, bakasesuka lubilu mu nshila unakabalesha; bakadienzela luhingu ne biamu biakatulabo
Halua dituku dia muanda mukulu, yeye neangatshile nansha nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi nansha mputu nyunyu ibidi, nealue n ai kudi muakuidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Kadi hanuasabuka Yadene, hanuashikama mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuhianyisha, udi unuha dikisha kudi bena lukuna bonso badi banunyunguluka, ne nenushikame talalâ

Muntu udi muakane neasangishe butue buonso bua muana wa ngombe, neabuteke ku butshika bua tshitudilu ha muaba mutoke, nebabulamine tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele bu mai a kulengesha hau bubi eu udi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Mukelenge wa Ejipitu wakabambila ne, Bualu kai, nuenu Mose ne Alona, nudi nulekesha bantu midimu yabo, yai bienu ku midimu yenu
Hakabutula Nzambi misoko ya mu Mpala, yeye wakavuluka Abalahama, wakumusha Lota munkatshi mua dikenga hakabutuleye misoko kuakadi Lota mushikame
Nebikale n anyi ne mpata musangu bule munyi bua malu a kukema onso anakenza munkatshi muabo
Wakadidika ne, Sitena
Bana ba balume ba Gada, Sifiona ne Haga ne Shuni ne Esebone ne Eli ne Alodi ne Aleli

Kanungu ka Bûngi bwabi mu tshipidi tshiônso, midimu ya kutuma dîyi dîba diônso ne miaba yônso idi ne tshia kulondeshila bipangidikilu bilelela bitangila popamwe dikumbana dia mubidi, dia kalasa kalonga, bibidilu bîmpe pamwe ne dileeja dia mpala dia momumwe dia polovensa ne polovensa
Wakimita difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamba ne, Katataka bayanyi neandamate bualu bua nakumulelela bana ba balume basatu, nunku wakadika dina diandi ne, Lewi
Yeye wakaya kudi Lakele kabidi, wakatamba kunanga Lakele ku mpala kua Lea, yeye wakakuatshila Labana mudimu bidimu muanda mutekete bakuabo
Bualu bua bobo badi bu tshisamba tshia bantu badi kabayi ne lungenyi, kabena ne dijingulula dia malu munda muabo
Wewe udi bu mai adi asaba ha kalua, atutukila muiku, wewe kuena wikala ne bukokeshi ku mutu kua bantu, bualu bua wewe wakabanda ha bulalu bua tatu ebe, wakenzahu bualu bubi wakabanda ha bulalu buanyi

Salai wakambila Abalama ne, Bubi buanyi buikale kûdi wewe nakafila mukashi muena mudimu wanyi mu tshiadi tshiebe, ne hakamoneye ne, Nakuimita difu, yeye wakundengulula, Yehowa alumbuluile tshilumbu tshidi hankatshi hetu n ebe
Kabuena nunku ne, Wewe uyaya n etu, ne tuetu, meme ne bantu bebe, netuikale bu bantu badi bahanduluka kudi bisamba bionso bia bantu badi hanshi ha buloba, anyi

Nzambi wakamuambila mu tshiota ne, Bulelela, ndi mumanye ne wewe wakuenza bualu ebu mu buakane bua mu mutshima webe, nakakuhidisha kabidi bua kuenza bualu bubi ku mesu kuanyi, nunku tshiakuitabusha bua wewe kumulenga tshianza
Mose wakambila Eleazâ muakuidi ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, ne bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ya bisamba bia Bena Isalele bua bualu buabo

Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Wimane ha buihi ne mulambu webe wa kuosha ha kahia ne meme nengumuke, bumue Yehowa nealue kusangakena hanyi, nenkuambile malu onso adiye ungambila Yeye wakaya kulu ku muaba wakadi mutuhu
Binatuisha muele wanyi wa nvita, ne bingolola tshianza tshianyi bua kulumbulula bilumbu, meme nensombuele badi n anyi lukuna, neafute badi n anyi tshiji
Alona wakasaku, bakamujika; ne Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, wakenza mudimu wandi wa buakuidi
Nenuhatuke dituku edi mu ngondo wa Abiba
Tshibangidilu tshia bukelenge buandi tshiakadi Babela ne Eleke ne Akada ne Kalene mu buloba bua Shinâ
Kanudisangishidi manananshi adi atua dihembu nunku ne bintu ebi, manananshi au neikale a tshijila kudi Yehowa
Meme nengendakane munkatshi muenu, nengikale Nzambi wenu, ne nuenu nenuikale bantu banyi
Bobo bakahaula mpala yabo hanshi
Bakatekahu muonshi wa bleu muhindakana, bakatshisuika ha tshilulu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Yosefe wakatuma bana babo nunku, bakaya yeye wakabambila ne, Nudimuke, kanutandanganyi mu nshila
Hashishe nakanuambila ne, Kanuikadi ne buowa, kanubatshinyi

Yeye neafile mulambu eu bua muaba wa tshijila, bualu bua Bena Isalele kabena bakane, ne bualu bua disambuka diabo dia mikenji, ne bualu bua malu mabi abo onso, nênze nunku bua kulengesha ntenta wa kusangakena udi munkatshi muabo, munkatshi mua bubi buabo
Mwâna yônso udi ne tshia kubweela mu tulasa tupwekela ne kabidi kabeena mwa kufutshila tulasa etu mu bilongelu bia mbulamatadi to
Nuende bienu mu nshila wakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua nuenu nuikale ne muoyo, ne bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu mu buloba bunudi nuhiana
Bualu bua bobo bakungambila ne, Utuenzele nzambi idi mua kuya ku mpala kuetu, bua muntu eu Mose wakatumikila mu buloba bua Ejipitu, katuena bamanye bualu buakumukuata
Yehowa wakamueneka mu Ntenta mu difutu: difutu diakimana ku mutu kua tshibi tshia Ntenta
Nuenu nenusankishibue ku mutu kua bantu bonso: nansha mulume nansha mukashi munkatshi muenu anyi munkatshi mua bimuna bienu nebikale nkumba
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kubweja mianda ya mapa a muntu yônso mu ndongamu yônso idi itangila dilongesha dia beena bilwilu , bampulushi ne beena midimu ya bukubi bwa ditunga

Bintu bionso biakadi ha buloba biakafua, ne nyunyu ne bimuna ne nyama ne bintu bionso budi bidikoka hanshi ne muntu yonso, bintu bionso biakadi ne muhuya wa muoyo munda muabi bia ha buloba bume biakafua

Tshintu etshi netshikale tshituha tshia Alona ne tshia bana bandi balume kudi Bena Isalele tshiendelele, bualu bua tshidi tshituha tshia bakuidi tshia mu mulambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala ya Bena Isalele, tshidi mulambu udibo babisha mulu kudi Yehowa
Hanukonka muan enu wa balume ne, Bualu ebu ntshinyi

Genese Yakoba Udi Wamba Malu Alualua bua Bana Bandi Yakoba Wakabikila bana bandi bonso, wakamba ne, Nudisangishe hamue bua meme kunuambila bua malu alualua kunudi mu matuku adi kayi manze kulua, Nuenu bana balume ba Yakoba, nudisangishe hamue, unvuai di telejai matshu kudi Isalele tatu enu
Pagiele, muana mulume wa Okelana mukelenge wa bana ba Ashe, wakafua bintu dituku dia dikumi ne dimue
Batatu benu bakenza nunku hanakabatuma ku Kadeshe bânea bua kutentekelabo buloba
Mose wakaya ne mulangala wa Nzambi mu tshianza tshiandi
Mose wakambila Alona ne, Ambila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele ne, Luai ha buihi ku mpala kua Yehowa, bualu bua yeye wakunvua tshitanu tshienu
Kabiela nu bwîlà Mulopo mu mpangà bantu
Hakamanabo kumujika, Yosefe ne bana babo ne bantu bakaya n andi bua kujika tatu wandi bakahingana mu Ejipitu

Hakadi Noa mu tshidimu tshia nkama isambombo tshia muoyo wandi, mu ngondo muibidi ne dituku dia dikumi ne muanda mutekete dia ngondo, mu dituku adi mene, mishimi yonso ya mu mai manene yakahongoloka ne bibi bionso bia mu diulu biakunzuludibua

Ku tshikondo atshi Yehowa wakajidila tshisamba tshia Lewi, bua kutualabo mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne bua kuimana ku mpala kua Yehowa bua kamuenzela mudimu, ne bua kuvudishila bantu disanka mu dina diandi, bu mudibo benza lelu
Yosefe wakasangisha matete bu bungi bua nsenga ya kukala kua mai manene, akatamba bungi, yeye wakalekela kua bala, kabakamanya mua kuabala
Ka dî binuahidia kuenza nunku, monai, nuakuenzela Yehowa bualu bubi, numanye bienu ne, Bualu bubi buenu nebunukuate bulelela
Bana ba Midiyana bakadi Eha ne Ehê ne Hanoka ne Abida ne Eleda Bana aba bonso bakadi bana ba Ketula
Dana neikale bu nyoka mu nshila, ne bu ntoka mu nshila udi usuma kabalu ku mijilu ya bikono, ne muntu udi ubanda ha nyima udi uhona hanshi bualame
Alona wakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi, kuikadi ne tshiji tshikole, wewe udi mumanye bantu aba, badi ne mitshima yabo ku malu mabi
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Bena nvita badi munkatshi muenu bangate bintu bia nvita bualu bua kushikisha dikenga didi Yehowa musue kusombuela n adi Bena Midiyana

Mose wakambila Bena Isalele ne, Yehowa wakamana kuhikula Besalele, muana mulume wa Uli, muana mulume wa Hû wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, wakamûsha tente ne Nyuma wa Nzambi ne lungenyi lule lua kuenza n alu midimu yonso, ne lua kulongolola n alu mudimu muimpe wa bintu bia or ne bia argent ne bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mudimu wa kusonga mabue ne wa kusonga mabaya ne midimu yonso ya bantu badi ne lungenyi lule
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Uhatule muntu eu muena bihendu ku butshika bua tshitudilu, bantu bonso bakunvua mei andi batentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu handi ne bantu bonso bamukume ne mabue
Ne tangila, meme nenkoleshe mitshima ya Bena Ejipitu, nebayemu ku nyima kua Bena Isalele, nengangate butumbi bualu bua Palô ne bisumbu biandi bionso ne makalu andi ne masalayi andi adi enda ha tubalu
Yosefe wakasangisha argent yonso yakadi mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ya mu buloba bua Kanâna ku bintu bia kudia biakasumbabo, Yosefe wakalua ne argent yonso mu nsubu wa Palo
Batanu benu nebihate bantu lukama, ne bantu benu lukama nebihate binunu dikumi bia bantu, badi n enu lukuna nebafue ku muele wa nvita
Dina dia muana mukashi wa Ashê diakadi Sela
Wambile bantu ne, Nudijidile bua makelela, nenudie munyinyi, bualu bua nuenu nuakudila mu matshu a Yehowa ne, Udi utudisha munyinyi nganyi
Lubena ikale biandi ne muoyo, kafu nansha, bantu bandi kabikadi banya banya
Mu dituku dia dikumi ne anai dia ngondo eu ku dilolo, nebadie mu tshikondo tshiaku, bobo nebenze bu mudi mei onso ne mikenji yonso bia kuhita kua Yehowa
Tunkanunuina tua Tela Ei idi ndelanganyi ya tunkanunuina tua Tela

Matuku muanda mutekete nenufile milambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, dituku dia muanda mukulu nedikale dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila kunudi, nenufile mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, edi ndisangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Utshidikishe nseke mai mikosolola hankatshi bua kuikala nseke ibidi ya bunene bumue, buludi buatshi nebuikale bu ntanta wa tshianza, ne butshiama buatshi bu ntanta wa tshianza

Nenudie mampa adi kayi ne luevene to matuku muanda mutekete, dituku dia kumudilu nenumushe luevene mu nsubu yenu, muntu yonso udi udia mampa adi neluevene ku dituku dia kumudilu to matuku muanda mutekete, nebamumushe munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Abalahama wakateka bana ba mikoko ba mashina muanda mutekete ha buabo

Bualu bua Yehowa nealumbuluile bantu bandi bilumbu biabo, neakudimune mutshima wandi bualu bua bantu bandi, hatangileye ne bukole buabo buakujimina, ne kakuena muntu udi mushale muhika anyi mudishikaminyi

Muntu udi musue kudilengesha neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neabeye nsuki yandi yonso, neadioweshe ne mai, yeye neikale muakane; ku nyima nealue biandi mu tshitudilu, kadi neashikame ku mbelu kua ntenta wandi matuku muanda mutekete

Mu bulongolodi bwenza kudi Dîyi dikulu ne kudi mêyi a ditunga, Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika kadi katangila mu tshitupa tshia kumpala ne mu tshia ndekeelu bibawu bibunda kudi: batshipwita munwamfwanka ne batshipwita bakulumpe; beena Bukalenga bunene bônso ba ditunga pa kumbusha Minisitila Kavulambedi; beena Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu; balumbulwishi ba ku Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika ne balumbulwishi ba ku palake waku; beena Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi ne beena palake mulamatshisha ku Kapangu aka; beena ku Kapangu ka mianda ya lupetu ne beena palake mulamatshisha ku Kapangu aka; balombodi ba kumpala ba Tubadi twa kabwendela ne bamfumu ba palake milamatshisha ku Tubadi etu; balombodi ba kumpala ba Tubadi twa Mbulamatadi twa kabwendela ne bamfumu ba palake milamatshisha ku Tubadi etu; banguvenêla, bindonda bia banguvenêla ba polovensa ne baminisitila ba polovensa; balombodi ba Bisangilu bia polovensa

Eu newikale mukenji wa tshiendelele kudibo muntu udi umiamine mai a kubalengesha n au, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, muntu udi ulenga mai a kubalengesha n au tshianza neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo
Yuda wakamba ne, Yeye ashale n atshi, bua bundu kabutukuatshi, mona, nakamutumina muana wa mbushi eu, ne wewe kuakamusangana
Nutumikile mei anyi
Tshisamba tshia Benyamina Abidana muana mulume wa Gideoni neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Benyamina

Bana ba Gada ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo, ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita; bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Gada binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama isambombo ne makumi atanu
Bakaya ne Yosefe mu Ejipitu
Nunku kanuena nuona buloba bunudi nushikamamu, bualu bua mashi adi ona buloba, kabena bamanye mua kuhikula buloba hakamata mashi, anu ku mashi a muntu wakamatshisha mashi
Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Naho ne Nzambi wa tatu wabo ikale mulumbuluishi hankatshi hetu Yakoba wakaditshiha ku ditshina dia tatu wandi Isaka
Genese Yakoba Udi Uya mu Ejipitu ne Bantu Bandi Bonso Isalele wakabisha luendu luandi wakangata bintu bionso biakadiye n abi, wakalua ku Be sheba wakashihela Nzambi wa tatu andi Isaka nyama
Nyama yonso idi ne mikono mihanduluke ne idi ihingishilula bintu mukana ibidia kabidi, nudi mua kudia nyama ei
Ekesode Dikengeshibua dia Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu Â mmena a bana balume ba Isalele bakalua mu Ejipitu, muntu ne muntu ne ba mu nsubu wandi bakalua ne Yakoba
Isalele wakamba ne, Nuakungenzela bibi nunku, hanuakuambila mulume au ne, Tudi ne muakuny etu, munyi
Bakambila Lebeka mei a Esau, muan andi muan a bute yeye Wakabikila Yakoba muan andi muan a mukala, wakamuambila ne Esau mukulu ebe udi welangana meji a kukushiha bua kutokesheye munda muandi
Nunku Abalama wakaya bu muakamba Yehowa, ne Lota wakaya n andi Abalama wakadi ne bidimu makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu hakumukeye mu Halana
Isalele wakamona bana babidi ba Yosefe, wakamukonka ne, Aba mbanganyi
Nunku nuenze bualu, ebu bu tshilele tshienu mu ngondo watshi ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
lupetu lusomba munda mwa ditunga bwa majinga a polovensa;

Bikaleye muhele kayi ne bungi bua bintu biwakamubadila, nunku nebamushikike ku mpala kua muakuidi, ne muakuidi neatuangane n andi mushinga, muakuidi neatuangane ne muena kuditshiha mushinga ku bungi bua bintu bidiye n abi
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Dîyi didi dileeja ngikadilu wa bamfumu ba kabukulu
Kola wakabikila tshisumbu tshonso tshia batomboki ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka kudi tshisumbu tshonso
Batele bilulu bikese ha maha bua kutuangasha bituha bia efoda bibidi
Bintu bionso bidibo bakuata n abi mudimu mu tshiendelele ne milonda yonso yatshi, ne milonda yonso ya luhangu luatshi, nebikale bia tshiamu tshia mitaku
Nsongakashi eu wakadi ne mpala muimpe be, wakatshidi kamama, kayi muanze kumanyibua kudi mulume, yeye wakahueka ku mushimi wa mai, wakasuna mulondo wandi tente, wakabanda kabidi
Mose wakaya ne bualu ebu ku mpala kua Yehowa
Kalongu kisâtu : Bidi bitangila bulongolodi bwa momumwe pankatshi pa Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne Bukalenga bunene

Mona, meme nakusungula Oholiaba, muana mulume wa Ahisamaka, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana bua kumumatshisha, nakabuesha lungenyi lule mu mitshima ya bantu bonso badi ne meji bua bobo benze bintu bionso binakukuambila
Mose wakadila kudi Yehowa, wakamba ne, Nengenzele bantu aba tshinyi

Tuhanza tunai tuakadi tuzola ne bilongo bia amande ne tshihunga tshia or ne tshilongo, tshihunga tshia or tshiakadi hankatshi ha mahu abidi, hankatshi ha mahu abidi, hankatshi ha mahu abidi, ku mahu asambombo
Muntu yonso udi ulenga bulalu buandi tshianza neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale mukoya tô ne dilolo
Mukelenge wa Sodoma wakambila Abalama ne, Umpe bantu, wewe wangate biuma
Genese Nzambi Udi Ubikila Abalama Yehowa wakambila Abalama ne, Umuka mu musoko webe ne kudi bana benu ne ku nsubu wa tatu ebe, ya biebe mu muaba undualua kukulesha
Bakambilangana ne, Tuyai kuasa musoko ne tshibumba tshile, musonga watshi neufike mulu mu matutu tuikale ne dina dia butumbi, bua katutangadiki ha buloba buonso
Budi bumanyisha Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne batshipwita bakulumpa
ne mutshima wanyi newikale ne muoyo
Nakanuambila ku tshikondo atshi ne, Tshiena mua kunutuala nkayanyi: Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakunukumbasha ba bungi, ne monai, lelu nudi bu bungi bua mitoto ya mulu

Nententekashe malu mabi ha mitu habo, nembase mikete yanyi; nzala neyibanyange, makala a kahia ne makenga makole neabashihe, nentume nyama ya menu makole munkatshi muabo, ne lulengu lua nyoka idi idikoka hanshi
Kahia ka ha tshioshelu kakajimi nansha, muakuidi neatekehu nkunyi dinda ne dinda, nealonge mulambu wa kuosha ha tshioshelu, neoshe dianyi dia mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala
Kanuhu Muena Lewi udi ku mbelu kuenu muoyo; bualu bua yeye kena ne tshituha tshiandi ne buhianyi buandi kunudi
Teka tshifulu ha mutu handi ne tshitotolo tshia tshijila ha tshifulu
Wakalua ne mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi; ne Alona ne bana bandi balume bakatentekasha bianza biabo ha mutu ha ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi

Bikala mulume eu wa ku nyima mumukine, mumufundile mukanda wa kushiha dibaka kabidi, mumuheu mu bianza biandi, mumûmushe mu nsubu wanyi, anyi biafua mulume eu wa ku nyima wakamuangata bu mukashi wandi, mulume wa diambedi, wakamûmusha mu nsubu wandi, kena mua kumuangata bu mukashi wandi kabidi, bualu bua mukashi wakumana kunyangisha; bualu ebu budi bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa

Biatangila muakuidi ne disama kadiena ditampakane mu tshilulu, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama nansha mu tshintu tshia tshiseba, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Nuvuwe tshintu tshidi ne disama, ne yeye neatshiteke ha buatshi matuku muanda mutekete makuabo
Muan a bute wakalela muana mulume, wakamulelela dina ne, Moaba, yeye wakadi nkambua wa Bena Moaba to ne lelu
Aba mbana balume ba Sheme ku meku abo ne ku miaku yabo ne ku maloba abo ne ku bisamba biabo
Bobo nebabalonde ku nyima, tshisumbu tshisatu
Wele manananshi ku mulongo ne ku mulongo, manananshi neikale bu tshivulukidi ha mampa bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Meme Yehowa nakuamba, nengenzele bantu aba bonso badi bampidia nunku, nebajimine mu tshihela etshi, nebafuemu
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka Minisitila anyi meena kavulambedi wa mu tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia batshipwita munwa mfwanka panyima pa diumvwangana dienda ne beena tshitupa etshi
bishimikidi bia mianda ya manga ne ya dinanga dia bantu;
Enza makoha ne muonshi wa bleu ku mibangu ya bilulu idi ituangana, ku tshisumbu ne ku tshisumbu tshia bilulu

Muntu yônso, mweena mbulamatadi yônso kabeena mwa kumukanyika mwa kuneemekayi dîyi didibo bamutumina pikala dîyi edi kadiyi dineemeka pa butooke mapa a muntu yônso, budikadidi bwa bantu bônso ne bibidilu bia mulowo
Mikalu ya mapa aa idi anu eyi idi mielela bisumbu bia tshidiidi biônso ne midimu yaabi kudi Dîyi dikulu ne mêyi ne mikandu
Yehowa neamutahulule munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele bua kamuenzela bibi, bu mudi milau yonso ya tshihungidi etshi mifunda mu mukanda eu wa mikenji
Muntu yônso udi mwa kuya ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu bwa kuleeja dibenga kumvwangana dia Dîyi dikulu ne dipangadika diônso dia bwenji anyi dia buludiki
Mulombodi wa Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu badi bamusungula kudi bakwende bwa tshipungu tshia bidimu bisatu tshidibo mwa kwambulula musangu umwe

Bakenza nunku, Alona wakolola tshianza tshiandi ne mulangala wandi, wakakuma dinfuenkenya dia buloba ne nkusu yakadi kudi bantu ne kudi nyama, dinfuenkenya dionso dia ha buloba diakakudimuka nkusu mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Biabuela muntu mu nsubu mu matuku akinshileye bibi, yeye neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne dilolo
Hakatshidi munyinyi mukana, diambedi bobo kabayi banze kûdia ku menu, tshiji tshiakakuata Yehowa bua bantu, ne Yehowa wakasamisha bantu bikole
Abalahama wakamba bua Sala, mukashi wandi, ne, Yeye udi muan etu mukashi, ne Abimeleke, mukelenge wa Gelâ, wakatuma bantu, bakangata Sala
Tshidi ne mudimu wa kukookesha ne kushiindika budikadidi ne dikuba dia butshikuma mbila pamwe ne mishindu yônso ya dimanyisha tshibûngi maalu mu kaneemu ka dîyi

Kanungu ka Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi bisangila mu bukookeshi bônso misangu ibidi bwa midimu ya tshibidilu ku tshidimu: a musangu wa kumpala udi ubanga mu matuku a lwîshi ne ujika mu matuku a kashipu nkenza ; b musangu mwibîdi udi ubanga mu matuku a tshimungu mukaji ne ujika mu matuku a kaswa bitenda
Hawalua ne mulambu wa bukula budibo balamba mu nfulu, nebuikale mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene busangisha ne manyi, anyi mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene idi ne manyi mela ha mutu
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yosefe ne wa mu tshisamba tshia Manashe, Gadi, muana mulume wa Susi

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula; ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi; ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia; ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Pagiele, muana mulume wa Okelana
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ndi muan ebe, muan a bute Esau
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi pende ne tshia kumanya mianda
Padibio bienzeka Bia kumanyishangana nabi mianda Bienji ne bisumbu Mpwila mambu , tshimenga tshia ku mutu kwa ditunga
Nutumikile mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nuende mu nshila yandi, numutshine
Beena Bilo badi babasungula mu mushindu udibo balongolola kudi mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu
Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu nkadi ne tshia kutangila dilomba adi, mu tshipungu tshia ngondo umwe
Nyuma wakashala kudibo, bakadi ne mena abo mafunda, ka dî kabakaya ku Ntenta, bakamba di dia Nzambi mu tshitudilu
dijalamija dia ditunga dijima;
Mulau ukukuate, Moaba

Kanungu ka Midimu ya beena Bukalenga bunene kayeena yikumbanangana ne mudimu mukwabo ônso wa basungudibwe,mudimu ônso wa mbulamatadi,wa bweena musoko anyi wa busalâyi ne wa ditambakana dikwabo diônso to, pa kumbusha midimu ya budimi, ya matanda, ya dikolesha dia lungenyi, ya bulongeshi ne ya dikebulula dia mamanya
Bela, muana wa Beô, wakakokesha mu Edome, dina dia musoko wandi ne, Dinehaba
Wakidika dina dia mai ne, Eseke; bualu bua bobo bakatandangana n andi
Uleshe kanemu kudi muntu udi ne nsuki yandi mitoke tô, unemeke muntu mununu, utshine Nzambi webe meme ndi Yehowa

Budi bwangata mu bitupa biônso, bu mudi mu tshitupa tshia maalu a bweena mwaabo, a tshidiidi, a bubanji, a nsombelu ne a bunkambwa, mapangadika ônso adi akumbana bwa kujadika divunguluka dijima dia mukaji ne ditwisha diende dia maboko ku ditantshisha dia ditunga
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne tshimue ne nkama itanu

Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi usanganyibwa pa tshipapu tshia ditunga udi ne bukookeshi bwa kwendakanapu mudilekelela, bukookeshi bwa kwasapu lwende lubanza, bwa kumbuka ne kupingana, bilondeshila makanyika a mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga
Kanutahi mputu ham bidi henu bua kujinga n ai bantu bafue, kanutahi nsalu ham bidi henu meme ndi Yehowa
Yehowa neambe ne, Nzambi yabo idi kudi kunyi, ne dibue diabo diakadibo batekemena didi hanyi, yakadia manyi a nyama yakadibo bamushihela, yakanua nvinyo yakafilabo
Bakamukudimuna di ne, Tudi ba ku Halana
Yehowa wakatamba kusankisha mukelenge wanyi, yeye wakulua muntu munene, wakumuka bisumbu bia mikoko ne bia ngombe, ne argent ne or, ne bahika balume ne bahika bakashi, ne tumelo ne nyama ya mpunda
Yosefe wakambila Palô ne, Kammeme to, kadi Nzambi neahe Palô kujingulula kudi ne ditalala
Wakenza makunshi a acacia anai, wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ku makunshi, akadi ne bitubuidi bia or, wakenza nkanu yau mai ya tshiamu tshia argent
Hakaya Labana bua kukoseye mikoko miosa, Lakele wakiba mpingu ya mu nsubu wa tatu andi
Bu mu dî dia Alona ne bana bandi balume Bena Gêshona nebenze mudimu wabo, nebatuale majitu abo; nuenu nenubaleshe majitu abo
Kanuenji nzambi mikuabo bua kuikala hehi n anyi nzambi ya tshiamu tshia argent anyi nzambi ya tshiamu tshia or, kanuyenji

Mose wakabatuma ku nvita, bantu tshinunu ku tshisamba ku tshisamba, Pinehasa, muana mulume wa Eleazâ muakuidi, wakaya n abo ne bintu bikuabo bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne mpungi ya kuela n ai dî dikole mu tshianza tshiandi

Kadi bikala mushihi mubi tshile butshika bua musoko wakanyemeneye, ne bikala musombuedi musangakene n andi ku butshika bua musoko wandi wa kunyemena, ne bikala musombuedi mushihe mushihi wa muntu, yeye kena ne bualu bubi, bualu bua yeye wakadi ne bualu bua kuikala mu musoko wa kunyemena to ne bakafua muakuidi munene, kadi ku nyima kua lufu lua muakuidi munene mushihi udi mumanye mua kuhingana ku buloba bua buhianyi buandi
Hakatangila bantu bonso ne Alona wakafua, Bena Isalele bonso bakamujinga tô matuku makumi asatu
mianda ya bunkanbwa,monima ya beena ditunga ne mpangu idibo bâmba ne idi yambulwisha ditunga dijima
Kuenzedi muenyi bualu bubi, kumukengeshi, bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Bikaleye kayi ne bintu bia kubuhikula n abi, nunku buloba buakahaneye nebuikale mu bianza bia muntu wakabusumba tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, mu tshidimu tshia disanka dinene buloba nebuhikudibue ne yeye neahingane mu buloba buandi
Yeye Wakabikila tumelo binu hanshi ku butshika bua musoko hehi ne mushimi wa mai dilolo ha diba diyaya bakashi bua kusunabo mai

Lubena wakabambila ne, Kanumatshishi mashi andi hanshi, tumuele mu mukela eu udi mu tshihela, kadi kanumulengi tshianza nansha, yeye wakamba nunku bua kumusungileye mu bianza biabo ne bua kumuhingasheye kudi tatu wandi

Mose wakangata argent ya buhikudi bua bantu bakahita Bena Lewi bungi; yeye wakangata nshekele kudi ban a bute ba Bena Isalele bu tshinunu tshimue ne nkama isatu ne makumi asambombo ne itanu, bu nshekele udibo bafile mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Nunku Nzambi wakumusha bimuna bia tatu enu, wakubimpa
Hashishe muan a bute udi mukashi eu ulela nebamuidike dina dia muan abo wakafua; bua dina diandi kadijiminyi mu Isalele
Mbulamatadi udi ushindika ne muntu yônso udi mwa kwikala ne bintu biende nkayende anyi ne bintu bia mu tshibûngi bipeta bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu anyi bunkambwa
Noa wakadi ne bidimu nkama isambombo hakaloka nvula ha buloba
Katataka, Yehowa, tuakulua ne bintu biakaboba diambedi mu buloba buwakutuha
Ngombe minyane yakadia ngombe muanda mutekete yakadi midiunde ne ya manyi

Kadi bakashi benu ne bana benu bakese ne bimuna ndi mumanye ne, Nudi ne bimuna bia bungi nebishale mu misoko nakanuha, tô ne haha Yehowa baha benu dikisha bu nuenu, ne bobo badi bahiana buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ubaha, dishiya dia Yadene; hashishe nenuhingane muntu ne muntu ku buhianyi buandi bunakamuha
Miehu mikese yakamina miehu yakadi miakane
Kadi wewe wimane biebe hehi n anyi, nenkuambile mei onso, ne mikenji ne malu bindi musue wewe kubamanyisha, bua bobo babienze mu buloba bundi nnuha

Wakumukaku, wakaya ku Bê sheba Yehowa wakamueneka kudiye butuku abu mene, wakamba ne, Ndi Nzambi wa tatu webe Abalahama, kutshinyi, bualu bua meme ndi n ebe, nenkusankishe, nenkumbashile tunkanunuina tuebe bualu bua muntu wanyi Abalahama
Nomba Yehowa Udi Ubaha Mai ku Dibue Bena Isalele bonso bakalua mu tshihela tshia Sina mu ngondo wa kumudilu, bakashikama mu Kadesha, Mîyama wakafua, bakamujikamu

Neangate mashi a muana mulume wa ngombe, neamiamine mashi ne munu wandi ku tshibuikilu tshia mushete ku luseke lua ku esete, neamiamine mashi ku mpala kua tshibuikilu tshia mushete ne munu wandi kabidi misangu muanda mutekete
Nganyi udi bu wewe Yehowa, munkatshi mua nzambi mikuabo

Mukanda mufila ku dijooja dia tshiakabidi badi bawanyisha kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa anyi mu mushindu wawu wa ku tshibangilu, anyi panyima pa diwushintulula dilomba kudi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beena Tshibambalu etshi
