Badi ne tshia kumukuba bu mudibo bakuba bantu ne makanyika mafila mu ndondu ne mêyi
Kamushintakashi nansha, nyama muimpe ku nyama mubi anyi nyama mubi ku nyama muimpe, biashintakasheye nyama ku nyama mukuabo, nyama eu ne nyama wakashintakasheye handi nebikale bia tshijila
Yosefe wakabakonka ne, Bualu ebu bunuakuenza budi munyi
Lewitiki Bintu Bidi Bimpe mua Kudia ne Bidi Kabiyi Bimpe Dut
Abalahama wakabaka mukashi mukuabo dina diandi Ketula
Mukenji umue newikale kûdi ne kudi muntu muledibue mu buloba buenu ne muenyi udi ushikama munkatshi muenu
Bobo nebadie bintu abi bidibo babuikidila n abi bantu mibi yabo, bua kubajidila ne kubalengesha kudi Yehowa, kadi muenyi kena mua kudia bintu ebi, bualu bua bidi bia tshijila

Bobo bakamba ne, Umuke Bobo bakamba ne, Mulumiana eu, wakahatula bua kushikameye kunoko, ne katataka yeye udi musue kuikala bu mulumbuluishi, nenkuenzele bualu bubi budi butamba bualu butudi tubenzela bobo
Badi babasungula mu tshipungu tshibîdi ku Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa
Muntu yonso utu wenza malu au, malu au mabi, udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata Alona ne bana bandi balume badi n andi ne bilulu ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu ne mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne bimpanga bibidi ne tshisaka tshia mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, ubikile bantu bonso ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Bobo nebalame mushete wa Nzambi ne mesa ne minda ne bioshelu ne malonga adibo benza n au mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne tshilulu tshidibo bateka ku mpala kua muaba wa tshijila
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuela di difume mu diulu ne, Abalahama, Abalahama, yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Nubivuluke, nubienze; bualu ebu budi lungenyi luenu ne budimu buenu ku mesu kua bantu badi bunvua mikenji ei yonso, badi bamba ne, Bulelela, bantu aba banene badi ne lungenyi ne budimu

Biafila muntu mulambu eu bua kubakidila Nzambi, yeye nealue kabidi ne mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene busangisha ne manyi, ne mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene miela manyi ha mutu, ne mikata ya bukula bubotesha budi busangisha ne manyi
Kabena mua kuhikula muntu mujidile munkatshi mua bantu bua kuhishibua, nebamushihe
Nakanuambila ku tshikondo atshi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuha buloba abu bu buhianyi: bena nvita nebasabuke ne bintu bia nvita ku mpala kua bana benu ba Bena Isalele
Ushikishe lumingu lua muana eu, hashishe, netukuhe muana mukuabo kabidi biwankuatshila mudimu bidimu muanda mutekete bikuabo
Bakashikama hehi ne Yadene, ku Bete yishimota tô ne ku Abele shitima, mu mpata ya Moaba
Benyamina udi bu nkashama udi ne luonji, udi udia bintu dinda, ne dilolo udi ubiabanya

Yeye wakayikila n abo, wakabambila ne, Binuitabusha bua meme kujika tshitalu etshi ku mesu kuanji, nungunvuile, nungakuile kudi Efelona, muana wa Sohâ bua yeye ampe lubuebue lua ku Makepela, ludiye n alu ku mpenge kua budimi buandi, yeye alumpe ku mesu kua buonso buenu ku mushinga udiye musue wa muaba wa kujikamu tshitalu
Kadi Yehowa wa kakolesha mutshima wa Palo, yeye kakabalekela
Kadi yeye bakaha bana balume ba Kohata tshintu, bualu bua bobo bakadi ne mudimu ne bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bakabituala ha maha abo
Tukanda badi batweela padibo babiikila dîna dîyi dikola, anyi tshianza muulu, anyi pa disomba ne dijuuka kulu ,anyi pa kabeji ka muntu pa nkayenda,anyi ku mushindu wa biamwa bia nzembu
Kubinaminyi, kubitendeledi, bua meme Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ndi bianyi Nzambi wa mukau, ntu ngatumina bana ba tshihungu tshisatu anyi tshinai badi hanyi lukuna mibi ya batatu abo
Biakuma ngombe muhika mulume anyi muhika mukashi ne nsengu, nebafute mukelenge wabo nshekele makumi asatu ya argent, nebakume ngombe ne mabue
Nzambi wakunvua kulomba kua Lea, yeye wakimita difu, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume muitanu
Hakatshimonabo, Bena Isalele bakakemangana ne, Etshi ntshinyi
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita Tuludiki twa munda badi batutangila bu tukumbana
Yeye wakabutula misoko ai ne mpata yonso, ne bantu bonso ba mu misoko, ne bintu biakadi bidiunda mu buloba
Yehowa udi muena nvita, Yehowa ndina diandi

Kanungu ka Bûngi bwabo mu tshipidi tshiônso, midimu ya kutuma dîyi dîba diônso ne miaba yônso, idi ne tshia kulondeshila bipangidikilu bilelela bitangila popamwe dikumbana dia mubidi,dia kalasa kalonga ne bibidilu bîmpe pamwe ne dileeja dia mpala dia momumwe dia polovensa ne polovensa
Nenuikale ne disanka mu misoko yenu, nenuikale ne disanka mu madimi enu

Mikanda ya luseka lwa dîyi ikâdiku mu mianda eyi badi mwa kuyishiintulula kudi dipangadika padi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu, ku dilomba dia Bukalenge bunene, kamba ne idi luseka lwa tuludiki bilondeshila tulongu tudi kulu
Nenusungule misoko ya kunyemena isambombo
Kanulu ne tshintu tshidi tshitonda Yehowa mu nsubu muenu bua kufuanangana n atshi: nuhidie tshintu atshi, nuikale n atshi lukuna; atshi ntshintu tshibihe tshia tshijila
Yeye wakambila bantu ne, Nudilongolole ku dituku disatu, kanuyi ha buihi ne bakashi nansha
Nzambi wakamueneka kudi Belâma wakamuambila ne, Balume aba badi kuebe mbantu kai
Tshitupa tshibîdi : Bidi bitangila makookeshi a bubanji, a nsombelu mu musoko ne a bunkambwa
Isaka wakatamba kuhampakana, wakamba ne, Muntu kai wakangata munyinyi wa ntole, wakulua n au kundi, ne nakudia diambedi wewe kuyi muanji kulua, ne nakamuvudishila disanka
Yehowa avudishile bintu biandi disanka, itabushe mudimu wa bianza biandi: atshibule nyima ya bantu badi bahika ku mpala kuandi, ne ya badi n andi lukuna bua kababiki kabidi
Ubiteke milongo ibidi, mulongo isambombo mulongo isambombo, ha mesa adi ku mpala kua Yehowa
Yakoba wakadi ne tshiji, wakatanda ne Labana, wakebesha Labana ne, Dihanga bianyi didi hanyi, anyi bubi buanyi budi hanyi bua wakundonda lukasa nunku
Bakumuka mu Halada bakashikama mu Makehelota
Umuambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu, wakuntuma kudi ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye bua kuntendelela mu tshihela, ku diambedi to ne mpindiu wewe kuena muanze kunvua
Wewe newenze malonga ne nkuta ne mpanza ne bihanza bia or mutambe buimpe
Muan abo mulume ne mamu wa Lebeka bakamba ne, Nsongakashi anji kushala matuku makese, nansha dikumi, hashishe yeye neaye
Muntu eu Mose wakadi ne kalolo be, wakatamba bantu bonso ba ha buloba ne kalolo

Bana ba Nafatale ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale binunu makumi atanu ne bisatu ne nkama mai
Ulekele bantu baye kutendelela Yehowa Nzambi wabo, wewe kuena mumanye ne, Buloba bua Ejipitu buakushihibua, anyi
Dilolo nenuambe ne, Tudi basue butuku butshie bualu bua buowa budi bunukuata mu mitshima yenu, ne bua malu anudi batangila ku mesu
Hakamueneka nzala mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bantu bakadidila Palô ne, Utuhe bia kudia Palo wakambila Bena Ejipitu bonso ne, Yai bienu kudi Yosefe, nuenze malu adiye wamba
Bikala disama dishale mu tshilulu nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama anyi mu tshintu tshia tshiseba, disama edi didi ditampakana, neboshe tshintu atshi mu kahia

Tshituha tshidi tshishale netshikale kudi Alona ne bana bandi balume bu tshintu tshia kudia, bobo nebadie tshituha tshidi katshiyi ne luevene mu muaba wa tshijila, mu luhangu lua ntenta wa kusambakena
Yehowa wakela dî kudi Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe ne mulangala webe ha mutu ha misulu ne ha mutu ha tusulu ne mashiba bualu bua kutuma biula mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Nomba Mikenji ya Milambu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanualua mu buloba buenu, bundi munuhe, ne hanuafila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa bua kushikisha kuditshiha, anyi mulambu udi mitshima yenu misue kufila, anyi mu matuku anudi nudia bidia bia disanka, bualu bua kumusha dihembu kudi Yehowa, nansha mulambu wa ngombe nansha wa mikoko, muntu udi ufila mulambu neafile mulambu wa bukula bubotesha bu tshintu tshia dikumi tshia tshihiminu tshimue, busangisha ne tshituha tshinai tshia dikoho dia manyi
Badi Basangula Balumbuluishi Ek
Nunku wewe mubambile ne, Hanuanyukula bintu bidi bitamba buimpe, bintu ebi nebikale bibadibue kudi Bena Lewi bu bintu biakuvulangana ku tshishihuidi ne ha tshikaminu
Genese Yakoba ne Esau Badi Balengeshangana Yakoba wakabanduluka, wakamona Esau ulua ne bantu nkama mai

Bakusesuka lubilu mu nshila unakubambila, bakulamba nkanu ya or, bakutula kana ka ngombe, bakukatendelela, bakukashihela milambu, bakuamba ne, Bena Isalele, nzambi wenu nyeu wakanuluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Bualu bua nuenu kanuakakuatshila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mudimu ne disanka mu mitshima yenu bua bintu bionso biakanuheye, nunku nenukuatshile badi n enu lukuna mudimu badi Yehowa unutumina, ne nzala ne nyota ne butaka ne kuhanga kua bintu bionso
Ba ha mutu habo nebambile bantu ne, Nganyi wakuasa nsubu muhia muhia, ne kena muanze kunjidila
Yehowa wakenza bu mu dî dia Mose, biula biakafua mu nsubu ne mu mbanza ne mu madimi
Bualu bua bintu biabo biakatamba bia bungi kabakamanya mua kushikama kaba kamue, ne buloba buakadibo bashikame buakadi bukese bualu bua bungi bua bimuna biabo
Bakumuka mu Dofaka, bakashikama mu Alusha
Yosefe wakambila bana babo ne, Ndi nnutendekena ne, Semenai ha buihi n anyi
Bua tshitangidi bualu ebu bubi budi bulue kudi tatu wanyi

Yeye kena ukeba mua kutangila ne tshintu tshidi tshimpe anyi tshidi tshibi, yeye kena mua kutshishintakasha nansha, biabishintakasheye, tshintu etshi ne tshintu tshiakashintakasheye n atshi nebikale bia tshima, kabena mua kubihikula
Nenudie munyinyi nunku ne bilulu bienu biela mikaya, ne bisabata ku makasa ne mulangala ku bianza bienu nenudie munyinyi lubilu, bualu ebu budi kuhita kua Yehowa
Yehowa wakatuma nyoka idi isuma bu kahia kosha munka tshi mua bantu, yakasuma bantu, bantu ba bungi ba Isalele bakafua
Sala wakafua mu Kiyata aba eu udi Hebelone mu buloba bua Kanana, Abalahama wakaya bua kuaula muadi wa Sala ne bua kumujinga
Bakumuka ku mukuna wa Shefe, bakashikama mu Halada
Wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi muana wa nganyi
Wewe neumuvuishe butumbi buebe, bua Bena Isalele bonso batumikile dî diandi
Bantu ba Palô bakamukonka ne, Muntu eu neikale buteyi kutudi musangu bule munyi

Hanuakenga mu dikenga, halua malu au onso kunudi, nenuhingane kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu matuku adi ku nyima, nenutumikile dî diandi: bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi wa luse; yeye kena unuhanga, kena unujimisha, yeye kena uhua muoyo bualu bua tshihungidi tshia batatu enu tshiakahungeye n abo
Udi ubungamina tshinyi
Uluemu ne mesa, ulongolole bintu bidihu, uluemu ne bitekelu bia minda, utekemu minda
Nudimuke, kanufidi milambu ya kuosha mu miaba yonso mudi nutangila; kadi muaba udi Yehowa Usungula munkatshi mua bisamba bienu, nenufileku milambu yenu ya kuosha, nenuenzeku mei onso anakunuambila
Nuenu nenuhingane, nenutumikile dî dia Yehowa, nenuenze mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu
Ushale mu buloba ebu, nengikale bebe, nenkusankishe, bualu bua nenkuhe wewe ne tunkanunuma diebe buloba ebu buonso, nenjadike n ebe tshihungidi tshinakahunga ne Abalahama, tatu ebe
Abalahama wakabika ku mpala kua tshitalu tshiandi, wakambila bana ba Hete ne, Ndi bianyi muenyi ne muikadi munkatshi muenu, numpe muaba wa majambu bua meme kujikarnu tshitalu etshi ku mesu
Wewe wakambila bantu bebe ne, Luai n andi kundi, bua meme kumonangana n andi ku mesu

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, muakuidi neatangile mu mputa, ne bikala mputa kayi mutampakane, ne nsuki mitoke kabayiku, bielanganeye meji ne mputa kena ubuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, nebamubeye, kadi nebashiye muaba wa mputa, ne muakuidi neamubueshe mu nsubu matuku muanda mutekete makuabo
Bikala mulambu webe wa bukula budibo balamba mu dilonga, newikale wa bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene busangisha ne manyi
Bena Isalele bakenza nunku, bakabihata mu tshitudilu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose, Bena Isalele bakenza nunku
Palo wakamba ne, Yehowa nganyi

Muakuidi nealabe manyi adi ashala mu tshianza tshiandi ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia muntu udiye musue kulengesha ne ku tshiala tshiandi tshia ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku muan a dikasa munene wa ku tshianza tshia balume ha mutu ha mashi a mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, manyi adi ashala mu tshianza tshia muakuidi, nêle ha mutu ha muntu udiye musue kulengesha, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi ku mpala kua Yehowa
Kanungu ka Mafutu a beena Bukalenga bunene badi baateeka kudi mêyi adi atangila mianda ya lupetu
Neoshe dianyi dia mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ha tshioshelu
Hakunvua muhika wa Abalahama mei abo, yeye wakakukuila mpala wandi hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa
Mose wakambila Alona mei onso akamuambila Yehowa ne bimanyinu bionso biakamuheye
Kadi nuenu nuakahidia bua kuyamu, nuakahidia mukenji wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala udibo bafila kudi Yehowa

Ebi mbilulu bidibo ne bua kutela tshintu tshia kuteka ha tshiadi, ne efoda, ne tshikowelu, ne kazaku ka bibaka bibaka, ne tshilulu ne mukaba, bobo nebatelele Alona ne bana bandi bilulu bia tshijila, bua yeye ankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi
Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nya, nempingane kuetu kudi bana betu
Nunku wewe neumushe Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, Bena Lewi nebikale banyi
Bena Isalele bakaya mu bunene bua mai ha buloba bûme, mai akadi bu tshinunu kudibo ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku tshianza tshia bakashi

Nunku amba biebe ne, Mona, ndi mmuhe dihungila dianyi dia ditalala, nedikale kudiye ne kudi bana badi bamulonda ku nyima, bu dihungila dia mudimu wa buakuidi tshiendelele bualu bua yeye wakadi ne mukau bualu bua Nzambi wandi, wakabuikidila Bena Isalele bubi
Midimu ya tshibidilu ya tshisangilu tshiônso kayeena mwa kupita pa ngondo isatu to
Meme nakanuambila ne, Nuakulua ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, buloba budi Yehowa mutuhe

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakatuadishila disanka mu malu onso anuakenza ne tshianza tshienu; yeye wakamanya ngendu yenu mu tshihela etshi tshinene; mu bidimu ebi makumi anai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakadi n enu; kanuakakengela tshintu
Nenudie bidia bia disanka dia mbingu ei muanda mutekete ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne diha didi mitshima yenu misue kufila mu bianza bienu, bu muakanuvudishila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, disanka
bintu biabo bilondeshila Kanungu ka Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kujadika ne kwenza mushindu wa se bisamba biônso bia ditunga bikala bisomba pamwe mu ditalala ne mu bulongame
Mose wakafunda mei onso a Yehowa mu mukanda, wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakasa tshioshelu kuinshi kua mukuna, ne mabue manene dikumi ne abidi bu bungi bua bisamba bia Bena Isalele

Bintu biakafileye biakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete, bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi, mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu, ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kumusha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Nashona, muana mulume wa Aminadaba
Bikala nsuki ya muntu ya ku mpala nubike, ne bikala mpala wandi ne dibala, yeye udi muakane
Bintu bionso bidibo balela, ne bia bantu ne bia nyama idibo bafila kudi Yehowa, nebikale biebe, kadi wewe neuhikule ban a bute ba bantu ne ban a bute bonso ba nyama idi kayiyi miakane
Baledi badi ne bukookeshi bwa kusungula diikala dia ndongeshelu wa kupeesha bâna baabo

Kadi biatangila muakuidi ne miosa mitoke tô kayenaku, ne disama kadiena dibuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, nunku muakuidi neamubueshe ha nkayandi mu nsubu matuku muanda mutekete, bikala disama ditampakane mu dikoba, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu kadi katangilula, mu mishindu mileeja kudi mêyi a ditunga, diludika dia lupetu lwa mbulamatadi, dia bintu bia mbulamatadi pamwe ne dia lupetu lwa mbulamatadi ya polovensa, ya bitupa bia teletwale bidiludika ne ya biâpu bia mbulamatadi
dibanza dia mbulamatadi dia ditunga;
Mutshima wa Yehowa wakanyingalala bualu bua yeye wakafuka bantu ha buloba, kanyinganyinga kakadi mu mutshima wandi
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kubuneemeka ne kubukuba
Tuakabika ku Holeba, tuakenda tô mu tshihela atshi tshinene tshibi tshinuakatangila, ku nshila wa ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, bu muakatuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wetu; tuakalua ku Kadeshe bânea
Bakatuenzela bimpe mu Ejipitu, nunku Yehowa neanuhe munyinyi, nenudie
Mu buloba buonso bunudi nuhiana biasumbabo bukuabo, nebashiye tshieya tshia buhikudi bua buloba kudi wakabusumbisha

Mu dituku ditanu bana balume ba ngombe tshitema ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Nenuhikule ban a bute benu ba balume bonso
dikuba dia bisumbu bia bantu badi kabayi ne makanda
Nunku bakabikila muaba au ne, Besheba bualu bua bubidi buabo bakaditshihilaku
Mose wakalua, wakabikila bakulu ba bantu, wakabamanyisha mei onso akamuambila Yehowa
Yakoba wakaya ku Sukota, wakasaku nsubu, wakenzelaku bimuna biandi bitanda, nunku bakidika muaba au ne Sukota
Diidikija diônso dia kumbusha ku bukole bukalenga bwenza kudi Dîyi dikulu badi badipiisha ne tshibawu katshiyi kukupula bwa bibi bienzela ditunga ne Mbulamatadi
Dilama anyi difunda dia tshipwita badi mwa kwanji kudiimanyika padi Tshibambalu tshidiye wenzela mudimu tshilomba
Kanungu ka Badi basungula tshipwita mukulumpa bwa tshipungu tshia mvula itaanu
Yakoba wakashala mu buloba bua Ejipitu bidimu dikumi ne muanda mutekete, nunku bidimu bionso bia muoyo wa Yakoba biakadi lukama ne makumi anai ne muanda mutekete
Muntu yonso udi wenza mudimu dituku adi nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Palo wakambila Yosefe ne, Mu tshiota tshanyi nakamona meme muimane kukala kuamusulu, nakamona ngombe muanda mutekete yakadi ne manyi a bungi, yakabanda mu mai, yakadia mashinde malehe
Hakaluabo kudi Luele, tatu abo, yeye wakamba ne, Nuakuhingana lubilu lelu bualu kai
Isaka wakalua mu nshila wa ku Bê laha loi, bualu bua yeye wakadi ushikama ku buloba bua ku Sude
Katataka binuasua kulesha mukelenge wanyi luse ne bulelela, nungambile, ne binuahidia, nungambile kabidi: nunku meme ndi mua kuya ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Hakatangila bantu difutu dimana ku mbelu kua Ntenta, bantu bonso bakabika, bakatendelela muntu ne mu ntu ku ntenta wandi
Yehowa wakateka dî mukana mua Belâma, wakamba ne, Hingana kudi Balaka, umuambile nunku
Isalele wakambila Yosefe ne, Nfuafua, kadi Nzambi neikale n enu neanuhingashe mu buloba bua batatu etu
Badi babwangatshila ku tshiengedi
Bialala mulume ne nyama, nebanshihe yeye ne nyama kabidi
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne bisambombo ne nkama itanu
Bana balume ba Kusha badi nunku Seba ne Hawila ne Sabeta ne Lâma ne Sabeteka Bana balume ba Lama badi Sheba ne Dedana
Eu udi mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, yeye udi ne dihila dilelela ku mesu kua Yehowa
Dîba edi Minisitila kavulambedi udi ufila mukanda wa dilekele dia mudimu dia Bukalenga bunene kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga mu mêba makumi abidi ne anaayi
Bena Isalele bonso, balume ne bakashi, ba mitshima miololoke bakitabusha kufila bintu ku mudimu wakadi Yehowa Wambila Mose bua kuenjibua, bakabika kudi Yehowa bu kuha kuabo kua disanka
Yeye wakangata bantu bandi, bakamulonda to luendu lua matuku muanda mutekete, bakamuhetela ku mukuna wa Gilada
Bualu bua ban a bute bonso ba mu Isalele mbanyi, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, mu dituku dinakashiha ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu nakabajidila kundi
Bakumuka mu Salemona, bakashikama mu Punona
Kuvudi mukashi wa muan enu mulume bilulu, yeye udi mukashi wa mua n enu mulume
Kanuikadi ne bihiminu bibidi mu nsubu yenu, ne tshinene ne tshikese
Kanungu ka Mu matuku asambombo adi alonda dianyisha dia dîyi , badi badituma kwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga bwa adipatula
Enza mukeluba umue ku butshika bumue ne mukeluba mukuabo ku butshika bukuabo enza bakeluba ne tshibuikilu tshia mushete ne tshituha tshijima tshia or
Bintu bionso bidi bidikoka hanshi ne mafu, anyi bintu bidi bienda ne mikolo mai, kanudi bintu ebi bionso bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba, bualu bua bintu ebi bidi bibi
Masungulangana badi baenza kudi bantu bônso, kaayi kansungansunga, muntu yônso weela kakanda pa nkayenda
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi biafileye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neadie tumuma tuandi
Hanoka wakikala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asambombo ne bitanu, wakalela Metushela Ku nyima kua kulela kua Metushela, Hanoka wakendakana ne Nzambi bidimu nkama isatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi

Wewe neashihe tshimpanga, angata mashi atshi, wateke ku lusongo lua ditshu didi ku tshianza tshia balume tshia Alona, ne ku lusongo lua ditshu ku tshianza tshia balume tshia bana bandi balume, ne ku tshiala tshia ku tshianza tshiabo tshia bukole, ne ku muan a dikasa munene dia ku tshianza tshia balume, umiamine mashi ha tshioshelu tshionso
Yeye wakayangata ku bianza biabo, wakayilamba mu kahia, wakayiteka ne mulolo bu kana ka ngombe, bakamba ne, Bena Isalele, ke nzambi wenu, wakanuluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu

Bwa kubotakaja nsombelu mu nkatshi mwa polovensa yôyi nkayayi pa luseka, ne pankatshi payi ne Bukalenga bwa ku mutu, mbâsa Tshisangilu tshia banguvelenêla tshilombola kudi Mfumu wa Ditunga tshidi tshikala ne mudimu wa kukwatshisha mu mibelu bitupa bibidi bia Mbulamatadi ebi
Mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete ne dituku dia dikumi ne muanda mutekete dia ngondo buatu buakatua ha mikuna ya Alalata
Wakimita difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, yeye wakamba ne Bualu bua Yehowa wakumpa ne meme ndi mubengibue, nunku yeye wakumpa muana eu mukuabo, wakamuidika dina ne, Shimeona
Masama onso ne makenga adi kâyi mafunda mu mukanda wa mikenji, Yehowa neanutumineu, tô ne hanuajimishibua
Bana Baledibue kudi Yakoba Hakatangila Yehowa ne Lea wakadi mubengibue, yeye wakamulelesha bana, kadi Lakele wakadi nkumba
Nomba Buluka Udi Ubikila Belâma Bena Isalele bakaya ku luendu, bakashikama mu mpata wa Moaba dishiya dia mai a Yadene, batangilangana ne Yeleko
Bena Isalele bakadia bidia abi tô bidimu makumi anai, tô ne hakaluabo mu buloba muakadi bantu, baka dia bidia abi tô ne hakaluabo ku matshika a buloba bua Kanâna
Ndi ntendekena mukelenge wanyi adianjile ku mpala kuanyi, nenkulonde bitekete bitekete, bu mudi luendu lua bimuna ne lua bana bindi n abi, to ne hanafika kudi mukelenge wanyi ku Seî
Mbulamatadi udi mwa kupeesha bisumbu bia tshidiidi lupetu lwa mbulamatadi bwa biôbi kwenza nalu didiswisha diabi bwa kusungudibwa anyi kwenza midimu yabi, mu bulongolodi bufila kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Yeye wakatuma Yuda ku mpala kuandi kudi Yosefe bua kumulesheye nshila wa ku Goshene, bakalua mu buloba bua Goshene

Bwalu bônso budi bupangisha disungudibwa tshikondo tshia masungulangana budibo balwa kumanya pashishe kudi beena ku tubadi badi ne bukookeshi budi bufikisha ku dijimija dia ngikadilu wa butshipwita munwamfwanka wa ditunga anyi wa butshipwita mukulumpa
Bana benu nebikale bu bena tshiendenda mu tshihela etshi tô bidimu makumi anai, bobo nebatuale bujitu bua masandi enu, tô ne hajimina mibidi yenu mifue mu tshihela etshi
Mu dituku adi nendame buloba bua Goshene budi bantu banyi bashikame, bisumbu bia tuishi kabiena bifikaku, bualu bua kukumanyisha ne, Meme ndi Yehowa hanshi ha buloba
Muana wakakola, mamu andi wakalua n andi kudi muana wa bakashi wa Palo, yeye wakalua bu muana wandi mene
Nenukebeku mua kudihana kudi badi n enu lukuna bu bahika balume ne bahika bakashi, kadi kakuena muntu udi unusumba
Bakulu ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha muana mulume wa ngombe ku mesu kua Yehowa, nebashihe muana mulume wa ngombe ku mesu kua Yehowa

Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi ufunda olodonase wa dijaadika nende mu nkwaasa banguvelenele ba polovensa, ne bindonda biaabu bidibu basungula mu tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu, bu mudibio biamba mu kanungu ka
Tuanji kuitabusha bualu ebu, ne bobo nebashikame n etu Bena musoko bonso ba mu musoko wandi bakitabusha mei a Hamô ne a muan andi Shekeme, balume bonso ba mu musoko wandi bakätengudibua
Yeye wakamba ne, Wangate muan ebe mulume, muana umuehele, ûdi munange, Isaka mene, uye biebe mu buloba bua Moliya, umufileku bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kalua, ha mutu ha mukuna undualua kukulesha

Kanungu ka Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga badi mwa kutshibikidija mu tshisangilu tshia tshimpitshimpi kudi mulombodi watshi bilondeshila ndongamu mutapuluke, ku dilomba dia Bilo biaatshi anyi dia tshia bibidi tshimwe tshia beena bilo anyi dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga anyi dia Bukalenga bunene bwa Ditunga
Genese Dibutuka dia Sodoma ne Âmola Banjelo aba babidi bakafikaku Sodoma dilolo Lota wakadi ushikama ku tshibi tshia ku Sodoma
Bienza Muena Isalele bualu bubi ku mpukahuka budi Yehowa uhidia ne biahileye, ne hamanyeye bualu bubi buakenzeye, yeye neafile mukashi wa mbushi udi kayi ne tshilema bu mulambu wa bubi buakenzeye
Wewe neuteke tshibuikilu ha mutu ha mushete wa Nzambi mu muaba mutambe wa tshijila
Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi, Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidi tshienza mêyi
Biamona mukashi katshetshi mu matuku a bungi adi kâyi a tshikondo tshiandi, matuku au onso neikale bu matuku a tshikondo tshia ndi, yeye udi ne bukoya
Bakumuka mu Kadesha, bakashikama ku mukuna wa Hô, ku butshika bua buloba bua Edome

Kadi mundi udi kayi munyanguke, ne udi kayi muye ku luendu, udi uhidia kuvuluka kuhita kua Yehowa, nebumushe muntu au munkatshi muabo; bualu bua yeye kakafila mulambu wa Yehowa mu tshikondo tshiau, muntu au neadituadile bubi buandi
Bakumuka mu Sukota, bakashikama mu Etama, udi ku butshika bua tshihela

Kanuenzedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku bualu bua bobo badi benzela nzambi yabo malu onso mabi adi atonda Yehowa; bualu bua bobo badi boshila nzambi yabo bana babo balume ne bana babo bakashi mene mene ha kahia
Hakunvua Yoshua diyoyo dia bantu hakadibo bela mbila, yeye wakambila Mose ne, Au mmutoyi wa bantu badi baluangana nvita mu tshitudilu
Numanye bienu lelu, bualu bua tshiena ngakula ne bana benu badi kabayi bamanye, badi kabayi banze kutangila malu akanuyishabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Biahita bidimu bia bungi, wewe udi mumanye mua kuhandisha mushinga wa bintu, ne bialeha bidimu bikese, wewe neuhuekeshe mushinga wabi bu mudi bungi bua bintu bidiye ukusumbisha

Binuasangana disua dia nyunyu mu nshila ku mutshi anyi ha buloba, ne bana ba nyunyu anyi makela bidimu, ne mukashi wa nyunyu udi ushikama ha bana anyi ha makela, kanuangatshi mukashi wa nyunyu ne bana bandi kabidi; nulekele mukashi wa nyunyu tshianana, kadi nudi mua kudiangatshila bana ba nyunyu; nunku malu enu neikale mimpe, nenuvudishe matuku enu
Udi mumanye mua kubala bana ba Yakoba nganyi
Hakalua dilolo nkuadi yakalua, yakabuikila tshitudilu, dinda dime diakadi dinyunguluka tshitudilu

Muntu wanyi Mose kena nunku, yeye udi wenza mudimu wandi bimpe mu nsubu wanyi wonso, meme nensombe n andi mukana ha mukana, ne mei adiye mumanye, tshiena nsomba n andi ne nsumuinu, neatangile mundidimbi wa Yehowa nunku kanuakutshina bua kusonguela mundi wanyi Mose munyi
Bena Isalele bakaya ku mpala ku luendu luabo mu tshihela tshia Sinai, ditutu bakimana mu tshihela tshia Palana
Kanungu ka Bampulushi ba ditunga dijima kabeena babwelakana mu mianda ya tshidiidi to

Tangilai, ndi ne bana bakashi babidi badi kabayi banze kumanya balume, binuitabusha, nendue n abo kunudi, nubenzele bu munudi basue, kadi kanuenji balume aba bualu, bualu bua bobo bakulua mu diledi dia nsubu wanyi
Dinda nenuambe ne, Tudi basue butuku buile
bipupu;

Yehowa neanuvuisbe bu mitu, kena unuvuisha bu mikila; nuenu nenuikale anu ku mutu, kanuena nuikala hanshi, binuatumikila mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, indi nnuambila lelu, binuayenza; binuikala kanuyi nusesuka lelu ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi ku mei andi nnuambila, bua kuya kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu
Bualu bua yeye nealue tshisamba tshinene, ne bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bua bualu buandi
Abalama wakatula ntenta yandi, wakamuangala, wakaya kushikama hehi ne nu tshi ya telebinta ya Mamale idi mu Hebelone, wakenzelaku Yehowa tshioshelu
Nebanutengule, ne bualu ebu nebuikale bu tshimanyinu tshia tshihungidi tshidi hankatshi hetu n ebe
Aba mbantu bakasungula Yehowa bua kutahulula Bena Isalele buloba bua Kanâna
Labana wakafua Zilepa, muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi, kudi Lea muan andi wa bakashi bu muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa ditunga udi upatula dîyi mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adibo bamutuminadio panyima pa bipungu bidibu bafila kudi tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu

Bena Lewi nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha balume ba ngombe wewe neufile umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa, bua kubuikidila Bena Lewi bubi buabo

Mose wakambila Hobaba, muana mulume wa Luele, Muena Midiyana, tatu andi muenu wa Mose ne, Tutshidi tuya ku muaba wakamba Yehowa ne, Nennuheu, uye n etu, netukuenzele bimpe, bualu bua Yehowa wakalaya Bena Isalele bualu buimpe
Bakavuluka kuhita kua Yehowa mu ngondo wa kumudilu mu dituku dia dikumi ne anai ku dilolo, mu tshihela tshia Sinai, bu muakadi mei onso akambila Yehowa Mose, Bena Isalele bakenza nunku
Nuenu nuambile tatu wanyi bua butumbi buonso bundi n abu mu Ejipitu, ne bua malu onso anuakumona, nuhingane ne tatu wanyi kunoko lubilu

Mu dituku dinai bana balume ba ngombe dikumi ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue, badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba; ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Yeye wakamba ne Monai, diba ditshidi mulu, kandiba dia kusangisha bimuna nansha, nuishai mikoko mai, yai bienu nuyidishe
Nunku, ya biebe, meme nengikale ne mukana muebe, meme nenkuyishe mei andi musue wewe kuamba

Bikala muntu eu kayi ne muan abo bua kubuhikula, kadi bialueye muntu mubanji udi ne bintu bia kubuhikula n abi, yeye neabale bungi bua bidimu biakahita hakamusumbisheye buloba, neamuhingashile mushinga wabu ne bintu bikuabo ha mutu, yeye neahingane mu buloba buandi

Lewitiki Bidimu bia Kuikisha ne Tshidimu tshia Buhikudi Yehowa wakambila Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuabuela mu buloba bundi nnuha, nenushiye buloba bua kubandabu kudi Yehowa
Wakela makalu a Palô ne bisumbu biandi bionso mu mai manene, wakashiha tuhita tuakasunguleye mu Dishiba Dikunze

Neumushe dianyi dionso bu muakenzeye ne mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala, muakuidi neadioshe ha tshioshelu bu tshintu tshidi tshitue dihembu kudi Yehowa, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Ekesode Mose wakandamuna ne, Kadi bobo kabena bangitabusha, kabena bunvua di dianyi, bobo nebambe ne, Yehowa kakamueneka kûdi nansha
Kalongu ka kumpala : Bidi Bitangila Mulombodi wa Ditunga Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi Mfumu wa Mbulamatadi
Ndi ntshijadika ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo ne nyunyu ne bimuna ne nyama yonso bidi n enu bintu bionso bia ha buloba biakaluhuka mu buatu

Tshituha tshia Bena Isalele tshiakabatahuluila Mose, tshiakashilangana ne tshia bena nvita, tshituha tshiabo tshiakadi mikoko binu nu nkama isatu ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama itanu, ne ngombe binunu makumi asatu ne bisambombo, ne nyama ya mpunda binunu makumi asatu ne nkama itanu, ne bantu binunu dikumi ne bisambombo
Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku disatu
Bakumuka mu Litema, bakashikama mu Limona pelese
Njila mwisâtu : Bidi bitangila diumvwangana pankatshi pa bukalenga bwenzeji ne bukalenga bweenji bwa mêyi
Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudibo, bua kubashiha munkatshi mua tshitudilu, tô ne hakafuabo buonso buabo
Muana mukashi yonso udi ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, neikale mukashi wa umue wa mu tshisamba tshia tatu andi, nunku muntu ne muntu wa Bena Isalele neikale ne buhianyi bua batatu abo
Nu hingane ne muan enu, muan a mukala kundi, nunku mei enu neajalame, kanuena nufue
Yehowa neakokeshe bantu tshiendelele

Bakulu ba mu musoko au nebakuate muntu au, nebamukengeshe; ne bobo nemmuambile ne, Ufute lukama lua nshekele ya argent ne yeye neayifile kudi tatu wa mushikankunde eu, bualu bua yeye wakuona lumu lua mukashi utshidi kamama mu Isalele: yeye neikale mukashi wandi, yeye kena mua kumuhidia tô matuku andi onso
Bintu bia kumudilu binudi nuhuola biai n abi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Muakuidi neangate bukula bua mulambu wa mukau ku bianza bia mukashi, neanyukule mulambu wa bukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, nealue n au ku tshioshelu, ne muakuidi neambule dianza tente ne bukula, bu tshivulukidi tshiau, neabuoshele ha tshioshelu, ne ku nyima yeye neamushe mukashi mai
Muenyi ne muena mudimu wa difutu kabena mua kutshidia
Kuvudi muan abo ne tatu ebe mulume bilulu, kuyi ha buihi ne mukashi wandi, yeye udi mukashi wa tatu ebe mukuabo
Munyinyi udi utuanganaa ne tshintu tshibi, kabena mua kûdia, nebawoshe mu kahia
Kuedi manyi au ham bidi ha bantu, kabena manyi mafuanangane n au, wowo adi a tshijima, neikale a tshijila kunudi
Kanungu ka Bukookeshi bwa kupengama mu ditunga dikwabo budi bwanyishibwa
Mose wakangata manyi adibo bela ha mutu, wakantumina manyi ku nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne ku bintu bionso biakadimu, wakadidila
Mishindu ya kuteeka bulongolodi bwa tshimpitshimpi anyi bwa bilwilu badi bayileeja kudi mêyi a ditunga
Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe, bua matuku ebe ikale a bungi mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ukuha
Kanuendi mu bilele bia tshisamba tshindi ngihata ku mesu kuenu, bualu bua bobo bakenza malu au onso, nunku nakabalengulula
Yehowa wakabidika mesu a Belâma, ne yeye wakamona muanjelo wa Yehowa muimane mu nshala, ne muele wa nvita mu tshianza tshiandi, yeye wakinama mutu wandi, wakatua mpala hanshi
Hakatangila tatu muenu wa Mose malu onso akenzeleye bantu, yeye wakamba ne, Wewe udi wenzela bantu tshinyi

Nenufile milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa, muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, bintu bisatu bia dikumi ku muana wa ngombe, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko tô ne ku bana ba mikoko muanda mutekete, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ha mutu ha milambu idibo bosha babala ngondo, ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua, bu mudi mukenji wamba, milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Alona nealue ne bintu ebi mu muaba wa tshijila ne muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne tshimpanga tshia mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Muana wa masandi kabuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa; ne tunkanuniuna tuandi kaubuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa tô ne hahita bikondo dikumi
Bantu kabakadi ne mai a kunua, bakadisangisha kudi Mose ne kudi Alona
Kadi kanufidi tshintu tshidi ne tshilema bualu bua tshiena ngitabusha tshintu etshi
Matuku onso a Hanoka akadi bidimu nkama isatu ne makumi asambombo ne bitanu
Mose wakenza nunku bu muakamuambila Yehowa, mbu muakenzeye
Tangilai, kabena balue ne mashi a mulambu mu nsubu munda mua tshitendelelu; nuakadi kûdia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bu munakamba
Ku tshikondo atshi Yehowa wakangambila ne, Songa mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi, ulue biebe kundi ku mukuna, udienzele mushete wa mabaya
Bintu bionso bia kudia bidi bituangana ne mai akadi mu bintu ebi nebikale ne bukoya, ne mai a kunua onso akadi mu bintu ebi neikale ne bukoya
Kànkamana mwena kwanyì, Mutu tudie emu kumutwikale, Bidimu bitu byà kukùdimuka

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Kanumushi tshisamba tshia meku a Bena Kohata munkatshi mua Bena Lewi, nubenzele nunku, bua bikale ne muoyo, kabafu, haluabo ha buihi ne bintu bia tshijila Alona ne bana bandi balume nebabuelemu, nebaleshe muntu ne muntu mudimu wandi ne bujitu buandi, kababuedi bua kutangila bintu bia tshijila nansha kakese, bua kabafu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Songa biebe mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi: neufundehu mei onso anakafunda ha mabue a diambedi awakatshibula
Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nshiha musoko bualu bua bantu makumi anai

Bana ba Shimeona, ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo muntu ne muntu, balume bonso ku bidimu makumi abidi to ne ha mutu, bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona binunu makumi atanu ne tshitema ne nkama isatu
Tuakanyenga misoko yandi yonso ku tshikondo atshi, katuakashiya musoko umue; tuakanyenga misoko makumi asambombo, ne luseke tuonso lua Âgoba, bukelenge bua Oga mu Bashana
Yehowa mene uyaya ku mpala kuebe, yeye neikale hebe, kena ukuhanga, kena ukulekela: kutshinyi, kuzakadi
Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Wewe kuena ne buhianyi mu buloba buabo, wewe kuena ne tshituha munkatshi muabo meme ndi tshituha tshiebe ne buhianyi buebe munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Binuahidia kutunvuila bua kutengu dibua, hashishe, netuangate muan etu wa bakashi, netuye
Bena Isalele bakamona mpala wa Mose ne musunyi wa ha mpala ha Mose wakakonka: Mose wakateka tshilulu tshikudika ha mpala handi kabidi tô ne hakayeye kusomba ne Yehowa
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Nenkutumine muan a mbushi wa mu tshisumbu tshinyi
Mai akadi mu mulondo akashika, ne yeye wakaladika muana muinshi mua katshi kasase
Alona wake nza nunku, wakatemesha minda ku mpala kua tshitekelu tshia muinda, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Hakafikabo ku tshituilu tshia Atada, tshidi dishiya dia Yadene, bakadila muadi mukole, baka jinga tatu wandi to matuku muanda mutekete
Dina dia diboko dibidi didi Gihona, didi dinyunguluka buloba buonso bua Atiopa

Kadi biajidileye budimi buandi ku nyima kua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, muakuidi neamubadile mushinga bu bungi bua bidimu bidi bishala tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, nebamuhuekeshile mushinga wakasanganabo
Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne bukookeshi ne dikanyika dia kusungila ditunga ne bujima bwa malaba mu dîba dia njiwu anyi dîba didibo badiêla mvita kudi beenyi
Netubuelemu munyi
Mose wakamba ne, Ebu mbualu buakamba Yehowa bua nuenu nuenze, ne butumbi bua Yehowa nebumueneke kunudi

Hakatangila Mose ne bantu bakadi batomboka Alona wakabanda bua kudifuishishabo bundu kudi bena lukuna babo , Mose wakimana ku mbelu kua tshitudilu, wakamba ne, Udi ku luseke lua Yehowa alue biandi kundi Bana balume bonso ba Lewi bakadisangisha kudiye
Nakanuambila nunku, kanuakangunvuila; kadi nuakadi ne budisu, nuakahidia dî dia Yehowa, nuakadiyila ku mikuna
Nzambi wakambila Abalahama ne, Wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe mu bikondo biatu bionso, nenutumikile tshihungidi tshianyi
Mukoshi wa nsambu musomba mu nkwaasa kêna usambasamba to
Mose wakamba ne, Bikala mpala webe kayi uya n anyi, kudimusha kunoko
Bûngi bwa baminisitila ba polovensa kabweena ne tshia kupita pa dikumi to

Lewitiki Milambu ya Mibi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bienza muntu bualu bubi ku mpukahuka budi Yehowa uhidia, bienza muakuidi muela manyi ha mutu bualu bubi budi buhisha bantu, yeye nealele mulambu wa muana wa ngombe udi kayi ne tshitema kudi Yehowa, bu mulambu wa kubuikidila n au bubi buandi
Kanuenji bubi hanualumbulula bilumbu, anyi hanuidikisha bule bua bintu anyi bujitu buabi anyi bungi buabi
Mose ne Mabue a Mikenji Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ufunde mei â, bualu bua nakuhunga n ebe ne Bena Isalele tshihungidi bu mudi mei â
Kanulu ne mashi a nyama mishiha ne mampa adi ne luevene hohamue; kanushihi nansha tshintu tshikese tshia mulambu wa disanka dia kuhita kua Yehowa tô ne ku dinda
Hashishe Palô wakatuma di, Wakabikila Yosefe, bakamuhatula mu nsubu wa midima lubilu, yeye wakadibeya muedi wandi, wakaluata bilulu bikuabo, wakaya kudi Palô
Bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa bakashala mu tshituha ne bu muakadi dî ba Yehowa bakaya ku luendu, bakatumikila dî dia Yehowa, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Nenteke mikalu yenu ku Dishiba Dikunze tô ne ku mai manene a Bena Peleshete, ne ku tshihela tô ne ku musulu wa Pelata, bualu bua meme nenfile bena buloba mu bianza bienu, nuenu nenubihate ku mpala kuenu
Yakoba wakahanda bivualu biandi, wakaluata tshilulu tshikayabala mu tshimono, wakajinga muan andi matuku a bungi
Wakashikama mu tshihela tshia Palana, mamu wandi wakamuangatshila mukashi wa mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Muntu udi ulala mu nsubu neuvuwe bilulu biandi, ne muntu udi udia bidia mu nsubu neuvuwe bilulu biandi
Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Mona, nakamana kulua kudi
Nenusungule misoko isatu dishiya dia Yadene, ne isatu mu buloba bua Kanâna, neyikale misoko ya kunyemena
Kusha wakalela Nimeloda, yeye wakabanga kuikala muntu mukole
Numuke ne nuenu nuakadi bahika mu Ejipitu: nutumikile mikenji ei yonso
Bule bua dibaya dimue nebuikale coudées dikumi ne butshiama buadi nebuikale coudée umue ne tshituha

Ku dituku adi kakuena muprofete mukuabo mubike munkatshi mua Bena Isalele bu Mose, wakadi mumanyangane ne Yehowa ku mesu, mu bimanyinu bionso ne mu malu a kukema akamutumina Yehowa bua kuenzeye mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne bua kuenzela Palo ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buandi buonso, ne mu tshianza tshikole, ne mu buowa bunene biakenza Mose ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso
Mêyi maludiki adi aleeja bulongolodi bwatshi ne lwendu lwatshi
Yehowa neanutumine milau ne makenga ne mahumbisha mu malu anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu, tô ne hanuajimishibua ne hanûmushibua lubilu ha buloba; bualu bua bubi bua bienzedi bienu, bua nuakundekela
Nenkuvudishile tunkanunuina tuebe, netuikale bu dinfuenkenya dia buloba, nunku biamanya muntu mua kubala dinfuenkenya dia buloba, hashishe, tunkanunuina tuebe netubadibue kabidi
Dikumbajija, ndongolwelu ne lwendu lwa bitupa bia teletwale bidikadila ebi ne kabidi malela abi ne Mbulamatadi ne polovensa adi masunguluja kudi dîyi dilongolodi
Bakabatekela tuhita, bakabakengesha ne mudimu
Kadi meme nakanuambila ne, Nenuhiane buloba buabo, nennuhebu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nakanujidila munkatshi mua bantu bakuabo
Wewe neushihe tshimpanga, newangate mashi atshi wamiamine ha tshioshelu tshionso

Mêyi ne mikandu adi aleeja ngikadilu wa beena mudimu ne adi akajilula maalu a sungasunga adi atangila bulongolodi bwa mêyi ni mikandu bwa bisumbu bia beena mudimu ne dienza dia midimu didi dikeba kwikala ne dibeji dia kalasa kapwekela ne dia kalasa kakulumpe
Mabaya muanda mukulu akadiku ne masoso a tshiamu tshia argent dikumi ne asambombo, masoso abidi ku dibaya ku dibaya
Nuvuluke bu muakenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Miyama mu nshila hanuakalubuka mu Ejipitu
Kabeena mwa kwaasa Tubinadi twa sungansunga anyi twa tshiumusha to, nansha bôbu batwinyika dîna kayi
Wakaya kudi Haga ne yeye wakimita difu, hakatangileye ne, Nakuimita difu, yeye wakalengulula mukelenge wandi mukashi
Bakabihata ku mesu kua Palô
Kanungu ka Mianda mikwabo idi kayiyi mu luseka lwa dîyi idi mu luseka lwa tuludiki

Nenuteke bintu ebi hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenutendelele ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; nenusanke mu malu mimpe onso akanuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne nuenu ne ba mu nsubu yenu, ne Muena Lewi ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu
Aba mbana balume ba Benyamina ku meku abo Bela ne meku a Bena Bela; Ashabele ne meku a Bena Ashabele; Ahilama ne meku a Bena Abalama; Shefufama ne meku a Bena Shefufama; Hufama ne meku a Bena Hufama
Diumvwangana edi didi mwa kwangata lwidi lwa diambulwisha

Yeye neafile mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji kudi Yehowa, tshimpanga tshidi katshiyi ne tshialua tshia mushinga ûdi witabusha kudi muakuidi bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kumubuikidila n au bubi kudi Yehowa ne bubi buakenzeye nebuikale bubuikidibue

Lota wakabanduluka, wakamona mpata ne bibanda bia musulu wa Yadene, ne tusulu tuakadi kuonso diambedi Yehowa kayi muanze kushiha Sodoma ne Amola, mpata au wakadi bu tshibundu tshia Yehowa, wakadi bu buloba bua Ejipitu, hawaya mu nshila wa ku Soa
dilonda dia mêyi adi aludika bumuntu mu musoko;
Bualu bukuabo kabidi, Yehowa neatume matembue munkatshi muabo, bantu badi bashala nebasokome, tô ne hafuabo ku mpala kuenu

Muntu nansha umwe peshi tshisumbu tshia bantu katshiena mwa kwangata tshitupa tshia buloba bwa ditunga bu mwaba wa kubangila dikeba dia kukudimuna mianda ya tshidiidi anyi dibweeja dia tshimvundu mu ditunga dia Kongu anyi mu ditunga dikwabo diônso to
Mukashi wakamba ne, Wewe udi bayanyi wa mashi bualu bua ku tengula
Mwâna yônso wa mabela pa ludimi udi mwa kumanya mêna a tatwende ne a mamwende
Mose wakamba ne, Bantu bandi n abo badi bena nvita binunu nkama isambombo, ne wewe wakuamba ne, Nembahe munyinyi, bua bobo badie ngondo mujima
Bubidi buabo, mulume ne mukashi, bakadi butaka, kabakadi ne bundu
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Gada, Gewele, muana mulume wa Maki
Wa kumudilu wakahatuka wakadi mukunze kunzû, wakadi ne miosa ya bungi ham bidi handi, bakamuidika dina ne, Esau

Dimungutula nansha dimwe kadieena mwa kwenzeka mu tshidimu tshidi tshilonda masungulangana, nansha mu tshikondo tshia mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi wa bilwilu anyi tshia mvita, nansha padi Ditunga ku bulombodi bwa mfumu wa tshimpitshimpi
Dîyi dilongolodi didi difila mishindu ya kumanya, kupeta, kujimija anyi kupetulula bweena ditunga dia Kongu
Kuikadi ne nzambi mikuabo ne meme hohamue
Nunku nakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa matuku makumi anai, bualu bua Yehowa wakamba ne, Nembashihe

Biwashiha bantu aba bu mundi umue, hashishe bisamba bionso biakunvua lumu luebe nebiambe ne, Bualu bua Yehowa kakadi ne bukole bua kulua ne bantu aba mu buloba buakahaneye, nunku yeye wakabashiha mu tshihela
Kanungu ka

Kanungu ka Kabeena mwa kuteekela mweena Kongu nansha umwe kansungansunga pa bidi bitangila mianda ya tulasa ne dienza dia midimu ya mbulamatadi anyi mianda mikwabo, kansungansunga kamwenekela mu mêyi ne mikandu anyi mu dipangadika dia Bukalenga bunene, pa kutangila tshisumbu tshia ditabwija tshia muntu, dîku didiye mufumina, mulongo weende mu musoko, mwaba udiye usombela, ngelelu wende wa meji ne bidiye pende mumona bîmpe mu mianda ya tshidiidi, dikala dieende dia mweena dikoba kampanda, dia tshisamba kampanda, mweena lukongu, mweena tshisamba kampanda, bûngi bwa bantu bukesa mu bunkambwa anyi mu mwakulu umwe

Bwa kubweeja bipeta bîmpe, dimanya dipiluke ne mitalu mu ditangila dia bilumbu, badi batapulula bilumbulwidi mu nkongu isatu ya tubadi: tubadi twa lukongu lwa bandumbulula tudibo batangila kudi Kabadi ka kashipi ka mapangadika; tubadi twa lukongu lwa baludiki ba mbulamatadi tulombola kudi Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi, ne Kabadi kimikila Dîyi dikulu

Nebikale bintu biebe munkatshi mua bintu biakajidilabo ku kahia milambu yabo yonso, ne ya bukula, ne ya kubuikila n ai bubi buabo, ne ya kubuikila n ai kusambuka kuabo kua mikenji, milambu idibo bafila kundi neyikale bu tshintu tshia tshijila kûdi ne kudi bana bebe balume
Kujidila kua Ban a Bute Nenujidile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ban a bute balume ba ngombe ne ba mikoko; kanuenzeshi ban a bute ba ngombe mudimu, kanukoshi ban a bute ba mikoko miosa
Mose wakabuela munkatshi mua difutu, wakabanda mu mukuna Mose wakashala mu mukuna munya ne butuku mafuku makumi anai
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Hingana kudi mukelenge webe mukashi, udikokeshe mu tshianza tshiandi
Abalahama wakaha bana ba bakashi bandi bakuabo matabisha, wakabumusha kudi Isaka hakadiye ne muoyo, wakabatuma ku luseke lua ku esete

Hafila muntu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa bua kushikisha kuditshiha kuandi anyi mulambu udi mutshima wandi musue kufila wa munkatshi mua ngombe anyi mikoko, nengitabushe anu tshintu tshidi tshiakane, katshiena mua kuikala ne tshitema

Wakenza tshikowelu tshia efoda ne buanda bua bleu, bakashiya disoso bua kubueshamu mutu, bakanyunguluka disoso ne muonshi muhindakana bu mudibo benza tshikowelu tshia nvita, bua tshikowelu katshihandiki nansha

Padi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfuaka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa tshikosa difila dia bukookeshi buvwa bwimikila Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga bwa polovensa mushindu awu, bulongolodi bwa mêyi a polovensa adibo bapatula mu mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene, bilondeshila difila dia bukookeshi edi, adi ashala ne bwenzeji mu polovensa mweena bwaalu too ne palwa Dîyi dikulu dia ditunga kujikija mianda ayi
Wewe neulue ne bana bandi balume, ubaluatshishe bikowelu
Muntu udi udia munyinyi wandi neuvuwe bilulu, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo, ne mundi udi utuala mubidi wandi mufue neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi mbulamatadi wa bilwilu udi mwa kuteekibwa pa tshitupa anyi pa tshipaapu tshijima tshia Ditunga bwa matuku makumi asatu
Bika biebe, va ku Padana alama ku nsubu wa Betuele tatu wa ma mu ebe wangataku mukashi wa bana bakashi ba Labana, muan abo wa balume ne mamu ebe
Salai wakambila Abalama ne, Mona, Yehowa wakumpidisha bua kulela, ndi nkutendekena ne, Uye biebe kudi mukashi, muena mudimu wanyi, binamanya mua kuheta bana kudiye Abalama wakitabusha di dia Salai

Mose wakambila Alona ne Eleaza ne Itama, bana bandi balume bakadi bashala, ne, Nuangate mulambu wa bukula udi ushala munkatshi mua milambu idibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia, nûdie ne bintu bidi kabiyi ne luevene hehi ne tshioshelu, bualu bua tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia tshijila, nenudie mu muaba wa tshijila, bualu bua etshi ntshintu tshiebe ne tshia bana bebe balume munkatshi mua milambu idibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia, bualu bua Yehowa wakangambila nunku
Yosefe wakalongolola dikalu diandi wakaya kusangakena ne Isalele, tatu andi, mu Goshene Wakafika kudiye, wakamuela tshituha ku nshingu, wakadila to musangu mule
Alona nêle mbushi ei ibidi nshobo, biakuata nshobo umue, ngua Yehowa, ne biakuata nshobo mukuabo, ngua Azazele
Bobo bakafofomesha mesu a balume bakadi bimane ku tshibi tshia nsubu, bakese ne banene, bakateketa, kabakamona tshibi
Kanungu ka Batshipwita munwamfwanka ba ditunga ne batshipwita bakulumpa badi ne bukookeshi bwa kutambakana kakuyi mukalu anyi dipangisha munda mwa ditunga dijima ne bwa kumupatuka

Bobo nebunvue dî diebe, wewe ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele nenufile kudi mukelenge wa Ejipitu, nenumuambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu, wakusangakena n etu Tudi tukutendekena ne, Witabushe bua tuetu kuya luendu lua matuku asatu mu tshihela bua kushihela Yehowa Nzambi wetu nyama
Yeye wakamba ne, Udi mu ntenta
Enzai nunku ne ngombe yenu ne mikoko yenu kabidi, muana neikale ne mamu wandi matuku muanda mutekete, kadi numufile kundi dituku dia muanda mukulu
Tshihiminu etshi tshidi bu tshia dikumi tshia épha
Buludi bua muaba wa luhangu nebuikale coudées lukama ne butshiama bualu nebuikale coudées makumi atanu, ne bule bualu bua mulu coudées itanu, ne bilulu bia lin ne nkanu yabi ya tshiamu tshia mitaku
Bikaleye kayi ne disanka bualu bua mukashi eu, hashishe yeye neamutume kudiye musue kuya; kadi kamuhanyi ku biuma, kamuenji bu muhika, bualu bua yeye wakamukehesha

Nansha nanku, Bukalenga bunene, mu dilombola dia Minisitila wa kumpala anyi meena kavulambeli, ke budi ne bukookeshi bônso bwa kuludika tshidiidi tshia Ditunga tshidibo busunguluja mu diumvwangana ne Mulombodi wa Ditunga

Bakatuala nsubu wa tshitendelelu, Ntenta mene, kudi Mose, ne bintu bionso biakenzabo, ne nkanu ne mabaya, ne mitshi ne makunshi ne masoso a tshiamu, ne tshintu tshia biseba bia bimpanga tshima mu mai makunze kunzû tshia kuteka ha mutu ha nsubu, ne tshintu tshia biseba bia nkonge tshia kuteka ha mutu hatshi, ne tshilulu tshia hankatshi ha nsubu, ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne mitshi ya mushete, ne tshibuikilu tshia mushete, ne mesa, ne malonga onso a mesa, ne bidia bilesha, ne bitekelu bia minda, ne minda ne malonga au onso, ne manyi a minda, ne tshioshelu tshia tshiamu tshia or, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne musenga wa manananshi, ne tshilulu tshia kuteka ku mbelu kua nsubu, ne tshioshelu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne biamu bitshiamakane, ne mitshi yatshi, ne malonga atshi onso, ne tshiowelu ne mesa atshi, ne bilulu bia luhangu lua muaba wa kutendelela, ne makunshi a luhangu ne nkanu, ne tshilulu tshia tshibi tshia luhangu, ne mionshi yonso ne milonda ne bintu bionso bia kuenza n abi mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, mbia ntenta wa kusangakena, ne bilulu bitedibue bimpe bia kuenza n abi mudimu wa mu nsubu wa tshijila, ne bilulu bia tshijila bia Alona muakuidi, ne bilulu bia bana bandi balume bia kuenza n abi mudimu wa buakuidi
Yuda, bana benu nebakutumbishe, tshianza tshiebe netshifiekele mu nshingu ya bantu badi n ebe lukuna, bana ba tatu ebe nebakukukuile

Yosefe wakambila bana babo ne, Nfuafua, kadi Nzambi neikale n enu, neanumushe mu buloba ebu, neanuhingashe ku buloba buakalayeye Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba Yosefe wakatshihisha bana ba Isalele wakabambila ne, Nzambi neikale n enu, ne nuenu nenuye ne mifuba yanyi
Dina dia mukashi wa Amalama diakadi Yokebede, muana mukashi wa Lewi, wakalelabo mu Ejipitu: yeye wakalelela Amalama Alona ne Mose ne Miyama, muan abo mukashi

Bana betu bakatekesha mitshima yetu, bakamba ne, Bantu aba badi batuhita hunene ne bule; misoko yabo idi minene, ne mpangu yai ya mabue idi miye mulu mule; bualu bukuabo, tuakatangilamu bana balume ba Bena Anaka
Wakenza tshibuikilu tshia tshiamu tshia or nkayandi, buludi buatshi buakadi coudées ibidi ne tshituha, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudée umue ne tshituha

Kanungu ka Bwa kulondolola pa lukasa ndongamu wabu, Bukalenga bunene budi mwa kulomba kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe dianyisha dia kwangata, mu olodonase dîyi , mapangadika adi pa tshibidilu ku bukookeshi bwa dîyi mu mapangadikadîyi bwa tshipungu tshikese ne pa mianda mimanyika

Nenudie bidia bia disanka dia bitandatanda tô matuku muanda mutekete, hanuashikisha kusangisha bintu ku tshishihuidi ne ku tshikaminu: nenuikale ne disanka hanuadia bidia ebi, ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muntu webe mulume ne muntu webe mukashi ne Muena Lewi ne muenyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila badi mu misoko yenu
Meme ne mamu ebe ne bana benu netulue bua kukukukuila hanshi, anyi
Bana ba balume ba Lubena, muan a bute wa Isalele Hanoka ne Palu, Heselona ne Kâmi, â mmeku a Lubena
Bakakuata Lota, muana wa muan abo ne Abalama, wakadi ushikama mu Sodoma, ne bintu biandi bionso, bakaya n abi
Olodanase ya Mulombodi wa Ditunga idibo bapatwila maalu aa badi bayitwa tshiâla tshibîdi ku dia bakaji kudi Minisitila kavulambedi
Kanuibi, kanudingidianganyi, kanushimianganyi
Yuda wakamonaku muana wa bakashi wa muena Kanana, dina diandi Shua, yeye wakamuangata, wakalala n andi
Mulau wa Mputa ya Mbalanga Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nuangate manza a butue bua mu tshikutu, Mose abumiamine mulu ku mesu kua Palô
Bialua mukuenu muntu muhele, biahaneye tshituha tshia buloba buandi, ne bialua bana babo bua kubuhikula, badi mua kuhikula buloba buakahanabo kudi muan abo

Muakuidi nealabe mashi ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi tshidi mu ntenta wa kusangakena ku mesu kua Yehowa, neahongolole mashi onso a muana wa ngombe ku tshitaka tshia tshioshelu tshia kahia tshidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena

Bena Isalele bakamushiha ne muele wa nvita, bakanyenga buloba buandi ku mai a Ânona tô ne ku mai a Yaboka ku butshika bua buloba bua Bena Amona, bualu bua butshika bua buloba bua Bena Amona buakadi bukole
Mweena lukanu yônso badi ne tshia kumwangata mu mushindu wa kulaminyina mooyo wende, bukole bwende bwa mubidi ne bwa lungenyi ne kabidi mushinga wende
Nudi mua kudia nyunyu yonso idi miakane
Budimi ne lubuebue luakadimu biakaya mu bianza bia Abalahama tshiendelele ku mpala kua bana ba Hete bu muaba wa kujikabo bantu bafue

Munkatshi mua bisamba ebi kanuena nusangana ha kuikisha, anyi kua kutalasha munda mua makasa enu; Yehowa neanutumineku mitshima izakala ne mesu a buowa ne kusamina kua muoyo; nenuikale ne mpata bua mioyo yenu; nenuikale ne buowa munya ne butuku, kanuena nuikala ne ditekemena dia mioyo yenu
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bu mu dî dia Yehowa ne, Ba mu tshisamba tshia bana balume ba Yosefe badi bamba dî dilelela
Nudisangishe matuku asambombo, kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete didi dijidila, kabiena bikalaku dituku adi
Palô Wakabikila Abalama, wakamukonka ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi tshinyi
Biasanganabo bintu bidi ne muoyo mu tshianza tshiandi, nansha ngombe nansha mpunda nansha mukoko, yeye neahingashe bintu misangu ibidi

Nebateke tshilulu tshia bleu ha mutu ha tshioshelu tshia or, nebâteke ha mutu hatshi tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge, nebabueshemu mitshi ya tshioshelu nebangate malonga onso adibo benza n au mudimu wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu nebâteke mu tshilulu tshia bleu, nebâbuikde ne tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge, nebâteke ha mitshi ibidi idi mikuatakasha Nebumushe butue ku tshioshelu, nebatekehu tshilulu tshikunzubile nebâteke ha mutu hatshi bintu bionso bidibo benza n abi mudimu watshi ne malonga a kahia ne nkobo ya munyinyi, ne nkasu, ne bihanza ne malonga onso a tshioshelu, nebâteke tshibuikilu tshia biseba bia nkonge, nebabueshemu mitshi yatshi
Kadi kakosa tshilumbu mu bululama ne kikala kangata ne mushinga mianda yônso idi mwa kwambulwisha bantu bônso anyi muntu nkayende

Yehowa Nzambi wakamenesha mitshi yonso idi buimpe ku mesu ne idi mimpe bua kudia mu buloba, mutshi wa muoyo kabidi wakadi munkatshi mua budimi, ne mutshi wa lungenyi lua kujingulula malu mimpe ne malu mabi
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamueneka kudiye mu ludimi lua kahia, luakadi luluhuka mu katshi, wakamona talala, kahia kakadi kosha katshi, katshi kakakahia
Mose wakahingana ku tshidi dilu kabidi, kadi mukuatshishi wandi Yoshua, nsongalume, muana wa balume wa Nuna, kakaluhuka mu Ntenta
Dituku dia muanda mutekete nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Kahia bakahatuka kudi Yehowa, kakosha mulambu ne dianyi biakadi ha tshioshelu, hakakatangila bantu bonso, bakela mbila, bakatua mpala hanshi
Kadi kabidi ne bukookeshi bwa kulumbulwisha badibo babunda nabo bilumbu ne bavwa babambulwisha

Kadi bikala mitshima yenu mihambuke, ne binuikala kanuyi nunyua, kadi binuatendelela nzambi mikuabo bua kuyikuatshila mudimu, meme ndi nnuambila lelu ne, Nenujimishibue bulelela; kanuena nuvudisha matuku enu mu buloba bunuyaya dishiya dia Yadene bua kubuhiana
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Sheta Adama wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi

Genese Yakoba Udi Wangata Disanka dia Isaka Dituku dikuabo hakadi Isaka muntu mununu ne mesu andi akadi bileshileshi, kakamanya mua kutangila bimpe, yeye Wakabikila Esau muan andi, muan a bute, wa kamuambila ne, Muan anyi Yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Labana wakamuambila ne Bingikala ne diakalengele ku mesu kuebe ushale biebe, bualu bua meme nakumana kujingulula ne, Yehowa wakunsankisha bua bualu buebe
Hakadibo baya mu nshila wa ku nsubu wa tshilala benyi, Yehowa wakasangakena n andi, wakamba kumushiha
Palô wakatuma mundi, wakamona ne, Nansha tshintu tshimue tshia bimuna bia Bena Isalele tshiakafua
Bakatulula nsubu wa tshitendelelu hanshi, ne bana balume ba Gêshona ne bana balume ba Melali, bakadi batuala nsubu, bakaya ku mpala
Wewe neulue n au kudi tatu webe, yeye audie, akuvudishile disanka diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua

Biamba muhika ne, Ndi musue mukelenge wanyi ne mukashi wanyi ne bana banyi, tshiena musue kuheta budishikaminyi, nunku mukelenge wandi nealue handi kudi balumbuluishi, nealue handi ku tshibi anyi ku tshibanda tshia tshibi ne mukelenge wandi neatubuishe ditshu diandi ne tshiamu ne yeye neamukuatshile mudimu tshiendelele
Hakunvua mukelenge wa Yosefe mei akamuambila mukashi wandi ne, Muntu webe wakungenzela nunku, tshiji tshikole tshiakamukuata
Wakuvuwa bintu bia munda ne bioku, wakabisha ha tshioshelu ha mutu ha mulambu wa kuosha
Elisafana muana wa balume wa Uziele neikale mukelenge wa nsubu wa batatu ba Bena Kohata
Kadi ndi muma nye ne wewe ne bantu bebe kanuena banze kuikala ne ditshina dia Yehowa Nzambi
Mose wakamba ku mesu kua Yehowa ne, Mona, meme ndi muena tshikukumina, Palo neangunvuile munyi
Diasa dia tshisumbu tshia kabumwe didi tshibawu katshiyi kukupula tshia dipangila dia ditunga tshinyokibwa kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Bobo kabena bikala mu buloba buebe bualu bua bobo nebakuenzeshe bua kungenzela malu mabi, biwatendelela nzambi yabo, bualu ebu nebuikale buteyi kûdi

Ubikile Alona mukulu ebe kûdi, ne bana bandi balume balue n andi ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, yeye ankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi, Alona mene ne Nadaba ne Abihu, Eleazâ ne Itamâ, bana balume ba Alona
Wewe ne ba mu nsubu webe nenubadie ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ku tshidimu ku tshidimu mu muaba udi Yehowa musungule
Tshiena muhunge n enu nuenu nkayenu tshihungidi etshi ne kuditshiha eku, kadi ne muntu yonso udi muimane ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, lelu, ne muntu yonso udi kayi muimane n etu lelu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Muakuny ebe wakulua ne bu dimu wakumana kuangata disanka diebe
Bobo nebalame bintu biebe ne bintu bia mu Ntenta: kadi bobo kabalu ha buihi ne malonga a mu nsubu anyi tshioshelu, bua bobo kabafu ne nuenu kanufu kabidi
Nudi mua kuamba muntu wa bende kasombela; kadi kanulombi mukuenu kasombela; bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, anuvudishile disanka mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza, mu buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana
Yeye wakenzela Abalama bimpe bua bualu buandi, wakamuha mikoko ne ngombe, ne balume ba nyama ya mpunda, ne bahika balume ne bahika bakashi, ne mashina a nyama ya mpunda ne tumelo
Kueyemenyi buhele bua muntu muhele mu dikosa dia tshilumbu tshiandi

Muntu udi kayi muakane neangate butue bua mulambu wakoshabo bua kubuikila n au bubi, neangate mai adi ahueka mu dilonga: mundi utshidi muakane neangate mabeshi a hysope, neâtue mu mai, neamiamine ha ntenta, ne ha malonga onso, ne ha bantu bonso bakadimu, ne mundi wakalenga mifuba tshianza, anyi mundi wakafua ku muele wa nvita, anyi mundi mufue, anyi lukita, mundi utshidi muakane neamiamine mai ha mundi udi kayi muakane dî diku disatu ne dituku dia muanda mutekete, ne halua dituku dia muanda mutekete neamulengeshe, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne mai, neikale muakane ku dilolo
Hakadi Esau ne bidimu makumi anai, wakangata Yudita, muana mukashi wa Bêli, Muena Hiti, ne Basemata, muana mukashi wa Elone, Muena Hiti, bu bakashi bandi

Mucìma muku nanga mwena kwanyì Bayanyì dinanga dya bamoyo wanyì Shabana, kunangindi bibi lelu Bwalu bilengele bicilwàlwa Mukaji wa badiadia badiadia Wa kafwisha bayende mwitu eee Claude Mashala Mu civwa muku nanga mwena kwanyì Bayanyì dinanga dyà bamoyo wanyì Shàbana, kunangindi bibi lelu Bwalu bilengele bicilwalwa Mukaji wa badiadia badiadia Wa kufwisha bayende mwitu eee Kabuta kaka, bakulumpe bakamba ne Kunangindi byà kubwala bwala ishibuta usànke bwalu cyèbè cidimu
Bualu bua nakumutangila ku mutu kua mabue, nakamumona ku mutu kua mikuna, bantu aba badi bashikama ha buabo kabena babadibua munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabo

Haditshiha mukashi kudi Yehowa, anyi halayeye mulayi wandi, hatshidiye mu nsubu wa tatu andi, ku bunsongakashi buandi, biunvua tatu wandi kuditshiha kuandi, biahuwa tatu wandi kudiye, nunku kuditshiha kuandi kuonso ne mei andi onso nebijalame
Bakamba ne, Muena Ejipitu wakatusungila mu tshianza tshia balami, wakatukokela mai kabidi, wakanuisha mikoko
Lakele wakamba ne, Biwampa tumuma tua muan ebe, Yakoba nealale n ebe butuku ebu
Mweena Kongu yônso udi mwikala ne mapa ende a bweena mwabo ne a tshidiidi udi ne bukookeshi bwa kwasa tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi anyi bwa kubweela mu tshisumbu tshidiye muswa
Bungi bua Bena Lewi bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona bu muakambila Yehowa, ku meku abo, balume bonso ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu, buakadi binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi
Yuda wakangatshila Ele muan andi, muan a bute, mukashi dina diandi Tama Ele, muan a bute wa Yuda wakadi muntu mubi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Yehowa wakamushiha

Nuvuluke malu onso akanuenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bidimu ebi makumi anai hakadiye munulombole mu tshihela, bualu bua kunuhuekesha, ne kunuteta bualu bua kumanya malu akadi mu mitshima yenu, ne nudi basue kutumikila mikenji yandi, anyi kuyihidia
Selofehada, muana mulume wa Hefê, kakadi ne bana ba balume nansha, wakadi anu ne bana ba bakashi, mena a bana ba bakashi ba Selofehada
Kanungu ka Dîyi dilongolodi didi dileeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Tshipangu tshia mianda ya bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bweena ditunga
Isaka wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi muan anyi Esau bulelela, anyi
Bûngi bwa lupetu ludi lubweela lwa ditunga dijima ludibo bapeesha polovensa badi babuteeka mu bia lukama
Muakuidi neanyukule bintu ebi ne mampa a bintu biakahuolabo diambedi ne bana ba mikoko babidi bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa, nebikale bintu bia tshijila kudi Yehowa bualu bua muakuidi
Bena bilengulengu kabakamanya mua kuimana ku mpala kua Mose bualu bua mputa ya mbalanga, mputa yakadi ham bidi ha bena bilengulengu ne ham bidi ha Bena Ejipitu bonso
Yeye nealongolole minda ha bitekelu biai bia or numpe ku mpala kua Yehowa ku dituku ku dituku
Bungi bua bantu bakafua ku disama edi bakadi binunu dikumi ne binai ne nkama muanda mutekete, ha mutu ha bantu bakafua bua bualu bua Kola
Edi kadiena di dituakukuambila mu Ejipitu ne, Utulekele bua tukuatshile Bena Ejipitu mudimu, anyi

Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bukookeshi bukwabo budi Dîyi edi anyi mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga mikapeesha, Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika kadi katangila malomba a ditangilula, panyima pa mapangadika mangata mu tshitupa tshia ndekeelu kudi Tubadi ne tubinadi twa basivila ne twa basalayi
Bakumuka mu Iyima, bakashikama mu Dibona gada
Mose ne bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi bakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Huwai, unvuai, Bena Isalele, lelu nuakulua bu bantu ba Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kanungu ka Tulasa tudi tudikadile
Hakalueye Penuele, diba diakabanda, ne Yakoba wakadi utebuka bualu bua tshikundukundu tshiandi
Yeye wakamba kabidi ne, Monai, nakunvua lumu ne, Bintu bia kudia biakashala mu Ejipitu, yai bienu kuakua, nutusumbileku bia kudia, bua tuetu tuhanduke, katufu
Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Kubedi mulau, kubavudishidi disanka nansha
Nenufile tshituha tshia bintu bienu bionso bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa nenufile bintu bidi bitamba buimpe, bintu bia tshijila mene
Yeye wakamba ne, Ungambila difutu diebe, nenkufutedi
Munyi mudi Bena Ejipitu mua kuamba ne, Yeye wakabaluhula bua kubenzela bibi, ne bua kubashiha ku mikuna, ne bua kubajimisha ha buloba

Hanuasemena hehi ne musoko bua kuluangana n abo, diambedi nenubaleshe ditalala; ne bikalabo banukudimune mei makane, bianunzuluilabo bibi, hashishe bantu bonso badimu nebanulambule milambu, nebanukuatshile mudimu

Wewe ne bana bebe balume badi n ebe nenuikale ne mudimu wa buakuidi bua bintu bionso bia tshioshelu ne bintu bidi ku nyima kua tshilulu tshikudika, nuenu nenuenze mudimu eu, nakunuha mudimu wa buakuidi bu mudimu wa kuha kuenu, muenyi udi ulua ha buihi, nebamushihe
Yeye wakaya ha bule buludiludi buakadi muana bu mudi muntu wamba kuela mikete, bualu bua wakamba ne, Tshitangidi lufu lua muana Yeye wakashikama buludiludi buakadi muana, wakaula muadi, wakadila
Yakoba wakalua ku Luze eu udi Betele mu buloba bua Kanana, yeye ne bantu bonso bakadiye n abo

Tshikondo tshidibo bashehula bintu netshikale tô ne ku tshikondo tshidibo bahuola mamuma a mitshi, ne tshikondo tshidibo bahuola mamuma netshikale tô ne ku tshikondo tshidibo bakuna bintu, nenukute mafu tente ne bia kudia, nenushikame mu buloba buenu talala
Lea wakimita difu, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Lubena, bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa wakatangila dikenga dianyi, ne katataka bayanyi neansue
Palo wakakonka Yakoba ne, Bidimu bia muoyo webe bidi bungi munyi
Ekesode Kuhita kua Yehowa Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne, Ngondo eu neikale tshibangidilu tshia ngondo kunudi, neikale ngondo wa kumudilu kua tshidimu kunudi
Yuda wakabimanya, wakamba ne, Yeye udi muntambe meme buakane, bualu bua meme tshiakamubakisha kudi muan anyi mulume Shela
Yehowa wakabikila Mose ku mutu kua mukuna, ne Mose wakabanda
Bena Isalele Badi Batombokela Yehowa ku Holeba Numanye bienu ne, Yehowa kena munuhe buloba ebu buimpe bu buhianyi bualu bua buakane buenu; bualu bua nudi bantu ba tshitshu
Bialala mulume ne mulume mu kuabo bu mudiye ulala ne mukashi, bubidi buabo bakenza bualu bubi nebabashihe, ne mashi abo neikale ham bidi habo

Kabeena mwa kubwelakana diakamwe anyi mu mantonya mu mishinga ya patooka idi ifila makasa kudi biludiki anyi bishimikidi bidibo badiila pabo makasa kudi bukalenga bunene, polovensa ne bitupa biludiki bidikadile
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Utume bantu, bua bobo batentekele buloba bua Kanâna, bundi mpa Bena Isalele, usungule mundi ku tshisamba ku tshisamba, mundi yonso udi bu mukelenge munkatshi muabo
Genese Kana ne Ebele Adama wakamanyangana ne Eva, mukashi wandi, ne yeye wakimita difu, wakalela Kana, wakamba ne, Nakuangata muntu kudi Yehowa
Badi Basangula Bena Lewi Kadi kabakabala Bena Lewi munkatshi muabo ku tshisamba tshia batatu abo
KOKOLA udju wagashighaita baba shibaiwan wambe kokola kak tshala muana tseula muana wambe kokola mkana mwana tsheula mwana wambe kokola udju wagashighaita baba shibaiwan wambe kokola

Katataka nudikonke munda bua matuku adi ku nyima akadi ku mpala kuenu, katshia Nzambi wafuka bantu ha buloba, ne ku luseke lumue lua diulu tô ne ku luseke lukuabo ne, Bikalaku bualu bunene nunku, anyi bikalabo bunvue lumu lua bualu bua nunku
Eliaba, muana mulume wa Helona, wakadi ku mutu kua Bena Zebuluna

Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, neabuikile bubi bua muntu udiye musue kulengesha ku bubi buandi ku nyima yeye neashihe mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bukula ha tshioshelu, muakuidi neamubuikidile bubi buandi, ne yeye neikale muakane

Nuye anu ne bintu binuakajidila ne milambu yenu ya kuditshiha ku muaba udi Yehowa Usungula; nenufile milambu yenu ya kuosha, ne munyinyi ne mashi, ha tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; nuhongolole mashi a milambu yenu ha tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; nudie munyinyi wau
Nzambi Udi Ukengesha Bena Isalele Nom
Uteke tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kuosha ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakahunga n etu tshihungidi mu Holeba
Yeye wakakonka tuhita tua Palô diakadi n andi mu nsubu wa lukanu mu nsubu wa mukelenge wandi ne, Nudi nubungamina lelu nunku tshinyi
Bakahaula biuma bionso bia mu Sodoma ne Amola ne bintu bia kudia, bakaya mu nshila
Abalahama wakahuola muoyo wandi, wakafua mununu, bidimu biandi biakakumbana bia bungi, ne yeye wakadisangisha ne bankambua bandi
Kuvudi mukashi wa muan ebe bilulu, yeye udi mukashi wa muana webe, kuvudi bilulu biandi
Mose wakabanda mu mukuna ne difutu diakabuikila mukuna

Kanukengeshi muntu wakabuela mu mudimu wa difutu, udi muhele ne udi kayi ne bintu, nansha umue wa bana benu nansha muenyi udi ushikama mu buloba buenu ne mu misoko yenu; nubafute difutu diabo buatshia buatshia diambedi diba kadiyi dianze kubuela; bualu bua bobo badi bahele ne badi bakuma mitshima yabo ku difutu; bobo kabadidi kudi Yehowa bualu buenu, ne bualu ebu kabuikadi bubi kunudi
Muntu yônso udi ne tshia kuneemeka Dîyi dikulu ne kulonda mêyi ne mikandu ya Ditunga
Nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
bampulushi ba ditunga;
Yeye wakungambila ne, Ubanduluke, utangile ne mbushi ya bimpanga yonso idi iya kudi mashina a mbushi idi ne mihola mihola ne matoba matoba bualu bua nakutangila malu onso akukuenzela Labana
Kanuikadi ne luse kudi batumpidianganyi aba: nebafile muoyo ku muoyo, disu ku disu, dinu ku dinu, tshianza ku tshianza, dikasa ku dikasa
Lota wakaluhuka, wakambila baku bakadi babangila bana bandi bakashi ne, Jukai, numuke mu musoko eu, bualu bua Yehowa neashihe musoko Kadi yeye wakadi bu muntu udi wakula biakulakula kudi baku bandi
Mose wakaluhuka mu musoko kudi Palô, wakolola bianza biandi kudi Yehowa, ne makubakuba ne mabue a nvula biakashika, nvula kakamata ha buloba kabidi
Nunku Yosefe wakasumbila Palo buloba bua Ejipitu buonso bualu bua Muena Ejipitu yonso wakahana madimi andi bualu bua tshiole tshiakabatamba bukole, buloba buakalua bua Palô
Bena Isalele Badi Bumuka mu Ejipitu Bena Isalele bakaya ku Lamesese tô ne ku Sukota, balume bakenda hanshi bakadi bu bununu nkama isambombo, ne bana kabidi
Melekisedeke, mukelenge wa Salema, wakalua ne mampa ne nvinyo

Lewitiki Masanka Adi Alonda Batumikidi ba Mikenji Kanusongi mpingu, kanujadiki luhingu lua tshiamu tshiakafulabo, anyi dikunshi anyi dibue diakasongabo mu buloba buenu bua kubmamina, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Hashishe, Mose wakabanda ne Alona ne Nadaba ne Abihu ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele makumi muanda mutekete
Dîyi didi difila bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya balumbulwishi
Mose wakaya kusangakena ne tatu andi muenu, wakamukukuila, wakatuangana n andi mishiku, bakakonkangana bua malu abo, bakabuela mu ntenta
Hakamba diba kubuela, tulu tukole tuakakuata Abalama monai, buowa bua midima buakamukuata
Ayi ke milongo minene idi isunguluja Dîyi dikulu
Bakakanda bantu nunku
Kadi halua tshidimu tshinai, nujidile mamuma onso a mu tshidimu atshi bua kutendelela n au Yehowa
Hadileye kundi, nemmunvuile, bualu bua meme ndi ne luse

Genese Luhanza Lujimina Yosefe wakambila mulami wa nsubu wandi ne, Ûshe bibombi bia balume ne bia kudia tente, bungi bua bujitu budibo mua kutuala, teka argent ya muntu ne muntu munda mua tshîbombi tshiandi
Kanulambi muana wa mukoko ne mabele a mamu wandi

Belâma Udi Wamba Malu Alualua Ku Mpala Tshiji tshiakakuata Balaka bualu bua Belâma wakakuma bianza biandi Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Nakakubikila bua kungelela bantu badi hanyi lukuna mulau, kadi mona, wewe wakubavudishila disanka misangu ei isatu
Wakenza tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi kudi bantu ba lungenyi lule, bu muakenzabo efoda ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzu ne bia lin muimpe
Ndi nkutendekena ne, Witabushe matabisha anakulua n au kudi, bualu bua Nzambi wakungenzela bimpe ne meme ndi ne bintu bikumbane kabidi
Bakatamba mikata ya bidia biakadi kabiyi ne luevene biakaluabo n abi, kabakadi ne luevene bualu bua bakahitata mu Ejipitu, kabakamanya mua kushala, ne kabakadianjila kudilongoluela bia kudia

Kanuikadi ne luevene mu nsubu yenu to matuku muanda mutekete, ne muntu yonso udi udia bintu bia luevene, nebamumushe munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele; nansha bikaleye muenyi anyi muntu muledibue mu buloba
Bakumuka mu Lefidima bakashikama mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Mose Udi Unyema Ejipitu Mu matuku au, hakakola Mose, yeye wakaya kudi bana babo, wakamona mudimu wabo mukole, wakamona Muena Ejipitu ukuma Muena Ebelu, muan abo

Mu makanyika mafila kudi mêyi a ditunga, bidi biambulwisha, mu dîba dia ditalala, ku ditantshisha dia bubanji, dia nsombelu wa bantu ne dia bunkambwa pamwe ne ku dikuba dia bantu ne bintu biaabo Kanungu ka Bilwilu bidi bia ditunga dijima

Tuakanyenga misoko yandi yonso tshikondo atshi, tuakahaula musoko ne musoko muakadi bantu, ne bakashi ne bana bakese: katuakashiya nansha muntu; kadi tuakadiangatshila bimuna, ne bintu biakadi mu misoko ituakanyenga
Wakatuangasha bilulu bitanu ha buabi, ne bilulu bisambombo ha buabi

Kanungu ka Dîba didi maalu makole afwana kujimija budikadidi anyi bujima bwa tshipaapu tshia ditunga anyi kufikisha ku dimanyikija dia lweendu lwa bishimikidi bia ditunga, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka bulongolodi bwa tshimpitshimpi anyi bwa bilwilu panyima pa diyukilangana ne minisitila wa kumpala ne balombodi ba bibambalu biônso bibidi bia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga, bu mudibio biambibwa mu tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu edi
Mutshima wa Palo wakakoleshibua, yeye kakabunvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
dipingaja dia beena bilumbu mwabo, diya kusomba mu ditunga dia benda, dipatuka dia mu ditunga diebe, difila dia pasepolo ne viza;
Yosefe wakambila tatu andi ne, Nansha, tatu anyi, kuenji nunku, bualu bua eu udi muan a bute, utentekashe tshianza tshiebe tshia balume ha mutu handi
Genese Yosefe ne Mukashi wa Potifâ Bakaya ne Yosefe mu Ejipitu, ne Potifa, kamanda ka masalayi a Palo, Muena Ejipitu, wakamusumba ku bianza bia Bena Yishemaele, bakalua n andi
Kadi muntu udi wenza bualu bubi ne mutshima mukole nansha muntu mulela munkatshi muenu nansha muenyi, muntu au udi uhenda Yehowa, nebamumushe munkatshi muabo

Nulue ne mampa au ne bana ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne bilema ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne bimpanga bibidi, bintu ebi nebikale bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, udibo bafila ne mulambu wa bukula ne mulambu wa bintu bia kunua, bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Mu matuku onso a tshijila tshiandi kabateki dihaya ha mutu n andi, neikale mundi wa tshijila tô ne hashikisheye matuku adiye musue kubijidila kudi Yehowa; nsuki ya ha mutu n andi neyikale mile
Udi mwimanyina pa dineemeka dia Dîyi dikulu
Biosha kahia bisumbu bia luosa anyi luosa lua mu budimi, muntu wakatemesha kahia neafute
Wakananukila kumusengelela ne yeye wakângata

Lewitiki Makenga Adi Akuata Benji ba Malu a Bundu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele kabidi ne, Muntu yonso wa Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele udi ufila muana wandi kudi Moleke neashihibue bulelela, bena buloba nebamukume ne mabue
Bakabikila Lebeka, bakamuebesha ne, Udi musue kuya ne muntu eu, anyi
Bakenza bilulu ebi bionso ne buanda bua lin muimpe

Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada bakadi ne bimuna bia bungi be, hakatangilabo ne buloba bua Yazê ne buloba bua Gilada buakadi muaba muimpe wa bimuna, Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena bakalua kudi Mose ne Eleazâ muakuidi ne kudi bakelenge ba tshisumbu, bakamba ne, Atalota ne Dibona ne Yazê ne Nimela ne Heshebona ne Eleale ne Sebama ne Nebo ne Beone, buloba buakashihabo kudi Yehowa ku mpala kua tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele, mbuloba bua bimuna, ne bantu benu badi ne bimuna
Hashishe Palô wakabikila Mose ne Alona lubilu, wakamba ne, Nakuenzela Yehowa Nzambi wenu bualu bubi ne nuenu kabidi

Yeye wakasemena ha buihi, wakatuangana n andi mishiku, yeye wakanunkila muhuya wa bilulu biandi, wakamuvudishila disanka ne, Tangila, muhuya wa muan anyi udi bu muhuya wa budimi buakasankishibua kudi Yehowa, nunku Nzambi akumatshishile dibungi dia mu diulu akuhe buloba butu bukuatshike bintu bia bungi, ne manvua ne nvinyo muhiamuhia bia bungi, bantu bakukuatshile mudimu, ne bisamba bia bantu bitue mpala hanshi ku mesu kuebe wikale mukelenge wa bana benu, bana ba mamu webe batue mpala hanshi ku mesu kuebe, muntu yonso udi ukuela mulau neadiele mulau muntu yonso udi ukuvudishila disanka, adivudishile disa nka
Bana bonso banudi batela mbanyi; ban a bute ba balume ba bimuna mbanyi, ban a bute ba ngombe ne ba mikoko
Enza nkanu ya or mai, ne teka nkanu ku mikolo mai ya mesa
Bakamba ne, Bulelela, Yehowa wakasomba anu ne Mose, anyi

Hakamba Palo kuhidia kundekelu, Yehowa wakashiha ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ba bantu ne ba nyama kabidi, nunku ndi mushihele Yehowa ban a bute ba balume ba nyama, kadi ndi muhikule ban a bute ba balume banyi
Dutelonone Mikenji Dikumi Ek
Hakabakengeshabo nunku, Bena Isalele bakakumbana ba bungi, bakatangadika Mitshima ya Bena Ejipitu yakanyingalala bualu bua Bena Isalele
Kabena babikila kabidi dina diebe ne, Abalama, kadi nebakuidike dina diebe ne, Abalahama, bualu bua nakakuvuisha nkambua wa bisamba bia bungi
Malonga onso a mu nsubu, adi kayi ne bibuikidi, neikale bu tshintu tshidi katshiyi tshiakane
