Muntu yonso udi ulenga tshintu tshiakashalameye tshianza neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo, muntu udi utuala bintu ebi neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Helabo mpungi, bantu bonso nebadisangishe kûb ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena
disomba dia lupetu pambelu bwa majinga a Ditunga anyi a polovensa;
Yehowa neanumushile masama onso: kena unusamisha masama mabi a mu Ejipitu, anudi bamanye, kadi yeye neasamishe badi n enu lukuna masama au
Mose wakatshishiha, wakantumina mashi ku tshioshelu
Wa kabifila mu bianza bia bahika bandi, tshisumbu ha buatshi tshisumbu ha buatshi, wakabambila ne Sabukai ku mpala kuanyi, nushilangane muaba hankatshi ha tshisumbu ne tshisumbu
Shila malu a mushimi kaba, kanushihi muntu muimpe udi kayi ne bualu meme tshiena mbingisha muntu mubi
Munazi neabeye nsuki ya ha mutu ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena neangate nsuki, neayiteke ha kahia kadi kuinshi kua mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala
Nunku Bena Isalele kabatu badia munyinyi wa ku tshikundukundu to ne katataka, bualu bua yeye wakalenga tshianza ha tshikundukundu tshia Yakoba

Nakulua hanshi bua kubasungila mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu, ne bua kubaluhula mu buloba abu, ne bua kulua n abo mu buloba buimpe ne bunene, mu buloba budi ne mabele ne buitshi bia bungi, mu muaba wa Bena Kanana ne wa Bena Hiti ne wa Bena Amole ne wa Bena Pelese ne wa Bena Hiwi ne wa Bena Yebuse

Kanulondi nzambi mikuabo ya bantu badi ha buihi n enu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi wa mukau, bua tshiji tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, katshikadi kunudi, ne bua yeye kanujimishi ha mutu ha buloba

Mwenji wa Dîyi dikulu udi ushindikulula se Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata didi anu ditabija bulongolodi bwa Mapa a Muntu yônso ne budikadidi bwa nshindameenu mu mushindu udi mêyi maludiki a bisamba biabûngi adidio ditabija mâmba
bulongolodi budi butangila ngikadilu wa midilu, wa madimi ne meetu, bumunyi,bidibwa bia munyinyi ne bia bisekiseki;

Kadi nudi mua kushiha nyama ne mua kudia munyinyi ku mbelu kuenu udi mitshima yenu misue, bu mudi disanka dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, diakanusankisheye n adi; bantu badi kabayi bakane ne badi bakane badi mua kudia munyinyi wa kabuluku ne mbashi
Yeye wakumuka mu buloba abu, wakaya mu Ashû, wakasa Ninewe ne Lehobote Ila ne Kala ne Lesene, hankatshi ha Ninewe ne Kala eu udi musoko munene

Kamuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi buleeja mu tunungu twa , ne twa Dîyi ditudi nadi edi, basungudianganyi ne badi mwa kusungudibwa, bilondeshila makanyika a dîyi, badi beena Kongu balume ne bakaji, bikala bamana kukumbaja mvula dikumi ne mwanda mukulu ya tshileledi ne bikala ne makookeshi abo a bweena mwabo ne a tshidiidi
Mukashi kaluatshi bilulu bia mulume, ne mulume kaluatshi bilulu bia bakashi: muntu yonso udi wenza malu au nunku udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Mabaya abidi neikale ne mpoko ibidi bua kutuângasha, enza mabaya onso a tshitendelelu nunku
Genese Abalahama ne Abimeleke Abalahama wakumuka ku muaba au, wakaya ku Sude, wakashikama hankatshi ha Kadesha ne Shû, wakashikama ku Gelâ
Aba mbana ba balume ba Lea bakaleleleye Yakoba mu Padana alama, ne muan andi wa bakashi Dina, bana bandi ba balume ne bana bandi ba bakashi makumi asatu ne basatu
Tuakanyunguluka, tuakaya mu nshila wa ku tshihela tshia Moaba
Mose wakamona mudimu wonso wakenzabo, ne mona, baka wenza bu muakamba Yehowa Mose wakabandisha disanka
Ei idi nyama mudi mua kudia: ngombe ne mukoko ne mbushi, mbashi ne kabuluku ne ntole ne mbushi wa ha mpata, ne lusumbi, ne ngulungu ne mukoko wa mu mikuna

Mukenji wa Kumusha Bena Amaleka Tshiendelele Nuvuluke bu muakanuenzela Amaleka mu nshila hanuakaluhuka mu Ejipitu; bu muakasangakeneye n enu mu nshila, wakashiha bantu bakashala ku nyima bakadi batekete, hanuakahanga, hanuakamba kufua mu nshila; yeye kakatshina Nzambi

Bualu bua misoko mudi nubaha munkatshi mua Isalele, bantu badi ne misoko ya bungi, nebabahe misoko ya bungi, ne badi ne misoko mikese nebabahe misoko mikese, nebahe Bena Lewi misoko bu bungi bua buhianyi buabo
Mu tshidimu tshia kuhuola blê, Lubena wakaya mu budimi, wakangula tumuma, wakalua n atu kudi mamu andi Lea Lakele wakambila Lea ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Umpeku tumuma tukuabo tua muan ebe
Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu badi bakenzulula mu tshimwe tshia bisatu tshiaku panyima pa bidimu biônso bisatu
Cilunga mulwesu, cikombola cikwanga Baswa kulwata, tulwata anu momumwa, Cyètù canza colola anu wa kulomba yo yo yo

Kadi dia mbedi bobo kabayi banze kulala bena musoko wa Sodoma, ne banso ngalume ne bantu banunu ba nseke yonso bakanyunguluka nsubu, ba kabikila Lota, bakamukonka ne Balume aba bakulua kudi butuku ebu badi hanyi
bua bobo kabakatshumanya Mose wakabambila ne, Tshidi bidia biakunuha Yehowa bua kudia
Wewe wakasasula bintu bianyi bionso, wakasanganamu tshintu tshiebe tshimue, anyi
Meme nkayanyi ndi mua kutuala malu enu ne bujitu buenu ne kutanda kuenu munyi
Anyi bialengeye tshianza ha manyanu a muntu ne bikala bualu ebu busokoka ku mesu kuandi, hamanyeye bualu ebu, yeye neahile
Bualu bua meme nempite buloba bua Ejipitu butuku abu, nenshihe ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ba bantu ne ba nyama; nendumbuluishe nzambi yonso ya Ejipitu, meme ndi Yehowa
Badi bapatukila mu masungulangana a kudi bônso diakamwe ne muntu ne muntu pa nkayenda

Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya bakoshi ba nsambu badi bakakumbaja kudi: Mulombodi wa Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu; Mulombodi wa palake mulamatshisha ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu; Mulombodi wa kumpala wa Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika; Mulombodi wa palake mulamatshisha ku Kabadi kashipi ka ma pangadika; Mulombodi wa kumpala wa Kapangu ka Mbula Matadi; Mulombodi wa palake mulamatshisha ku Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi; Mulombodi wa kumpala wa Kabadi ka kulu ka basalayi; Balombodi ba palake milamatshisha ku Kabadi ka kulu ka basalayi; Balombodi ba kumpala ba Tubadi twa kabweendela; Balombodi ba palake milamatshisha ku Tubadi twa kabwendela; Balombodi ba kumpala ba Tubadi twa Mbula Matadi twa kabwendela; Balombodi ba palake milamatshisha ku Tubadi twa Mbula Matadi twa kabwendela
Muntu yonso udi uhidia kunvua mei anyi adiye wamba mu dina dianyi, meme nenkose tshilumbu tshiandi
Udi kabidi mwa kuya ku Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu mu kulonda kwa tshilumbu tshiadibenga kumvwangana ne dîyi dikulu tshijula mu tshilumbu tshidi tshimutangila kumpala kwa tshilumbulwilu kampanda

Hanuashikisha kufila tshia dikumi tshia bintu bienu bionso mu tshidimu tshisatu tshidibo bafila tshia dikumi tshia bintu, nenubale Bena Lewi ne benyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila; nunku bobo nebadie mu misoko yenu, nebukute
Nundekelele bubi buanyi anu musangu eu, nundombele Yehowa Nzambi wenu, yeye angumushile bualu ebu bua lufu
Nuikale bantu ba tshijila kundi, bualu bua meme Yehowa ndi wa tshijila, nakanusungula munkatshi mua bantu bua nuenu nuikale bantu banyi
Kanungu ka Dineemeka dia mapa a muntu yônso ne dia budikadidi bwa shindameenu budi bushindikibwa mu Dîyi dikulu badi badikanyika bamfumu ba Mbulamatadi ne kabidi muntu yônso
Udi ne tshia kulonda mêyi ne mikandu ya Ditunga pa wôwu

Nenuhiane buloba ku meku enu, hanuela nshobo, nenuhe bantu ba bungi buloba bua bungi, ne bantu bakese buloba bukese, biakuata nshobo muntu, buloba abu nebuikale buandi, nenuhiane buloba bu mulongo wa bisamba bia batatu benu
Bualu buakenjibua Buloba buakamenesha bimenyi, midioko idi yela ntete, bu mudi mishindu yai, ne mitshi idi ikuama mamuma adi ne ntete yai, bu mudi mushindu wai

Labana wakamba ne Mushiki eu udi bu mutshihu wa bualu hankatshi hetu lelu Nunku bakabikila muaba au ne, Galede ne, Misepa, bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa atulame meme ne wewe, hatuamuangalaka muntu ne muntu
Zilepa, muena mudimu wa Lea, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume mukuabo Lea wakamba ne, Ndi ne disanka, ne bakashi nebambikile ne, Muena disanka Wakamuidika dina ne, Ashe
Ekesode Badi Batela Bivualu bia Bakuidi Ek
Mose ne Alona ne Bena Isalele bonso bakenzela Bena Lewi nunku, Bena Isalele bakenza malu onso akambila Yehowa Mose bua Bena Lewi
Mweena Kongu yônso udi mwa kwasa tshisumbu tshia diaakwila beena mudimu anyi mwa kumubweela mudilekelela bilondeshila bulongolodi bwa mêyi a ditunga
Bishala ditoba ditoke mu muaba umue, kadiyi ditampakane mu dikoba, etshi ntshiuja tshiakadiosheye ne kahia, ne muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, etshi ntshibangu tshia kahia

Palô wakakohola kakanu ka tshimanyinu tshiandi tshifundahu ku munu wandi, wakakela ku munu wa Yosefe, wakamuluatshisha bilulu bia lin, wakamuela lukanu lua or mu nshingu muandi, wakamuendesha mu dikalu dibidi dia bukelenge, wakela mbila ku mpala kuandi ne, Tuai binu hanshi, wakamuteka mu bukelenge bua buloba bua Ejipitu buonso Palo wakambila Yosefe ne, Meme ndi Palo, ne biwikala kuyi muambe di diebe, muntu kena mua kubisha tshianza tshiandi anyi dikasa diandi mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Noa wakalela bana balume basatu, Shema, Hama ne Yafete
Yakoba wakamukonka ne, Ungambile dina diebe Muntu wakamuebesha ne, Udi unkonkela dina dianyi tshinyi
Kanuenzedianganyi bibi, nuenu nenutshine Nzambi webe bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yeye wakambila Mose ne, Meme tatu ebe muenu, Yetelo, nakukuluila ne mukashi webe ne bana bandi ba balume babidi
Bangate muana mulume wa ngombe ne mulambu wandi wa bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, wewe newangate muana mulume wa ngombe mukuabo bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Yeye wakatangila kudi Amaleka, wakabela lusumuinu luandi ne, Amaleka wakadi tshisamba tshia ku mpala munkatshi mua bisamba, kadi kunshikidilu tshisamba tshiandi netshijimme tshiendelele
Kanungu ka Badi bâsa Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu mu ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata
Yehowa Nzambi wakambila mukashi ne, Bualu ebu buwakuenza budi tshinyi
Kadi bana balume ba Kola kabakafua
Nansha nanku bwa mapangadika adi atangila bantu, badi beela tukanda muntu ne muntu pa nkayenda
Mose wakangata kana ka ngombe kakenzabo, wakakosha mu kahia, wakakabotesha, wakakela mu mai, wakanuisha Bena Isalele mai au
Yakoba wakambila Lakele ne, Ndi muan abo ne tatu ebe, ndi muana wa Lebeka, Lakele wakaya lubilu, wakamanyisha tatu andi
Bantu bakadila kudi Mose, ne Mose wakalomba Yehowa, kahia kakajima
Yakoba wakatuma di wakabikila Lakele ne Lea mu budimi buakadi bimuna biandi, wakabambila ne, Ndi ntangila ne mpala wa tatu enu kena bu muvueye diambedi kadi Nzambi wa tatu wanyi wakadi n anyi
Hakadi Isalele ushikama mu muaba eu, Lubena wakalala ne Bileha, mukashi mukuabo wa tatu wandi, Isalele wakunvua lumu elu
Bua bualu ebu mbuakalotela Palo bilota bibidi, bualu ebu nebujadikibue kudi Nzambi, Nzambi neabushikishe tshituha tshibi
Ambila Bena Isalele ne, Baye ku mpala
Biahuoleye dinu dia muhika wandi mulume anyi muhika wandi mukashi, yeye neamumushe ku buhika buandi bualu bua dinu diandi
Bana bakadi baluangana munda muandi, yeye wakamba ne, Bikala bualu nunku, ndi mushale ne muoyo bua tshinyi
Yeye wakamba ne, Wakukuteka mukelenge wetu ne mulumbuluishi wetu nganyi
Ekesode Badi Basa Tshitendelelu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Halua dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa kumudilu, ushimike ntenta wa kusambakena
Kanuhuodi bintu bidi bidimenena anyi tumuma didi tudimenena etshi ntshidimu tshia kubanda kua buloba
Kanuadi bana bebe bua kubahitshisha mu kahia ka Moleke, kutedi dina dia Nzambi wenu tshitelatela meme ndi Yehowa
Muntu yonso udi ulumbuluisha benyi anyi bana ba nshiya anyi bakashi ba mu lufuila dilumbulula didi kadiyi diakane udi ne mulau
Mulubu ewu badi baupatula mu Tshibejibeji tshia mbulamatadi
Mêyi a ditunga adi aleeja mishindu ya kukumbaja kanungu katudi naku aka

Lupetu Bafidi ba bulongama Midimu ya Mbulamatadi a kabujima Dibutula dia tshisamba Bukalenga bunene Dijadikila , dishiindikila Dipangila dia ditunga Kasaala, musanzu Tshilema Lumu, mwanda mupiamupia, dimanyisha Bululame Tshilumbulwilu Bukalenga bwa bandumbulula,bukalenga bwa bakoshi ba nsambu,lukoongu lwa Tubadi tukoshi twa nsambu twa beena mwabo
Wakamuambila kabidi ne, Tudi ne mashinde ne manvua a bungi, ne miaba ya kulala

Biamu bia mu Tshitendelelu Bakasangisha or wa kuenza n ai mudimu wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ntalanta makumi abidi ne tshitema, ne nshekele nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi asatu, bu muakadi nshekele wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi
Abambana balume ba Yishemaele ku mena abo ne misoko yabo ne ku meku abo, baminyampala dikumi ne babidi ku bisamba biabo

Binuateleja matshu bimpe ku mikenji inakunuambila lelu, bua kusua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne kungenzela mudimu ne mitshima yenu yonso ne muoyo wenu wonso, hashishe nentume nvula ha buloba buenu mu tshidimu tshia nvula, ne nvula ya mbedi ne nvula ya ku nyima; nenumanye mua kuhuola manvua enu ne kukama nvinyo mihia mihia ne manyi enu

Bualu bua ndi mumanye ne, Ku nyima kua lufu luanyi nenutambe kudisangisha ne kusesuka mu nshila unakunulesha; malu mabi neanukuate mu matuku atshidi ku mpala; bualu bua nuenu nenuenze malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufikisha munda bua mudimu wa bianza bienu
Bantu bakitabusha ne hakunvuabo ne, Yehowa wakulua kudi Bena Isalele, wakumona dikenga diabo, bakinama mitu yabo, bakatendelela
Bilulu bienu kabiakasunsuka ham bidi henu, ne makasa enu kaena mûle bidimu ebi makumi anai
Ndi mua kuya kudi tatu wanyi bikala nsongalume kayi n anyi munyi

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia makookeshi makwabo adi Dîyi dikulu ne mêyi ne mikandu akapeesha, Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi kadi katangila, mu tshitupa tshia kumpala ne mu tshitupa tshia ndekeelu, malomba a ditangilula bilumbu bwaalu mbadiâta mêyi ne mikandu ku makasa, malomba mikala atontolola ngenzelu, nkoselu wa bilumbu ne mapangadika a bamfumu ba mbulamatadi munene
Hanakabanda ku mukuna bua kuangata mabue akadi ne mei a tshihungidi tshia Yehowa mafundahu, nakashala ku mukuna matuku makumi anai munya ne butuku; tshiakadia bidia, tshiakanua mai
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua bana bebe tô mu bikondo biabo bionso udi ne tshilema kena mua kulua ha buihi bua kufileye milambu kudi Nzambi wandi
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi, anyi yeye neatekeshe mitshima ya bantu bakuabo
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Noa, Lemeke wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama itanu ne makumi tshitema ne bitanu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Hakalela Leu Seluga, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama ibidi ne muanda mutekete, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Dina dia diboko disatu didi Hidekela, didi dinyunguluka ku esete kua buloba bua Ashû

Yakoba wakafua mulambu wa kuosha ba kalua ku mukuna, Wakabikila bantu bandi bua kudiabo bidia, bakadia bidia, bakalala ku mukuna butuku abu Labana wakabika hatshiatshia, wakatuangana mishiku ne bana bandi ba balume ne bana bandi ba bakashi, wakabavudishila disanka Labana wakahingana ku muaba wandi

Pikalabo kabayi bafila tshingenyingenyi mu tshipungu tshîmpe bwa kutshipatulabo kumpala kwa ntwadijilu wa tshikondu tshipiatshipia, Bukalenga bunene budi bulomba Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga bwa tshiaanji kwanyisha dipatula dia lupetu lwa nzanzanza
Kanukengeshi bakashi ba mu lufuila anyi bana ba nshiya

Halua bualu ebu buimpe kûdi, wewe unvuluke, ndi nkusengelela ne, Unfuile luse, wambileku Palô bualu buanyi, angumushe mu nsubu eu Bulelela, bakungiba mu buloba bua Bena Ebelu, ne kunoko kabidi tshiakuenza bualu bubi bua kungelelabo mu nsubu wa mîdima
Labana wakamba ne, Bualu ebu nebuikale bu mu di diebe
Mukalu wa Bena Kanana wakadi ku Sidona mu nshila wa ku Gela to ne ku Gaza mu nshila wa ku Sodoma ne Amola ne Adema ne Seboima to ne ku Lasha

Polovensa ayi nyôyo eyi : Bas Uele,Equateur, Haut Lomami, Haut Katanga, HautUele,Ituri, Kasaï, Kasaï Oriental, Kongo Central, Kwango, Kwilu, Lomami, Lualaba, Lulua, Mai Ndombe, Maniema, Mongala, Nord Kivu, Nord Ubangi, Sankuru, SudKivu , Sud Ubangi, Tanganyika, Tshopo, Tshuapa
Alona ne bana bandi balume nebaluate mihanu ei hayabo mu tshitendelelu anyi hayabo hehi ne tshioshelu bua kuenza mudimu wabo mu muaba wa tshijila, bobo kabatuadi mahambuka, kabafu

Kànkamana wa taatù, cikondu cilwàlwa tutambe kusànka byètù, Mwibile eee Kànkamana mwena kwanyì eee Kànkamana mwena kwanyì, cikondu cilwàlwa tutambe kusànka byètù, Pa buloba eee Kànkamana mwena kwanyì eee Mulùme wakanda undi musele, ucidi kwàbù, Kulonga kalasa wa kujikija mukanda, Udi anu ukèba mudimu wa kwètù, Tudi pembe basombe kuzubu kwà baledi
Adama wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne makumi asatu, wakalela muana mulume ne tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, mufuanangane n andi, wakamuidika dina ne, Sheta
Mose wakamba ne, Nudi nuhidia dî dia Yehowa munyi
Labana wakasangisha bantu bonso bakadiye n abo, wakabalambishila bidia bia dibanji
Anyi bikala ngombe muikale ne tshilele tshia kukuma ne nsengu diambedi, ne bikala mukelenge wandi kayi mumulame, yeye neafute ngombe ku ngombe, ne ngombe mufue neikale wandi

Wakashiha mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga kabidi, bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala kudi bantu, bana balume ba Alona bakamulesha mashi akamiamineye ku tshioshelu, ne dianyi dia mulume wa ngombe ne dia tshimpanga ne mukila udi ne dianyi ne dianyi didi ha mutu ha bintu bia munda ne tumuma ne lukutu lua mutshima, bakateka dianyi ha biadi, ne yeye wakosha dianyi ha tshioshelu, kadi Alona wakanyukula biadi ne tshibelu tshia ku tshianza tshia balume bu mulambu wa kunyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa, bu muakamba Mose
Hanoka wakendakana ne Nzambi, ne yeye kakikalaku bualu bua Nzambi wakamuangata
Zilepa, muena mudimu wa Lea, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume
Bimwangalaji bia ngumu ya kumvwa, ya kutangila ne mifunda bia Mbulamatadi bidi midimu ya bantu bônso mudibo ne tshia kuya kakuyi kansungansunga kudi nkongu yônso ya beena tshidiidi ne ya beena musoko
Nzambi wakambila Isalele mu bikena kumona mu butuku ne, Yakoba, Yakoba Yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku

Yehowa neanuhadishe, neanutumme bufofo, nenufue mikemu mu mitshima yenu; nenububute munda munya bu mudi muntu mufofo ububuta mu midima; kanuena nuenda dikasa dimpe mu nshila yenu, nebanutatshishe, nebanuibe, kakuena muntu udi mua kunusungila
Mose wakalomba Yehowa bua buila biakatumeye kudi Palô
Balami ba bimuna bia Abalama ne balami ba bimuna bia Lota bakatandangana

Yeye wakamuvudishila disanka, wakamba ne, Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu, mufuki wa diulu ne buloba asankishe Abalama, ne Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu, wakafua bena lukuna bebe mu tshianza tshiebe, atumbishibue Abalama wakamuha tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso
Wewe neuyikile handi, neuteke mei mukana muandi, meme nengikale ne mukana muebe ne mukana muandi, nenkuyishe malu anudi mua kuenza
Badi Bafila Bintu Biabo Hashishe, tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele tshionso tshiakumuka ku mesu kua Mose

Panyima pa dimungutuka dia Tshibambalu tshia Tshipwita munwamfwanka, Kasumbu kadikadikle komekela Mianda ya Masungulangana kadi kabiikila beedi ba tukanda bwa kusungulabo Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshipiatshipia, mu tshipungu tshia matuku makumi asambombo adi alonda dipatuka dia dipangadika dia dimungutula
Muntu yonso udi ulenga tshintu tshiakashikameye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kushala mupika wa mukwabo to anyi kwikala muteeka mu tshitupa tshifwanangane

Milambu ya Dia Lumingu ne ya Ngondo Mu dituku dia Lumingu neufue bana balume ba mikoko babidi badi kabayi ne tshilema ba tshidimu tshimue, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi bia tshihiminu tshimue tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi, ne mulambu wa bintu bidibo banua: eu udi mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ku matuku a Lumingu, ku mutu kua mulambu udibo bafila buatshia buatshia
Debola, muena mudimu wa bakashi wa Lebeka, wakafua, bakamujika muinshi mua mutshi munene wa mu Betele, bakabikila muaba au ne, Alonobakuta
Hakahita matuku asatu bakambila Labana ne, Yakoba wakunyema
Habuela diba yeye neikale muakane, ku nyima yeye udi mua kudia bintu bia tshijila bualu bua ebi mbidia biandi
Hayabo ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu mu nshila, Bena Lewi nebatule nsubu, ne halongololabo tshitudilu, Bena Lewi nebamushimike, bialua muenyi ha buihi nebamushihe
Mose ne Alona bakabuela mu ntenta wa kusangakena, bakaluhuka, bakavudishila bantu disanka, butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka kudi bantu bonso
Kadi kanudi mashi, bualu bua mashi adi muoyo; kanudi muoyo ne munyinyi hohamue
Muana wa bakashi wa Palo wakamuambila ne, Ya biebe Nsongakashi wakaya, Wakabikila mamu wa muana
Mose wakaluhuka mu tshitudilu ne bantu bua kusangakena ne Nzambi, bobo bakimana kuinshi kua mukuna
Kadi Palô kena ukunyuila, ne meme nenteke tshianza tshianyi ha Ejipitu, nempatule bantu banyi Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Bena Ejipitu ku dilumbulula dikole

BIDI BITANGILA DIAKAJILULA DIA DIYI DIKULU Bwa kwepula ngenyi miludiki ya mungalata idi mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi ku mpukapuka ya tshidiidi ne ku diyitangilula kadiyi dikengedibwa, diakajilula dia Dîyi dikulu nansha dimwe kadieena mwa kulenga bulongolodi budi butangila Mbulamatadi wa Bukalenga bwabanyangana, lungenyi luludiki lwa disungudibwa kudi bantu bônso, bweena mpala bwa Bukalenga bunene, bûngi ne bule bwa matuku a butumibwa bwa Mulombodi wa ditunga, budikadidi bwa bukalenga bwa bandumbulula, tshibûngi tshia bisumbu bia tshidiidi ne bia bakwidi ba beena mudimu

Biumusha muntu tshibuikidi tshia ha mutu ha dina, anyi biumbuleye dina kayi uteka tshibuikidi ha mutu, ne biahonamu ngombe anyi kabalu, muena dina neashikishe bualu bimpe, neahe muen abi biuma, ne nyama mufue neikale wandi
Uteke tukanu tua or tuhindakasha ku nkanu idi ku nseke ya tshilulu

Yehowa wakunvua mei enu, wakadi n enu tshiji, wakaditshiha ne, Nansha muntu umue wa mu tshikondo etshi tshibi neatangile buloba ebu buimpe, bunakalaya batatu enu bua kunuhabu, anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, neabutangile; nemmuhe buloba buakadiateye muinshi mua makasa andi, ne kudi bana bandi, bualu bua yeye wakalonda Yehowa bulelela
Wakabikila nsubu ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu ha nsubu, wakateka tshilulu tshikuabo ha mutu hatshi, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kalongu kinâyi : Bidi bitangila bilumbulwilu bia basalayi
Bakaya ne dibendele ba tshitudilu tshia Lubena, ne Elisû, muana mulume wa Shedeu, wakadi ku mutu kuabo
Bobo bangashile tshitendelelu, bua meme kuikala munkatshi muabo

Wambile bantu aba ne, Nenuhite mu buloba bua bana benu, bana ba Esau, badi bashikama mu Sei; bobo nebanutshine, nudimuke bienu; kanutandanganyi n abo, bualu bua tshiena munuhe buloba buabo, nansha kaba ka bunene bua dikasa dia muntu; bualu bua nakamana kuha Esau mukuna wa Sei bu buhianyi buandi
Yeye wakebesha Hagâ, mukashi muena mudimu wa Salai, ne, Wakufuma kudi kunyi

Alona nealongolole minda dilolo ne dinda ku mesu kua Yehowa ku dituku ku dituku, ku mpala kua tshilulu tshia ku muaba wa tshijila mu ntenta wa kusangakena eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu bikondo bienu bionso

Bakabisha luendu luabo mu Lamesese mu dituku dia dikumi ne atanu dia ngondo wa kumudilu, ku nyima kua dituku dia kuhita kua Yehowa Bena Isalele bakumuka ku mesu kua Bena Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole, hakadi Bena Ejipitu bajika ban a bute bakashihabo kudi Yehowa munkatshi muabo Yehowa wakalumbuluisha nzambi yabo kabidi
Au mmeku a Bena Lubena, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi anai ne bisatu ne nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi asatu
Balaka wakaya ne Belâma ku mutu kua mukuna wa Peô, kuakatangileye ku tshihela
Biasua muntu kuhikula tshituha tshia tshintu tshia dikumi, yeye neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu hatshi

Nzambi wakambila Abalahama ne, Bualu ebu kabuikadi bujitu ku mesu kuebe, bualu bua nsongalume ne bua muhika webe, witabusha mei onso akukuambila Sala, unvua dî diandi, bualu bua tunkanunuina tuebe netubikidibue mu Isaka
Nunku nuenu nenufile mulambu wa bia dikumi bionso binudi nuangata kudi Bena Isalele bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, wewe neuhe Alona muakuidi mulambu eu wa bintu bidibo banyukula kudi Yehowa
Lubena, muan a bute wa Isalele, bana balume ba Lubena, Hanoka ne meku a Bena Hanoka, Palu ne meku a Bena Palu, Heselona ne meku a Bena Heselona, Kantu ne meku a Bena Kami

Bukookeshi ebu budi bukoonga bukookeshi bwa kupatulayi ngelelu wende wa meji anyi bidiye mujadika, bu mudi mu ngakwilu, mu mfundilu ne mu bimfwanyi, kadi mwikala uneemeka mêyi a ditunga, bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne bibidilu bia mulowu
Kanudi nansha tshintu tshikese tshia luevene, mu nsubu yenu yonso nenudie anu bintu bidi kabiyi ne luevene

Hakatangila mukashi ne Yosefe wakashiya tshivualu mu tshianza tshiandi, wakanyema, wakahatuka, mukashi wakela dî kudi balume ba mu nsubu wandi, wakabambila ne, Tangilai, mulume wanyi wakulua ne Muena Ebelu mu nsubu bualu bua kutufiusha bundu, wakabuela mu nsubu bua kulaleye banyi, ne meme nakuela di dianyi dikole
Bitupa bia munda ne lwendu lwa bisumbu bia beena mudimu bidi ne tshia kwikala bia mungalata
Mu tshidimu etshi tshia disanka dinene nenuhingane muntu yonso ku buloba buandi muntu yonso ku buloba buandi

Mose ne Alona bakangata balume aba bakabikilabo ku mena abo bakasangisha tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele ku dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo muibidi, bakababadila milongo ya bankambua babo ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, muntu ne muntu
Biajidileye budimi buandi ku tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, mushinga wabu newikale bu muakatuanganabo
Bakambila Yakoba ne, Mona muan ebe Yosefe ulua lua kûdi Isalele wakadikolesha, wa kashikama ha bulalu
Bana balume ba Yuda ku meku abo
Neboshile bintu ebi ku dituku ku dituku ku bikondo bienu bionso ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusangakena ku mesu kua Yehowa, kundi nsangakena n enu bua kuyikila n ebe
Yeye wakamba ne, Ubuele, wewe udi musankishibue kudi Yehowa, udi muimane ha bule bualu kai
Bana betu bakese ne bakashi betu ne mikoko ne ngombe yetu nebishale mu misoko ya Gilada, kadi bantu bebe, bena nvita bonso, nebasabuke ku nvita ku mesu kua Yehowa, bu muakuamba mukelenge
Kadi tshivuadi tshia dima tshidibo baulambila nebatshishihe, biaulambilabo mu tshivuadi tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku, nebatshisukule bimpe ne mai

Muntu ne muntu wakadi ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzu ne bia lin, ne bia miosa ya mbushi ne biseba bia bimpanga bitua mu mai makunze kunzû, ne biseba bia nkonge ya mu mai, wakalua n abi
Muntu kêna mwa kukandika mapa abu adi matangila dikalaku diaabu, midimu yaabu ne dilwangana diaabu bwa kupeta bukalenga mu mungalata

Mose wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso, wakabambila ne, Nuenu nuakatangila malu onso akenzela Yehowa Palo mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku mesu kuenu, ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buonso; mateta makole anuakatangila ne mesu, ne bimanyinu ne malu a kukema
Mose wakambila Alona ne, Angata tshivuadi, tekamu tshihiminu tshia bidia abi tente, ubiteke ku mesu kua Yehowa, nushale n abi tô ne ku bikondo bienu bionso
Bintu ebi bidi tshituha tshia bakuidi kudi bantu badi bafila milambu ya kuosha, nansha ngombe nansha mukoko: bobo nebahe bakuidi diboko ne matama abidi ne tshiadi
Wakantumina manyi ku tshioshelu misangu muanda mutekete ne ku malonga atshi onso ne ku tshiowelu ne ku tshitaku tshiatshi bua kubijidila
Lumu bakafika kudi mukelenge wa Ejipitu ne, Bantu bakanyema Palô ne bantu bandi bakakudimuna mitshima yabo, bakamba ne, Tuakenza tshinyi hatuakalekela Bena Isalele ku mudimu wetu
Bana balume ba Hama badi nunku Kusha ne Miselayima ne Puta ne Kanana
dilonda dia mapangadika a bukookeshi bwa kusomba ne kwaasa nzubu kudi beenyi bu mudibio mu mêyi ne mikandu;
Muntu yonso atshine tatu andi ne mamu andi, nuvuluke matuku a lumingu ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yakoba wakanyema mu musokoko, Labana, Muena Alama, kakadi mumanye bualu, yeye kakamuambila ne, Nyaya

Bikala muntu ne disama dia nsudi, nebalue n andi kudi muakuidi, muakuidi neatangile, ne bikala tshima tshitoke tô mu dikoba, ne bikala miosa miandamuke mitoke tô, ne bikala munyinyi mubishe mu tshima, edi didi disama dia nsudi diakadi kudiye diambedi mu dikoba diandi, ne muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane, yeye kena umubuesha mu nsubu, bualu bua yeye kena muakane
Kadi blê ne bintu bikuabo kabiakadi bifue, kabiakanza kukola nansha
Hahita butumbi buanyi, nenkuteke mu dina didi mu dibue, nenkubuikile ne tshianza tshianyi to ne hanamana kuhita ku mesu kuebe
Yeye wakashala ne Yehowa minya makumi anai ne mafuku makumi anai; wakajila bia kudia ne mai a kunua
Mamuma mimpe a mu buloba buabo buonso adibo bahuola diambedi, adibo halua n au kudi Yehowa, neikale mamuma ebe, muntu yonso wa mu nsubu webe udi muakane neadie
Muntu yonso utu wenza malu au udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa; bualu bua malu au mabi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Wihata bantu ku mesu kuenu
Nomba Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Ungashile bioshelu muanda mutekete, undongoluele balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete ne bimpanga muanda mutekete
Tshitupa tshinâyi : Bidi bitangila makanyika a mweena mwabo Kanungu ka Badi bafwanyikija ne muntu yônso udi anu mumanya mêyi ne mikandu
Nzambi wakambila Belâma ne, Kuyi n abo, kuedi bantu aba mulau nansha, bantu aba badi basankishibue
Budi bwambula bujitu bwa midimu yabo kumpala kwa Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga tshidi mwa kubupeesha dinyooka dia mu tshibûngi pa ditabija dia mukanda wa ditangilula
Palo wakabakonka ne, Nudi benji ba mudimu kai

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Pinehasa, muana mulume wa Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi, wakalekesha tshiji tshianyi kudi Bena Isalele, bualu bua yeye wakadi ne mukau bu mukau wanyi munkatshi muabo, nunku tshiakashiha Bena Isalele bonso ne mukau wanyi
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne muan abo mukashi, nansha muana wa tatu wandi nansha muana wa mamu wandi udi ne mulau

Dituku dia lufu lua Isalele diakalua ha buihi, Wakabikila muan andi Yosefe, wakamuambila ne, Bingikala ne luse ku mesu kuebe, ulenge tshianza tshiebe muinshi mua tshibelu tshinyi, uditshihe bua kungenzela malu mimpe ne a bushuwa, ndi nkutendekena ne, Kabanjiki mu Ejipitu
Genese Isaka Wakabikila Yakoba wakamuvudishila disanka wakamudimusha ne, Kubaki mukashi wa bana bakashi ba Bena Kanana

Kukumi mutshima webe ku mukashi wa mukuenu, anyi ku nsubu wa mukuenu, anyi ku budimi buandi, anyi ku muhika wandi mulume anyi ku muhika wandi mukashi, anyi ku ngombe wandi anyi ku mpunda wandi anyi ku tshintu tshionso tshia mukuenu
Alona wakahingana kudi Mose ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, disama diakashika
Tangila, meme nkayanyi, nendokeshe mai mangi ha buloba bua kujimisha bintu bionso bidi ne muhuya wa muoyo munda muabi muinshi mua diulu, tshintu tshionso tshidi ne muoyo ha buloba netshifue
Mu bunene bua buakane buebe, wewe utu wahita bantu bukole badi badilesha ku mesu kuebe, wewe udi ubatumina tshiji tshiebe, tshidi tshibosha bu bilu
Bakidika muaba au ne, Tabela, bualu bua kahia ka Yehowa kakatema munkatshi muabo
Wewe newenze tshikololo tshia tshiamu tshia or, neufundehu ne, TSHIA TSHIHE A KUDI YEHOWA

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Unsangishile balume makumi muanda mutekete ba bakulu ba mu Isalele, baudi mumanye ne mbakulu ba bantu, ne bakelenge badi ku mutu kuabo, ulue n abo ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bobo bimaneku n ebe

Wewe newenze tshitekelu tshia minda tshia or mutambe buimpe, nebenze tshitekelu etshi ne or muhite, ne tshishikaminu tshiatshi ne mukolo watshi, tukoho tuatshi ne mahu atshi ne bilongo biatshi nebenze ne tshituha tshimue tshia or mene tshiakenzabo n atshi tshitekelu
Mutshima wandi wakalamata Dina, muana mukashi wa Yakoba, yeye wakananga nsongakashi eu, wakamuambila mei a kalolo
Genese Badi Basombuela Kuoneka kua Dina Dina, muana mukashi wa Lea wakaleleleye Yakoba, wakaya bua kumoneye bana ba bakashi ba mu buloba abu
Mu tshikondo tshinai tunkanunuina tuebe netulue kunoko kabidi, bualu bua bubi bua Bena Amole kabuena buanji kukumbana
Bualu bua bahele nebikale mu buloba buenu matuku onso, nunku nakanuambila ne, Nubulule tshianza tshienu kudi muan enu, kudi mukengi ne kudi muhele mu buloba buenu

Nuenu nenukudimune di ne, Bantu bebe bakadi balami ba bimuna hatuakadi bitende tô ne katataka, ne tuetu ne batatu etu, bua nuenu nushikame mu buloba bua Goshene Bualu bua mulami yonso wa mikoko udi mulenguludibue kudi Bena Ejipitu
Bikaleye mufutshile nyama au bua kuenza n andi mudimu, mushinga wakumufutshileye neukumbane
Nzambi wakamba ne, Munya wikale, ne munya wakikala
Kabatangidi lue vene mu miaba yenu yonso tô matuku muanda mutekete; kanushiyi munyinyi unuakashiha wa milambu dilolo dia dituku dia ku mpala butuku buonso tô ne ku dinda
Ngombe minyane muanda mutekete yakalonda ku nyima kuai idi bu bidimu muanda mutekete, ne miehu yakafubidila ku luhehele luakafuma ku esete, idi bu bidimu muanda mutekete bia tshiole

Dîyi dilongolodi ke didi difila ngikadilu wa butontolodi bwa beena tshidiidi Kanungu ka Mbulamatadi udi ne bukookeshi bwangatangana pa buloba, mwinshi mwa buloba, mâyi ne meetu, pa bitupa bia mu lupepela, mu misulu, mu mâyi matengebela ne mu mbuwa bia Kongu ne kabidi pa mbuwa wa ditunga ne pa maloba mûma a Kongu
Badi babudia bilondeshila bikadilu bia mu musoko padibio kabiyi bibengangana ne Dîyi dikulu, ne mêyi ne mikandu, ne bulongoma bwa ditunga ne bienzelu biakane
Kuibi

Nuangate kabidi mulambu wa Yehowa kudi bantu bakaya mu nvita mundi umue ku bantu nkama itanu, ne umue wa ngombe ne wa nyama wa mpunda ne wa mikoko kabidi, nutshiangate kudi tshituha tshiabo, nutshine kudi Eleazâ muakuidi bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa
Binualonda mei, anyi binuatumikila mikenji yanyi, binuayenza, nennuhe nvula mu tshidimu tshia nvula, ne buloba nebukuame bintu bia bungi, ne mitshi ya mu madimi neyikuame mamuma a bungi

Alona neatentekashe bianza biandi bibidi ha mutu ha mbushi udi ne muoyo, neatondele Bena Isalele mabi yabo ne disambuka diabo dionso dia mikenji ne malu mabi abo onso, neatentekashe malu mabi onso ha mutu ha mbushi, nebamuihate mu tshihela ku tshianza tshia muntu wakasunguleye diambedi, mbushi neatuale bujitu bua mibi yabo mu muaba wa hatuhu, neihate mbushi mu tshihela
Bana balume bonso ba bakuidi nebaudie mu muaba wa tshijila, etshi ntshintu tshitambe tshijila

Kanungu ka Kumpala kwa kubweela mu bukalenga ne ku ndekeelu wa bukalenga, Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne beena Bukalenga bunene badi ne tshia kufila ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu mukanda udi umanyisha bintu bia mêku abu, babala bintu binyunganyunga, mwikala kabidi ne bintu bieela mu mushinga , bintu bisangila ne bantu, makanyika, bia mushinga bikwabo, lupetu ludi mu tshibutshilu, bintu bikeena binyungakana, mwikala mpaangu ikeena miibaka, meetu, madimi ne bilaala, majimba ne nzubu mikwabo yônso, ne mikanda yaayi

Lewitiki Muaba Umuehele wa Kushihela Milambu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne bana bandi balume ne Bena Isalele bonso ne, Ebu mbualu buakuamba Yehowa ne, Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua Bena Isalele udi ushiha nansha ngombe nansha mukoko nansha mbushi mu tshitudilu anyi ku butshika bua tshitudilu, kayi nulue n andi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena bua kumufila bu mulambu wa Yehowa ku mpala kua nsubu wa Yehowa, nebamubale bu muhite bua mashi akamatshisheye hanshi, yeye wakamatshisha mashi hanshi, nebumushe mundi au munkatshi mua bana babo
Yeye waka tuma nyunyu wa tshikololo, tshiakalembelela tô ne hakûma mai ha buloba

Mose wakadi ushimika ntenta ku butshika bua tshitudilu, wakamubikila ne, Ntenta wa kusambakena Muntu yonso wakasua kukeba Yehowa wakaluhuka mu tshitudilu bua kuya ku ntenta wa kusambakena, wakadi ku butshika bua tshitudilu

Kanungu ka Dîyi didi dileeja mishindu ya kwasa matanda kwasa mayeba, kuteeka, kulenga, koosha ne kusumbula bishakata bia lulengu, bidi bibolesha anyi biladioaktif, bidi bifuma ku matanda a biamu binene anyi a midimu ya bianza adi asanganyibwa mu buloba bwa ditunga
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neasabuke ku mpala kuenu; yeye neashihe bisamba abi ku mpala kuenu, nuenu nenubihate; Yoshua neasabuke ku mpala kuenu bu muakamba Yehowa
diambulwisha dia bashikumbata ne balema ba ku mvita;
Netusabuke ne bintu bia nvita ku mesu kua Yehowa mu buloba bua Kanâna, netuikale ne buhianyi buetu dishiya dia munemu dia Yadene
Neubangile mukashi kadi munga muntu nealale n andi; newase nsubu kadi kuena ushikamamu; neukune budimi bua nvinyo, ne kuena udia mamuma abu

Bakatuma dî kudi Yosefe ne, Tatu webe wakamba diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua ne, Nuenu nuambile Yosefe ne, Ulekelele bana benu mibi yabo ne malu mabi akakuenzelabo Hashishe tuetu tudi tukusengelela ne, Utubuikidile matomboka a bena mudimu ba Nzambi wa tatu webe Yosefe wdkadila hakamuambilabo mei a
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nengikale ne bantu aba babi badi bantontolola musangu bule munyi

Yeye wakamuambila ne, Wangate lukungulu lua ngombe lua bidimu bisatu, ne dishina dia mbushi dia bidimu bisatu, ne tshimpanga tshia mukoko tshia bidimu bisatu, ne nyunyu wa nkutshi ne mputu nyunyu Yeye wakangata bintu ebi bionso, wakabihanda nseke, wakateka luseke eku luseke eku, kadi yeye kakahanda nyunyu nseke

Halua dituku dia muanda mukulu, nealue ne bintu bia kudilengesha n abi kudi muakuidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena ku mpala kua Yehowa, muakuidi neangate muana wa mukoko wa mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji ne dikoho dia manyi, ne muakuidi neabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona mei a kuya n au kudi Bena Isalele ne kudi Palo, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, bualu bua kuhatula Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Mukelenge wanyi wakakonka bantu bebe ne Nudi ne tatu, anyi muan enu mukuabo, anyi
Bualu bua meme ndi mumanye kutomboka kuenu ne tshitshu tshienu: monai, hantshidi ne muoyo munkatshi muenu lelu, nuakumana kutombokela Yehowa; nenutambe kutomboka ku nyima kua lufu luanyi

Bobo nebanutshintshimike ku bibi bienu bionso tô ne hahona ngumbu yenu yonso inuakueyemena mu buloba buenu buonso; bobo nebanutshintshimike ku misoko yenu yonso mu buloba buonso budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Kanujadiki dibue dia kutendelela didi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ukina

Hakamunuisheye mai, hashishe Bikala mukashi muonyibue, bikaleye muenzele mulume wandi bualu bubi, mai adi elesha mulau neabuele munda muandi, neikale a bululu, ne mubidi wandi neutuntumuke, ne tshibelu tshiandi netshibole ne mukashi neikale ne mulau munkatshi mua bana babo

Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi pende ne tshia kwindila se baneemeka bumuntu bwende yêye nkayende, bamulamina maalu ende masokoma a mu mikanda, a mu dimanyishangana mianda ya kulekule anyi a mu mushindu mukwabo ônso wa dimanyishangana mianda
Bikala mulambu wandi wa kuosha muana wa mukoko anyi muana wa mbushi, yeye neafile mulume udi kayi ne tshilema
Tela wakalela Abalama ne Nahô ne Halana, Halana wakalela Lota
Nzambi wakambila Belâma butuku ne, Bialua balume aba bua kukubikila, ubike biebe, uye habo, kadi wenze biebe anu dî dinakuambila
Yeye wakatshina ne, Yeye neafue bu muakafua bana babo

Nakaha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada buloba buonso ku Gilada tô ne ku hankatshi ha tshibanda tshia Ânona tô ne ku kasulu ka Yaboka ku butshika bua Bena Amona; ne buloba bua Alabâ kabidi ne tshibanda tshia Yadene ku Kinelete tô ne ku dishiha dia Alabâ, Dishiba dia Luehu, kuinshi kua mukuna wa Pisega ku esete
Bantu bakaluhuka, bakâsangisha, bakâhela mu biamu ne mu binu, bakâlamba mu bivuadi ne mai, bakalamba n au mikata, akashemakana bu manyi mahia mahia

Muakuidi muela manyi ha mutu neangate mashi makuabo a muana wa ngombe, nealue n au mu ntenta wa kusangakena, muakuidi neafue munu wandi mu mashi, neamiamine mashi misangu muanda mutekete ku mpala kua tshilulu tshikudika tshidi hankatshi ha nsubu wa tshitendelelu ku mesu kua Yehowa

Hamo ne muan andi Shekeme bakalua ku tshibi tshia ku musoko wabo, bakayilala ne bena musoko, bakamba ne, Balume aba badi bashikama n etu talala nunku tuitabushe bua bobo bashale mu buloba buetu bendeshangane n etu mushinga buloba budi bunene bua bobo bikalemu tuangate bana babo ba bakashi bu bakashi betu, tufile bana hetu ba bakashi budibo

Muakuidi neangate dikoho dia manyi, nele munda mua tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi, neafue munu wandi wa ku tshianza tshia balume mu manyi adi mu tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi, neamiamine manyi ne munu wandi misangu muanda mutekete ku mpala kua Yehowa
Ahila, muana mulume wa Enana, mukelenge wa bana ba Nafatale, wakafua bintu dituku dia dikumi ne abidi
Badi Batuma Batentekedi ba Buloba ku Kadeshe bânea Nom
Badi ne mwa kunyangakaja mapa aa anu mu bitupa bilongolola kudi mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga
Abimeleke wakamba ne, Tshiena mumanye bantu bakuenza bualu ebu, wewe kuakungambila diambedi, tshiakunvua lumu lua bualu ebu, anu lelu

Bantu ba Tshijila ba Yehowa Bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanusungula munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bidi hanshi ha buloba, bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi
Milambu ya mufuki wa tshintu ne ya mwena lungenyi lufuka badi bayijadika ne bayikuba kudi mêyi a ditunga
Tshisamba tshinudi kanuyi bamanye nebadie bintu biakadiunda mu buloba bualu bua mudimu wenu; nebanunyange, nebanudiate matuku onso; malu anudi nutangila ku mesu neanuhadishe
Kadi Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, ne Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, anu bobo bakashala ne muoyo munkatshi mua bantu bakaya bua kutentekelabo buloba
Meme nensangakeneku ne Bena Isalele, ne tshitendelelu netshikale tshiedibue ku butumbi buanyi
Bakumuka mu Makehelota bakashikama mu Tahata
Bana ba balume ba Ashe, Yimena ne Yishewa ne Yishewi ne Belia ne muan abo wa bakashi, Sela, ne bana ba balume ba Belia, Hebê ne Malekiele
Hakunvia Balaka lumu ne, Belâma wakalua, wakaya kusangakena n andi ku tshimenga tshia Moaba, tshidi ku muelelu wa mai a Amona, ku butshika bua buloba buandi mene
Lea wakadi ne mesu a bulengu, kadi Lakele wakadi muimpe mubidi ne mpala wandi
Kanunyangishi dina dianyi dia tshijila, kadi nengikale mujidibue munkatshi mua Bena Isalele meme ndi Yehowa udi unujidila, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua kuikala Nzambi wenu meme ndi Yehowa

Yeye neujidile Yehowa matuku a tshijila tshiandi, nealue biandi ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bihanga diandi, kadi matuku a diambedi adi hatuhu bualu bua tshijila tshiandi tshiakadi tshionyibue
Kadi kakosa nsambu idi mitangila masungula a Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne a bena Tshiamwenda wa bukalenga pamwe ne idi mitangila dieebeja dia beena ditunga
Bakambilangana ne, Tuyai bietu, tuenzai tushola, tutuoshe mu kalua Bakadi ne tushola bu mabue, ne bitume bu tshimama

Alona ne bana bandi balume neboweshe bianza biabo ne makasa abo ne mai mu tshiowelu, hayabo mu ntenta wa kusangakena, nebowe mai bua bobo kabafu nansha, anyi hayabo ku tshioshelu bua kuosha nyama ha kahia kudi Yehowa
Enosha wakikala ne muoyo bidimu makumi tshitema, wakalela Kenana
Bakatshidi halua kudiye ne bintu biakadi mitshima yabo misue ku dinda ku dinda
Nomba Badi Batuma Batentekedi Dikumi ne Babidi ku Kanâna Dut
Kulama kua Muinda Lew
Mose wakumpa muabi wa bantu ku meku ne ku meku, mundi ne mundi ku mbelu kua ntenta wandi tshiji tshiakatamba kukuata Yehowa, tshiji tshiakakuata Mose kabidi
ndongamu wa bulongolodi bwa polovensa;
Mona, nakuha Bena Lewi tshintu tshia dikumi tshionso tshia mu Isalele bu buhianyi buabo bua mudimu udibo benza mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Mu ngendu yabo yonso, hakabandishibua difutu ha mutu ha nsubu, Bena Isalele bakadi babanga luendu

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu edi, mishindu ya Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa ya kumanyisha ne ya kulondolola Bukalenga bunene, kumpanyi ya Mbulamatadi, nzubu ne midimu ya Mbulamatadi idi: a lukonko lwa mukana anyi lwa pa dibeji kwikala anyi kakuyi dikokangana, kabayi balulondeshisha kudi dieela dia tukanda; b lukonko lwa pa mianda ya lelu; c dieebeja dia diumvwija; d dituma dia bantu bwa kutangilula; e diteelejibwa kudi tusumbu tukese
Tuye kumushiha, tumuele mu mukela mukuabo, netuambe ne, Nyama mubi wakamudia, netumone tshiavuisha bilota biandi

Mose wakabikila Datana ne Abilama, bana balume ba Eliaba, ne bobo bakamba ne, Katuena tulua, bualu budi bukese bua wewe wakumuka n etu mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi bua kubishiha mu tshihela, udi musue kudibandisha bu mukelenge wetu kabidi, anyi
Kuoshi musenga wa manananshi udi kauyi mujidila ha tshioshelu, nansha mulambu wa nyama idiho bosha, nansha mulambu wa bukula, nansha mulambu wa nvinyo idiho banua
Buloba buakashiyabo nebuikale ne bidimu bia kubanda, nebuikale hatuhu; bobo nebitabushe dikenga dia mibi yabo bualu bua bobo bakahidia mei anyi, ne mitshima yabo yakalengulula mikenji yanyi
Bualu bua nenusabuke Yadene bua kubuelamu ne bua kuhiana buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha; nenubuhiane, nenushikamemu
Aba mbana ba Sibiona Aya ne Ana muntu eu Ana wakasangana mishimi yakadi ihatuka mai a kahia mu tshihela, hakadiye udisha nyama ya mpunda ya tatu andi Sibiona
Nenulongolole nshila, nenutahulule mikalu ya buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi bituha bisatu, bua mushihianganyi yonso anyemenemu
Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Ungashile bioshelu muanda mutekete, undongoluele balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete ne bimpanga muanda mutekete
Kuitabushi bua muena milongo mukashi ashale ne muoyo
Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakamufila mu tshianza tshietu; tuakabashiha ne yeye ne bana bandi balume ne bantu bandi bonso

Bualu ebu kabuena butamba bakole ku mesu kuebe, hawamulekela, bualu bua yeye wakakuenzela mudimu bidimu bisambombo udi utamba muena mudimu wa difutu misangu ibidi; hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanusankishe mu malu onso anudi nuenza

Yeye wakanuhuekesha, wakanufuisha nzala ne wakanudisha ne mana a mu diulu, anudi kanuyi bamanye, ne akadi batatu benu kabayi bamanye; bua kunumanyisha ne, Muntu kena wikala ne muoyo bualu bua bidia nkayabo kadi utu wikala ne muoyo bualu bua mei onso adi ahatuka mukana mua Yehowa

Wewe neushikame mu buloba bua Goshene, newikale ha buihi n anyi, wewe ne bana bebe ne bana ba bana bebe, ne mikoko yebe ne ngombe yebe ne bintu bionso biudi n abi, nenkudishileku bualu bua bidimu bia tshiole bidi bishale bitanu; kanulu bu bahele, wewe ne bonso badi mu nsubu webe ne bintu biudi n abi

Nusangishe bantu bonso, ne balume ne bakashi ne bana bakese ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, bua buonso buabo bumue, bayile lungenyi, batshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, batumikile mei onso a mikenji ei; nunku bana babo badi kabayi banze kumanya nebunvue, nebamanye mua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tô matuku onso anudi nushikama mu buloba bunudi nuya dishiya dia Yadene bua kubuhiana
Bobo kabakamanya ne, Yosefe wakadi ujingulula mei akadibo bambilangana, bualu bua muandamunyi wa miaku wakadiku
Nenushihele Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mulambu wa kuhita kua Yehowa, wa mikoko ne wa ngombe, mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi
Yeye wakamba ne, E

Kanudi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu tshia dikumi tshia manvua enu, anyi tshia nvinyo yenu mihia mihia, anyi tshia manyi enu, anyi tshia ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne ba mikoko yenu: nansha milambu yenu mudi nuditshiha n ai, nansha bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, nansha milambu idibo bakuha: kadi nubidie ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musungule, ne wewe ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muhika webe mulume ne muhika webe mukashi, ne Muena Lewi udi ku mbelu kuenu: nuikale ne disanka ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Biashikameye ha tshiseba tshia ha nyima ha kabalu, netshikale ne bukoya
Buloba buonso kabuena ku mpala kuebe, anyi

Genese Abalama Udi Usungila Lota Mu matuku a Amalafele, mukelenge wa Shinâ, ne Ayoka, mukelenge wa Elasa, ne Kedôlaome, mukelenge wa Elama, ne Tidala, mukelenge wa Goyima, bakaluangana nvita ne Bela, mukelenge wa Sodoma, ne Bisha, mukelenge wa Amola, ne Shinaba, mukelenge wa Adema, ne Shemebê, mukelenge wa Bena Seboi, ne mukelenge wa Belê eu udi Soâ
Genese Hagâ ne Yishemaele Salai, mukashi wa Abalama, kakamulelela bana nansha, wakadi ne mukashi muena mudimu, Muena Ejipitu, dina diandi Haga
Muakuidi neafue munu wandi mu mashi makuabo, neâlabe ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshia kahia, neahongolole mashi onso makuabo ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu
Yeye wakamukonka ne, Wewe wakuenza tshinyi
Tshintu tshionso tshia dikumi tshia ngombe anyi tshia mikoko bidibo babala netshikale tshintu tshia tshijila kudi Yehowa
Yehowa Nzambi wetu nyama, bua yeye katukengeshi ne masama anyi muele wa mata
Bobo nebatele efoda ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bukunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin mutambe buimpe, bintu bidibo benzesha kudi bantu badi ne lungenyi lule
Mutshima wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye bakalekela bantu
Meme ndi Yehowa

Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikidila Bena Isalele bonso bubi, ne bubi buabo nebuikale bubuikidibue, bualu bua bobo bakahanga ne bakalua ne milambu yabo, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa, ne mulambu wa kubuikila hau bubi ku mpala kua Yehowa, bualu bua dihanga diabo; bubi bua Bena Isalele bonso ne bua muenyi udi munkatshi muabo nebuikale bubuikidibue, bualu bua bakadi benze bualu ebu ku mpukahuka
Dîyi dilongolodi didi disunguluja ngikadilu wa bakoshi ba nsambu
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Nuakunyunguluka mukuna eu musangu mule, yai bienu ku nôde
Yeye wakatahulula bana ba Lea ne ba Lakele ne ba bakashi babidi benji ba mudimu
Kadi kakuakadi muntu umue munkatshi muabo wakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Wewe neuyiteke mu ntenta wa kusambakena ku mpala kua mushete kundi ndimuenesha, muaba utudi tusangakana n ebe
Bikala umue wabo kayi muakane, udi mulema anyi udi mufofo anyi udi muoneka muaba mukuabo, kanumushihedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Dituku dia kumudilu nedikale dituku dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Nuenu nuelangane meji mu mitshima yenu ne, Bu mudi tatu ukengesha muan andi mulume, nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanukengesha

Tangila, meme nakulua bu muhumbishi webe, bualu bua nshila webe kena muakane ku mesu kuanyi, mpunda wakuntangila, wakusesuka kundi nusangu ei isatu bu mpunda muhidie kusesuka kundi, nakadi kukushiha wewe, ne nakadi kusungila mpunda
Kuhikula kua Ban a Bute Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ubale ban a bute balume bonso ba Bena Isalele ba mu ngondo umue to ne ha mutu, funda bungi bua mena abo
Wakabuesha mitshi mu nkanu ya ku nseke ya mushete bua kutuala n ai mushete

Kadi biwikala musesuke kudi mundi udi kayi mulume webe, ne biwikala muonyibue ne bikala mundi udi kayi mulume webe mulale n ebe, nunku muakuidi neatshihishe mukashi kuditshiha kua mulau muakuidi neambile mukashi ne, Yehowa akuenzeshe mulau ne kuditshiha munkatshi mua bana benu, haboleshe Yehowa tshibelu tshiebe, ne hatuntumusheye mubidi, ne mai au adi elesha mulau neabuele mu mala ebe, neatuntumushe mubidi webe, neaboleshe tshibelu tshiebe Ne mukashi neitabe ne, Amen, Amen
Bualu kai nuakatuhatula mu Ejipitu bua kulua n etu mu muaba eu mubi

Bintu ebi bidi bibi kunudi munkatshi mua bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi, muntu yonso udi ubilenga tshianza hadibi bifue yeye neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo Bikala bintu ebi bifue ne biahonabi ha tshintu, tshintu atshi netshikale ne bukoya, nansha dilonga nansha bilulu nansha biseba nansha tshibombi nansha tshintu tshikuabo tshidibo benza n atshi mudimu, nebatshiteke mu mai, netshikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo, nunku netshikale tshitoke tô
Teka mesa ku mpala kua tshilulu, ne teka muinda ku luseke lua tshitendelelu ludi ku Sude, neuteke mesa ku luseke lua ku nôde

Mose wakambila Alona ne, Semena ha buihi ne tshioshelu, ufile mulambu webe wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mulambu webe wa kuosha ha kahia, udibuikidile bubi buebe ne bubi bua bantu, ufile mulambu wa bantu kabidi bua kubabuikidila n au bubi buabo bu muakamba Yehowa
Bantu bebe kabena mua kuenza bualu bubi nunku
Hashika disama dia muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi, nebamubadile matuku muanda mutekete bua kumulengesha, ne yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe mu mai a mueji, neikale muakane
Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Tshiakakusengelela bua kulua kundi, anyi
Biafila balume aba bu mudi bantu bonso bafue, anyi biabakuata bualu bu mudibu bukuata bantu bonso, nunku Yehowa kena muntume
Bantu bakadi binunu dikumi ne bisambombo, ne mulambu wa Yehowa wakadi bantu makumi asatu ne babidi
Nuenu nenudie bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene ku mesu kua Yehowa
Musombuedi nkayandi neashihe mushihi wa muntu
Hashishe, wewe umuambile ne, Mbintu bia muntu webe Yakoba
Au mmeku a bana balume ba Efelayima, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi ne nkama itanu Aba mbana balume ba Yosefe ku meku abo

Belâma wakambila Nzambi ne, Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, mukelenge wa Moaba, wakantumina dî ne, Bantu bakaluhuka mu Ejipitu, bakatangadika buloba buonso, lua biebe, ubangelele mulau, hashishe nemmanye mua kuluangana n abo, nembihate
Majitu a manyooka adi itshikila anu mweena mambu ende nkayende
Mêyi ne mikandu adi apeesha mishindu mikwabo yônso ya tshinyangu tshia bâna ba mabeela pa ludimi manyooka makole
Tuetu katuena tuhiana n abo buloba budi dishiya dia Yadene to ne ku mpala, bualu bua buhianyi buetu budi dishiya dia munemu ku esete kua Yadene
Teka luhanza luanyi lua argent mu tshibombi tshia muana muakunyi ne argent yandi kabidi Yeye Wakenza bu dî dia Yosefe
Hashala buloba, tshidimu tshia kukuna bintu ne tshidimu tshia kunowa bintu ne tshidimu tshia mashika ne tshidimu tshia luya ne munya ne mîdima kabiena bihanga tshiendelele nansha

Hashishe nenulue ne bintu binakanuambila ku muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi; milambu yenu ya kuosha ne nyama yenu mishiha, ne bintu bia dikumi bia bintu bienu, ne bintu bienu bidibo bakuha, ne milambu ya kuditshiha kuenu kunudi nuditshiha n aku kudi Yehowa
Bua Gada yeye wakamba ne, Muntu wavudishila Gada disanka udi ne disanka: yeye udi walamina bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, yeye udi utula diboko ne lubombo lua ku mutu kabidi
Badi Balengesha Bena Lewi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, ubalengeshe
Kanungu ka Mafutu a Mulombodi wa Ditunga badi baateeka kudi mêyi adi atangila maalu a lupetu
Muakuidi neatangile ha munyinyi wa mubidi mubishe, neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane, munyinyi eu mubishe kawena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi
Wakatshiawila tatu wandi ne bana babo, tatu wandi wakamukuhulula ku di diandi ne, Etshi ntshilota kai tshiwakulota
Bana babo kabakamanya mua kumuitaba, bakadi batshina ku mesu kuandi

Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bualu buenu, wakamba ne, Wewe kuena ubuelamu: Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, utu wimana ku mpala kuebe, yeye neabuelemu: ukoleshe mutshima wandi, bualu bua yeye neahianyishe Bena Isalele buloba
Abidana, muana mulume wa Gideoni, mukelenge wa bana ba Benyamina, wakafua bintu dituku dia tshitema
Badi babukumbaja kudi midimu ya mbulamatadi, ne biâpu ne midimu idi mifwanangana nayi
Badi babadika bûngi bwa mêyi adi anyisha mukanda wa dimanyika anyi wa dieela mpata udibo mwa kwanyisha anu padiku tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beena mu Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka
Yeye wakashiya bintu bionso biakadiye n abi mu tshianza tshia Yosefe, yeye kakamanya bungi bua bintu biakadiye n abi, anu bidia biakadiye udia
Udi wambila beena mu Tshimamwende wa bukalenga mianda idiye ubadisha ne kakuyi dishintakaja dia ngenyi
Binuangashila tshioshelu tshia mabue, kanusongi mabue ne biamu, bualu bua binuâheya ne tshiamu, nuenu nuakuona mabue au
Anyi biambeye bualu, kena ubuenza, anyi
Mai akabanda to coudées díkumi ne itanu ha mikuna mile
Baketeka nsonga ibidi mikuabo ya tukanu tuhindakana mu masoso abidi, nunku bakatuteka ha bilulu bia efoda bia ha maha ku mpala kua tshilulu

Yehowa neanumuangalashe munkatshi mua bantu bonso ku ditengu edi dia buloba tô ne ku ditengu dikuabo; nenukuatshileku nzambi mikuabo ya mitshi ne ya mabue mudimu, mudi kanuyi bamanye, ne bankambua benu kabakayimanya kabidi

Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata didi dianyisha, pikalabio kabiyi bibengangana ne bukubi bwa ditunga, dipengama pa bulaba bwadi dia beenyi badibo balonda anyi banyanga anu bwa, bu mudi, ngelelu wabo wa meji, ditabuuja diaabo, dikoba, tshiôta, tshisamba, mwakulu waabo anyi bwa midimu yaabo idi mikala yambulwisha mungalata, dikuba dia mapa a bantu ne bisamba biônso, bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu ne tuludiki tutshidi koku
Hakahita ngondo isatu, bakambila Yuda ne, Tamâ ma muen ebe wakandamuka bu mukashi wa masandi, ne yeye wakimita difu kabidi ku masandi
Kena mumanye mua kudiona bualu bua tatu andi anyi bua mamu andi anyi bua muan abo mulume anyi bua muan abo mukashi hafuabo, bualu bua tshijila tshiandi kudi Yehowa tshidi ha mutu n andi
Kanungu ka Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya bakoshi ba nsambu kadi tshitupa tshidi tshiludika bukalenga bukoshi ba nsambu
Mana akadi bu ntete ya kolianda, akadi afuanangana ne bedola
Genese Hakatangila Lakele ne, Tshiena ndelela Yakoba bana, hashishe Lakele wakadi ne mukulu andi mukau, wakambila Yakoba ne, Umpe bana, anyi meme nenfue
Kanungu ka : Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka, utentemuna ne padibio bienzeka, umbusha ku mudimu, mu olodonase, banzuji ne bandumbulula pa dilomba dia Kapangu ka ku mutu ka bandumbulula
Lebeka wakabandisha mesu andi kabidi ne hakatangileye Isaka, yeye wakatuluka ha nyima ha kamelo
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi biafileye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neabake mukashi au
Yehowa wakumpa mabue au abidi akadi mafunda ne munu wa Nzambi; akadi mafundahu mei onso akanuambila Yehowa ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia mu dituku dia disangisha dietu
Yeye nkayandi wakahita ku mpala kuabo, wakakukuila hanshi misangu muanda mutekete to ne hakasemeneye ha buihi ne mukulu andi
Alona ne bana bandi balume bakenza mei onso akamba Yehowa mukana mua Mose
Yeye wakadi muakuidi wa Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu
Yehowa nkayandi wakamulombola, kakadi nzambi wa bende kudiye
Nunku nenumushe malu mabi â munkatshi muenu

Badi babupeesha bilumbulwidi ebi : kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu,Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika, Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi, Kabadi ka kulu ka basalayi, tubadi ne tubinadi twa basevila ne basalayi pamwe ne palake idi milamata ku bilumbulwidi abi
Kadi wewe neuye kudi bankambua bebe hola, neujikibue muntu mununu

Nomba Bena Isalele Badi Batendelela Bâla peô Bena Isalele bakashikama mu Shitima, bantu bakabanga kuenda masandi ne bana bakashi ba Bena Moaba, bualu bua bakabikila bantu ku milambu ya nzambi yabo, ne bantu bakadia, bakinamina nzambi yabo
Yehowa wakaya ku mpala kuabo mu ditutu, kubalesha nshila, ne butuku mu difutu diakadi ne dinkenke bua kubatemena mu nshila, bua bobo bamanye mua kuya ne munya ne butuku
Kanungu ka Anu mêyi a ditunga ke adi mwa kukosa bitadi
Mitshi ya lin ne ya orge yakashihibua, bualu bua orge yakadi mu miehu ne lin yakadi ne bilongo

Mose ne Alona ne bakelenge ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele bakabala bana balume ba Bena Kohata ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ba bidimu makumi asatu to ne ku makumi atanu, muntu yonso wakadi ubuela mu mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena bakabalabo ku meku abo bakadi binunu bibidi ne nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi atanu

Wakangata dianyi ne mukala wakadi ne dianyi ne dianyi dionso dia ha mutu ha bintu bia munda ne lukutu lua mutshima ne tumuma tubidi ne dianyi diabi ne tshibelu tshia ku tshianza tshia balume, wakangata mukala umue wakadi kauyi ne luevene ne mukata wakadi ne manyi mela ha mutu ne mukata mukuabo mu tshisaka tshiakadi ne mampa adi kâyi ne luevene ku mesu kua Yehowa, wakayiteka ha mutu ha dianyi ne ha tshibelu; wakateka bintu bionso mu bianza bia Alona ne mu bianza bia bana bandi balume, bakabinyukula bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa
Nunku nuenu nutumikile mei a tshihungidi etshi, nuê nze, bua nuenu nuikale ne dikasa dimpe mu malu onso anudi nuenza
Bantu bakajiana Nzambi ne Mose kabidi ne, Nuakatuluhuila mu Ejipitu bua kutufuisha mu tshihela nunku bua tshinyi
Bakalua ne bantu bakakuatabo ne bintu biabo bionso kudi Mose ne kudi Eleazâ muakuidi ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, ku tshitudilu tshiakadi mu mpata ya Moaba, hehi ne Yadene ku Yeleko
Tshitupa tshia kumpala
Bualu kai nuakushiya mulume ku nyima
Utshienze ne mabaya, ushiye munda muatshi mutuhu, utshienze bu munakukulesha ku mukuna
Mose wakaluhuka kudi Palô, wakalomba Yehowa

Bana bandi balume, Isaka ne Yishemaele, bakamujika mu lubuebue lua Makepela mu budimi bua Efelona, muana wa Soha, Muena Hiti, ku mpala kua Mamale, budimi buakasumba Abalahama kudi bana ba Hete, bakajikamu Abalahama ne Sala, mukashi wandi
Kanuedianganyi meji a bintu bienu, bualu bua bintu bimpe bionso bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu mbienu
Hakatentekelabo buloba nunku matuku makumi anai, bakahingana
Aba mbana ba Eze Bilehana, ne Zâwana ne Akana
Nenufundehu mikenji ei hanuasabuka; nunku nenubuele mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, munulaye
Mai akatamba, akavulangana a bungi ha buloba, ne buatu buakabanda ha mutu ha mai
Yakoba wakangata mitshi mibishi ya peuplier ne ya amande ne ya platane, wakubula bihusu bibaka bitoke, wakamuenesha bibaka bitoke bia mitshi
Kuenza kua Nsubu wa Tshitendelelu Ek
Bana ba balume ba Bileha, muena mudimu wa bakashi wa Lakele, bakadi Dana ne Nafatale
Yeye wakabambila ne, Yehowa ashale n enu binanulekela ne bana benu bakese, bualu bua bualu bubi budi munda muenu
Palo Wakabikila Mose ne Alona, wakamba ne, Nundombele Yehowa, yeye umushe biula kundi ne kudi bantu banyi, nendekele bantu baye kushihela Yehowa nyama
Wakenza mitshi ya acacia, wakaladika tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yonso bua kutuala n ai mesa
Yehowa neavuishe nvula wa buloba buenu bu lufuishi ne nsenga bia mu diulu tô ne hanuajimishibua
Kutedi dina dia Nzambi tshitelatela, kuhendi mukokeshi wa bantu bebe
ditambakana, bintu bia kale, dibandila dia bantu bônso ne mpangu ya nyama idi ne diambulwisha mu polovensa ne mu musoko
Muntu yonso udi ulua ha buihi ne nsubu wa Yehowa utu wadia: buonso buetu netulue, anyi
Nansha nanku, dîba diônso didibo bakenzulula, badi babwita mêsu bwa kusobola dîna dimwe ku bitupa biônso
Nunku Mose wakafunda musambu eu dituku adi, wakauyisha Bena Isalele
Bena Ejipitu bonso bakumbula mena hehi ne musulu, bakakeba mai a kunua, bualu bua kabakamanya mua kunua mai a mu musulu

Neufunde bifuanyikishi bia tumuma tua grenade ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunzekunzû kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshionso, neuteke ndibu ya or hankatshi ha tumuma, neuteke kadibu ka or ne kamuma, ne kadibu ka or ne kamuma to ne kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshionso
Yakoba wakamukudimuna ne, Mukelenge wanyi udi mumanye ne bana batshidi batekete ne mikoko ne ngombe bidi ne bana, ne biabenzeshabo lukasa lukasa anu dituku dimue, bimuna bionso nenfue

Bobo nebabange ku tshidimu tshiakudihaneye nebabale bungi bua bidimu tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, mushinga wa kudihikula n au newikale bu bungi bua bidimu biakashaleye handi bu muena mudimu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Palô kena ukunvuila nansha, bualu bua kuvudisha malu anyi a kukema mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Nuase misoko ya bana benu bakese ne mpangu ya mikoko yenu, nuenze mei onso akaluhuka mukana muenu

Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe tshivwa tshilomba; Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshivwa tshianyisha; Beena Ditunga dia Kongu, mu tshikondo tshia dieebeja dia dianyisha diabo dilongolola bitwadijila ku
Wewe newangate mabue abidi a onyx, ufundehu mena a Bena Isalele, mena asambombo ha dibue dimue ne mena asambombo adi ashala ha dibue dikuabo, balondangane bu mudi kuledibua kuabo

Bikala muenyi mushikame munkatshi muenu, anyi muntu yonso muikale munkatshi muenu tô ne ku bikondo bienu bionso udi musue kufila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa, yeye nênze bu munudi nuenza

Nomba Mikenji ya Maboko ne Bakashi Bahianyi Bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ba diku dia Bena Gilada, muana mulume wa Makî, muana mulume wa Manashe, wa meku a bana balume ba Yosefe, bakalua kudi Mose ne kudi bakelenge ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ba mu Isalele, bakamba ne, Yehowa wakela dî kudi mukelenge wetu bua kutahulula buloba bua buhianyi ku nshobo, Yehowa wakela dî kudi mukelenge wetu kabidi bua kuha buhianyi bua Selofehada muan etu mulume kudi bana bandi bakashi
Bakakudimuna Palo ne, Bantu bebe badi balami ba mikoko, ne tuetu ne batatu etu
Mose wakababikila; Alona ne bakokeshi bonso ba munkatshi muabo ba kahingana kudiye; Mose wakasomba n abo
Kadi bulelela, nakukubisha bua kukulesha bukole buanyi ne bua dina dianyi dimanyishibue ha buloba buonso
Biwalela bana bakuabo ku nyima kuabo, nebikale bana bebe kabidi nebabidike dina dia bana babo mu buhianyi buabo
Bantu bakadinyangisha kudiye, kabena bu bana bandi, bakahambuka, malu abo akanyanguka, akalua manyongoboka

Bikala muntu munkatshi muenu udi kayi muakane bua malu akamukuata butuku, hashishe yeye neaye ku mpenge kua tshitudilu, kabuedi mu tshitudilu; kadi hafika dilolo, yeye neowe mai, ne habuela diba, yeye neahingane mu tshitudilu

Umue wabo neoshe muana wa ngombe ku mesu kuandi, ne tshiseba tshiandi ne munyinyi wandi ne mashi andi ne tunvi tuandi: ne muakuidi neangate mitshi ya cèdre, ne mabeshi a hysope, ne bintu bikunzubile, neabiele munkatshi mua kahia kadi kosha muana wa ngombe

Muakuidi neangate umue wa bana balume ba mikoko, neamufile bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne dikoho dia manyi, neabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa; yeye neashihe muana mulume wa mukoko kudibo bashihela milambu ya kubindila n ai bubi ne mulambu ya kuosha ha kahia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, mulambu wa disatu buka dia mikenji udi mulambu wa muakuidi bu mudi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, etshi ntshintu tshia tshijila
dibanza dia mbulamatadi mu polovensa;
Elishama, muana mulume wa Amihuda, mukelenge wa bana ba Efelayima, wakafua bintu dituku dia muanda mutekete

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Ahiezê, muana mulume wa Amishadai
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Mahalelela, Kenana wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi anai, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Bwa bidi bitangila bweena ditunga, mwenji wa Dîyi dikulu udi anu mwimanyina pa lungenyi luludiki lwa kabumwe ne lwa mukawu wa bweena ditunga dia Kongu
Yehowa Nzambi wakatelela Adama ne mukashi wandi bivualu bia biseba, wakabaluatshishabi
Bantu aba badi balami ba mikoko, bualu bua bakadi balami ba bimuna, bakalua ne mikoko yabo ne bimuna biabo ne bintu bionso bidibo n abi
Tshiakukukuatshila mudimu bualu bua Lakele, anyi
Nenukute mafu tente, nenusakidile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bualu bua buloba buimpe buakalayeye
Kanungu ka Mêyi malongolodi adi aleeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Bilwilu
Kumpala kwa kwenzatu mudimu, mulombodi wa Tshisangilu Tshinene udi utumanyisha Kabadi komekela mianda ya Dîyi dikulu bwa kôku kujadikaku dikumbanangana diatu ne Dîyi dikulu, mu tshipungu tshia matuku
Bena Gada bakasa Dibona ne Atalota ne Aloe ne Atalota shofana ne Yazê ne Yogebeha, ne Betenimela ne Betehalana, misoko yakadi ne mpangu ya mabue, ne mpangu ya mikoko
bûngi bwa bantu ne dibabadika bidi bikale ne diambulwisha bwa ditunga dijima;
Dutelonone Bikala bantu babidi batandangane, ne haluabo bua kulumbuluishibua, balumbuluishi nebalumbulule tshilumbu tshiabo; ku nyima nebabingishe muntu muimpe ne nebahishe muntu mubi

Tatu wabo Isalele wakabambila ne, Bikala bualu butukuate, enzai bienu nunku nuangate bintu biakakuamibua mu buloba buetu, nubiteke mu bisaka bienu, nuye n abi bu matabisha kudi mulume au Nuangate bintu bia muhuya muimpe, baume ne buitshi ne mula ne pistaches ne amandes, nuye ne argent muhite misangu ibidi mu bianza bienu, argent yakahingashabo munda mua bibombi bienu, nuye n ai mu bianza bienu kabidi, bumue bakenza bualu abu ku mpukahuka nuangate muakunyi enu kabidi, bikai bienu, nuye kudi mulume au

Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mioyo ya bantu asunguile bantu bandi muntu udi mumanye mua kuya ku mpala kuabo, udi mumanye mua kulua kudibo, udi mumanye mua kubalombola, udi mumanye mua kulua n abo mu buloba, bantu ba Yehowa kabikadi bu mikoko idi kayiyi ne mulami
Bena Isalele Badi Bahita Sifiona Bukole Dut
Muntu wakamuambila ne, Bakumuka kunoko, nakabunvua bamba ne Tuyai ku Dotana Yosefe wakalonda bana babo, wakabasangana mu Dotana
Monai, Yehowa wakunuha dituku dijidila, nunku yeye wakunuha bidia bia matuku abidi ku dituku disambombo, muntu ne muntu ashale mu muaba wandi, kaluhuki mu muaba wandi dituku dia muanda mutekete
Kadi hakadi difutu kadiyi dibandishibua, kabakaya mu luendu tô ne ku dituku diakabandishibua difutu
Teka tshiamu etshi munda mua nseke mai ya tshioshelu ne hankatshi, mu bule buatshi
Wewe newenze bitubuidi bia or, ne tukanu tua or tubidi, tudi tuhindakasha bu muonshi, uteke tukanu ku bitubuidi
Kuladi ne nyama bua kudionena mutshima webe, ne mukashi kimanyi biandi ku mpala kua nyama bua kulala handi, bualu ebu budi butamba bubi
Yehowa wakahueka mu ditutu, wakimanahu n andi
Hakalueye hehi ne tshitudilu, wakatangila kana ka ngombe ne bantu baja maja Mose wakadi ne tshiji tshikole, wakela mabue hanshi akadi mu bianza biandi, wakatshibula kuinshi kua mukuna

Biafileye muana wa mukoko bu mulambu wandi, nealue handi ku mesu kua Yehowa, neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha muana wa mukoko wa mulambu wandi, neamushihe ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, bana balume ba Alona nebamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu

Lufu lua Batentekedi Babi Dikumi Balume aba bakatuma Mose bua kutentekelabo buloba, bakadi bahingana, bakadi batontoluesha bantu bonso kudiye, bualu bua bobo bakalua ne lumu lubi lua buloba, balume aba mene bakalua ne lumu tubi lua buloba bakafua ne disama dikole ku mpala kua Yehowa
Ya biebe ku tshisumbu tshia mbushi, Ulue kundi ne nku ngulu ya mbushi ibidi idi mimpe, nendambile tatu webe munyinyi muimpe wa dihembu udiye musue
Muntu yonso udi uhenda tatu wandi anyi mamu wandi udi ne mulau; bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen

Uteke milongo ya masoso mai a kubueshamu mabue, mulongo wa kumudilu wa mabue a sardoine ne topaze ne émeraude, mulongo muibidi wa mabue a escarboucle ne saphir ne calcédoine, mulongo muisatu wa mabue a opale ne agate ne améthyste, ne mulongo muinai wa mabue a chrysolithe ne onyx ne jaspe ubueshe mabue a mu masoso
Kanuenji mudimu nansha mukese dituku adi eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu bikondo bienu bionso mu nsubu yenu yonso
Hamba Muprofete malu mu dina dia Yehowa ne malu au kaena menjibue, au mmalu adi Yehowa kayi mumuambile; muprofete au wakatuambila, kanumutshinyi
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne mukashi wa tatu wandi udi ne mulau, bualu bua yeye wakavula tshilulu tshia tatu wandi
Badi ditunga dijima
Kanungu ka Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu anyi Tshisangilu Tshinene tshidi tshikwaata mudimu wa mushinga anu padi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beenatshi babwêla
Kadi nansha nanku, kabeena mwa kwanji kwimanyika midimu ya kabadi ka kabwendela to
Labana wakadi ne bana bakashi babidi dina dia muan a bute diakadi Lea, ne dina dia mukuny andi diakadi Lakele
Mose wakashila tshioshelu, wakidika dina dia tshi ne, Yehowa nisi, wakamba ne, Yehowa wakaditshiha, Yehowa neuhingane ne Bena Amaleka nvita ku tshikondo ku tshikondo

Kanudi mampa adi ne luevene ne mulambu eu; nenudie n au mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, mbia kudia bia tshivulukidi tshia dikenga; bualu bua nuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu lubilu; nunku numuke dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu matuku onso a muoyo wenu
Muntu wa munkatshi mua bana balume ba Alona udi ufila mashi ne dianyi bia mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala neikale ne diboko dia balume bu tshintu tshiandi
Helabo mpungi umue, bakelenge ne bantu ba ku mutu kua binunu bia Bena Isalele nebadisangishe kûdi
Biamukuatabo mu munya, nebamusombuele, yeye neahingashe bintu, ne bikaleye kayi ne bintu, nebamuhane bua buibi buandi
Hela muntu bilumi, yeye neadioweshe mubidi wandi wonso ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo

Kanungu ka Mu tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu a dituma dia dijinga dia kwenzeja dîyi, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi mwa kulomba kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa dijooja dia tshiakabidi dia dîyi anyi dia tumwe tunungu twadi

Yeye wakatuma miloho kudi Belâma, muana mulume wa Beô, ku Petô udi hehi ne musulu wa Pelata ku buloba bua bantu bandi bualu bua kumubikila ne, Tangila, bantu bakaluhuka mu Ejipitu, tangila, badi batangalaka buloba buonso, badi bashikama hehi n anyi

Ekesode Mose ne Alona Badi ku Mpala kua Palo Ku nyima kua malu â Mose ne Alona bakalua kudi Palô, bakamuambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi Wamba ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye mu tshihela bua kudia bidia ku mesu kuanyi
Kanungu ka Beena mu Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa badi ne mwânzu wa batshipwita bakulumpa ba mabala
Wangate Alona ne Eleaza, muan andi mulume, ulue n abo ku mukuna wa Hô, uvule Alona bilulu biandi, ubiluatshishe Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, Alona neasangakene ne bankambua bandi, neafue biandi
Mei abo akasankisha Hamo ne Shekeme, muan andi wa balume
Hashishe muakuidi neuvuwe bilulu ne mubidi wandi ne mai, ne ku nyima nealue biandi mu tshitudilu, neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo
Yeye wakafunda ha mabue, bu muakafundeye diambedi, mikenji dikumi yakanuambila Yehowa ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia mu dituku dia disangisha dietu; Yehowa wakumpau
Wakateka bitekelu bia minda mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ku mpala kua mesa ku luseke lua nsubu lua ku sude
Yeye kakungambila ne, Yeye udi muan etu mukashi, anyi

Yeye wakabandisha mesu andi, wakatangila balume basatu bimane ku mpala kuandi, hakabatangileye, wakabika ku mbelu kuandi, wakaya lubilu bua kubakidila, wakabakukuila, wakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi, biwikala ne luse kundi, ndi nkutendekena ne, Kuhitshi muntu webe
Hashishe nuenu nuakangambila ne, Tuakuenzela Yehowa bibi, netuye, netuluangane, bu muakatuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wetu
Muana wa bakashi wa Palô wakamuambila ne, Wangate muana eu, umungamushile mabele, nenkufute Mukashi wakangata muana, wakamuamusha mabele
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Wakakuambila ne, Udi butaka nganyi

Muena Amona anyi Muena Moaba kababuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa; ne tunkanunuma tuabo kaubuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa tô ne hahita bikondo dikumi tshiendelele; bualu bua bobo kabakanuha bia kudia ne mai a kunua mu nshila hanuakaluhuka mu Ejipitu; ne bualu bua bobo bakahita Belâma, muana mulume wa Beô ku Petô wa mu Mesopotamia, bua kunueleye mulau
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Umuka biebe munkatshi mua tshisumbu etshi tshia bantu, nenubashihe mu tshituha tshihi
Mulùme wakanda undi musele, ucidi kwàbù, Kulonga kalasa wa kujikija mukanda, Udi anu ukèba mudimu wa kwètù, Tudi pembe basombe kuzubu kwa baledi
Dutelonone Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu ya Bena Kanâna Ek
Angata dianyi dionso didi ku mala ne lukutu lua ku mutshima ne tumuma tubidi ne, dianyi diabi, ubioshile ha tshioshelu

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu Nudimuke bienu bimpe; bualu bua kanuakatangila tshifuanyikishi tshia muntu dituku diakasomba n enu Yehowa mu Holeba munkatshi mua kahia; kanuonyi mitshima yenu, kanudisongidi luhingu ne tshifuanyikishi tshia muntu nansha mulume nansha mukashi, nansha tshia nyama yonso ya ha buloba, anyi tshia nyunyu yonso idi yenda mu diulu, anyi tshia tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi ha buloba, anyi tshia munyinyi wa mu mai adi muinshi mua buloba; bua hanuabandisha mesu enu mulu, ne hanuatangila diba ne ngondo ne mitoto ne bintu bionso bia mu diulu, kanubitendeledi, kanubienzedi mudimu; ebu mbualu buakaha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu bonso bakuabo badi muinshi mua diulu

Abalama wakangata mukashi wandi Salai, ne Lota, muana wa muan abo, ne bintu biabo bionso, ne bantu bonso bakahetabo mu Halana, bakaya mu nshila wa ku buloba bua Kanâna, bakafika mu buloba bua Kanâna Abalama wakalala mu buloba, wakalua ku Shekeme, kuakadi mutshi wa telebinta wa mu Mole Bena Kanana bakadi mu buloba tshikondo atshi
Muakuidi udi ufila mulambu wa bukula budibo balamba mu nfulu ne mu tshivuadi ne mu dilonga, yeye mene neangate bintu ebi bionso

Bikala muntu ne tshima mu dikoba, ne bikala tshima tshiondahibue, ne bikala muaba watshi mutoke tô, anyi ditoba ditoke, nunku yeye neadileshe kudi muakuidi, muakuidi neatangile, ne bielanganeye meji ne disama diakabuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, ne miosa idi miandamuke mitoke tô, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi diakamueneka mu tshima
Au mmena a bana ba balume ba Alona Nadaba muan a bute ne Abihu ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ
udi mumanye mua kubala tshituha tshinai tshia Bena Isalele nganyi

Yakoba wakamba ne Muan anyi kena uya n enu, mukulu andi udi mufue ne anu yeye umuehele udi mushale, biamukuata bualu bubi mu nshila unuaya, hashishe, nenuvuishe nsuki yanyi mitoke to ne kanyinganyinga mu Muaba wa Bafue

Nenufunde mukalu wenu wa ku esete ku Hasâ enana tô ne ku Shefama, mukalu neuhueke ku Shefama to ne ku Libela ku esete kua Ayina, mukalu neuhueke tô ne ku muelelu wa dishiha dia Kinelete ku esete, mukalu neuhueke tô ne ku Yadene uhueka tô ne ku Dishiba dia Luehu Ai mmikalu idi înyunguluka buloba buenu
Yeye wakambila mukashi ne, Nentambe kuvudisha didinyenga diebe ne kuimitshishibua kuebe neulele bana ne didinyenga, mutshima webe newikale kudi mulume webe, yeye neikale ne bukokeshi ku mutu kuebe
Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku disambombo
Hanuaditshiha ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kanuhangi kushikisha mitshihu yenu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nealombe bua nuyishikishe; ne bualu ebu nebuikale bubi kunudi binuahanga kuyisbikisha

Muntu udi utela dina dia Yehowa tshitelatela nebamushihe bulelela, bantu bonso nebamukume ne mabue, bikaleye muenyi anyi muntu muledibue mu nsubu yenuhateleye dina dia Yehowa tshitelatela, nebamushihe
Yeye wakadidika ne, Shiba, nunku badi babikila dina dia musoko au ne, Be sheba to ne ku dituku edi
Bakumuka mu Bene yâkana, bakashikama mu Ho hadidegada Bakumuka mu Ho hadidegada, bakashikama mu Yotebata

Mukenji wa Mikau Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bikala mukashi wa muntu usesuka, bikaleye umuenzela bibi, bikala mulume mukuabo ulala n andi, bikala bualu ebu busokoma ku mesu kua mulume wandi, kabuyi bumanyibue, bikala mukashi muonyibue ne kakuyi mumonyi wa bualu, kabayi bamukuata hakadiye wenda n andi, ne bikala mukau mumukuate bualu bua mukashi wandi udi muonyibue anyi bikala mukau umukuata bualu bua mukashi wandi udi kayi muonyibue, hashishe mulume alue biandi ne mukashi wandi kudi muakuidi, nealue ne mulambu wandi, tshituha tshia dikumi tshia tshihiminu tshia bukula bua orge, kedihu nansha manyi, katekihu nansha musenga wa manananshi, bualu bua eu udi mulambu wa mukau, mulambu wa bukula wa tshivulukidi, bua kuvuluishangana bualu bubi

Lemeke wakambila bakashi bandi ne, Ada ne Sila, telejai matshu, bakashi ba Lemeke, unvuai di dianyi, nakashiha muntu bualu bua yeye wakantaha mputa, nakashiha nsongalume bualu bua yeye wakantuta, biasombuelabo Kana nusangu muanda mutekete, bulelela, nebasombuele Lemeke misangu makumi muanda mutekete ne muanda mutekete
Nzambi wakalekela kuyikila ne Abalahama, wakamushiya, wakaya mu diulu
Ebu kambualu bua hatuhu kunudi; kadi budi muoyo wenu, budi buvudisha matuku enu mu buloba bunuyaya kuhiana dishiya dia Yadene

Kadi wewe ne bana bebe balume ne bana bebe bakashi nenudie tshiadi tshia kunyukulabo ne tshibelu tshia kukuhabo ebi mbintu biebe ne bia bana bebe balume munkatshi mua milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala ya Bena Isalele

Ebi mbintu bidibo ne bualu bua kutuala, mu mudimu udibo benza mu ntenta wa kusambakena mabaya a nsubu ne mitshi yandi ne makunshi andi ne nkanu yandi, ne makunshi a ku luhangu ne nkanu yau ne milonda yau ne nshinga yau ne bintu biau bionso bidibo benza n abi mudimuku mena abi wewe neubaleshe bintu bia majitu abo
Hahita matuku asatu, Palô neabishe mutu webe, neakuhingashe mu mudimu webe kabidi, wewe neuhe luhanza lua Palô mu tshianza tshiandi, bu muwakenza diambedi bawakadi mutuadi wandi wa maluvu
