Nuenu nuikale balamate kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Hakuvudishila Yehowa, Nzambi webe, disanka, bikala nshila mutambe kule, ne wewe kuena mua kutuala bintu biebe bualu bua muaba udi Yehowa neusungule bua kujadikamu dina diandi udi utamba kule, hashishe neubihane ku argent: wangate argent mu tshianza tshiebe, uye biebe ku muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, musungule; neudisumbile bintu bidi mutshima webe musue, nansha ngombe nansha mikoko nansha mioyo nansha maluvu makole nansha bintu bionso biudi musue; neubidie ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, neusanke, wewe ne ba mu nsubu webe
Aba mbana balume ba Benyamina ku meku abo, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama isambombo

Dilomba diônso ku dimwe ku dimwe badi badifila ku Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa tshidi tshilondesha bulongama bwa dilomba, bwa tshingenyingenyi anyi bwa difwanyikija
Hamona mukashi katshetshi, yeye neikale ne bukoya tô matuku muanda mutekete, ne muntu yonso udi umulenga tshianza neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo

Eu udi mukenji wa Munazi hashikisheye matuku a tshijila tshiandi nebalue n andi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena: neafile mulambu wandi kudi Yehowa, muana mulume wa mukoko udi kayi ne tshilema wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne muana mukashi wa mukoko udi muakane wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kubuikila hau bubi, ne tshimpanga tshidi tshiakane bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala, ne tshisaka tente ne mampa adi kayi ne luevene, ne mikata yakenzabo ne bukula bubotesha ne manyi, ne mikata idi kayiyi ne luevene ne manyi mela ha mutu hai, ne mulambu wa bukula ne mulambu wa bintu bia kunua
Nenuvuwe bilulu dituku dia muanda mutekete, nenubale bakane, ku nyima nenuhingane mu tshitudilu

Abalahama wakambila Nzambi ne, Mbimpe Yishemaele ikale ne muoyo ku mesu kuebe Nzambi wakamba ne, Nansha, Sala mukashi webe neakulelele muana wewe neumuidike dina ne, Isaka, nenjadike n andi yeye ne tunkanunuma tuandi tshihungidi tshianyi bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele

Yeye wakabavudishila disanka dituku adi, wamba ne, Isalele neavudishile bakuabo disanka bualu buenu, neambe ne, Nzambi anuvuishe disanka dia Efelayima ne dia Manashe, yeye wakateka Efelayima ku mpala kua Manashe
To ne hashika tshiji tshia muan enu kudi, ne hahueye bualu buwakamuenzela muoyo, hashishe nenkutumine di nenkubikile, nennujimishile bubidi buenu dituku dimue bualu kai
Lubena, wewe udi muan a bute wanyi, ntshibangidilu tshia bukole buanyi, udi wa kumudilu wa kanemu, ne wa kumudilu wa bukokeshi
Bua bualu ebu Bena Lewi kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo; Yehowa udi buhianyi buabo bu muakabambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Wakamumanyisha dina dia Yehowa
Hashika disama diandi, nebamubadile matuku muanda mutekete, ku nyima neikale mulengele
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nulale bienu kunoko butuku ebu, nennuambile dî kabidi, bu mudi Yehowa ungambila, ne bakelenge ba Moaba bakashala ne Belâma
Bobo nebenze mukaba wa efoda bu mudibo benza efoda, newikale tshituha tshimue tshia ku efoda, ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin mutambe buimpe

Kadi ban a bute ba ngombe ne ba mikoko ne ba mbushi, wewe kuena ubihikula, ebi mbintu bia tshijila wewe neumiamine mashi abi ha tshioshelu, newoshe dianyi diabi bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Ebi mbidimu bia muoyo wa Yishemaele, biakadi lukama ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete, yeye waka huola muoyo wandi, wakafua, wakadisangisha ne bankambua bandi
Bia Kudia Bimpe ne Bidi Kabiyi Bimpe Lew
Bobo nebalonde ku nyima kua bonso ku mabendele abo

Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa wakahueka ha mukuna wa Sinai, wakabika munkatshi muabo ku Sei, wakatemena ku mukuna wa Palana, wakamueneka munkatshi mua binunu makumi bia bantu bandi ba tshijila, wakalua kudibo ne mikenji mitema kahia mu tshianza tshiandi tshia bukole

Mose Udi Uhingana mu Ejipitu Mose wakahingana kudi Yetelo tatu andi muenu, wakamuambila ne, Ndi musue kuhingana kudi bana betu badi mu Ejipitu, bua kubamona ne bobo batshidi ne muoyo Yetelo wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe talala
Bulelela, yeye udi muakunyi wanyi, udi muana wa tatu wanyi, kadi kena muana wa mamu wanyi, ne yeye wakalua mukashi wanyi
Mapangadika dîyi adi ajika bukookeshi tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia dianyisha
Nunku nutumikile dî dianyi, kanuenji bilele ebi bibi biakenzabo ku mpala, kanudionyi mu malu au meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Nenuikale bu dikema ne bu lusumuinu ne bu bihendu kudi bisamba bionso bidi Yehowa mulela munkatshi muabi
Bana balume ba Nafatale ku meku abo Yasele ne meku a Bena Yasele; Guni ne meku a Bena Guni; Yesê ne meku a Bena Yesê, Shilema ne meku a Bena Shilema
Netuambe tshinyi
Bena Ejipitu bakamba kubihata, bakabalonda ku nyima kuabo mu bunene bua mai, tubalu tua Palô bionso ne makalu andi onso ne masalayi andi onso akadi enda ha tubalu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bana ba bakashi ba Selofehada badi bamba dî dilelela: Ubahe buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo ne tatu abo, buhianyi bua tatu abo nebulue kudibo
Nakanyunguluka, nakahueka ku mukuna, nakateka mabue mu mushete unakenza, adimu bu muakangambila Yehowa, Bena Isalele bakumuka ku Belota Bene yâkana, bakaya ku Mosela
Nzambi wakafuka mulu, wakatahulula mai a ha buloba ne mai a mulu Bualu buakenjibua Nzambi wa kuhita mulu ne, Diulu, dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku dibidi
Bena bilengulengu bakenza muomumue ne manga abo, bakatuma biula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Anu bua bualu ebu bumue balume aba nebitabushe bua kushikama n etu tulue bantu bamue bua mulume yonso wa munkatshi muetu atengudibue bu mudibo batengula
Bana ba balume ba Shimeona, Yemuele ne Yamina ne Ohada ne Yakina ne Sofa ne Shaula, muana wa mukashi wa Bena Kanana
Shekeme wakambila tatu wa mukashi ne bana babo ne, Ndi musue kuikala ne diakalengele ku mesu kuenu, nennufute bintu bionso binudi nuamba

Yakabuikila buloba buonso, to ne hakalua buloba midima, yakadia midioko yonso ya mu madimi ne mamuma onso a ku mitshi, biakashala ku mabue a nvula, nansha tshintu tshikese nansha midioko nansha mutshi biakashala mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Bakumuka mu Oboto, bakashikama mu Iye habalima, mu tshihela tshidi ku mpala kua Moaba, kudi diba dihatuka
Wakalua kudiye, wakadi muimane ha buihi ne mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia, miloho ya Moaba yakadi n andi
Wakenza manyi adibo bela ha mutu ne musenga wa manananshi kudi bantu bakadi ne lungenyi lule
Mona, nengihate Bena Amole ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse ku mpala kuebe

Yehowa wakangambila ne, Kanutatshishi Bena Moaba, kanuluanganyi n abo nvita; bualu bua tshiena munuhe buloba buabo bu buhianyi buenu; bualu bua nakamana kuha bana ba Lota buloba bua Ala bu buhianyi buabo
Nenuhikule ban a bute benu ba mpunda ku muan a mukoko; binuikala kanuyi nubahikula, nutshibule nshingu yabo
Alona ne bana bandi balume nebadie munyinyi wa tshimpanga ne bidia bidi mu tshisaka ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusangakena
Nudimuke, kanulekedi Muena Lewi tô matuku onso anudi nushala mu buloba buenu
Lufu lua Alona ku Mukuna wa Hô Bakabisha luendu luabo mu Kadesha, ne Bena Isalele bonso bakalua ku mukuna wa Hô
Muan abo mukashi wakimana kule, bualu bua kumanya muenzelabo muakuny andi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nakutangila bantu aba, mona, badi ne buhidia bukole, nunku kumpumbishi nansha, tshiji tshianyi tshikale tshikole kudibo, neashihe, kadi nenkuvuishe wewe tshisamba tshinene
Ashe neikale ne bintu bia kudia bia bungi, neavudishe bintu bia kudia bidi bitambe bilengele
Palô neambe bua Bena Isalele ne, Bakuhambuka mu nshila, tshihela tshiakubahumbisha

Nakumûsha tente ne Nyuma wa Nzambi ne lungenyi ne dijingulula ne meji mu kuenza kua midimu yonso ya bianza, bua kulongololeye bintu bia or ne bia argent ne bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne bintu bidibo basonga n abi mabue, ne bidibo basonga n abi mitshi, ne midimu yonso ya bantu badi ne lungenyi lule
Bena Midiyana, bendi ba mushinga bakahita, ba kahatula Yosefe mu mukela, bakamuhanyisha Bena Yishemaele ku bituha bia argent makumi abidi
Nenuikale ne milau hanuabuela mu nsubu, nenuikale ne milau hanualuhukamu
Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, mukuatshishi wa Mose, umue wa balume bakasunguleye, wakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi, Mose, ubakande
Nenufunde ha mabue au mei onso a mikenji ne kufunda kuakane
Badi ne tshia kupeta difutu dikumbana bwa kushindika budikadidi bwabo ne mushinga wabo
Lewitiki Bukoya bua Mubidi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nuambile Bena Isalele ne, Hahatuka tufina mu mubidi wa muntu, tufina atu tudi tubi
Nzambi wakabimona ne, Mbimpe
Tela wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi muanda mutekete, wakalela Abalama ne Nahô ne Halana
Abalahama wakadi ne bidimu lukama hakamulelabo muana wandi mulume Isaka

Nomba Kuhita kua Yehowa Yehowa wakambila Mose mu tshihela tshia Sinai mu ngondo wa kumudilu wa tshidimu tshibidi tshiakaluhukabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne, Bena Isalele nebadie bintu bia kuhita kua Yehowa mu tshikondo tshinakasungula
Nzambi wakunvua di dia nsongalume, ne muanjelo wa Nzambi wakela dî kudi Hagâ difume mu diulu, wakamukonka ne, Hagâ, bualu kai budi bukutonda
Ubande biebe ku mutu kua Pisega, bandisha mesu ebe ku luseke lua ku wesete ne lua ku nôde ne lua ku Sude ne lua ku esete, tangila ne mesu ebe, bualu bua wewe kuena usabuka Yadene eu
Muntu udi mwa kudifidila mpala nkayenda kayi upitshila mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi to
Bulelela, yeye udi unanga bantu bonso, bantu bandi bonso ba tshijila hadi mu tshianza tshiebe: bobo bakashikama hanshi ku makasa ebe, bua kunvua mei ebe
Kadi biatekabo biuma bia kudihikula kudiye, yeye neafile biuma bionso bidibo balomba bua kuhikula muoyo wandi
Edi ndisanka dia Yuda; wakamba ne, Yehowa, unvua dî dia Yuda, ulue n andi kudi bantu bandi: bianza biebe bimukoleshe, wikale mukuatshishi wandi kudi bena lukuna
Bana balume ba Shimeona ku meku abo Nemuele ne meku a Bena Nemuele, Yamina ne meku a Bena Yamina, Yakina ne meku a Bena Yakina, Sela ne meku a Bena Sela, Shaula ne meku a Bena Shaula
Wewe newenze tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi ne mutshi wa acacia
Wewe wambile Bena Isalele ne, Muntu yonso udi uhenda Nzambi wandi nendituadile bubi buandi
Bakaya ne dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Bena Efelayima, ne Elishama, muana mulume wa Amihuda, wakadi ku mutu kuabo
Mose wakadila kudi Yehowa ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Nzambi, umuondahe
Bakaya ku luendu luabo, ditshina dia Nzambi diakadi ku misoko yakadi ha buihi n abo, ne bena musoko kabakalonda bana ba balume ba Yakoba
Muana mulume udi biandi muakuidi mu muaba wandi neabiluate matuku muanda mutekete hayeye mu ntenta wa disangisha bua kuenza mudimu mu muaba wa tshijila

Eu udi mukenji wa disama dia nsudi dia mu tshilulu anyi dia mu nsubu, ne wa tshiuja kabidi anyi wa tshilamulamu anyi wa ditoba ditoke, bua kubalesha hadi bintu kabiyi biakane ne hadibi biakane eu udi mukenji wa disama dia nsudi
Wewe neusunsulule mukata eu, neuwelehu manyi tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia mulambu wa bukula
Kadi nenubenzele nunku: nushihe bishihelu biabo, nuele mabue abo hanshi adibo batendelela, nutahe Bashela babo, nuoshe mpingu yabo ne kahia
Mose wakamba ne, Yehowa, nda nkusengelela ne, Utume muntu ûdi musue kutuma
Bakavudishila Lebeka disanka, bakamuambila ne, Wewe muan etu mukashi, wikale nkambua mukashi wa binunu bia mbombo ya bantu, ne tunkanunuina tuebe tuhiane buloba bua bantu badi n atu lukuna
Nendiundishe mashinde mu madimi enu bua nuenu kudisha bimuna bienu; nenudie, nenukute
Bakashimika nsubu wa tshitendelelu mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa kumudilu mu tshidimu tshibidi
Muntu nealuhuke kudi Yakoba, neikale ne bukelenge butambe, neashihe tshituha tshia bantu badi bashala mu musoko

Muakuidi nealue handi ku tshioshelu, neanyengabashe nshingu wandi, neamuoshile ha tshioshelu, mashi andi neamate hanshi ku luseke lua tshioshelu, yeye neumushe dibodi ne masala, nealele ku luseke lua tshioshelu ludi ku esete, mu muaba wa butue

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Tangila, wewe neulale tulu ne bankambua bebe; ne bantu aba nebabike, nebalonde malu a masandi a nzambi ya bende ya mu buloba buyayabo, nebandekele, nebashihe tshihungidi tshituakahunga n abo
Nakumana kunuambila dî dianyi, enzai nunku, nuangate makalu a tubalu tua mu buloba buetu bua kutuadilamu bana benu bakese ne bakashi benu, nuangate tatu wenu, nuhingane
Sheme, nkambua wa Bena Ebê, muan abo ne Yafete, yeye mene wakalela bana

Yehowa wakangambila kabidi ne, Nakatangila bantu aba ne mona, badi bantu ba tshitshu; undekele, bua meme neashihe, nenjimishe dina diabo muinshi mua diulu; meme nenkuvuishe wewe tshisamba tshidi tshibahita bunene ne bukole
Wakalua ne mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, waka ufila bu muakadi mukenji
Bena Ejipitu nebamanye ne meme ndi Yehowa, hangolola tshianza tshianyi ha Ejipitu ne hanahatula Bena Isalele munkatshi muabo
Yakoba wakamuambila ne, Wewe udi mumanye bu munakakukuatshila mudimu ne bu muakavulangana bimuna biebe binakadi n abi
Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nkulekela biwikala kuyi munsankishe
Yuda wakamba ne, Balue n andi kunoko, bamuoshe mu kalua
Yehowa wakamuambila kabidi ne, Teka tshianza mu tshiadi tshiebe
Muntu yonso wa mu budimi udi ulenga mundi wakafua ku muele wa nvita bianza, anyi mubidi wa mundi mufue, anyi mufuba wa mundi, anyi lukita, neikale bu mundi udi kayi muakane tô matuku muanda mutekete
Buela biebe ne nyama yonso idi mimpe, balume muanda mutekete ne bakashi muanda mutekete, ne nyama idi kayiyi mimpe, buela ne balume babidi ne bakashi babidi
Wewe neulue n abo, neubateke mu mukuna wa buhianyi buebe, muaba uwakusungula, Yehowa, ne, Nenshikamemu, muaba wa tshijila, uwakajadika ne bianza biebe
Nengendakane munkatshi mua bimuna biebe lelu, nengumushe bionso bidi ne matoba, ne mikoko yonso idi mifike, ne mbushi yonso idi ne matoba, bintu ebi nebikale difutu dianyi
Nuakuenza bibi mu bualu ebu

Genese Ditengula nTshimanyinu tshia Tshihungidi Hakadi Abalama ne bidimu makumi tshitema ne tshitema, Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Abalama, wakamuambila ne, Ndi Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso, wenda ku mpala kuanyi, wikale muakane
Bisamba ebi bidi bitendelela nzambi yabo munyi
Labana wakambila Yakoba ne, Bualu bua wewe udi muan etu wa balume, bidi bimpe wewe unkuatshile mudimu tshianana, anyi

Genese Bana Babo ne Yosefe Badi Balua mu Ejipitu bua Kusumba bia Kudia Hakamanya Yakoba ne, Bintu bia kudia biakashala mu Ejipitu, yeye wakambila bana bandi balume ne, Nudi batangilangana muaku bua tshinyi
Udi upeta bukalenga padi dipangadika dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga dipatuka
Wakela lusumuinu luandi kabidi ne, Nganyi neikale ne muoyo hashikisha Nzambi malu au
Bakabuesha mabue au mu masoso a tshiamu tshia or
Muakuidi udi ufila mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, yeye neaudie, neaudie mu muaba wa tshijila mu luhangu lua ntenta wa kusangakena
Abalama wakadi ne bubanji be bua bimuna ne argent ne or
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi ne bukookeshi bwa kwakula

Budikadidi bwa batshikuma mbila, budikadidi mu dimanyisha ne dimwangalaja dia ngumu ku tudiomba ne bindidimbi, bifundibwa, bibejibeji anyi mushindu mukwabo ônso wa dimanyishangana dia mianda udi mwanyishibwa, kadi anu mu dineemeka dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso, dia bibidilu bia mulowo ne dia mapa a muntu mukwabo yônso
Bintu ebi bidi bibi munkatshi mua bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba bibulebule ne mpuka ne dibemba ne musodi ne tshiula ne lungonyonyi
Anu mêyi ne mikandu ke idi ileeja mishindu ne makanyika a kulonda bwa kuya kutangila anyi kukalula mu nzubu mwa muntu
Genese Yosefe Udi Ujinguluila Palô Tshiota Tshiandi Hakahita bidimu bibidi bijima, Palô wakalota tshiota, yeye wakadi muimane hehi ne musulu
Witabushe bua meme nsabuke, utangile buloba buimpe budi dishiya dia Yadene, mukuna au muimpe, ne Lebanona

Bana balume ba Alona bakamulesha mashi, yeye wakatua munu wandi mu mashi, wakâlaba ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu, wakalongolola mashi ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu, kadi yeye wakosha dianyi ne tumuma ne lukutu lua mutshima bia mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ha tshioshelu, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nuangate balume ba lungenyi lule, banudi bamanye, bungi bua bisamba bienu, nembateke ku mutu kuenu
Yeye wakamba ne, Nansha

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa muanda mutekete nedikale dituku dia kuikisha kunudi, dituku dia tshivulukidi didibo bela mpungi, dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila
Mose wakalua, wakambila bantu mei onso a musambu eu mu matshu abo, yeye ne Hoshea, muana mulume wa Nuna

Netuitabushe anu bua bualu ebu, bua buonso buenu nulue bu tuetu, ne balume bonso ba munkatshi muenu batengudibue, hashishe, netufile bana betu ba bakashi kunudi, ne tuetu netuangate bana benu ba bakashi, netuikale n enu netuikale bu bantu bamue
Ku dituku adi mene bahika ba Isaka bakalua kudiye, bakamuambila bua dina dia mai diakimbabo ne, Tuakusangana mai

Muntu yônso udi mwa kubweela mu bilongelu bia ditunga kabayi bamusunguluja bwa mwaba udiye mufumina, bwa dikoba, ditabuuja, bulume anyi bukaji, mmwenenu wa mianda ya tshidiidi anyi ya dieela dia meji, ngikadilu wende wa mubidi, wa lungenyi anyi wa lumvu bilondeshila bukookeshi bwende
Bakashihela ba demon badi kabayi Nzambi nyama, nzambi idibo kabayi bamanye, nzambi mihia mihia yakamueneka anu katataka, yakadi batatu benu kabayi batshina diambedi

Haleha bidimu bisatu nuenu nempatule tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso biakakumbana tshidimu atshi, nenutshiteke ku mbelu kuenu; ne Bena Lewi, bualu bua bobo kabena ne tshituha anyi buhianyi kunudi, ne benyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila badi ku mbelu kuenu nebalue, nebadie, nebukute; nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Yehowa wakamba ne, Binasangana bantu bakane makumi atanu mu musoko wa Sodoma, nensungile musoko wonso bua bualu buabo
Nuenu nuakalua ha buihi, nuakimana kuinshi kua mukuna; mukuna wakatema kahia tô ne mu diulu, ne midima mikole ne matutu
Biakabuela ne Noa mu buatu, bintu bibidi bintu bibidi bia bintu bionso bidi ne muhuya wa muoyo
Eleyasafa, muana mulume wa Deuele, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Gada
Wakabaha muntu ne muntu bilulu bihia bihia, kadi wakaha Benyamina bituha bia argent nkama isatu ne bilulu bihia bihia bitanu
Mulami wa mikoko wakafumaku, ku dibue dia Isalele
Kanukunyi mutshi wa Ashela hehi ne tshishihelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshinudi badiashile

Bikala muntu muenze bualu bubi bua lufu, ne badi bamushiha, nebamuowe ku mutshi; kabashiyi tshitalu tshiandi ku mutshi butuku bujima, bamujike anu dituku adi mene; muntu yonso muowa ku mutshi udi muedibue mulau kudi Nzambi; kanunyangi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Bantu bonso bakabalabo ba mu tshitudilu tshia Lubena bakadi binunu lukama ne makumi atanu ne tshimue ne nkama mai ne makumi atanu Bobo nebatonde ku nyima, tshisumbu tshibidi

Neangate dilonga tente ne makala a kahia ku tshioshelu tshidi ku mpala kua Yehowa, ne bianza biandi tente ne musenga wa manananshi, nealue n abi ku nyima kua tshilulu tshikudika, neateke musenga wa manananshi ha kahia ku mpala kua Yehowa bua ditutu dia muishi wa musenga wa manananshi dibuikile tshibuikilu tshia mushete wa Nzambi, bua yeye katu nansha
Bialala mulume ne mukashi wa manseb andi, udi bu muntu wakavula manseb andi bilulu, bobo nebadituadile bubi buabo, kabena balela bana tshiendelele

Nebenze ntenta wa kusangakena, ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne tshibuikilu tshia ha mutu ha mushete, ne bintu bionso bidi mu ntenta wa kusambakena, ne mesa ne malonga a mesa, ne muinda muimpe ne malonga a muinda, ne tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi, ne tshioshelu tshia kahia ne malonga a tshioshelu, ne tshiowelu ne tshitaku tshia tshiowelu
Mukelenge wandi wakamona ne, Yehowa udi n andi, ne Yehowa wakadi mumuendeshe diakalengele mu tshianza tshiandi mu malu onso akenzeye
Bialueye ne muana wa mukoko bu mulambu wa kubindila n au bubi, nealue biandi ne mukashi wa mukoko udi kauyi ne tshilema
Bua Nafatale yeye wakamba ne, Nafatale wakadiukutshisha ne diakalengele, udi mûle tente ne disanka dia Yehowa

Ya usangishe bakulu ba Bena Isalele, ubambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Isaka ne Nzambi wa Yakoba wakamueneka kundi, wakungambila ne, Nakulua kunudi, Hakatangila mudibo banuenzela mu Ejipitu
Wakasumba tshituha tshia buloba kuakashimikeye ntenta yandi kudi bana ba Hamo tatu wa Shekeme, ku lukama lua kesita
Badi bamumanyisha mu dibweela dia tshilumbulwilu dia ku mêsu a bantu bônso

Bakenza nkanu yonso ya makunshi ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, kadi bitubuidi bia makunshi biakadi bia tshiamu tshia argent, wakalengesha mitu ya makunshi onso ne tshiamu tshia argent, ne makunshi onso a luhangu akadi malengesha ne tshiamu tshia argent
Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Yehowa, meme tshiena mua kuakula bimpe, nansha diambedi, nansha katshia wabanga kuakula ne muntu webe, bualu bua meme ndi muena tshikukumina
Dutelonone Mabue a Mikenji Mifundibue Tshiakabidi Ek
Biwasangana mpingu yebe mu bianza bia muntu wanyi afue biandi, usungule bintu biebe bionso ku mpala kua bana betu, uye n abi Bualu bua Yakoba hakadi mumanye ne, Lakele wakayiba
Tshidi tshilondolola Bukalenga bunene, kumpanyi ya mbulamatadi pamwe ne nzubu ne midimu ya Mbulamatadi

Bialenga muntu tshianza tshiandi ha tshintu tshibi, nansha mifuba ya nyama udi kayi muakane, nansha mifuba ya ngombe udi kayi muakane, nansha mifuba ya tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi tshidi katshiyi tshiakane, ne bikala bualu ebu busokoka ku mesu kuandi, yeye udi muntu wa bukoya, neahile
Mose wakakonka Alona ne, Bantu bakakuenzela tshinyi bua wewe wakubavuishila bualu bubi

Yoketana wakalela Alamodada ne Shelefe ne Hasamaweta ne Yela ne Hadolama ne Uzala ne Dikela ne Obala ne Abimaele ne Shiba ne Ofi ne Hawila ne Yobaba bantu aba bonso bakadi bana balume ba Yoketana Mukalu wabo wakadi ku Mesha mu nshila wa ku Sefa, to ne ku mikuna mile ya ku esete
Bu bobo bikale ne lungenyi, bakadi kujingulula bualu ebu, bakadi kuela meji a malu atua kudibo

Yuda wakambila Isalele tatu andi ne, Utume nsongalume n anyi, netubike, netuye, bua betu ne wewe ne bana hetu bakese bikale ne muoyo, katufu Meme nendieyeke kudiye bu tshieya mu muaba wandi, udi mua kumusombuela ku tshianza tshianyi binahanga kuhingana n andi kudi ne kumuteka ku mpala kuebe hashishe nendibadile bujitu ebu tshiendelele; bu tuetu katuyi bajanguluke nunku, tuakadi mua kuhingana kunoko tshiakabidi
Kadi katangila mu kabwendela malomba a ditangilula mapangadika a tubadi twa Mbulamatadi twa kabwendela
Yeye ne balume bakadi n andi bakadia, bakanua, bakalala butuku abu, bakabika ne dinda, yeye wakabambila ne, Nuntume kudi mukelenge wanyi
Yehowa, ubuikile bubi bua bantu bebe Bena Isalele, bawakahikula, kuitabushi bua mashi a muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu ashale munkatshi mua bantu bebe Bena Isalele
Ndi nkutendekena ne, Tahuluka kundi bi waya ku tshianza tshia bakashi, nenye bianyi ku tshianza tshia balume ne biwaya ku tshianza tshia balume, nenye bianyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi

Uvuluke bantu bebe, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba; kutangidi tshitshu tshia bantu aba anyi buhidia buabo anyi mibi yabo, bua bena buloba buwakatuhatula kabambi ne, Bualu bua Yehowa kakadi ne bukole bua kulua n abo mu buloba buakahaneye ne bualu bua yeye wakadi n abo tshiji, yeye wakalua n abo mu tshihela bua kubashiha
Kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neabafile mu bianza bienu, neabakengeshe ne makenga makole, tô ne hajiminabo
Yosefe wakadi mukokeshi wa mu buloba, nyeye mene wakadi uhanyisha bantu bonso bintu, bana babo ne Yosefe bakalua, bakamukukuila hanshi
Miloho yakahingana kudi Yakoba, yakamuambila ne, Tuakuya kudi mukulu ebe Esau, ne yeye ulualua kusangakena n ebe mu nshila, udi ne balume nkama mai ku nyima kuandi
Bakenza masoso a or abidi ne nkanu ibidi, bakateka nkanu ei ibidi ku nseke ibidi ya tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi
Badi bamwambulwisha kudi mufundi wa mikanda wa Kapangu ka kulu komekela mianda ya bakoshi ba nsambu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Hingasha mulangala wa Alona ku mpala kua mushete, bu tshivulukidi kudi bantu badi basue kutomboka, neumanye mua kushikisha kutontolola kudibo bantontolola n aku bua bobo kabafu nansha
Uteke tshiowelu hankatshi ha ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshioshelu tshia milambu, welemu mai
Bisumbu bia tshidiidi bidi biambulwisha bwa bantu kwambabo majinga abo mu disungulangana bwa kukolesha dimanya dia bwikadi bwa mweena Kongu ne bwa kulongesha bantu mianda ya bweena mwabo
Wakenza bitubuidi bia makunshi ne bintu bia kulengesha n abi makunshi ne nshekele ya argent tshinunu tshimue, nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu

Bikala tatu andi kayi ne bana babo, yeye neaheshe muan abo udi umulonda mu diku diandi buhianyi buandi, yeye mene neabuhete, eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele kudi Bena Isalele, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kadi mesu enu akatangila malu manene onso akenza Yehowa

Hakaya Mose mu ntenta wa kusambakena bua kusomba ne Yehowa, hashishe yeye wakunvua Di diakadi diakula n andi ha mutu ha tshibuikidi tshia ha mutu ha mushete wa Nzambi hankatshi ha bakeluba babidi ne yeye wakasomba ne Yehowa
Hashishe, kahita ka bena maluvu wakambila Palo ne, Ndi muvuluke dihanga dianyi lelu
Bakatua bana babo balume bu banyemi, ne bana babo bakashi bu bena lukanu kudi Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole
Muntu udi ushiha nyama neafute muena nyama, muoyo ku muoyo
Palo wakelela bantu bandi bonso mukenji ne, Bialelabo muana mulume, nenumuele mu musulu, kadi nensungile bana bakashi
Tuakuenza lelu bu muakamba Yehowa bua kunubuikidila bubi
Wakumukaku, wakimba dina dia mai dikuabo, kabakaditandila, yeye wakadidika ne, Lehobota
Aba mbana balume ba Shutela: Elana ne meku a Bena Elana
Muntu yonso udi usangisha bintu ebi bua kudienzela manananshi, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Yehowa katangidi tshintu tshibi munkatshi muenu, kasesuki kunudi
Bulongolodi bwa tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi budi butangila, bilondeshila dishintuluka dia mianda, beena Bukalenga bwa polovensa

Ekesode Kakamanya bantu ne, Mose wakashala ku mukuna musangu mule, bakadisangisha kudi Alona, bakamuambila ne, Bika biebe, utuenzele nzambi idi mua kuya ku mpala kuetu, bua muntu au Mose, wakalua n etu mu Ejipitu, katuena bamanye bualu buakumukuata

Hakunvua Mose dî edi, yeye wa kakuma mpala hanshi, wakambila Kola ne bakadiye habo ne, Dinda Yehowa neadileshe bantu bandi, ne nganyi udi wa tshijila, neamubikile ku mpala kuandi, neabifile wasunguleye ku mpala kuandi
Nakumuebesha ne, Wewe udi muana wa nganyi
Kulambi muana wa mukoko ne mabele a mamu wandi
Enza biebe tshintu tshia biseba bia bimpanga biaka tuabo mu mai makunze kunzû ne tshia biseba bia mbushi tshia kuteka ha musonga wa tshitendelelu
Uteke bintu ebi bionso mu bianza bia Alona ne mu bianza bia bana bandi balume, bobo nebabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa

Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Tshiakuambila miloho yebe kabidi iwakuntumina ne, Biampa Balaka nsubu wandi mûle tente ne argent ne or, tshiena mumanye mua kuya ku mpala kua dî dia Yehowa, bua kuenza bualu buimpe anyi bualu bubi mu mutshima wanyi, nenkuambile mei onso adi Yehowa ubambile, tshiakayambila nunku, anyi
Nuenu nutumikile mei onso adi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuambila; kanusesuki ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi

Nendue ne muele wa nvita munkatshi muenu bu musombuedi wa tshihungidi tshianyi, ne hanuadisangisha mu misoko yenu, meme nentume masama makole munkatshi muenu, nennufile mu bianza bia bantu badi n enu lukuna

Halua Yehowa n enu mu buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana, hanuihatshileye bisamba bia bungi ku mpala kuenu, Bena Hiti ne Bena Gîgashi ne Bena Amole ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse, bisamba muanda mutekete bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole; habafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu bianza bienu, nenubashihe; hashishe nenubajimishe ha buloba: kanuhungi n abo tshihungidi, kanubaleshi luse, kanubakanganyi n abo, kanubakishi muan enu mukashi kudi muana wabo mulume, kanuangatshidi muana wenu mulume mukashi kudibo
Shela ne meku a Bena Shela, Pelese ne meku a Bena Pelese, Zela ne meku a Bena Zela
Matuku onso a Lemeke akadi bidimu nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mutekete ne mua nda mutekete, yeye wakafua biandi
Nunku yeye wakidika mushimi wa mai ne, Bê laha loi kukudimuna kua muaku ne, Mushimi wa Nzambi wa muoyo utu wantangila udi hankatshi ha Kadesha ne Belede
Midimu ya Mulombodi wa Ditunga kayeena ikumbanangana ne bujitu kampanda mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi kansanga to

Nakuinyika mutu wanyi, nakutendelela Yehowa, nakutumbisha Yehowa, Nzambi wa mukelenge wanyi Abalahama, wakandombola mua kuya mu nshila muakane bua kuangatshila muana mulume wa mukelenge wanyi mukashi kudi muana wa muan abo
Dinanga dia Isalele kudi Yosefe diakatamba dinanga diandi kudi bana bandi bonso, bualu bua yeye wakadi muana wakaleleye ku bununu buandi, wakamulelela tshikowelu tshia maboko male
Kudingidi mukuenu
Netanele, muana mulume wa Sua, mukelenge wa Yisakâ, wakaula bintu biandi dituku dibidi
Kanungu ka Budikadidi bwa kulonda mianda ya diaakwila beena mudimu budi bumanyike ne bujadikibwe

Nebangate tshilulu tshia bleu, nebabuikile hatshi bitekelu bia minda ne minda, ne bintu bidibo bajima habi minda, ne tuhanza tua mishila ya kahia, ne bihanza bia manyi adibo bakuatshisha n au minda nebateke minda ne malonga ne bintu ebi bionso mu tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge, nebabiteke ha mitshi ibidi idi mikuatakasha
Bakaluangana ne Bena Midiyana bu muakambila Yehowa Mose, bakashiha balume bonso
Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Abalama, wakamba ne, Nempe tunkanunuina biebe buloba ebu Abalama wakenzela Yehowa, wakamueneka kudiye, tshioshelu
Hakashikisha tumelo kunua mai, mulume eu wakahatula kakanu ka or ka bujitu bua tshituha tshia nshekele, ne nkanu ibidi ya ku maboko ya bujitu bua nshekele dikumi kabidi
Hakalela matuku a bungi, mukelenge wa Ejipitu wakafua Bena Isalele bakafua mikemu bualu bua buhika, bakadila, muadi wabo wakafika kudi Nzambi bualu bua buhika buabo
Difila nansha dimwe, dishintakaja nansha dimwe, disakidila nansha dimwe kadieena ne mushinga padiku kakuyi dianyisha dia beena Kongu didibo bapeta mu dikonkoloja to
Yeye wakamba ne, Wewe kuena mua kumona mpala wanyi; bualu bua muntu kena mua kumona mpala wanyi ne kuikala ne muoyo
Hanuaya kusangana mba ne bantu badi banukengesha mu buloba buenu, nenuele mpungi bikole, nenuikale nuvulukibua ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenusungidibue kudi bantu badi n enu lukuna
Kadi bikala tatu wandi mumukande mu dituku diakunvueye kuditshiha kuandi, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso kabiena bijalama: Yehowa neamubuikidile bualu ebu bua tatu andi wakamuitaba
Kana wakambila Ebele muakuny andi bualu ebu Hashishe hakadibo mu budimi, Kana wakabika ku mpala kua Ebele muakuny andi, wakamushiha

Wakenza bakeluba babidi ne tshiamu tshia or tshituha tshimue tshijima, ku matengu abidi a tshibuikilu, mukeluba umue ku ditengu dimue, ne mukeluba mukuabo ku ditengu dikuabo, wakenza bakeluba ne tshibuikilu tshia mushete ne tshituha tshijima tshia or

Dituku dia dikumi dia ngondo eu wa muanda mutekete nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, nenunyingalashe mioyo yenu, kanuenji mudimu, ka dî nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, bintu bisatu bia dikumi ku muana wa ngombe, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko tô ne ku bana ba mikoko muanda mutekete, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, nenufile bintu ebi ku mutu kua mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ya buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Yeye wakamba kabidi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Sheme, atumbishibue, Kanana neikale muhika wandi
Abalama wakadia mpala hanshi, ne Nzambi wakayikila n andi ne, Mona, tshihungidi tshianyi tshidi n ebe, wewe newikale nkambua wa bisamba bia bungi

Bana ba balume ba Yakoba bakalua munkatshi mua bantu bafue bakahaula musoko, bualu bua bobo bakanyanga muan abo wa bakashi Bakangata mikoko yabo ne ngombe yabo ne mpunda yabo, ne bintu biakadi mu musoko, ne bintu biakadi mu madimi, ne biuma biabo bionso ne bana babo ne bakashi babo, bakabangata bu bahika babo ba mu nvita bionso mene biakadi mu nsubu
Kadi nenufile milambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia tô matuku muanda mutekete, dituku dia muanda mutekete ndituku dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Yakoba wakumusha bana ba mikoko, wakateka mesu abo kudi bimuna bia Labana biakadi ne matoba ne biakadi bifike, wakateka bimuna biandi ha buabi, kakabiteka hamue ne bimuna bia Labana
Tangilai, nakateka disanka ne mulau ku mpala kuenu lelu
Mishimi ya mu mai manene ne bibi bia mu diulu kabidi biakadi bikandibua, ne nvula ya mu diulu yakalekeshibua

Kanungu ka Padi tshingenyingenyi anyi tshialwa kwikala dîyi batshiamba kudi Bukalenga bunene ne tshidi tshia kutangila pa lukasa, badi batshilondeshilula kumpala kwa biônso mu tshibambalu ne tshibambalu kudi Kasumbu kadi kakumbanyina maalu awu bilondeshila bulongolodi buleeja mu mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu
Kadi kajadika bululama bwa ngenzelu wa masungulangana ne wa dikonkoloja dia beena ditunga

Bintu bidi bidimenena mu tshidimu tshia kubanda kua buloba nebikale bintu bienu bia kudia, bintu biebe ne bia muhika webe mulume ne bia muhika webe mukashi ne bia muena mudimu webe ne bia muenyi udi ushikama n ebe ne bia bimuna biebe ne bia nyama yonso idi mu buloba buebe bintu bionso biakadimenena nebikale bintu bia kudia
Kusakidila pa bukookeshi ebu, polovensa idi yabanyangana makookeshi makwabo ne Bukalenga bwa kumutu, ne yabanyangana kabidi nabu lupetu lwa ditunga mu bitupa bia bialukama ne
kupangisha dijinga diônso dia kufikisha ku bukalenga bwa nkaya;
Balaka wakatuma miloho mikuabo, yakahita miloho mikuabo butumbi
Kumukokeshi ne tshianza tshikole, kadi utshine Nzambi webe
Bantu aba badi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo, Bena Lewi, ku meku abo
Yeye wakalua muntu munene be, wakatamba kudiunda bunene, wakadi ne bisumbu bia mikoko ne bia ngombe ne bantu ba bungi ku nyima kuandi
Bualu bua bilulu, ne bintu bionso biakenzabo ne biseba, ne bintu bionso biakenzabo ne miosa ya mbushi, ne bintu bionso biakenzabo ne mabaya, nenudilengeshe bua bintu ebi
Mose wakambila balumbuluishi ba mu Isalele ne, Muntu ne muntu ashihe bantu ba mu tshisamba tshiandi bakadisangisha kudi Bâla peô
Bikalabo kabayi bakuitabusha, kabayi bunvue di dia tshimanymu tshia kumudilu, bobo nebitabushe dî dia tshimanymu tshia kunshikidilu
Uyaya kudi kunyi

Wakenza mabaya a mu nsubu makumi abidi a kuteka ku luseke lua ku sude, Wakenza masoso makumi anai a tshiamu tshia argent mu mabaya makumi abidi, masoso abidi mu dibaya dimue a kuteka mu tutshi tua tutuha, ne masoso abidi mu dibaya dikuabo a kutekamu tutshi tua tutuha

Nomba Midima Yakahabo Bena Lewi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Balai bungi bua bana balume ba Kohata ba munkatshi mua bana balume ba Lewi ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, mu bidimu makumi asatu to ne ku bidimu makumi atanu buonso buabo badi bakuata mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Bikala mulambu wandi wa kuosha wa muana wa ngombe, neafile mulume udi kayi ne tshilema, neamushihele ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, ne Yehowa neamuitabushe

Etshi ntshintu tshia tshijila tshia Alona ne tshia bana bandi balume munkatshi mua milambu ya Yehowa idibo bosha ha kahia mu dituku diakabasunguleye bua kuenzelabo Yehowa mudimu wa buakuidi, Yehowa wakela mukenji wandi kudi Bena Isalele bua kubahabo tshintu etshi mu dituku diakabasunguleye
Bena Isalele, bitudilu bienu bidi bimpe
Abalama wakikala mu buloba bua Kanana, Lota wakashikama mu misoko ya mu mpata, wakashimika ntenta yandi tô ne ku Sodoma
Tshituha tshidi bule bua coudée ku luseke lumue ne tshituha tshidi bule bua coudée tshiota tshisonga netshikale ku luseke lua tshitendelelu bua kutshibuikila
Bena Isalele bakaditshiha kudi Yehowa ne, Biwafila bantu aba mu bianza bietu, netushihe misoko yabo yonso
Kadi kanuenji Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku
Kadi kanudi mashi andi; nuahongolole hanshi ha buloba bu mai

Bana ba Yakoba bakamuenzela bu muakabambileye, bualu bua bobo bakamutuala mu buloba bua Kanana, bakamujika mu lubuebue lua mu budimi bua Makepela, luakasumba Abalahama hamue ne budimi, kudi Efelona, Muena Hiti, bu muaba wa kujikamu bafue, ku mpala kua Mamale
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe, umukuate ku mukila, yeye wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakamukuata ne nyoka wakakudimuka mulangala kabidi

Bena Holi bakashikama mu Sei diambedi, kadi Bena Esau bakabalonda ku nyima; bakabashiha ku mpala kuabo, bakashikama mu muaba wabo; bu muakenza Bena Isalele ku buloba bua buhianyi buabo, buakabahebua kudi Yehowa
Kadi Nzambi wakamueneka kudi Abimeleke mu tshilota butuku, wakamuambila ne, Wewe udi anu muntu mufue, bualu bua mukashi uwakuangata udi mukashi wa munga muntu
Yehowa neanutumine masama mabi tô ne hanuajimishibua ha buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana
Mu dikumbaja dia midimu eyi ne makookeshi aa, Tshibutshilu Tshinene tshia Kongu tshidi tshidikadile ne tshidi ne bukookeshi bwa kudiludika nkayatshi
Nunku muan anyi witabusha di dianyi, bika biebe, unyemene kudi Labana muan etu wa balume, udi mu Halana, ushale n andi matuku makese to ne hashika lukuna lua mukulu ebe ludiye n alu kudi
Mose wakalelela mikenji bu buhianyi bua tshisambakena tshia Yakoba
Yehowa wakadi ne Yosefe, wakamuendesha diakalengele, wakadi mu nsubu wa mukelenge wandi, Muena Ejipitu
Bakadila bibombi biabo hanshi lubilu, ne muntu ne muntu bakasulula bibombi biabo
Badi Batela Malenda ku Bilulu Biabo Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele bua bobo ne tunkanunuma tuabo badienzele malenda ku bilulu biabo, ne bobo bateke muonshi wa bleu ku malenda abo
Lea wakamba ne, Dikasa dimpe
bishimikidi bia mianda ya manga ne ya dinanga dia bantu; diangata dia batumi ba mêyi ku mudimu wa manga ne wa budimi;
Ekesode Nsubu wa Tshitendelelu Ek
Kadi biasumba muntu muhika wandi ku argent, ne hakamutengulabo, yeye udi mua kutshidia
Luhuka mu buatu ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo biakadi n ebe ne nyunyu ne bimuna ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi, bilelangane, bivulangane bia bungi ha buloba

Kanuikadi ne kansungusungu hanualumbulula bilumbu; nunvue dî dia muntu mukese ne dia muntu munene muomumue; kanutshinyi mpala wa muntu; bualu bua kulumbulula kua bilumbu kudi kua Nzambi: tshilumbu tshidi tshihita bukole, nulue n atshi kundi, meme nentshiunvue
Mudimu wa Tshipwita mukulumpa udi utwadija padibo bitabuuja makookeshi enda kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa ne udi ufika ku ndekeelu padibo bateeka Tshibambalu tshipiatshipia
Mu matuku onso a tshijila tshiandi kadi tshindi tshiakenzabo ne mitshi ya tumuma ku ntete ya tumuma tô ne ku bihusu biatu
Nzambi wakenzela baleleshi bimpe, bantu bakakumbana ba bungi, bakalua bakole be, Bualu bua baleleshi bakatshina Nzambi, yeye wakabaha bana
Mukashi wakamba ne, Nyoka wakundinga, nakudia
Biakuma muntu muhika wandi mulume anyi muhika wandi mukashi ne mulangala, ne biafueye mu tshianza tshiandi, nebamukengeshe bulelela
Katataka bikai bienu, nusabuke kasulu ka Zelede; tuakasabuka kasulu ka Zelede
Hashikisha Yehowa kubihata, kanuambi mu mitshima yenu ne, Mbualu bua buakane buetu, Yehowa wakaluamu n etu bua kuhiana buloba ebu: bualu bua Yehowa udi ubihata ku mpala kuenu bualu bua bubi buabo
Yeye wakebesha Isaka ne, Wewe kuakunshilaku disanka, anyi
Biahona tshituha tshia mibidi mufue ya bintu ebi ha tshintu, tshintu atshi netshikale ne bukoya, nansha nfulu nansha bivuadi, nebanshihe, bidi ne bukoya, nebikale bibi kunudi
Bana balume ba Manashe Mala ne meku a Bena Mala, Mala wakalela Gilada; Gilada ne meku a Bena Gilada
Enza mabaya makumi abidi bua kuteka ku luseke lua ku Sude lua tshitendelelu
Bana ba Lotana bakadi Holi ne Hemana; Timena wakadi muan abo wa bakashi ne Lotana

Wakenza tshitekelu tshia minda ne or nkayandi, bakahita tshitaku tshia kahanza, ne tshintu tshia tshiamu tshiakadi hankatshi, ne luhanza tukese, ne bihunga, ne bilongo ne tshituha tshia tshiamu tshia or tshijima
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne mukashi muhika, udi mubangila kudi mulume, udi kayi muanze kuhikudibua, nebabakengeshe bubidi buabo, kabena babashiha bualu bua yeye kakadi muhikudibue

Wewe neulongolole luhangu lua tshitendelelu, ku luseke lua sude enza bilulu bidi bituangane tô ne ku coudées lukama, makunshi makumi abidi ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku makumi abidi, bitubuidi bia ku makunshi nebikale bia argent

Kanungu ka Ndondo ya bupole, ya bungenda mushinga, ndondo ne diumvwangana bidi bitangila ndongolwelu ya bukwa matunga ne idi bitangila dikosa dia bilumbu bia bukwa matunga, eyi idi ikengela lupetu lwa Mbulamatadi, eyi idi ishintulula bulongolodi bwa ngelelu wa mêyi, eyi idi itangila mubidi wa bantu, eyi idi ifikisha kudishintakaja ne disakidila tshitupa tshia buloba badi mwa kuyijadika anyi kuyanyisha bilondeshila mêyi a ditunga
Muakuidi neameme tshituha tshia mulambu wa bukula bu tshivulukidi, neatshioshile ha tshioshelu ne kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshi tua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Esau wakashikama mu mukuna wa Sei Esau udi Edome

Nuhingane kundi ne muan enu, muan a mukala, hashishe nemmanye ne, Kanuena batentekedi nudi bantu ba mei a bushuwa nunku nempingashe muan enu mu bianza bienu, nenumanye mua kuendulula mushinga mu buloba
Bantu bakajuka dituku adi, ne butuku bujima tô ne ku dituku dikuabo, bakasangisha nkuadi muntu wakasangisha bungi bukese wakasangisha bihiminu binene dikumi, bakadilongoluelayi mu tshitudilu
Kadi biwunvua di diandi ne biwenza mei onso andi nkuambila, nunku meme nengikale bu muena lukuna kudi bantu badi n ebe lukuna, ne bu muena nvita kudi bantu badi basue kusangana n ebe
Misoko ei yonso yakadi ne mpangu mile ne bibi bikanda ne biamu; tuakanyenga misoko mikuabo ya bungi yakadi kayiyi ne mpangu
Dutelonone Muaba Umuehele wa Kutendelela Yehowa Â mmalu ne mei anudi ne bualu bua kutumikila mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, munuhe bua kubuhiana matuku onso a muoyo wenu ha buloba

Bantu Kabadi Mashi To Muntu yonso wa mu bisamba bia Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi ba munkatshi muabo udi udia mashi, meme nengumushe mesu anyi kudi muntu au udi udia mashi nemmumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Mabue akadi bungi bua mena a bisamba bia Bena Isalele, dikumi ne bibidi, bakafundahu mena a bisamba bia Bena Isalele dikumi ne bibidi ku mulongo wa tshisamba ne tshisamba
Yeye wakamuambila ne Mona, Bileha, muena mudimu wanyi wa bakashi udiku, uye kudiye bua yeye andelele bana ha binu bianyi, ne bua meme ngikale ne bana kudiye
Dina dia Muena Isalele wakashihabo ne mukashi wa Bena Midiyana diakadi Zimeli, muana mulume wa Salu, mukelenge wa nsubu ya batatu abo ya Bena Shimeona
Binuatumikila dî dianyi, ne binuanemeka tshihungidi tshianyi, nuenu nenuikale bantu banyi ba munkatshi mua bantu bonso, bualu bua buloba buonso mbuanyi
Bamonyi ba bualu nebolole bianza kudiye diambedi bua kumushiha, ne ku nyima bantu bonso nebolole bianza biabo
Yehowa wakadi ne Alona tshiji tshikole bua kumushiha; nakalombela Alona musangu eu kabidi

Nenufile diatshimue ne mulambu wa bukula wa bituha bibidi bia dikumi bia épha busangisha ne manyi, mulambu wa kutua dihembu dimpe muoshile Yehowa, nenufile mulambu wa nvinyo wa kunua wa tshituha tshinai tshia hin
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama isambombo ne makumi atanu
Yeye wakalota tshilota tshikuabo, wakatshiawila bana babo, wakabambila ne, Monai, nakulota tshilota tshikuabo, nakumona diba ne ngondo ne mitoto dikumi ne umue, biakunkukuila
O, nakadi kusua bua mutshima eu wikale munda muabo, bua kuntshina ne bua kuenza mikenji yanyi yonso matuku onso, ne bobo bikale ne dikasa dimpe, ne bana babo badi balonda ku nyima tshiendelele

Tangila, hantshidi muimane hehi ne mushimi wa mai, ne bana bakashi ba bena musoko bakadi balua bua kusunabo mai, witabushe ne nsongakashi undi ngambila ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Utule mulondo webe wa mai, umpe mai a kunua, yeye angandamune di ne, Nua biebe, nennuishe tumelo biebe kabidi, nunku yeye mene ikale mukashi uwakasunguila muntu webe Isaka, nunku nemmanye ne wewe wakufuila mukelenge wanyi luse

Bakenzela Alona ne bana bandi balume bikowelu bia lin, ne bifulu bia lin, ne bilulu bikuabo bia ha mutu, ne mihanu ya lin, ne mukaba wa lin ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû, mudimu wa bantu ba lungenyi lule, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, Nashona muana mulume wa Aminadaba
Mêyi a ditunga adi ateela mêna a mpetu mikwabo ya mu musoku ne mushindu wa kuyabanya

Mu dituku dia muanda mutekete bana balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete, ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai bu mudi mukenji wamba; ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Nebabusangishe ne manyi mu dilonga, ne hashikishabo kubulamba, nebafile bituha bidi bilamba kudi Yehowa bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu
Bu mudi bungi bua bidimu ku nyima kua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene wewe neusumbe bintu kudi mukuenu, ne yeye neakusumbishe bu mudi bungi bua bidimu biakamaneye kuhuola bintu
Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi kafikisha dimanyisha edi ku buludiki bwa bitadi
Yakoba wakambila Lebeka mamu andi ne, Tangila, Esau, mukulu anyi udi ne miosa ya bungi ham bidi bandi kadi meme ndi ne mubidi mutuhu

Mfumu yônso wa ditunga dijima, wa polovensa, wa musoko anyi wa kabukulu udi ne tshia kusungila bumwe bwa Ditunga ne bujima bwa malaba aadi, tshianana badi bamupiisha ne tshibawu tshia dipangila dia ditunga
Ekesode Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nakukuvuisha bu Nzambi ku mesu kua Palô, ne Alona mukulu ebe neikale muakuidi webe
Abalahama Wakabikila dina dia muaba au ne, Yehowa yile; nunku badi bamba tô ne ku dituku edi ne, Mu mukuna wa Yehowa nebatuhe bintu

Hakatangila Pinehasa, muana mulume wa Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi, bualu ebu, yeye wakabika munkatshi mua tshisumbu, wakangata difuma mu tshianza tshiandi, yeye wakalonda ku nyima kua Muena Isalele mu nsubu wakababambakasha bubidi buabo, Muena Isalele ne mukashi Nunku disama diakalekedibua munkatshi mua Bena Isalele

Ku nyima kua kulela kua Hanoka, Yalede wakikala ne muoyo bi dimu nkama muanda mukulu, wa kalela bana balume ne bana bakashi Matuku onso a Yalede akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne makumi asambombo ne bibidi, yeye wakafua biandi

Ku butshika bua musoko nenuidikishe ku luseke lua ku esete coudées binunu bibidi, ne ku luseke lua ku Sude coudées binunu bibidi, ne ku luseke lua ku wesete coudées binunu bibidi, ne ku luseke lua ku nôde coudées binunu bibidi Buloba ebu bua ku matshika a misoko nebuikale buhianyi buabo
Wewe newele Alona ne bana bandi balume manyi ha mutu, neubajidile, bua bobo bankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi
Kadi biwokala kuyi wenza bimpe, bualu bubi budi bualamina ku mbelu kuebe, mutshima wa bubi newikale kudi, kadi wewe ubukokeshe
Lufu lua Yosefe Yosefe wakashikama mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wandi, Yosefe wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne dikumi
Dituku dikuabo, muana wa bakashi wa Shua, mukashi wa Yuda, wakafua, Yuda wakasambibua, wakaya kudi bakoshi ba miosa ya mikoko yandi ku Timena, kudi mulunda wandi Hila, Muena Adulama

Ei mmilambu ludi mua kuoshila ha tshioshelu bana ba mikoko babidi ba tshidimu tshimue ku dituku ku dituku misangu yonso Wewe newoshile umue wa mikoko ne dinda ne mukuabo dilolo Woshe muana umue wa mukoko ne tshia dikumi tshia tshihiminu tshia bukula busangisha ne tshia tshinai tshia tshihiminu tshia manyi, ne tshia tshinai tshia tshihiminu tshia nvinyo bu mulambu wa kunua
Mutshi ma wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye kakunvuila Bena Isalele, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kanungu ka Dikumbaja dia ndongamu wa midimu ya lupetu didi ditwadija mu dia kumpala dia tshiongu ne didi dijika mu dia dia tshiswa munene
Miaba yonso mudi nudiata munda mua makasa enu neyikale yenu: ku tshihela ne mikuna ya Lebanona ne ku musulu munene wa Pelata tô ne ku mai manene adi ku nyima kuenu
Nunku muan anyi, utumikile dî dindi nkua mbila

Muntu mubanji kena ne bualu bua kufila tshintu tshidi tshilamba tshituha tshia nshekele bunene, ne muntu muhele kena ne bualu bua kufila tshintu tshidi tshilamba tshituha tshia nshekele bukese, hanuafila kuha kua Yehowa bua kuhikula mioyo yenu
Uhiane biebe buloba bua ku dishiha ne bua ku sude
Yosefe wakela bantu bandi mukenji bua kulongololabo tshitalu tshia tatu wandi, banganga buka bakalongolola tshitalu tshia Isalele
Yeye wakalukila kudi Yuda, wakamuambila ne, Tshiakumusangana, ne balume ba musoko bakungambila ne, Mukashi wa masandi kakadiku
Bua bualu ebu kanuena nudituadila bubi, hanuanyukula bintu bidi bitamba buimpe kanuena nuona bintu bia tshijila bia Bena Isalele, bua nuenu kanufu
Nzambi wakantuma ku mpala kuenu bua kunusangasha difuka dikese dia bantu ne bua kusungila mioyo yenu ku luhandu lunene

Nadaba ne Abihu bakafua ku mpala kua Yehowa, hakaluabo ne kahia kakadi kakayi kajidila ku mpala kua Yehowa, mu tshihela tshia Sinai, bobo kabakadi ne bana, ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ bakenza mudimu wa buakuidi ku mesu kua Alona tatu abo

Yeye nealue n ai kudi muakuidi, neafile mulambu wa kubindila n au bubi diambedi, neanyengabashe nshingu wandi kadi kena umuhandulula nansha, neamiamine mashi makuabo a mulambu wa kubuikala n au bubi ku luseke lua tshioshelu, ne mashi makuabo yeye neahongolole ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu, tshintu etshi mmulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Nudi ne muan enu mukuabo wa balume, anyi
Bishimikidi bidi bitwa mungalata mpanda bidi bimungutuka kakuyi dikonka dia muntu bwaalu to bitwadija ku dishikila dia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga
Abalahama wakabuela mu ntenta lubilu kudi Sala wakamuambila ne Wangate bihiminu bisatu bia bukula lubilu, usangakashe, ulambe mikata
Mulombodi udibo basungula udi ubanga mudimu mu tshipungu tshipiatshipia
Bakambila Tamâ ne, Tatu ebe muenu uyaya ku Timena bua kukoseye mikoko yandi miosa
Pa mukanda wa dîyi mujima, dieela dia tukanda didi dienzeka padibo babiikila dîna ne dîyi dikola
Hanubikilabo kudi Palo, yeye neanukonke ne, Nudi benji ba mudimu kai
Hashishe bakahanda bilulu biabo, bakahingasha majitu ha nyima ha mpunda yabo, bakahingana mu musoko
Muakuidi nealuate bilulu biandi bia lin ne mihanu ya lin, neangate butue bua kahia kakosha mulambu wa ha tshioshelu, neabuteke hehi ne tshioshelu
Hanuahuola tumuma tukese tua mu madimi enu a tumuma, kanutuhuodi tshiakabidi: tumuma netushale tua benyi ne tua bana ba nshiya ne tua bakashi ba mu lufuila

Dutelonone Mua Kufutshisha Mushihianganyi Bubi Buandi Biasanganabo muntu mufue mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu nubuhiane, kabayi bamanye muntu wakamushiha; hashishe bakulu ne balumbuluishi nebaluhuke, nebahime mutantshi kubangila ku muaba udi tshitalu tô ne ku misoko idi ha buihi ne muntu mufue; bakulu ba mu musoko udi utamba ha buihi ne muntu mufue nebangate kana ka ngombe kadi kakayi kanze kuenza mudimu ne tshikokedi; bakulu ba mu musoko nebahueke ne kana ka ngombe mu tshibanda tshidi ne mai adi ahueka, tshidibo kabayi banze kudimamu ne kukunamu bintu, nebatshibule nshingu wa kana ka ngombe mu tshibanda atshi
Wakenza mesu a mbote makumi atanu ku luseke lua tshilulu tshiakadi ha bule, ne mesu a mbote makumi atanu ku luseke lua tshilulu tshikuabo tshiakadi ha bule
Neutukokeshe, anyi
Yakoba wakambila Labana ne, Umpe mukashi wanyi, bualu bua matuku anyi akukumbana bua meme kuikala n andi

Mose wakamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mundankulu meme nenye munkatshi mua Ejipitu; ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu nebafue, ku muan a bute wa Palô udi ushikama ha nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge tô ne kudi muan a bute wa mukashi udi uhela manvua andi, ban a bute ba bimuna bionso nebafue kabidi
Wewe newangate bilulu, uluatshishe Alona tshikowelu ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu ha efoda ne efoda ne tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi ne umuele mukaba muluka bilengele wa efoda ku tshimono
Bintu ebi bionso ubienze ne tshituha tshimue tshia or, tshintu tshijima tshienza ne tshituha tshimue tshia or muedibue mutambe buimpe
Abalama ne Nahô bakabaka bakashi, dina dia mukashi wa Abalama diakadi Salai, ne dina dia mukashi wa Nahô diakadi Mileka, muana wa Halana, tatu wa Mileka ne tatu wa Yiseka
Isaka wakashikama mu Gelâ
Abimeleke wakamuambila ne, Mona, buloba buanyi budi ku mpala kuebe, ushikame kudi musue
Hanuahuola mu buloba ne hanuakuna mitshi ya mamuma, kunudi mamuma a mitshi tô bidimu bisatu
Abalahama wakaya lubilu ku tshisumbu tshia ngombe, wakangata lukungulu lua ngombe luakadi lutekete ne luimpe, wakalufila kudi muntu wandi, ne yeye wakaluhandulula lubilu
Nuditengule mu mitshima yenu, kanuikadi bantu ba tshitshu kabidi
Dutelonone Binuatangila nansha ngombe nansha mukoko bia mukuenu bihambuka, kusokoki bualu ebu kudiye, kadi ubihingashe kudi mukuenu
Wakutuenzela nunku tshinyi, bua kutuhatula mu Ejipitu
Genese Nzambi wakavuluka Noa ne nyama yonso ne bimuna bionso biakadi n andi mu buatu, Nzambi wakahehesha luhehele ha buloba ne mai akahueka
Alona wakolola bianza biandi kudi bantu, wakabandisha disanka, yeye wakahueka kuakadiye ufila mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne wa kuosha ha kahia ne ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala
Bantu bonso bakakuohola nkanu ya or yakadi ku matshu abo, bakalua n ai kudi Alona
Tshiowelu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wewe newenze tshiowelu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku ne tshitaku tshiatshi tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku kudibo bowa mai

Kanungu ka Difunda, kumpalampala kwa biônso, mu ndongamu wa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu dia tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi , dia dipangadika dia dîyi anyi dia diteeja dia tshidiidi tshia mu kabujima didi dienzeka kakuyi dieelakana padi Bukalenga bunene bwa Mbula Matadi budilomba, panyima pa dipeshangana dia ngenyi dieenza mu Tshipangu tshia ba meena
Butuku abu budi butuku budibo basue kuyidika Yehowa, bualu bua yeye wakabahatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ebu mbutuku bua Yehowa budi Bena Isalele bavuluka ku bikondo biabo bionso
Aba mbana ba balume ba Esau, aba mbakelenge babo, eu udi Edome
Wakukuta difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Onana

Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakela di diandi kudi Abalahama difume mu diulu tshiakabidi, wakamba ne, Nakaditshiha ku dina dianyi, muakuamba Yehowa, bualu bua wewe wakuenza bualu ebu, kuakumpidisha muan ebe, muana umue hele mene, ne hanasankisha bakuabo nenkuyudíshile disanka, ne hanakumbasha bakuabo nenkumbashe tunkanunuma tuebe bu mitoto ya mu diulu ne bu nsenga ya kukala kua mai manene tunkanunuma tuebe netuhiane bibi bia bantu badi n atu lukuna, bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bualu bua tunkanunuma tuebe, bualu bua wewe wakatumikila di dianyi
Alona neatuale mena a Bena Isalele ha tshilulu tshia dilumbulula tshidi ha mutshima wandi, hayeye ku muaba wa tshijila, bu tshivulukidi tshia tshiendelele ku mesu kua Yehowa
Hakashikisha Isaka kusankisha Yakoba ne Yakoba mumuke anu tshituha ku mesu kua tatu wandi Isaka, Esau mukulu andi wakahingana kuakadiye muye bua kumukebela nyama
Mei onso akaluhuka mukana muena nuenze bu munuakuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, binuakumulaya mukana muenu

Nenufile milambu ya buatshia buatshia nunku, milambu ya kuosha ha kahia tô matuku muanda mutekete, idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa, nenufile milambu ei ku mutu kua milambu mudi nuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua

Kudi tshibawu tshia mutabala mu lwendu lwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga anyi lwa Minisitila kavumbadi padiye wenza mudimu ne nzubu idi ne mushinga anyi ne bia kupaana bidiye mumanyina mianda yabi misokoma kadi mwikala wanji kubidiila makasa kumpala kwa mianda eyi kumanyikayi kudi bantu bônso
Nenushale bioshelu biabo, nutshibule mabue abo bituha, nuoshe Bashela babo ne kahia; nenutahe mpingu yakasongabo ne tshifuanyikishi tshia nzambi yabo; nenjimishe mena abo mu muaba au
Pelege wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu, wakalela Leu

Kanungu ka Bilondeshila bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu, Mulombodi wa ditunga udi weelangana mvita ku dipangadika dia Tshipangu tshia baminisitila panyima pa dianyisha dia Kapangu ka ku mutu kwa bilwilu ne dianyisha dia bibambalu biônso bibidi
Mona

Kadi kanudi nyama mikuabo idi ihingishilula bintu mukana, anyi idi ne mikono mihanduluke kamelo, bualu bua kadi kahingishilula bintu mukana, kabidia, kadi kakena ne mikono mihanduluke, kakena kakane kunudi

Milambu yonso ya bintu bia tshijila bidibo banyukula bidi Bena Isalele bafila kudi Yehowa, nakunuhabi ne bana bebe balume ne bana bebe bakashi, bu tshintu tshienu tshiendelele: etshi ntshihungidi tshia luehu tshia tshiendelele ku mesu kua Yehowa kûdi wewe ne kudi bana bebe badi n ebe
Mai akatamba kuvulangana ha buloba, ne mikuna mile yonso idi muinshi mua diulu yakabuikidibua
Yehowa neanujadike bu bantu bandi ba tshijila, bu muakanulayeye, binuatumikila mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, binuenda mu nshila yandi
Ekesode Mose ne Bakulu ku Mukuna wa Sinai Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ulue biebe kudi Yehowa ne wewe ne Alona ne Nadaba ne Abihu ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele makumi muanda mutekete, nuntendelele ha bule
Mose wakamushiha, wakangata mashi, wakitaba ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu ne munu wandi, wakajidila tshioshelu, wakela mashi ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu bua kutshijidila, bua kubuikila bubi bua bantu
Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka kalongu ka , Dîyi dikulu dia Bukalenga bwa Tshisabu dia mu dia a lwabanya ndifwa
Muntu udibo bânji kulama mu tshimana udi ne bukookeshi bwa kuyukila diakamwe ne beena dîku diende anyi ne mumwakwidi wende
Bualu bua hakayabo mu tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bakatangila buloba, bakahangisha mitshima ya Bena Isalele, bua bobo kabayi mu buloba buakabahabo kudi Yehowa
Kutedi dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi webe, tshitelatela, bua Yehowa kena ubingisha muntu udi utela dina diandi tshitelatela
Mikenji Idi Isuika Bena Tshimbambila Muntu udi ukuma mukuabo, udi umushiha, nebamushihe yeye bulelela
Kuvudi mamu ebe mukuabo bilulu, yeye udi muan abo ne mamu ebe

Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso anufue luse ku mesu kua mulume au, bua yeye ahingashe muan enu mukuabo ne Benyamina kabidi mu bianza bienu Bianjimishilabo bana banyi, nembajimishe Bobo bakangata matabisha au, ne argent misangisha misangu ibidi, ne Benyamina mu bianza biabo, bakabika, bakaya mu Ejipitu, bakimana ku mpala kua Yosefe
Bantu badi n enu lukuna nebanukokele, nuenu nenudiate mikuna yabo mu makasa enu
Hakalua dituku disambombo, bakasangisha bituha bibidi, bihiminu bibidi ku muntu ne ku muntu, ne bakulu ba munkatshi muabo Bakalua, bakamanyisha Mose

Nomba Badi Babala Bungi bua Bena Isalele ku Sinai Yehowa wakambila Mose mu tshihela tshia Sinai, mu ntenta wa kusambakena, ku dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo muibidi mu tshidimu tshibidi tshia kuluhuka kuabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne, Ubale bungi bua Bena Isalele bonso, ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena a balume, muntu ne mundi, wewe ne Alona nubange kudi balume bonso ba mu Isalele bakahita bidimu makumi abidi to ne ha mutu, nubale buonso buabo ku tshisumbu ne ku tshisumbu badi bamanye mua kuya mu nvita
Bialala mulume ne mukashi wa muan andi, nebabashihe bubidi buabo, bobo bakenza bualu bubi, ne mashi abo neikale ham bidi habo
Yeye wakanumanyisha bua tshihungidi tshiandi tshiakanuambileye bua nuenu nuenze, mikenji ei dikumi mene mene; yeye wakayifunda ha mabue abidi
Lubena wakunvua tshifufu tshiabo, wakamusungila mu bianza biabo, wakamba ne, Kabamushihi

Neumushe dianyi dionso bu muakenzeye ne mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala, muakuidi neadioshe ha tshioshelu bu muakenzeye ne milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Kadi Bena Lewi nebenze mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bobo nebadituadile bubi buabo eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele ku bikondo bienu bionso, bobo kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Tshisamba kai tshidi ne mikenji ne mei majalame bu mikenji ei yonso inakateka ku mpala kuenu lelu
Mu tshidimu tshia disanka dinene budimi nebuhingane kudi wakabuhana, kudi muena budimi mene
Wakenza mitshi ya acacia, wakalamata tshiamu tshia mitaku ku nseke yonso
Bobo nebalumbuluile bantu bilumbu matuku onso bobo nebalue kûdi ne bilumbu binene, kadi bobo nebakose bilumbu bikese; nunku badi mua kukumatshisha
Hakashikama Abalama mu buloba bua Kanâna to bidimu dikumi, Salai, mukashi wa Abalama, wakangata Hagâ, Muena Ejipitu, muena mudimu wandi, wakamuha kudi Abalama, mulume wandi, amubake bu mukashi wandi
Tshiji tshiabo tshidi tshiedibue mulau, bualu bua tshiakatamba bukole ne bualu bua lukina luabo kaluakadi ne luse, nembatahulule mu Yakoba, nembamuangalashe mu Isalele
Yeye neatuale muana mulume wa ngombe ku butshika bua tshitudilu, neamuoshe ha kahia bu muakenzeye ne muana mulume wa ngombe wa kumudilu eu udi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu bonso
Kashintu kaadi kadi Franc Congolais Mwakulu waadi wa mbulamatadi udi fwalanse

Tangilai, nakuteka muoyo ne malu mimpe, ne lufu ne malu mabi ku mpala kuenu lelu; mukenji unakunuelela lelu bua kunanga Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenda mu nshila yandi ne bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi ne mikandu yandi: nunku nenuikale ne muoyo, nenukumbane ba bungi, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu buloba bunuyaya kubuhiana
didimwija ku tshinyangu tshia makanda a bubanji;

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi; ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia; ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi; ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Ahila, muana mulume wa Enana
Aba mbana ba Zilepa, wakaha Labana muan andi mukashi Lea, yeye wakalelela Yakoba bana aba dikumi ne basambombo

Yosefe Udi Ukolesha Mitshima ya Bano Babo Hakatangila bana babo ne Yosefe ne, Tatu wetu wakafua bakambilangana ne, Hashishe Yosefe neikale n etu lukuna, neatusombuele bua malu mabi onso atua kamuenzela
Wakidika dina dia muaba eu ne Betele kadi diambedi dina dia musoko diakadi Luze

Kadi bantu bahele kabena bikala munkatshi muenu; bualu bua Yehowa neanusankishe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi buenu; binunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu
majitu, bipimu ne emfolomatika;
Dutelonone Lufu lua Mose Mose wakaya ku mpata ya Moaba ku mukuna wa Nebo, ku mutu kua Pisega, kuakadi kutangilangana ne Yeleko

Vùluka dilòòlò e Ndi waka benga Ngela cyanza ne kukwata Wewe nyi nyaya kwetu Bwà kupingana musela baabà Mêma kusengelela ee Ooo too ne mundinda, Kuula cibangu cyà bushùwà, Kunduupa kulusa munène Cyanàànà nyà kundiowa Cyena kupwa moyo cibangu cyà mukàwu Cindi ci mushingu cyà menu waka suma ee

Ku Aloê udi ku muelelu wa tshibanda tshia Ânona ne ku musoko mukuabo udi mu tshibanda tô ne ku Gilada, katuakasangana musoko umue wakatuhita bukole bua kûnyenga; Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafua misoko yonso mu tshianza tshietu; anu buloba bua Bena Amona, katuakalua ha buihi n abu; buloba buonso bua dishiya dia kasulu ka Yaboka, ne misoko ya ku mikuna ne miaba yonso yakatukanda Yehowa, Nzambi wetu

Mbua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne kuenda mu nshila yandi yonso, ne bua kumusua, ne bua kuenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mudimu ne mitshima yenu yonso ne bukole buenu buonso, ne bua kutumikila mikenji ya Yehowa ne mei andi anakunuambila lelu bua nuenu kukuma dikasa dimpe
Yosefe wakasangana luse ku mesu kuandi, wakamuenzela mudimu, wakamuteka mulami wa nsubu wandi yonso, wakafila bintu bionso biakadiye n abi mu tshianza tshiandi
Bana hadibo balela mu tshikondo tshisatu badi mua kubuela mu disangisha dia Yehowa
Kanungu ka Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi mwa kukwata mudimu menemena anu padi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beenabi bikalaku

Kanungu ka Bulongolodi bwa dîyi ne makajilula menza kudi beena mu Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpe kabeena babiangata ne mushinga padi dianyisha diabio difwana kulela dipweekesha dia biûma bia mbulamatadi anyi diaasa anyi dikolesha dia bujitu bia mbulamatadi, pa kumbusha pikalabio bileeja bulongolodi budi buleeja lupetu anyi mabanji adi abikumbana
Mulume udi ulala ne mukashi wa tatu andi udi bu muntu wakavula bilulu bia tatu andi nebabashihe bubidi buabo, ne mashi abo neikale ham bidi habo
Muhi ka wakateka tshianza tshiandi muinshi mua tshibelu tshia Abalahama, mukelenge wandi, wakaditshiha bua bualu ebu
Mulami wa nsubu wa lukanu wakafua bonso bakadi mu nsubu wa lukanu mu tshianza tshia Yosefe, malu onso akenzabomu, yeye wakadi bu muenzeshi wau
Bobo bakamunguila ba bungi, Lota mene mene bakasemena ha buihi bua kuhandabo tshibi
Kadi nansha mbua kena mua kubululala umue wa Bena Isalele, nansha muntu nansha nyama, bua nuenu mumanye ne, Yehowa udi utahulula Bena Ejipitu ne Bena Isalele
Aba mbana balume ba Melali bakabalabo ku meku abo, bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kanungu ka Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kweepula bansonga ku bidi mwa kunyanga bukola bwabo bwa mubidi, dimanya diabo dia maalu ne dikola dikwatakane
Netuye luendu lua matuku asatu mu tshihela, netushihele Yehowa Nzambi wetu nyama bu muatuambileye
Bikala nyama kayi muakane, yeye neamuhikule bu mudi mushinga webe, neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu, bikaleye kayi umuhikula, wewe neumuhane bu mudi mushinga webe

Nenukune bintu mu madimi enu bidimu bisambombo, nenulongolole mitshi ya tumuma, ne nuhuole tumuma tua mitshi bidimu bisambombo, kadi tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete buloba nebuikale mua kubandabu kudi Yehowa, kanukunyi bintu mu madimi, kanulongolodi mitshi ya tumuma
Wewe wakatuma luhehele luebe, ne mai manene akababuikila, bakadma bu mabue mu mai manene
Hakimana ditutu ku mutu kua nsubu matuku a bungi, nunku Bena Isalele bakatumikila dî dia Yehowa, kabakaya ku luendu
Dîyi didi difila makanyika a mwa kulongolola nau masungulangana ne dieebeja dia dianyisha dia beena ditunga
Uhande mabaya a mitshi ya acacia bua kuimanyika kulu mu tshitendelelu
Hanakalua kudi Palô mu dina diebe, yeye wakenzela bantu aba bibi, ne wewe kuena muanze kusungila bantu bebe nansha kakese

Mona, mukuabo wa Bena Isalele wakalua kudi bana babo ne mukashi wa Bena Midiyana ku mesu kua Mose ne ku mesu kua tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, hakadibo badila ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Hakadiye kayi mua kumusokoka kabidi, wakamuangatshila tshisaka tshia ntuhu, wakatshilaba bitume ne kamonyi, wakatekamu muana, wakatshiteka mu malenge akadi kukala kua musulu

Kabakatangila bualu buakenzeye Datana ne Abilama, bana balume ba Eliaba, muana mulume wa Lubena; muakabulula buloba mukana muabu, buakabamina, ne ba mu nsubu yabo, ne ntenta yabo ne bintu biabo bionso bia muoyo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Tangila musoko eu udi ha buihi bua kunyemenamu, udi mukese, witabushe bua mpandilemu musoko eu udi mukese nansha
Kadi nuenu, nunyunguluke, yai bienu mu tshihela mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze

Hakahita matuku asatu, dituku adi diakadi dituku dia kuledibua kua Palo, yeye wakalambishila bantu bandi bidia bia disanka, ne yeye Wakabikila kahita ka bana maluvu ne kahita ka bena bidia ku mesu kua bantu bandi
Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Wewe ne bana bebe balume, kanunu nvinyo ne bintu bikole bia kunua hanuahuola mu ntenta wa kusambakena bua kanufu bienu
Bena Isalele kabalu ha buihi ne ntenta wa kusambakena bua kabadituadidi bubi buabo, kabafu
Dikanga dia midimu ya tshibidilu anyi ya pa bwaayi badi badindija kakuyi ditontolola bwa kumona mwa kulonda, pikalabio bienzeka, bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka
Muakuidi nealue munu wandi mu mashi makuabo a mulambu, nealabe ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshia kahia, neahongolole mashi makuabo ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu tshia kahia
Muntu yonso wakadi mutshima wandi umuenzesha ne wakadi tshihahai wakalua ne kuha kua Yehowa bualu bua mudimu wa nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bintu bionso biakadi mu tshitendelelu ne bilulu bia tshijila
Balume bonso ba mu musoko wabo nebamukume ne mabue tô ne hafueye: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu; ne Bena Isalele nebunvue, nebatshine
Diyisha dianyi dimate hanshi bu nvula, ne mei anyi akudimuke bu mume; bu nvula mukese ha mashinde a nseku, bu nvula wa mudimbi ha midioko
Mitshima yenu kayinyingaladi, kanukuatshiki tshiji bualu bua nuenu nuakumpana kunoko; bualu bua Nzambi wakantumina ku mpala kuenu bua kusungila mioyo ya bantu
diaasa dia tulasa tupwekele, tubandila, twa ku mutu ne tukulumpa;

Yehowa wakambila Abalama ne, Umanye biebe bimpe ne, Tunkanu nuina biebe nebikale bendakanyi mu buloba budi kabuyi buabo, netukuatshile bena buloba mudimu, nebatukengeshe to bidimu nkama mai, meme nendumbuluishe tshisamba tshia bantu baditu tukuatshila mudimu, hashishe, netuhatuke ne biuma bia bungi
Isaka wakatuma Yakoba yeye wakaya ku Padana alama kudi Labana muana wa Betuele, Muena Alama muan abo wa balume ne Lebeka, mamu wa Yakoba ne Esau

nsombelu ne kudi Dilekelela anyi dinyanga dia bâna bu mudi kusangila bu mulume ne mukaji ne bâna bakese, bwenzavi bwa masandi pamwe ne dibatalula mupongo budi bukandikibwa ne badi babufidila manyooka kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Yeye wakamba kabidi ne, Biwamona bantu bakane makumi anai
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Lemeke, Metushela wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mukulu ne bibidi, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Abalama wakatshidi uya ku Sude
; Dut
Bankambua benu makumi muanda mutekete bakaya mu Ejipitu; katataka Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuvudisha bungi bua mitoto idi mu diulu
Bakabambila ne, Katuena mua kuenza bualu ebu bua kufila muan etu wa bakashi kudi muntu udi kayi mute ngula, bualu ebu budi butufuisha bundu
Mose ne Alona bakenza malu â onso a kukema ku mesu kua Palô, Yehowa wakakolesha mutshima wa Palô, yeye bakalekela Bena Isalele mu buloba buandi
Nunku kanunyangi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Mose Wakangata makalu ne ngombe, wakabifila kudi Bena Lewi
Nomba Bungi bua Bena Lewi ne Midima Yabo Ebi mbikondo bia Alona ne Mose mu dituku diakasomba Yehowa ne Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai
Munkatshi mwa midimu eyi, bibambalu bibidi ebi bidi bitwilangana bwa kwenza ne kwanyisha mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda twa Tshisangilu tshinene
Yeye kakalenga tshianza tshiandi ha bantu banene ba Bena Isalele, bakamona Nzambi, bakadia bidia, bakanua

Tuetu tuakamuambila ne, Tudi bambe mei malelela, katuena batentekedi, tudi bana dikumi ne babidi ba tatu umue, umue wetu kenaku, ne mua n etu, muan a mukala udi mushale ne tatu wetu mu buloba bua Kanâna
Mudimu wa tshipwita wa ditunga anyi wa tshipwita mukulumpa udi ubengangana ne midimu idibo bafidila mafutu kudi Ditunga dia beenyi anyi kudi bulongolodi bwa bukwa matunga
Hanuabuela mu budimi bua manvua bua mukuenu, nudi mua kutula manvua mu tshianza, kadi kanutahi manvua a mukuenu ne muele
Wewe newele dî kudi Bena Isalele bua kuluabo ne manyi a olive a kuela mu muinda, muinda uteme matuku onso
Badi Baluangana ne Bena Amaleka Amaleka wakalua, wakaluangana ne Bena Isalele mu Lefidima
Bialueye nkayandi, neaye biandi nkayandi, bikaleye mubake, nunku mukashi wandi neaye n andi
Kanungu ka Dilongolola dia polovensa didi dilondeshila ngenyi miludiki mifila mu mulongo mwisâtu wa dîyi ditudi nadi edi
Muntu kamulengi tshianza nansha, kadi nebamushihe ne mabue anyi nebamutahe ne difuma, bikaleye nyama anyi muntu, yeye kena wikala ne muoyo Helabo mpungi musangu mule, bantu nebalue ku mukuna
Mukashi mene wakamba ne, Yeye udi muan etu mulume Nakuenza bualu ebu mu buakane bua mu mutshima ne kutoka kua bianza bianyi

Nzambi wakabisankisha, wakabambila ne, Nulelangane, nukumbane ba bungi, nûshe buloba tente, nubukokeshe, nuikale ne bukokeshi ku mutu kua minyinyi ya mu mai, ne nyunyu ya mulu, ne tshintu tshionso tshidi ne muoyo tshidi tshiendakana ha buloba
Vulukai, kanuhu muoyo bu munuakafuisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshiji mu tshihela; ku dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu tô ne hanuakafika ku muaba eu, nuakahidia Yehowa
Biangata mulume mukashi wa muan abo mulume, ebu mbualu bubi, yeye wakavula muan abo mulume bilulu, bobo kabena balela bana tshiendelele
Hakalela Shela Ebê, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama mai ne bisatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Kanungu ka Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi tshilumbulwilu tshia manyooka tshia Mfumu wa Ditunga ne Minisitila wa Kavulambedi mu bitupa ne mishindu milongolola kudi Dîyi dikulu
Kadi nudi mua kudia bintu bionso bidi ne mahuahua bidi bienda ne mikolo mai bituhike ha buloba, nudi mua kudia mikumbi ne nsua ne bintunte ne mintuntu
Tshituha tshia buloba bunudi nuha Bena Lewi netshikale ku lumbu lua musoko tô ne ku coudées tshinunu ku nseke yonso

Lumingu Ludi bu Tshimanyinu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele kabidi ne, Nuenu nuvuluke matuku anyi a Lumingu dituku edi didi bu tshivulukidi hankatshi hetu ku bikondo bienu bionso bualu bua kunumanyisha ne, Meme ndi Yehowa wakunujidila

Muakuidi neatangile ha disama didi mu dikoba diandi, bikala miosa ya mu muaba wa disama miandamuke mitoke tô, ne bikala disama dimane kubuela mu munyinyi wandi mene mene, edi ndisama dia nsudi, muakuidi neamutangile, neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Kenana Enosha wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne dikumi ne bitanu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Idi dishiya dia Yadene mu nshila wa kudi diba dibuela, mu buloba bua Bena Kanâna bakadi bashikama mu Alabâ, hehi ne Gilegala, hehi ne mitshi ya telebinta ya Mole
Lea wakalua ne bana bandi bakafua mpala yabo hanshi kabidi, Yosefe ne Lakele bakalua ku nyima, bakatua mpala yabo hanshi
Âpakashada wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu ne bitanu, wakalela Shela Hakalela Âpakashada Shela, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama mai ne bidimu bisatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi

Yehowa wakanunkila dihembu dimpe: Yehowa wakamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Tshiena ngela buloba mulau kabidi bualu bua bantu badi ne meji mabi mu mitshima yabo hatshidibo bitende tô ne hakulumpabo, tshiena njimisha bifukibua bionso bidi ne muoyo kabidi bu munakenza diambedi
Bakasesuka, bakaya mu nshila wa ku Bashana, ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakaya ne bantu bandi bonso bua kusangana n abo nvita ku Edelei
Enza tukoho binai tua ha tshitekelu bu bilongo bia amande ne mahu atshi ne bilongo bia tshi
Kanungu ka Bilumbulwilu bia basalayi bidi bitangila bilumbu bibunda kudi beena bilwilu ne bampulushi
Wakabisha mitshi hankatshi ha mabaya ku mutu tô ne ku tshitaku tshia mabaya
Hakambeye kuhuola muoyo wandi bualu bua yeye wakafua , yeye wakamuidika diba ne, Benoni kadi tatu wandi wakamuidika ne, Benyamina

Tshitupa tshibîdi: Bidi bitangila Tshipangu tshia ku mutu kwa mianda ya dimwangalaja dia ngumu ne dileeja dia bimfwanyi Kanungu ka Mbâsa tshipangu tshia ku mutu kwa mianda ya dimwangalaja dia ngumu ne dileeja dia bimfwanyi tshidi tshimanyika mu mêyi a ditunga
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga badi bamusungula kudi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia mêyi
Hakaha Nzambi wa mu diulu bisamba buhianyi buabi, hakatahululeye bantu, wakadika mikalu ya bantu bu mudi bungi bua bana ba Isalele
Yosefe wakabambila ne Tshiena mua kuenza nunku anu muntu wakasanganabo ne luhanza mu tshianza tshiandi neikale muhika wanyi kadi bakuabo benu nuhingane kudi tatu wenu talala

Nutume umue wa munkatshi muenu, alue biandi ne muan enu, muan a mukala kunoko, netunusuike mionshi buonso buenu, netutete mei enu, bua kumanya ne, Nudi nuamba mei malelela, anyi bualu bunakuditshiha ku muoyo wa Palo ne, Nudi batentekedi, nebuikale bulelela
Nuenu nuyishe Bena Isalele mikenji yonso yakabamanyisha Yehowa mukana mua Mose
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata bakelenge bonso ba bantu, ubowe ku mpala kua Yehowa mu munya, nunku tshiji tshikole tshia Yehowa tshiumuke kudi Bena Isalele
Mose wakambila tatu andi muenu malu onso akenzela Yehowa Palô ne Bena Ejipitu bualu bua Bena Isalele, ne bua makenga akabakuata mu nshila, ne muakabasungila Yehowa
Kanungu ka Badi bênza Kapangu ka kulu ka disungidila ditunga
Bana ba balume ba Zilepa muena mudimu wa bakashi wa Lea, bakadi Gada ne Ashe Aba mbana ba balume ba Yakoba bakamulelelabo mu Padana alama
Nemmanye ne, Nakasangana luse ku mesu kuebe, ne meme ne bantu bebe, kudi kunyi
Kadi bantu bakolola bianza biabo, bakakoka Lota mu nsubu kudibo, ba kinshila tshibi
Yeye kakamumanya kabidi tshiendelele
Badi Bashiha Musambuki wa Mukenji wa Dia Lumingu ne Mabue Hakadi Bena Isalele mu tshihela, bakasangana muntu wangula nkunyi dî diku dia Lumingu
Nuenu nenujingulule bidi tshijila ne bidi kabiyi tshijila, ne bidi binyanguke ne bidi biakane
Bakafunda bifuanyikishi bia tumuma tukese tua grenade ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshionso
Yakoba wakambila bantu bandi ne, Sangishai mabue, bobo bakangata mabue, bakunguisha mushiki wa mabue, bakadia bidia kukala kua mushiki

Nunku budimi bua Efelona, buakadi mu Makepela ku mpala kua Mamale, budimi ne lubuebue luakadimu ne mitshi yonso yakadi mu budimi ne ku mpenge kuabu, bintu ebi bionso biakalua kudi Abalahama, bu buhianyi buandi ku mpala kua bana ba Hete ne kua bonso bakadi babuela mu musoko wandi
Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kwangatshibwa mu tshikisu, bu udi kayi muntu anyi mu dimupula mushinga to
Tama wakaya, wakashikama mu nsubu wa tatu andi

Mikenji Idi Ikandika Masandi Biabaka mulume mukashi, adi ulala n andi ne udi umukina, udi wambila bakuabo mei a bundu, udi wona lumu luandi, udi wamba ne, Nakabaka mukashi eu ne hanakasangila n andi bulalu, tshiakasangana bimanyinu bu mukashi utshidi kamama; hashishe tatu wa mushikankunde eu ne mamu wandi nebaluhuke ne bimanyinu biandi bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama kudi bakulu ba mu musoko ne ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko
Wewe newase tshitendelelu ne bilulu binene dikumi bia lin mutambe buimpe, bilulu bia bleu ne bilulu bikunzubile ne bilulu bikunze kunzû, ubienze ne bakeluba benjibue ne lungenyi lule
Hadiundisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, matshika enu muakanulayeye, ne nuenu nenuambe ne, Netudie munyinyi, bualu bua mitshima yenu idi misue kudia munyinyi; nudi mua kudia munyinyi udi mitshima yenu misue

Bena Ejipitu bakatuenzela bibi, bakatukengesha, bakatuenzesha mudimu mukole; ne tuetu tuakadi la kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua betu, ne Yehowa wakulua dî dietu, wakatangila makenga etu ne mudimu wetu ne majitu etu
Ku luseke lua ku wesete wakenza bilulu to ne ku coudées makumi atanu, ne makunshi dikumi, ne nkanu dikumi ne bitubuidi bia argent dikumi
Belâma wakambila muanjelo wa Yehowa ne, Nakuenza bibi, bualu bua tshiakamanya ne wewe wakadi muimane bua kunkanda mu nshila
Kadi Yakoba kakatuma Benyamina, muakunyi wa Yosefe, ne bana babo, wakamba ne, Bumue bualu bubi nebumukuate
Bikalabo kabayi bitabusha bimanyinu ebi bibidi, kabayi bunvue dî diebe, wewe newangate mai a mu musulu, wele ha buloba bûme, ne mai awakangata mu musulu neakudimuke mashi ha buloba bûme
Kudingidi mukuenu
Lua biebe, nenkutume kudibo Yeye wakamuambila ne, Ndiku
Mose wakatshina, wakamba ne, Bulelela, bualu ebu buakumanyibua
Esau wakambila tatu andi ne, Wewe udi ne disanka anu dimue, anyi
Nuvuluke ngondo wa Abiba bua kutendelela kuhita kua Yehowa wenu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu butuku mu ngondo wa Abiba
Asenata, muana mukashi wa Poti fela, mubuki wa mu Ono, mukashi wa Yosefe, wakamulelela Manashe ne Efelayima mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Yoshua Wakenza bu muakamuambila Mose, wakasangana ne Bena Amaleka Mose ne Alona ne Hû bakaya ha mutu ha mukuna
Bakabuesha tukanu tua or tuhindakana mu nkanu ibidi yakadi ku nseke ya tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi
