Tshiji tshiakakuata Nzambi bualu bua yeye wakaya, ne muanjelo wa Yehowa wakaditeka mu nshila bu muhumbishi wandi: Belâma wakadi wenda ha nyima ha mpunda wandi, ne bahika bandi babidi bakadi n andi
Bakalua kudi Yakoba, tatu abo, mu buloba bua Kanana, bakamuambila malu onso akabakuata ne, Muntu au mukelenge wa mu buloba, wakatua mbila mei makole, wakatuenzela bu batentekedi ba buloba
Mushiki eu wikale mumanyi wa bualu ne dibue edi dikale mumanyi wa bualu, ne, Meme tshiena nsambuka mushiki eu bua kukuenzela bibi, ne wewe kuena usambuka mushiki eu ne dibue bua kungenzela bibi
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele nunku, ne bobo bakaluhuka ne muena bihendu ku butshika bua tshitudilu, bakamukuma ne mabue Bena Isalele bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Bualu bua ndi mbandisha tshianza tshianyi kulu bua kuditshiha ne, Bu mundi muikale ne muoyo tshiendelele
Makookeshi ne makanyika a beena mwabo, mu tshikondo tshia mvita anyi padibo babwelela ditunga anyi badibunda kudi bantu ba pambelo badi baenzela dîyi
Bialenga muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi munga muntu tshianza diambedi yeye kayi muanze kuowa bianza biandi, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Yeye wakungambila ne, Ndi muana wa Betuele, muana wa Naho, wakamulelela Mileka, nunku nakumuluatshisha kakanu ka ku diulu diandi ne nkanu ya ku maboko

Mose wakambila Palô ne, Wikale ne butumbi ebu kundi, ndituku kai diudi musue meme nkulombele bua kumusha biula kûdi ne kudi bantu bebe ne kudi bahika bebe ne mu nsubu yenu, bishale anu mu musulu nkayau
Kayeena yikumbanangana kabidi ne majitu kampanda mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi kansanga to
Hakaya mushete ku mpala, Mose wakamba ne, Yehowa, bika biebe, bantu badi n ebe lukuna batangadishibue, bantu badi n ebe tshiji banyeme ku mesu kuebe
Wakimita difu dikuabo, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Shela, hakamuleleleye wakadi mu musoko wa Keziba
Hakatshia butuku banjelo bakenzesha Lota ne, Bika biebe, wangate mukashi webe ne bana bebe bakashi babidi badiku diambedi kanuyi banze kufua mu dikenga dia musoko eu
Yeye neamushihe ku luseke lua tshioshelu lua ku nôde, ku mesu kua Yehowa; ne bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ufunde bualu ebu mu mukauda bu tshivulukidi, ububadile mu matshu a Yoshua ne, Meme nenjimishe tshivulukidi tshia Amaleka muinshi mua diulu
Bena Isalele bakanyenga bimenga ebi bionso Bena Isalele bakashikama mu bimenga bionso bia Bena Amole, mu Heshebona ne mu misoko ei yonso
Abalahama wakitabusha dî dia Efelona Abalahama wakamuidikishila bungi bua argent buakalombeye ku mpala kua bana ba Hete, nshekele ya argent nkama mai bu muakitabusha bahanyi ba bintu
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kulondeshilula ne dîsu dikole difila dia mpala dia momumwe dia mulume ne mukaji mu bishimikidi abi
Kudimusha kua Bena Isalele bua Mpingu ya Bena Kanâna Dut
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne tshitema ne nkama isatu
Yeye wakabaheta, wakabambila mei au
midimu ya didimukila mvula ne ntuangajilu mupiluke wa midimu ya dipima bunene ne mupimbu wa buloba, ya dizola dia misoko ne ya dizola dia misulu;
Kabaki mukashi wa mu lufuila anyi mukashi wakahidiabo kudi mulume wandi anyi mukashi udi munyanga anyi mukashi wa masandi, yeye neabake mukashi utshidi kamama wa munkatshi mua bana babo
Hakaluabo ku Mala kabakamanya mua kunua mai a Mala, mai akadi ne bululu, nunku balodiha muaba au ne, Mala
Bantu aba Mose ne Alona mbantu bakambila Yehowa ne, Hatulai Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku misumba yabo
Nyama udi ne mihesa yandi mihandike anyi mitahe mputa kanumufidi bu mulambu kudi Yehowa mu buloba buenu

Eleazâ muakuidi wakangata malonga a tshiamu tshia mitaku akatuabo, bakâtula bu tshibuikilu tshia tshioshelu, bua kuikalau tshivulukidi kudi Bena Isalele ne kubamanyisha ne, Muntu udi kayi muana wa Alona, kalu ha buihi bua kuosheye musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kua Yehowa, kenji bu Kola ne bantu bandi, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Bakasangakena ne Mose ne Alona mu nshila hakaluhukabo kudi Palô, bobo bakabambila ne, Yehowa anutangile, anulumbuluishe, bualu bua nuakutuvuisha bu tshintu tshidi tshi tua tshibi ku mesu kua Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi, nuakuteka muele wa nvita mu bianza biabo wa kutushiha n au

Padi, panyima pa dibenga kumvwangana pankatshi pa Bibambalu biônso bibidi, tshingenyingenyi anyi dijinga dia kwenzeja dîyi kadiyi dianyishibwa panyima pa didibala kudi Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu, Bilo biônso bibidi bidi bienza kasumbu kasanga ka bantu bûngi bwa momumwe kimikila dieenza dia mukanda mutangila bulongolodi budibu bashaala bakonkoloja
Nulue kudi muakuidi wa mu matuku au, numuambile ne, Ndi nkuambila lelu ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ne, Nakubuela mu buloba buakaiaya Yehowa batatu betu, bua kutuhabu
Muakuidi wa munkatshi mua bana balume ba Alona, udibo bela manyi ha mutu bua kuhianeye mudimu wandi, neaufile kudi Yehowa bu muakelabo mukenji tshiendelele, neboshe mulambu eu mujima
Kalongu ka kumpala : Bidi bitangila Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka
Bobo badi bamba kunkuma ne mabue
Mose wakadi ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu, ne Alona wakadi ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu ne bisatu, hakadibo bakula ne Palô
Kadi bana benu bakese banuakuamba ne, Bobo nebafue ku miele ya nvita, nendue n abo, bobo nebamanye buloba bunuakuhidia
Tshisamba tshia Nafatale Ahila muana mulume wa Enana neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Nafatale
Bakashikama bua kudiabo bidia, bakabanduluka, bakamona Bena Yishemaele bafume ku Gilada, ne tumelo tuabo tutuala manananshi ne bintu bia muhuya muimpe ne mula, bakadi bahueka mu Ejipitu
Bobo bakamumona kule kuakua, ne diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufika ha buihi n abo, bakamuelela tshifufu bua kumushiha

Nuenze bienu nunku Kola ne bantu hadiye habo bangate malonga a kahia, batekemu kahia, batekehu musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kua Yehowa makelela, ne muntu udi musungudibue kudi Yehowa neikale muntu wa tshijila, nuenu bana balume ba Lewi nudi nutamba kudienzela malu
Bena Ejipitu bakenzesha bantu bualu bua kubihata mu buloba lubilu, bakamba ne, Tudi bantu bafue bonso
Genese Abalama ne Lota Badi Bahanduluka Abalama wakumuka mu Ejipitu ne mukashi andi ne bintu biandi bionso ne Lota, wakaya mu luseke lua ku Sude

Bikai bienu, yai, nuhite mu tshibanda tshia mai a Ânona: monai, nakafila Sihona, Muena Amole, mukelenge wa Heshebona, ne buloba buandi mu tshianza tshienu; nubange kuhiana buloba, nuluangane n andi nvita
Netanele, muana mulume wa Suâ, wakadi ku mutu kua Bena Yisakâ

Wikala dikemena wa kwata kumu kusu Kabuya Pitch Lux Pitch Lualua Mama ya bongo Yelele yelele Nganji kubikila Maamù eh Mamiani mwà Mbuya kasasu eh Mambi wa Tumba ne Tshala eh Mwâna mudikaya yampongo eh Moyi munda nganyì wà ngakwile eh Ngipata mukunda muya mukanka Mwana we lekela we Ya Esther Ngalula Kulola
Bantu bonso badi balela munkatshi muenu nebenze bilele ebi, hafilabo milambu ya kuosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Bakumuka mu Ejipitu, bakalua ku buloba bua Kanana kudi Yakoba tatu abo

Hashishe bakadisangisha tshisumbu tshia bantu bua kuelangana ne Mose ne Alona, baka tangila ku ntenta wa kusambakena, ne monai, difutu diakamubuikila ne butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka, Mose ne Alona bakatua ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena
dienza dia ndongamu ya majimba, ya bia mwinshi mwa buloba, ya matanda, ya mudilu udi wambulwisha polovensa ne diilonda bu mudibio mu mikenji ya kabujima ya ndongamu wa ditunga ;

Muakuidi neangate mashi a mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, nealabe mashi ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia muntu udiye musue kulengesha, ne ku tshiala tshia ku tshianza tshiandi tshia balume, ne ku muan a dikasa munene wa ku tshianza tshia balume
Dîku, kazubu ka nshindameenu ka tshinsanga tshia bantu, badi badilongolola mu lungenyi lwa kujadika bumwe bwaadi, bushindame bwaadi ne bubukubi bwaadi
Wakunuenzela nunku bua kunumanyisha ne, Yehowa udi Nzambi; kakuena Nzambi mukuabo

Aba mbashihianganyi badi mua kunyemenamu bua kuikala ne muoyo: muntu yonso udi ushiha mukuabo ku mpukahuka, kakadi n andi tshiji diambedi; bu muntu wakuya ne mukuabo muitu bua kutaha nkunyi, ne hakuambeye kutaha mutshi ne kasui, ne kasui kakukuka, kakutaha muntu mukuabo, kakumushiha; muntu eu neanyemene ku umue wa misoko ei, neikale ne muoyo
Bukalenga bunene budi bwambula majitu aabu kumpala kwa Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga bilondeshila makanyika mafila mu tunungu twa ne

Nenuambe ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne, Tatu wetu wakadi Muena Sulia, wakadi wamba kufua; ne yeye wakaya mu Ejipitu, wakashikamamu bantu banya banya; yeye wakalua tshisamba tshinene tshia bukole ne bantu ba bungi

Ditunga dia Kongu wa mungalata didi dikumbaja kudi tshimenga tshia Kinshasa ne polovensa dikumi idi ilonda eyi idibo bamanya kudi Mbulamatadi: Bandundu, Bas Congo, Equateur, KasaÏ Occidental, Kasaï Oriental, Katanga, Maniema, Nord Kivu, Province Orientale, Sud Kivu
Wewe kuena mulue kundi munyi

Nunku nakasungula balume ba lungenyi lule, banuakamanya, nakabateka ku mutu kuenu, tuhita tua binunu binunu, ne tuhita tua nkama nkama, ne tuhita tua makumi atanu makumi atanu, ne tuhita tua dikumi dikumi, ne miloho bungi bua bisamba bienu
Bakamuela mu lukanu, bualu bua kabakamanya dî dia Yehowa diakasueye kungenzela

Biwabakengesha ne biadilabo kundi, meme nengunvuile muadi wabo, ne tshiji tshianyi netshitambe bukole, nennushihe ne muele wa nvita, ne bakashi benu nebikale bakashi ba mu lufuila ne bana benu nebikale bana ba nshiya

Dituku dia kumudilu nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, kadi nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa bana babidi ba ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bintu bisatu bia dikumi ku ngombe ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi ku tshimpanga, ne tshintu tshia dikumi ku muana wa mukoko to ne ku bana bonso ba mikoko muanda mutekete, ne mulume wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi

Mose wakangata bintu mu bianza biabo, wakabisha ha tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kahia, ebi mbintu bia kujidila n abi bakuidi bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa eu udi mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Bena Lubena, Bena Gada, ne Tshituha tshia Bena Manashe Badi Bashikama ku Esete kua Yadene Nom

Muakuidi neangate diboko dia tshimpanga diakalambabo, ne mutanda wa mampa adi kâyi ne luevene mu tshisaka, ne mukata udi kauyi ne luevene, neabiteke mu bianza bia Munazi hashikisheye kubeya mutu wandi, muakuidi neabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, ebi mbintu bia tshijila kudi muakuidi bidi bisangisha ne tshiadi ne tshibelu bidibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, hashika bualu ebu, Munazi udi mumanye mua kunua nvinyo
Mose Udi Usungula Yoshua bu Muenampala Wandi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Banda biebe ku mukuna wa Abalima, utangile buloba bundi mpa Bena Isalele
Muadi mukole newikale mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso; kakuena kuanze kuikala muadi bu eu, ne kawena wikalaku kabidi
kujadika buludiki bwa mpatshi;

Mu bidimu bisambombo nukune bintu mu buloba, nuhuole bintu bidi bikumbana, kadi tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete nushiye buloba bua kututuka ne bualu bua bantu bahele ba munkatshi muenu badie bintu, ne bintu bidibo bashiye, nyama ya mu mpata neyibidie
Nunku nakanyunguluka, nakahueka mu tshibanda, ne mukuna wakadi utema ne kahia; ne mabue abidi a mei a tshihungidi akadi mu bianza bianyi bibidi

Kumpala kwa kubangabo mwa kuulonda, mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda badi ne tshia kuwutuma kudi Mulombodi wa tshibambalu tshieena bwaalu ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu bwa kaamba ne udi umvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu, mu tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu
Bikaleye mudi tshihe mu nsubu wa mulume wandi, anyi mulaye mulayi wandi, ne bikala mulume wandi munvue, muhuwe biandi kayi mumukande nansha, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso nebijalame

Bobo bakimana ku mpala kua Mose ne kua Eleazâ, muakuidi ne ku mpala kua bakelenge ba mu tshisumbu, ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bakamba ne, Tatu wetu wakafua mu tshihela, yeye kakadi munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia Kola tshiakadisangisha kudi Yehowa, kadi yeye wakafua anu bualu bua mibi yandi, yeye kakadi ne bana ba balume nansha
Bana balume ba Lakele, mukashi wa Yakoba, ba kadi Yosefe ne Benyamina
Bakumuka mu Dibona gada, bakashikama mu Alamona dibelatayima
Bakelenge bana ba Palo bakamumona, bakamuanyishila Palo, bakaya n andi mu nsubu wa Palo
Lota wakaya ne Abalama, ne yeye wakadi ne mikoko ne bimuna ne ntenta
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakaya ku mpala, wakimana mu nshila mukese, kakadi ne muaba wa mua kuya ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
