Yeye wakanunvuisha dî diandi mu diulu bua kunumanyisha malu: wakanuisha kahia kandi kanene hanshi ha buloba; nuenu nuakunyua mei andi munkatshi mua kahia
Nebashihele mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji kudibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, muakuidi neamiamine mashi ku nseke yonso ya tshioshelu
Bana balume ba Pelese Heselona ne meku a Bena Heselona, Hamula ne meku a Bena Hamula
Mesu andi neikale makunzekunzû ne manye, ne menu andi neikale matoke to ne mabele
Nudimuke bualu bua disama dia nsudi, bua nuenu kuenza malu onso bimpe adi bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi banuyisha: bu munakabambila bobo, nuenu nuenze nunku
Au mmeku a Yuda, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi muanda mutekete ne bisambombo ne nkama itanu

Bilulu biakadiye n abi, nansha tshilulu tshiakenzabo ne miosa ya mikoko nansha tshilulu tshia lin, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama ya miosa ya mikoko anyi ya lin, nansha mu tshiseba anyi mu tshintu tshiakenzabo ne tshiseba, bikala bintu bifike anyi bikunze mu tshilulu anyi mu tshiseba anyi mu milongo ya buludi anyi mu milongo ya butshiama anyi mu tshintu tshiakenzabo ne tshiseba, edi ndisama dia nsudi, nebaleshe disama edi kudi muakuidi
Ngondo wa kumudilu, mu matuku dikumi ne anai, diba dia dilolo, ndituku dia kuhita kua Yehowa

Yeye neashihe muana wa mukoko wa mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne muakuidi neangate mashi makuabo a mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, nealabe ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia muntu udiye musue kulengesha ne ku tshiala tshia ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku muan a dikasa munene wa ku tshianza tshia balume
Bakumuka mu Lisa bakashikama mu Kehelata
Yeye kena tatu wenu wakanuafuka, wakanuenza, wakanujadika, anyi
Hashishe, bakashi benji ba mudimu bakasemena ha buihi, bobo ne bana babo, bakafua mpala yabo hanshi
Isalele wakambila Yosefe ne, Ndi mua kufua katataka, bualu bua nakumana kukumona ku mesu ne wewe utshidi ne muoyo

Kadi kanudi nyama mikuabo idi mihingishilula bintu mukana anyi idi ne mikono mihanduluke: kamelo, ne nsenji, ne kabundi ka ku mputu; bualu bua nyama ei idi mihingishilula bintu mukana, kadi kayena ne mikono mihanduluke, kayena miakane kunudi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe mulu, bua mabue a nvula ikale mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, ne ha muntu ne ha nyama ne ha midioko yonso ya mu budimi, mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udibo basungula udi utwadija mudimu mu matuku dikumi adi alonda dipatula dia bipeta bia ndekeelu bia masungula a Mulombodi wa Ditunga
dikosa dia bitadi,dîkala ne bitadi bia pa binwibwa bikola,pa kumusha bitadi bidibo bateeka ku kanungu ka ;
Bana balume ba Zebuluna ku meku abo Selede ne meku a Bena Selede; Elone ne meku a Bena Elone; Yalele ne meku a Bena Yalele
Kanuonyi buloba bunudi nushikamamu, kundi mushikame kabidi, bualu bua meme Yehowa ndi mushikame munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Ndi mumanye ne, Mukelenge wa Ejipitu kena witabusha bua nuenu kuya, neitabushe anu ne tshianza tshikole
Yehowa wakadi ne tshiji kudi Isalele ne wakabende sha eku ne eku mu tshihela to bidimu makumi anai tô ne hakafua bantu bonso ba tshikondo atshi, bakadi benze bualu ebu bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa
Hakadibo babuela mu nsubu wa tshiendelele ne hakaluabo hehi ne tshioshelu, bakowa mai, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Tshitupa tshia kumpala: Bidi bitangila bishimikidi bia ditunga
Bikondo bikuabo ditutu bakimana dilolo tô ne ku dinda, ne hakumuka ditutu ne dinda, bakaya ku luendu, hakumuka ditutu nansha mu munya nansha mu butuku, bakaya ku luendu
Wewe newangate mashi a muana mulume wa ngombe, ulabe mashi ha nsengu ya ha tshioshelu ne munu webe, hongolola mashi onso ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu

Ulue biebe ne Bena Lewi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, usangishe tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, wewe neumueneshe Bena Lewi ku mpala kua Yehowa Bena Isalele nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha Bena Lewi: Alona neanyukule Bena Lewi ku mpala kua Yehowa bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Bena Isalele, bua bobo bikale bajidile bua kukuatshila Yehowa mudimu
bulongolodi butangila bibutshilu bia lupetu ne midimu yabi ne ya difila dia mishinga ya kashintu ;
Nuenu bantu bahote badi kabayi ne meji, nudi nuhingishila Yehowa malu mabi nunku, anyi
Nsongalume wakadiku, wakaya lubilu, wakamanyisha Mose ne, Eladada ne Medada badi bamba dî dia Nzambi mu tshitudilu
Bakosha misoko yabo yakadibo bashikamamu ne bitudilu biabo ne kahia
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi muanda mutekete ne binai ne nkama isambombo
Mena a bana ba balume ba Lewi ku bikondo biabo adi nunku Geshona ne Kohata ne Melah, bidimu bia Lewi biakadi lukama makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete

Yeye kena muntambe meme bunene mu nsubu eu, yeye kakumpidisha tshintu tshimue tshidiye n atshi anu wewe nkayebe, bualu bua wewe udi mukashi wandi: ndi mua kuenza bualu ebu bubi bunene ne mua kuenzela Nzambi bibi munyi
Bana balume ba Bela bakadi Ada ne Nâmana: ne meku a Bena Ada ne meku a Bena Nâmana
Hakatshiabu bakabika ne dinda dionso, bakafua milambu ya kuosha, bakalua ne milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, bantu bakashikama bua kudia ne bua kunua, bakabika bua kunaya
Biwasombesha mukuabo muhele wa munkatshi mua bantu banyi argent, kumubadi bu muena dibanza, kumulombi tshia kasombelu
Hamo wakayikila n abo wakamba ne, Mutshima wa muan anyi Shekeme udi musue mua n ebe wa bakashi, ndi nkusengelela ne umufile kudiye bu mukashi wandi

Olodonase mushintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila udi ushindika bulongolodi, ngenzelu wa mudimu wa Bukalenga bunene ne mishindu ya dikwatshishangana pankatshi pa Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne Bukalenga bunene pamwe ne pankatshi pa beena Bukalenga bunene
Nunku kabena bashihela ba demon milambu yabo hadibo benda n abo masandi
Mona, meme nengimane ku mpala kuebe ha mutu ha dibue dia Holeba, wewe neukume dibue ne mai neahatuke, bantu banue mai Mose wakenza nunku ku mesu kua bakulu ba Bena Isalele

Mukelenge wa Ejipitu wakambila baleleshi ba bakashi ba Bena Ebelu, dina dia umue wabo ne, Shifela, ne dina dia mukuabo ne, Pua ne, Hanuaya kuenzela bakashi ba Bena Ebelu mudimu wa baleleshi, ne hanuabatangila mu buledi, bialelabo muana wa balume, nuenu nenumushihe, kadi bialelabo muana wa bakashi, numushiye ne muoyo
Mu dekele mushintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, udi uteeka bantu ku midimu ya basivile ne ya basalâyi idi kayiyi ku bukookeshi bwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga
Ubisangishe bu manananshi adi atua dihembu kudi benyi ba manananshi, ubisangishe ne luehu lutambe buimpe ne lua tshijila
Bakabika ne dinda, bakahingana, Isaka wakabatuma kuabo, bakaya talala

Wewe newamiamine ntenta wa kusangakena ne mushete wa Nzambi, ne mesa ne malonga onso a mesa, ne muinda ne malonga onso a muinda, ne tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi, ne tshioshelu tshia kahia ne malonga onso a tshioshelu, ne tshiowelu ne tshitaku tshia tshiowelu

Bwa kujikija tshiyola katshiyi ndekelu etshi tshia bukalenga ne bwa kupeesha beena mwaabo ngânda wa kwibakilabo ditunga, batumibwe ba beena tshidiidi ne ba Bisumbu bidi kabiyi bia tshidiidi, bônso bikale diboko dia bukole dia Ditunga, badisangishe mu Muyuki wa beena Kongu, bavwa bapûnga mu Diumvwangana dia mu kabujima ne dia Tshikongu ditwa biâla ku Prétoria mu Afrika wa ku Butshiika wa ku sîda mu dia dia tshiswa munene , mwa kufuka bulongolodi bwa tshidiidi bupiabupia, bushindameena pa Dîyi dikulu dipiadipia dia mungalata mudi mweena Kongu ne tshia kwimanyina bwa kudipeesha baludiki beende, mu didikookesha, panyima pa masungulangana madikadile, a mu tshibûngi, a patooke ne manyishibwe

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu edi, dîyi didi diteeka tuludiki bwa : a makookeshi a bweena mwaabo ne mashindikila a nshindameenu adibo bapeesha beena mwabo bwa kusankabo ne budikadidi bwa muntu yônso; b bulongonlodi bwa mianda ya masungulangana; c mpetu ya Mbulamatadi; d makanyika adibo bateekela beena mwabo kudi bilwilu pa bumuntu bwaabo ne pa bintu biaabo; e bweena ditunga, ngikadilu ne bukole bwa bantu, bulongolodi bwa mianda ya diselangana, bwa dipianangana ne bupapayi; f disunguluja dia ntupakanyi ne manyooka adibo bayikosela, njila wa kulonda, bwa kutangila manyooka, bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa bukalenga bukoshi bwa nsambu, diaasa dia nkongu ya bilumbulwidi mipiamipia, mukanda wa ngikadilu wa bandumbulula, bulongolodi bwa mianda ya mêyi a ditunga bwa Kapangu ka ku kulu ka bandumbulula; g bulongolodi bwa dilumbulwilangana, diambulwishangana mu dilumbulula ne diimanyina dia bantu ku bilumbulwilu; h bungenda mushinga, bulongolodi bwa bweena makookesha ne makanyika a bweena mwabu ne a bungenda mushinga; i dikupula dia manyooka kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne dipingaja dia beena bilumbu mwabo; j bûngi bwa diabanya, mushinga wa ditapulula ne mushindu wa kufutshisha bitadi bia mishindu yônso, bulongolodi bwa dienza dia lupetu; k mpetu misomba ne ditula dia mpetu ya Mbulamatadi; l mikanda milongolodi ya ngikadilu wa beena mudimu bashindama ba Mbulamatadi, beena mudimu ba bilongelu bia ku mutu, bilongelu bikulumpa ne dikebulula dia mamanya; m bilwilu , bampulushi ne midimu ya bukubi; n makookeshi a mianda ya midimu ne ya bukubi bwa bantu; o bulongolodi bujima bwa bilwilu ne bwa bumpulushi bwa ditunga, mushindu wa kwangata bantu ku busalayi ne ku bumpulushi bwa ditunga, dibanda dia miânzu, makookeshi ne makanyika a basalayi ne beena mudimu wa bumpulushi
Mabue au akadi menza kudi Nzambi, ne mei akadi mafunda kudi Nzambi, mafunda ha mabue au
Bualu bua bobo badi badila kundi ne, Utuhe munyinyi wa tuetu kudia
Bakumuka mu tshihela tshia Sinai, bakashikama mu Kibelota hatawa
Nudie anu mampa adi kâyi ne luevene to matuku muanda mutekete, kanuikadi ne mampa a luevene, kabatangidi luevene mu nseke yenu yonso
Yehowa wakahuka hanshi bua kumona musoko ne tshibumba biakasa bana ba bantu
Bikaleye mushihe nansha muana wa balume nansha muana wa bakashi, nebamuenzele nunku bu mudi dilumbulula edi
Wakabituma luendu lua matuku asatu hankatshi ha Labana ne Yakoba, Yakoba wakadisha bimuna bikuabo bia Labana biakashala ku nyima
Kapitene ka masalayi kakatufila mu bianza bia Yosefe, yeye wakatukuatshisha, tuakashala mu nsubu wa lukanu musangu
Bantu aba bonso bakadisangisha mu tshibanda tshia Sidima etshi ntshibanda tshia Dishiba dia Mai a Luehu
Kanuhanduludi mikalu ya bantu bakuabo yakahandabo kudi bakaku benu diambedi, mu buhianyi buenu mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Mose wakambila Nzambi ne, Hanaya bianyi kudi Bena Isalele, hanabambila ne, Nzambi wa batatu enu wakantuma kunudi, nebankonke ne, Dina diandi nganyi, nembambile tshinyi
Olodonase miena bwalu mu tulongo tudi kulu etu badi bayitwa tshiâla tshibîdi kudia bakaji kudi Minisitile kavulambedi

Unvudishile meme kabidi disanka tatu anyi Esau wa kabandisha di diandi wakadila Isaka tatu andi wakamuambila ne, Wewe neushikame mu buloba budi bukuatshika bintu bimpe, ne dibungi dia mu diulu nedikumatshile, wewe newikale ne muoyo bualu bua muele webe wa nvita wewe neukuatshile muakuny ebe mudimu hawahanduka wewe neumushe mutshi wandi wa tshikokedi ku nshingu kuebe
Au mmeku a Dana ku meku abo
Katuena tulua
Nennumuangalashe mu bisamba bikuabo, nempatule muele wa nvita ku nyima kuenu, buloba buenu nebuikale hatuhu ne misoko yenu neyikale mihaula
Yeye udi butumbi buenu, yeye udi Nzambi wenu, wakanuenzela malu manene ne a kukema anuakatangila ku mesu

Yeye neahingishe mushinga wa tshintu tshia tshijila ne tshituha tshitanu ha mutu, neabifile mu bianza bia muakuidi, ne muakuidi neafile tshimpanga bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Kadi bikala ditoba ditoke tô dishale mu muaba wadi, kadiyi ditampakane, etshi ntshibangu tshia tshima, ne muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane
Bakamuambila ne, Tuakuya mu buloba buwakatutuma, bulelela, buloba abu budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, â mmamuma a buloba
Mose wakaya ne mifuba ya Yosefe, bualu bua yeye wakatshihisha Bena Isalele ne, Nzambi nealue kunudi bulelela, nuenu nenuye ne mifuba yanyi
Bena Isalele bakenza nunku, bakenza malu onso akambila Yehowa Mose
Yeye wakalela muakuny andi Ebele kabidi Ebele wakadi mulami wa mikoko, kadi Kana wakadi tshidime
Bana ba balume ba Elifasa bakadi Temana ne Omâ ne Sefo ne Gatama ne Kenaza
Kanukebi mua kubalesha ditalala ne malu makane tô matuku enu onso

Kanungu ka Padiku mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi mbulamatadi wa bilwilu, Mulombodi wa ditunga udi wangata ,mu olodonase mushintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, mapangadika adi akengedibwa bwa kujikija bwaalu

Misoko ya Kunyemena ya ku Esete kua Yadene Hashishe Mose wakasungula misoko ya kunyemena isatu dishiya dia Yadene kudi diba dihatuka; bualu bua mushihi wa muntu ku mpukahuka, wakadi kayi n andi lukuna diambedi, anyemene ku umue wa mu misoko ei, ikale biandi ne muoyo
Bobo nebakukuatshishe bua bintu bia mu ntenta wa kusambakena, ne mu mudimu wonso wa Ntenta muenyi kalu ha buihi n enu
Wewe newenze nkanu ya or ibidi, uteke nkanu ei ku nseke ibidi ya tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ebu mbualu bua mudimu wa Bena Lewi ba bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu tô ne ha mutu nebenze mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, hahitabo bidimu makumi atanu, nebalekele mudimu, kabankuatshidi mudimu kabidi, kadi nebakuatshile bana babo mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bua kulamabo bintu, kabenji mudimu mukole, wewe newenzele Bena Lewi nunku hawabalesha mudimu wabo
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Bakabangila kukeba ku muan a bute to ne ku muan a mukala, bakasangana luhanza mu tshibombi tshia Benyamina
Bantu bonso bakatangila makubakuba ne miele ya nvula ne di dia mpungi ne muishi ha mukuna, hakamonabo malu â, bakatshina, bakimana ha bule
Kenana wakikala ne muoyo bidimu makumi muanda mutekete, wakalela Mahalelela
Bâna badi ne tshia kwambulwisha baledi baabo
Yeye wakalua n au kudiye, yeye wakadia, wakalua kudiye ne nvinyo, yeye wakanua
Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Nakalota tshiota ne kakuena muntu udi mua kutshinjinguluila, kadi nakunvua lumu hebe ne, Wewe haunvua tshiota tshia muntu, udi mua kumujinguluilatshi
Kadi mitshi mudi bamanye ne kayena ne tumuma, nudi mua kuyikosa; nuase n ai bibumba bia nvita ku butshika bua musoko wa badi banuluisha to ne hanuabahita bukole
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Dituku dia matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondo eu wa muanda mutekete nebikale dituku didibo badia bidia bia mu bitandatanda tô matuku muanda mutekete
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nakunvua tshitanu tshia Bena Isalele, ubambile ne, Dilolo nenudie munyinyi, dinda nenukute bidia, nuenu nenumanye ne, Meme ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Nuenu nutu nuahidia Yehowa katshia ku dituku dinakanumanya

Bialua muenyi wa munkatshi muenu mundi mubanji, ne bialua mukuenu udi ushikama hehi handi muntu muhele, biadihaneye kudiye anyi kudi mundi mukuabo wa mu diku diandi, hadihaneye, badi mua kumuhikula, umue wa bana babo udi mua kumuhikula, manseb andi anyi muana mulume wa manseb andi anyi muan abo mukuabo udi mua kumuhikula, bialueye muntu mubanji, yeye udi mua kudihikula
Kanungu ka Beena tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka badi ne mwânzu wa batshipwita ba ditunga
Ekesode Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Katataka wewe mutangile bu mundi ngenzela Palô, bualu bua yeye neabalekele ku tshianza tshikole, neabihate mu buloba buandi ne tshianza tshikole

Kadi bikala disama dia nsudi ditampakane mu dikoba ne biabuikiladi dikoba dionso dia muena nsudi, ku mutu tô ne ku makasa andi, ku miaba yonso idi muakuidi utangila, nunku muakuidi neatangile ne bikala disama dia nsudi dimane kubuikila dikoba diandi dionso, yeye neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu wakadi ne nsudi udi muakane, wakandamuka muteke tô, yeye udi muakane
Bana ba balume ba Kohata ku meku abo Amalama ne Yisehâ ne Hebelone ne Uziele Bana ba balume ba Melali ku meku abo Mali ne Mushi
Umuamine manyi ha tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kuosha, ne ha bintu biatshi bionso, ujidile tshioshelu tshioshelu netshikale tshijidila
Wewe ubishe mujangala webe, wolola tshianza tshiebe ha mai, wahandulule, Bena Isalele nebaye munkatshi mua mai ha buloba bûme

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ulua n enu mu buloba buimpe, buloba budi bûle tente ne tusulu tua mai, ne mishimi ya mai idi ihatuka mu mikuna ne mu bibanda; buloba bua blê ne orge ne mionshi ya tumuma ne mitshi ya nfigi ne grenade; buloba bua mitshi ya olive ne buitshi; buloba bunudi mua kudia bidia bia bungi, kanuena nukengela tshintu; buloba budi ne biamu bia tubanda, nudi bamanye mua kumbula biamu bikunze bia tubanda ku mikuna yabu
Wakenza mbote ya or makumi atanu, wakatuangasha bilulu ne mbote ai, nunku nsubu wa tshitendelelu wakadi bu nsubu umue
Bakabisangisha buatshia buatshia, muntu ne muntu bu muakamanyeye mudiadieye, ne hakatema munya, bidia biakenguluka
Bana ba balume ba Yisakâ, Tola ne Puwa ne Yoba ne Shimelona

Tangila, makelela ha diba edi mene nemmatshishe mabue a nvula a bungi be, kabena banze kutangila mabue a nvula nunku ku tshibangidilu tshia bukelenge bua Ejipitu tô ne katataka, Nunku utumine bantu lubilu, basangishe bimuna biebe ne bintu bionso biudi n abi mu budimi, muntu yonso ne nyama yonso bidi bishala mu budimi bidi kabiyi bihingana mu nsubu, mabue a nvula neahone ham bidi babi, nebifue

Ditshina ne buowa nebikale kudi nyama yonso ne kudi nyunyu yonso ya mulu ne kudi tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi ne kudi minyinyi ya mu mai manene bua bualu buenu, nakafila bintu bionso mu bianza bienu
Yehowa, Nzambi wandi udi n andi ne dî dia lubila dia bukelenge didi munkatshi muabo
Bitupa bia teletwale bidikadile abi bidi tshimenga, komina, seketela ne musoko wa bamfumu
Bena bilengulengu bakambila Palo ne, Bualu ebu budi bu munu wa Yehowa, kadi mutshima wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye kakabunvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Kanuditshihi ne mashina ne dina dianyi, kanutedi dina dianyi tshitelatela, meme ndi Yehowa
Biwasua kutuenzela nunku, ndi nkusengelela ne, Unshihe ku tshianza tshiebe, binasangana luse ku mesu kuebe, bua tshitangidi dikenga dianyi nunku

Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kumubuikidila n au bubi buakenzeye, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue, tshituha tshia bukula tshidi tshishale netshikale tshia muakuidi, bu mudibo benza ne mulambu wa bukula
Nunku yeye wakambila Abalahama ne, Wihate muhika eu ne muana wandi mulume bualu bua muana wa muhika eu kena mua kuhiana buhianyi muomumue ne muana wanyi Isaka mene
Kanutshinyi ku mesu kuabo, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi munene udi uvuisha ditshina dikole
Biajidila mundi Yehowa nsubu wandi, muakuidi neatuangane n andi mushinga, bikala nsubu muimpe anyi mubi, nsubu neikale ne mushinga wakatueye ne muakuidi
Nebalenduishangane, mundi kayi ubihata, bu bantu badi banyema ku muele wa nvnta, kanuena nuikala ne bukole bua kuimana ku mpala kua bantu badi n enu lukuna
Abalahama wakamuambila ne, Udimuke, kuyi ne muan anyi kabidi kuakua

Wakajimisha tshintu tshionso tshiakadi ne muoyo ha buloba, ne bantu ne bimuna ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ne nyunyu ya mulu, bintu bionso biakajimina ha buloba, anu Noa ne bantu ne bintu biakadiye n abi mu buatu biakashala

Mose wakatendekena Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, wakamba ne, Yehowa, bualu kai tshiji tshiebe tshidi tshitambe bukole kudi bantu bebe bawakaluhula mu buloba bu Ejipitu ne bukole bunene ne tshianza tshia bukole
Yehowa kakahunga tshihungidi etshi ne batatu betu, kadi wakatshihunga anu n etu buonso buetu badi ne muoyo lelu eu
Nenusangishe bintu bionso bia musoko mu musesu, nenuoshile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musoko ne bintu ebi bionso; musoko eu newikale musasula tshiendelele, kabena bawasaku kabidi
Bana balume ba Sheme badi nunku Elama ne Ashû ne Âpakashada ne Luda ne Alama
Kanungu ka Too ne pikalabo bateeka Kabadi ka bulongolodi bwa midimu ya Mbulamatadi, Kabadi ka kabwendela kadi ne makookeshi adibo bateekela Kabadi ka Mbulamatadi ka kabwendela
Hashishe mulangala wa muntu unakusungula newele ntonga, meme nenshikishe kutontolola kua Bena Isalele kudibo bakutontolola
Bienda muana mukashi wa muakuidi masandi, yeye wakadinyanga wakasangisha tatu andi kabidi, nebamuoshe mu kahia
Wakabuesha lungenyi lua kuyisheye n alu bantu mu mutshima wandi, ne yeye ne Oholiaba, muana mulume wa Ahisamaka wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana
Bakahingana, bakalua ku Ene mishapata eu udi Kadesha , bakahaula buloba buonso bua Bena Amaleka ne Bena Amole bakadi bashikama mu Hasasona tamâ

Nansha nanku, pa kupanga diumvwangana munkatshi mwa bibambalu biônso bibidi ebi, badi mwa kwanyisha dîyi kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwanfwanka panyima pa dikonkonona dia ndekeelu anu pikala tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshianyisha; c mêyi malongolodi badi mwa kuapatula anu pikala Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu, pa dilomba dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga, kajadika diumvwangana diawu ne Dîyi dikulu, mu tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu

bukumbaji, makookeshi ne lwendu lwa Njila wa : Bidi bitangila buludiki bwa mianda ya mbulamatadi Kanungu ka Buludiki bwa mianda ya mbulamatadi kabweena bubweelakana mu mianda ya tshidiidi, kabweena butwa ku tshia muntu ne kabweena ne kansungansunga
Hashishe, Yehowa wakamatshisha mu Sodoma ne Amola soufre ne kalua bia mu diulu kudi Yehowa
Yehowa wakabidika mukana mua mpunda, wakambila Belâma ne, Nakuenza tshinyi bua wewe wakunkuma misangu isatu
Kanungu ka Badi bimikila Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu mudimu wa kutangilula lungenyi lwa dîyi dikulu ludi mu mêyi ne mikandu ne mu ngenzelu idi mikala ne bukola bwa mêyi ne mikandu
Musulu newikale tente ne biula, neubuele mu nsubu webe ne mu nsubu webe wa bulalu ne ha bulalu buebe, ne mu nsubu ya bahika bebê ne kudi bantu bebe, ne mu nfulu yenu ne mu binu bienu

Yeye wakabambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi Wamba ne, Muntu yonso aluate muele wandi wa nvita, endakane ku tshibi ne ku tshibi mu tshitudilu tshionso, ashihe muan abo mulume ne mulunda wandi ne muena mutumba n andi
Edi ndî diakamba Yehowa bualu bua bana bakashi ba Selofehada ne, Bobo babakibue kudi balume hadibo basue, kadi babakibue kudi balume ba mu meku a tshisamba tshia batatu abo
Muakuidi neangate tshisaka mu bianza bienu, neatshiteke hanshi ku mpala kua tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Balumbuluishi nebalondolole tshilumbu tô; ne bikala mumonyi eu muena mashimi mutumpile mukuabo tshianana, hashishe bamuenzele yeye bu muakasueye kuenzela muan abo: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Palô wakamba ne, Ya, ujike tatu webe, bu muakukutshihisheye
Wewe neuboteshe tshituha, utshiteke ku mpala kua mushete wa Nzambi mu ntenta wa kusangakena kundi nsangakena n ebe, netshikale tshilamba tshia tshima kunudi
Nudi mua kudia nyunyu yonso idi miakane
Mulume wandi udi mumanye mua kujadika kudi tshiha kuandi kuonso anyi mei andi onso, anyi udi mua kumusha malu au ne malu a hatuhu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nengenze bualu ebu buwakuamba bualu bua wewe wakasangana luse ku mesu kuanyi, meme ndi mumanye Hina diebe
Kadi nsubu ya mu misoko idi kayiyi minyungulula ne lumbu neyikale ne madimi, nudi mua kuyihikula, ne bena nsubu nebahingane halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene
Tshidi tshifila ngenyi mu mianda ya makookeshi malamina polovensa ne tshidi tshilondolola Bukalenga bwa polovensa pamwe ne midimu ya mbulamatadi ya mu polovensa ne mu misoko
Yakoba Wakenza nunku, wakashikisha lumingu luandi, ne yeye wakamuha Lakele bu mukashi wandi Labana wakafua Bileha, muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi, kudi Lakele bu muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi
Mu tshibawu tshia mutabala mudi disumba anyi disumbisha dia bintu dishindameena pa dimanya dia mianda idi beena bintu kabayi mwa kumanya tshiendelela
Bakumuka mu Miteka, bakashikama mu Hashemona, Bakumuka mu Hashemona, bakashikama mu Moselota
Nunku Mose, muinu wa Yehowa, wakafua mu buloba bua Moaba muakamba Yehowa

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Kabahu Yehowa Muoyo Nudimuke, kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi ne malu anakunuambila lelu: hanuadia bintu bia bungi, hanukuta, hanuasa nsubu mimpe ne hanuashikamamu, hakumbana ngombe yenu ne mikoko yenu ne havulangana biamu bienu bia argent ne bia or, ne havulangana bintu bienu bionso; hashishe nudimuke, kanudisu mu mitshima yenu, kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu; wakanulombola mu tshihela tshinene tshibi, tshiakadi ne nyoka isuma bu kahia ne tuminyiminyi, ne buloba budi kabuyi ne mai; wakanuhatula mai mu dibue dikole; wakanuisha ne mana mu tshihela, adi batatu benu kabayi bamanye; bualu bua kunuhuekesha ne kunuteta, bua kunuenzela bimpe mu matuku a kunshikidilu kuenu: kanuambi mu mitshima yenu ne, Tuakudiangatshila biuma ebi bionso ne bukole bua bianza bietu

Wakambila Adama ne, Bualu bua wewe wakuteleja di dia mukashi webe, wakudia mamuma a mutshi unakukuambila ne, Kuadi nansha, buloba buakedibua mulau bualu buebe, wewe neudie bidia biabu ne kanyinganyinga matuku ebe onso, buloba nebukumeneshile meba ne tusokola, neudie midioko ya mu budimi, neudie bidia ne luanga ha mpala hebe to ne hawahingana mu buloba kabidi, wewe wakumushibua mu buloba, wewe udi dinfuenkenya dia buloba, neuhingane mu dinfuenkenya dia buloba kabidi
Ebe wakalela bana balume babidi dina dia mukuabo diakadi Pelege, mu matuku andi bakabanyangana buloba, dina dia muan abo diakadi Yoketana
Ulue ne Alona ne bana bandi balume ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, uboweshe mai

Kanungu ka : Ku bukookeshi bwa baminisitila badibo batwa mu nyima, baminisitila bindonda badi bakumbaja makookeshi adibo babapeesha kudi olodonase udi utangila bulongolodi ne ngenzelu wa mudimu wa Bukalenga bunene
Efelona wakakudimuna Abalahama di ne, Mukelenge wanyi, ungunvuile budimi bua nkama mai ya nshekele ya argent budi mushinga kai munkatshi muetu
Nzambi wakamba kabidi ne, Ambila Bena Isalele ne, NDI MUNDI wakuntuma

Yehowa wakamufila buloba buonso bua Gilada tô ne ku Dana, ne buloba buonso bua Nafatale, ne bua Efelayima ne Manashe ne buloba buonso bua Yuda tô ne ku mai manene a ku nyima, ne buloba bua ku Sude, ne mpata wa mu tshibanda tshia Yeleko, musoko wa mabue, tô ne ku Soâ
Abalama wakambila Lota ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Katutandanganyi, balami ba bintu bietu kabatandanganyi, bualu bua tudi bana ba muntu umue
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Wewe wakusungi la mioyo yetu, utuendeshe diakalengele ku mesu kua mukelenge wetu, nebikale bahika ba Palo
Yeye wakamba ne, Mukelenge, kukuatshi tshiji, nengakule musangu eu, bikalamu bantu bakane dikumi Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nshiha musoko bualu bua bantu dikumi
Nenuenzele misoko yonso idi kule, idi kayiyi misoko ya bisamba ebi
Lewitiki Milambu ya Kuikisha n ai Ditalala Bikala mulambu wa mundi wa kumuvuisha n au ditalala, yeye neafile muana wa ngombe, nansha mulume nansha mukashi, udi kayi ne tshitema, ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kanungu ka Dikumbajangana,bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu badi babuleeja kudi mêyi malongolodi
Netusangishe minyinyi yonso ya mu mai manene bua kubadisha, anyi
Genese Kuledibua kua Isaka Yehowa wakahingana kudi Sala bu muakambeye, ne wakenzela Sala bu muakambeye
Lewitiki Kujidila kua Alona ne Bana Bandi Balume Ek
Wakafunda mei a dihungila, mikenji dikumi, ha mabue
Nebahe bantu bakuabo bana benu balume ne bana benu bakashi; mesu enu neabatangile ne mitshima minyingalala matuku onso; kadi kanuena nushala ne bukole nansha bukese mu bianza bienu
Hashishe ditutu diakabuikila ntenta wa kusangakena, ne butumbi bua Yehowa buakûla nsubu tente
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanutengule mu mitshima yenu ne ya bana benu, bua nuenu kunanga Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso, bua nuenu kuikala ne muoyo
Oholiaba, muana mulume wa Ahisamaka, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana wakadi n andi, mundi wa lungenyi lule wakenza bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû

Bikaleye mumukume ne tshiji, anyi bikaleye mumuele tshintu, hakadiye muale mu nshila, wakamushiha, anyi bikaleye mumukume ne tshianza tshiandi ne tshiji, mumushihe, nebashihe muntu wakamukuma, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu musombuedi neashihe mushihi wa muntu, hasangakeneye n andi

Mu bidimu bimpe muanda mutekete buloba buakalua ne bintu bia bungi, mafuka mafuka Yeye wakasangisha bintu bia kudia bionso bia mu bidimu abi muanda mutekete bia mu Ejipitu, wakabiteka mu bimenga, bintu bia kudia biakadiunda mu madimi a ha matshika a musoko, wakabiteka mu musoko au
Yeye wakabebesha ne, Yeye udi ne bukole, anyi
Yeye nealue n abu kudi muakuidi, ne muakuidi neabuambule dianza tente bu tshivulukidi, neabuoshe ha tshioshelu bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia eu udi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu
Kumpala kwa kusoomba mu nkwaasa, Minisitila kavulambedi udi uleeja ndongamu wa Bukalenga bunene kudi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga
Enza mabaya abidi a kutoka ku matumba a tshitendelelu adi ku nyima
Kanungu ka Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia mu polovensa ke tshitupa tshifidi tshia ngenyi tshia polovensa
Eleyasafa muana mulume wa Laele neikale mukelenge wa nsubu wa batatu ba Bena Gêshona
Abalahama Udi Ulomba Nzambi bualu bua Sodoma Bantu aba bakabika, bakatangila ku Sodoma, ne Abalahama wakaya kubashindikila mu nshila
Udimuke biebe bua kuenza bintu bionso bu tshidikishilu tshinakukulesha mu mukuna
Bobo bakaya ku mikuna, bakalua mu tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bakatentekela buloba
Yai muana mulume wa Manashe wakaya wakanyenga misoko mikuabo wakayidika ne, Hawota y i misoko ya Yai
Meme nembabishile muprofete munkatshi mua bana babo bu wewe; meme nenteke mei anyi onso mukana muandi, ne yeye neabambile mei onso anamuambila
Bakadi babakibua kudi ba mu meku a bana balume ba Manashe, muana mulume wa Yosefe, buhianyi buabo buakashala mu tshisamba tshia meku a tatu abo
Mu matuku onso adiye mudijidile kudi Yehowa yeye kena mumanye mua kulua ha buihi ne mundi mufue

Abalahama wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakasuika tshiseba ha nyima ha nyama wandi wa mpunda, wakangata bansongalume bandi babidi ne Isaka muan andi, wakahanda nkunyi ya kalua ka ha tshioshelu, wakabika, wakaya ku muaba wakamuambila Nzambi
Yeye udi mujidile kudi Yehowa matuku onso a tshijila tshiandi
Ei idi mikenji yakela Yehowa kudi Mose bua mulume ne mukashi wandi, ne bua tatu ne muan andi mukashi udi mu nsubu wandi mu bunsongakashi buandi
Udi ne tshia kuneemeka mêyi ne mikandu ne kabidi tuludiki twa Ditunga
Genese Nzambi Udi Uhunga Tshihungidi ne Noa Nzambi wakasankisha Noa ne bana bandi, wakabambila ne, Nulelangane, nukumbane ba bungi, nuikale ha buloba buonso
Yeye wakamba ne, Ndi bianyi muhika wa Abalahama

Nubambile ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bu mundi ne muoyo, bu munuakuamba mu matshu anyi, nennuenzele nunku: mibidi yenu neyihone hanshi mifue mu tshihela etshi, buonso buenu baka balabo ba bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bakadi bantontolola, bulelela, nuenu kanuena nulua mu buloba bunakanulaya bua nuenu nushikamemu, anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna

Lewitiki Bubi bua Nadaba ne Abihu Nadaba ne Abihu, bana balume ba Alona, bakangata malonga a kahia, muntu dilonga diandi muntu dilonga diandi, bakatekamu kahia, bakelahu musenga wa manananshi, bakalua ne kahia kakadi kakayi tshijila ku mpala kua Yehowa, hakadiye kayi mubambile
dipeta dia bintu bwa majinga a polovensa;
Nansha nanku, bu biôbi bienzeka pa dîyi dilongolodi, Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga netshikala mwa kwaasa bikwabo bishimikidi bia ditwa nabi mungalata mpanda
dikebulula dia mamanya ne bidi mwa kwenza nabi midimu;
Bakashi betu ne bana betu bakese nebashihibue, bualu budi butamba buimpe bua tuetu tuhingane mu Ejipitu nansha

Mbulamatadi udi ushindika ne muntu yônso udi mwa kupeta ne kwenza mudimu,ushindika ne udi umwepula ku dipangila dia mudimu, ne kabidi udi ushindika ne muntu yônso udi ne tshia kupeta difutu dilelela ne dikumbana bwa kumwambulwisha yêye ne dîku diende, bwa kwikala ne ngikadilu ulonda mushinga wa bumuntu, ngikadilu mukumbaja kudi mishindu mikwabo yônso ya dikuba dia majinga a bantu, bu mudi pansio wa bujika ngondu ne pansio wa kashidi
Mose wakafunda mikenji ei, wakayifila mu bianza bia bakuidi, bana balume ba Lewi, bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne kudi bakulu bonso ba mu Isalele
Dîba adi, badi bamupingana kudi muntu wa kumpala uvwa mumutwa munyima
Muntu wakihata mbushi wa Azazele neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neowe mai, ne ku nyima yeye neuhingane mu tshitudilu
Kanungu ka Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kwasa, nansha bishi, tshisumbu tshia kabumwe pa tshipapu tshijima tshia buloba bwa ditunga anyi pa tshitupa tshiadi
Kanungu ka Beena Kongu bônso badi ne tshia kwikala ne ditalala ne dikubibwa munda mwa ditunga ne pankatshi pa matunga
Yeye wakamuidika dina ne, Mose, wakamba ne, Bualu bua nakamukoka mu mai
Tuhita tuakabenzesha ne, Nushikishai mudimu wenu wa buatshia buatshia bu munuakenza hanuakadi ne bisonsa

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi nzuji wa manyooka wa Mulombodi wa ditunga ne wa Ministila wa kumpala bwa bibawu bia tshidiidi bia dipangila dia ditunga, dipeeja dia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga, dinyanga dia lumu anyi diupula dia mushinga wa ditunga pamwe ne bwa bibawu bia bantu batabala ne bwa bibawu bikwabo ku mêyi ne mikandu ya bantu bônso, bibawu bibunda mu midimu yabo anyi pa dîba dia midimu yabo
Hakaya Mose ku tshitendelelu, bantu bonso bakabika, bakimana muntu ne muntu ku ntenta wandi, bakatangila Mose tô ne hakabueleye mu Ntenta

Mulume eu nealue ne mulambu wa kubuikila n au disambuka diandi dia mikenji kudi Yehowa, ku mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusangakena, neafile tshimpanga tshia mulambu wa kubuikila n au disambuka diandi dia mikenji
Hashishe, Abalahama wakadishinda hanshi, wakaseka, wakamba mu mu tshima wandi ne, Nebalelele muntu udi ne bidimu lukama muana, anyi
Abimeleke kakadi muanze kulua kudiye, ne yeye wakakonka ne, Mukelenge, wewe neushihe tshisamba tshiakane, anyi
Ekesode Kujidila kua Ban a Bute Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Unjidile ban a bute bonso ba Bena Isalele, bonso badianjile kuledibua, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, bobo mbanyi
Wewe neushihe muana wa ngombe ku mesu kua Yehowa ku tshibi tshia ntenta wa kusambakena
Muntu ne mundi wakela mulangala wandi hanshi, wakakudimuka nyoka, kadi mulangala wa Alona wakatuma milangala yabo
Wakamona miehu mikuabo muanda mutekete yakadi mikese, yakafubidila ku luhehele luakafuma ku esete, yakadiunda kuinshi kua mikuabo
Bualu bua Yehowa wakasungula Bena Lewi munkatshi mua bisamba bienu bionso, bua kunuenzela mudimu mu dina dia Yehowa, ne yeye ne bana bandi balume tshiendelele

Yosefe wakamuambila ne, Eku nkujingulula kua tshilota tshiebe bisaka bisatu bidi bu matuku asatu, hahita matuku asatu, Palô neakukose mutu, neakuowe ku mutshi, ne nyunyu ya mulu neyizokole munyinyi wa mubidi webe
Nudi mua kudia munyinyi wa kabuluku ne wa mbashi bu mudi bakuabo badia; badi kabayi bakane ne badi bakane badi bamanye mua kudia
Dîyi dilongolodi didi difila mishindu ya bulongolodi ne ya lwendu lwatshi
Mulami Wakenza bu muakamba Yosefe, wakalua n abo mu nsubu wa Yosefe
Mose ne Alona bakaya kudi Palô, bakamuambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu, udi Wamba ne

Nzambi wakamba ne, Bintu bidi bikenka bikale mulu mua diulu bua kutahulula munya kudi butuku, bikale bua bimanyinu ne bua bikondo ne bua matuku ne bua bidimu, bikale bu minda mulu mua diulu bua kutokeshayi ha buloba, bualu buakenjibua
Nenubahe kabidi bintu binudi nuhuola diambedi, ne tshia nvinyo muhia muhia, ne tshia manyi enu, ne miosa ya mikoko
Kadi Yehowa wakanusungula bienu, wakanuhatula mu tshikutu tshia kahia, mu Ejipitu mene, bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi, bu mu dituku edi
Muaba au wakidikibua ne, Tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bualu bua tshisumbu tshia mamuma tshiakakosamu Bena Isalele
Bakamuambila ne, Yosefe utshidi ne muoyo, ne yeye udi mukelenge wa buloba bua Ejipitu Mutshima wandi wakahandika yeye kakitabusha di diabo
Bualu bua bobo bakashiha bantu mu tshiji tshiabo, ne mu tshishiku tshiabo bakakosa ngombe mijilu ya bikono biai
Mweena mwabo mulume, mukaji Mfumu wa Ditunga Kapangu , Tshipangu Dikolesha dia lungenyi, kabukulu, bunkambwa
Biatangila muakuidi ha mputa ne bielanganeye meji ne disama kadiena dibuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, ne nsuki mifike kayenaku, muakuidi neamubueshe ha nkayandi mu nsubu matuku muanda mutekete
Bana balume ba Yawana badi nunku Elisha ne Tâshishi ne Kitima ne Dodamma
Lebeka wakabika ne bena mudimu bandi ba bakashi, bakabanda ha nyima ha tumelo, bakalonda muntu wa Abalahama, yeye wakangata Lebeka, wakaya mu nshila wandi
Yosefe wakambila tatu wandi ne, Aba mbana bakumpa Nzambi kunoko Yeye wakamba ne, Ulue n abo kundi, nembavudishile disanka
Wewe newoshe tshimpanga tshijima ha tshioshelu, tshidi mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa, udi utua dihembu, udibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Kutushiyi, ndi nkusengelela, bualu bua wewe udi mumanye ne, Tuetu netuikale mu tshihela, wewe newikale bu mesu etu
Nenjadike tshihungidi tshianyi hankatshi hetu hebe ne tunkanunuina tuebe to ne bikondo biatu bionso bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele, bua meme kuikala Nzambi webe ne wa tunkanunuina tuebe
Bana ba balume ba Shimeona Yemuele ne Yamina ne Obada ne Yakina ne Soha ne Shaula, muana wa balume wa mukashi wa Bena Kanana, â mmeku a Shimeona
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Udi udidila kundi tshinyi
Yehowa neanutumine biusha bia mu Ejipitu, ne disama dia muiaka, ne mpusu ne lubila: masama adibo kabayi mua kuondaha
Mêyi ne mikandu adi aleeja mushindu wa kusanka ne mapa awu
Uvuluke matuku a lumingu, wakale ne ditshina mu nsubu wanyi meme ndi Yehowa
Muntu yonso udi ushikama ha tshintu tshiashikameye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Enzai mudimu matuku asambombo; kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete nedikale dituku dia tshijila, dituku dia kuikisha ku mesu kua Yehowa; muntu yonso udi wenza mudimu dituku adi nebamushihe

Kanungu ka Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kufila mpala ku masungula a Mulombodi wa Ditunga padiye kêna mukumbaja makanyika adi alonda aa: kwikala ne bweena Kongu bwa bangabanga; kwikala ne mvula ya tshileledi kayiyi mishadile ku ; kwikala ne bujima bwa makookeshi a bumuntu ne a tshidiidi; kubenga kubwelakana mu maalu adibo babenga kudi dîyi dia masungulangana
Mapangadika a Minisitila kavulambedi badi baatwa tshiâla tshibîdi ku dia bakaji, padibo bienzeka, kudi baminisitila badiye wimikila dikumbaja dia mapangadika awu
Wakenza nkanu ya or ibidi kuinshi kua mutu watshi, ku matumba abidi adi ku nseke yatshi, bualu bua kutshituala
Badi Bashikisha Kuenza Bintu bia Kubuesha mu Tshitendelelu Ek
Yehowa neabenzele bu muakenzeleye Sihona ne Oga, bakelenge ba Bena Amole, bakashiheye ne buloba buabo
Udi ushikama nkayebe ne bantu bimana ku mpala kuebe dinda tô ne ku dilolo munyi
Abimeleke wakamuebesha ne, Bualu buwakutuenzela budi tshinyi

Kanungu kinâyi Badi mwa kutapulula polovensa ne bitupa bia teletwala bidikadila bipiabipia pa kukosolola anyi kusambakaja bia kale bilondeshile makanyika mafila kudi Dîyi dikulu ne kudi mêyi a ditunga
Bikala tshintu tshikese tshia munyinyi wa tshijila anyi tshia bidia bishale tô ne ku dinda, wewe neutshioshe mu kahia, kabatshidi, bualu bua tshidi tshia tshijila

Nomba Bena Kanâna Badi Baluangana ne Bena Isalele Atada, mukelenge wa Bena Kanâna, wakadi ushikama ku luseke lua ku Sude, wakunvua lumu ne, Bena Isalele badi baya mu nshila wa ku Atalima, yeye wakaluangana ne Bena Isalele, wakaya ne bakuabo mu lukanu
Kanutemeshi kahia mu matshika enu onso dituku dia Lumingu

Mukalu wenu wa ku luseke lua ku nôde newikale ku mai manene tô ne ku mukuna wa Hô, ku mukuna wa Hô nenufunde tô ne ku mukalu wa Hamata ku Sedada; mukalu newikale kabidi ku Zifelona tô ne ku mukalu wa Hasâ enana, eu newikale mukalu wenu wa ku nôde
Bikaleye muvuishe malu au bu malu a hatuhu, hakunvueye, nunku yeye neamutuadile bubi buandi
Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila Bukalenga bunene

Enza biebe mitshi ya acacia ya kuela ku mabaya atanu adi ku luseke lumue lua tshitendelelu, mitshi itanu ya kuela ku mabaya adi ku luseke lumue ne mitshi itanu ya kuela ku mabaya adi ku luseke lukuabo, ne mitshi itanu ya kuela ku mabaya adi ku nyima
Yeye wakambila bakulu ne, Nutuindile bienu kunoko tô ne ha bialua kunudi kabidi, ne monai, Alona ne Hû badi n enu, muntu udi ne tshilumbu aye biandi kudibo
Wewe newambile Bena Isalele ne, Manyi au neikale ku mesu kuanyi bu manyi a tshijila adibo bela ha mutu ku bikondo bienu bionso
Yeye wakamuela lusumuinu luandi ne, Balaka, bika biebe, unvua, ungunvuile, muana mulume wa Sipô: Nzambi kena bu muntu udi wamba mei a mashimi, kena bu muana wa muntu, bua kukudimuneye mutshima
Neafile tshituha tshia mulambu ne mulambu bu mulambu udibo bakuha ku mesu kua Yehowa, netshikale kudi muakuidi udi umiamine mashi a mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala
Yeye udi muledibue mu nsubu webe ne yeye udibo basumba ku argent webe udi ne bua kutengudibua, tshi hungidi tshianyi netshikale munda muenu bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele
Tuye kuenza budimuke, kabalu ba bungi, halua nvita, kabayi kudi bantu badi n etu lukuna bua kuhingana n etu nvita, kabumuki mu buloba buetu
Mesu a bubidi buabo akabuluka, bakamanya ne, Tudi butaka, bakatela mabeshi a nfigi, bakadienzela mbondia
Biwakengesha bana banyi ba bakashi, anyi biwabaka bakashi bakuabo, kakuena mumanyi mukuabo hankatshi hetu, anu Nzambi udi mumanyi wa bualu buetu, meme ne wewe
Lubena wakahingana ku mukela, ne Yosefe kakadimu, yeye wakahanda tshivualu tshiandi
Muntu yonso udi ulenga bintu ebi bianza neikale ne bukoya, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo

Lebeka wakambila Isaka ne, Bana bakashi ba Bena Hete badi batondesha muoyo wanyi, biabaka Yakoba mukashi wa bana bakashi ba Bena Hete bu bana bakashi badi mu buloba ebu, muoyo wanyi newikale ne mushinga kai kundi

bababiikila ne batshipwita ba mu Batshipwita ba mu polovensa badi bapatukila mu disungula dia kudi bantu bônso dia tshikosu ne dia muntu ne muntu pa bwende , anyi badi babateeka amu nanku mu diumvwangana bwa tshipungu tshia mvula itanu idibu mwa kwambulula
dipangadika dia bingenyingenyi, ndongamu ne diumvwangana bwa kwambulwishangana mu mianda ya bubanji, ya dikolesha dia ngenyi, ya mamanya ne ya majinga a bantu pankatshi pa matunga;
Yokeshana wakalela Sheba ne Dedana, bana balume ba Dedana bakadi Ashulima ne Letushima ne Leumima
Kuladi ne mukashi wa mukuenu bua kudionena bualu buandi
Padiku tshipumbishi, badi banji kumupingana kudi mweena Bukalenga udi mubabidila bakwabo ku mulongo
Mulume wakamba ne, Mukashi uwakumpa bua kuikala n anyi wakumpa dimuma dia mutshi, nakudia
Dîyi didi dileeja bulongolodi , bukookeshi ne lwendu lwa bilumbulwilu bia lukongu lwa mbulamatadi
Bule bua tshilulu ne tshilulu nebuikale coudées makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu, ne butshiama buatshi coudées mai, bilulu bionso nebikale ne luidi lumue

Ebi mbintu biebe kabidi: bintu bidi Bena Isalele banyukula, ne milambu yonso idibo bakuha, nakunuha ne bana bebe balume ne bana bebe bakashi badi n ebe, bu tshintu tshienu tshiendelele muntu yonso udi muakane mu nsubu webe neabidie
Muntu ne muntu udibo babala neafile tshituha tshia nshekele bu mudibo bafila mu nsubu wa tshiendelele tshituha tshia nshekele bu kuha kuabo kudi Yehowa
Shimeona ne Lewi badi bana babo mene, miele yabo ya nvita idi mikole
Kufila Kuabo kua Buatshiabuatshia Nom
Mîyama, muprofete mukashi, muan abo mukashi ne Alona, wakangata tshisanji mu tshianza tshiandi, ne bakashi bonso bakamulonda ne bisanji, benda batuhika
Abidana, muana mulume wa Gideoni, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Benyamina
Kanuanji kutombokela Yehowa nansha, kanutshinyi bena buloba; bobo badi bu bintu bia tuetu kudia, bintu bidibo badisungila n abi biakumuka, ne Yehowa udi n etu; kanubatshinyi
Yehowa wakamana ku sungula dituku, makelela Yehowa nênze bualu ebu mu buloba
Aba mbana ba balume ba Lewi ku mena abo Gêshona ne Kohata ne Melali
Kadi katangila difwilakana dia makookeshi pankatshi pa Bukalenga bunene ne Bukalenga bwenji bwa mêyi ne mikandu ne kabidi pankatshi pa Mbulamatadi ne polovensa
Bualu bua nakuha Bena Lewi tshintu tshia dikumi tshia Bena Isalele tshidibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, bu buhianyi buabo, bua bualu ebu nakubambila ne, Kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Neamiamine mashi ne munu wandi ha mutu hatshi misangu muanda mutekete, neatshilengeshe, neatshijidile bua bubi bua Bena Isalele

Wakenza tshioshelu tshia musonga wa manananshi ne mabaya a acacia, buludi bua tshi buakadi coudée umue, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudée umue, bakidikisha nseke yonso ne luidi lumue, bule buatshi bua mulu buakadi coudées ibidi, wakenza nsengu yatshi ne tshituha tshijima

Kadi bua malu au onso hayabo mu buloba bua bantu badi n abo lukuna, meme tshiena mbahidia, tshiena ngikala n abo tshiji bua kubashiha tshiendelele ne bua kushiha tshihungidi tshianyi tshinakahunga n abo, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, kadi bua bualu buabo nenvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi tshinakahunga ne bankambua babo banakahatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku mesu kua bisamba bia bantu, bua meme kuikala Nzambi wabo meme ndi Yehowa
Kadi mukashi wa Lota wakatangila ku nyima kuandi, wakakudimuka dibue dia luehu
Padiku kakuyi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia batshipwita, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi mwa kutuma muntu kampanda bwa kujaandula diditeeka mu lukongu lumwe kudi batshipwiita

Kadi bintu bionso bia mu mai budi kabiyi ne mialala ne mabamba, bidi mu mai manene anyi mu misulu, bidi bibi kunudi, nebikale bibi kunudi, kanudi munyinyi wa bintu ebi, ne mibidi mifue yabi neyikale bu bintu bibi kunudi
Wewe neushikike Bena Lewi ku mpala kua Alona ne kua bana bandi balume, ubanyukule ku mpala kua Yehowa
Mose wakabambila ne, Muntu kabishiyi tô ne dinda
Kadi hakabuela Mose kudi Yehowa bua kusomba n andi, yeye wakumusha tshilulu tshikudika tô ne hakaluhukeye; wakaluhuka, wakambila Bena Isalele mikenji yakamuambila Yehowa
Muntu yonso wakangata dilonga diandi, wakatekamu kahia, wakatekahu musenga wa manananshi, bakimana ne Mose ne Alona ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Tuetu bakamba ne, Kabena mua kuyaku, bikala muakuny etu kayi muye n etu, bualu bua katuena mua kumonangana ne muntu au ku mesu bikala muakuny etu kayi n etu
Bana benu kabidi, tshisamba tshia Lewi, tshisamba tshia tatu ebe, ulue n abo bua bobo bakukuatshile mudimu kadi wewe ne bana bebe balume badi n ebe nenuikale ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Isaka wakakuna bintu mu buloba abu, ne tshidimu atshi wakahuola lukama lukama, Yehowa wakamusankisha
Bakumuka mu tshihela tshia Sina, bakashikama mu Dofaka
Isaka wakalua n andi mu ntenta wa mamu wandi, Sala, yeye wakangata Lebeka, wakalua mukashi wandi Isaka wakamunanga, ne mutshima wandi wakasambibua bua lufu lua mamu wandi
Biambeye dî, kena udishikisha, anyi

Mikata ne Kuabanyangana bia Buloba bua Kanâna Yehowa wakambila Mose mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mitangilangane ne Yeleko ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuasabuka Yadene mu buloba bua Kanâna, nenuihate bena buloba ebu bonso ku mpala kuenu, nushihe mpingu yabo ya mabue, ne mpingu yakatulabo ne tshiamu, ne miaba yabo ya kutendelela, nenunyenge buloba, nenushikamemu, bualu bua nakanuhabu bu buhianyi buenu

Kanulu ne difutu dia mukashi wa masandi anji dia muntu udi bu mbua, mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kushikisha diditshiha dienu; bualu bua bubidi buabo badi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kadi bikala mputa mutampakane hakashikisheye kudilengesha, muakuidi neamutangile, ne bikala mputa mutampakane mu dikoba, muakuidi kena ne bua kukeba nsuki mitoke tô, muntu eu kena muakane
Beena bukalenga bunene badibo bafunda badi ne tshia kudilekeela mudimu
Neudie muana wa mukoko umue ne dinda ne mukuabo dilolo, ne tshintu tshia dikumi tshia tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne tshituha tshinai tshia dikoho dia manyi

Tshimanyinu tshiaadi ndibendela bia bule bwa tshiululu, dilengeja ne mutôtu wa kalabi mu ditumba diadi dia kuulu ku diabakaji, ne dikosoloja lubelubelu kudi lupolu lukunze lunyungulula ne diikala dipepela dia kalabi
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune

Padiku kakuyi midimu, kakweena tshipwita umwe udibo mwa kukwata kakuyi dianyisha dia bilo ba Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi bia Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe to, amu padibo bamukwata tshianza mu tshisaka, padibo banyisha bwa kumufunda anyi padibo bamupisha tshiendelele
Yakoba wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakangata dibue diakadive musamehu mutu, wakadimanyika bu tshibumba wakela manyi ha mutu hadi
Bakenza nkanu ya or ibidi bakayiteka ku luseke lua tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi luakadi lutuangane ne efoda

Nakamumanya bua yeye ayishe bana bandi ne ba mu nsubu wandi bimpe, bua bobo baye mu nshila wa Yehowa bua kuenza malu makane ne malulame, nunku Yehowa neamanye mua kuenzela Abalahama malu onso akamuambileye

Kanungu ka Badi bênza bilumbulwilu bia nsambu ya pankatshi pa beena mwabo bôbo nkayabu bikumbajangana kudi tubadi na tubinadi twa basivila ne twa basalayi tuteeka mu bukookeshi bwa Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika
Ungambile, difutu diebe nedikale tshinyi

Nomba Mikenji ya Bunazi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Biatshiha nansha mulume nansha mukashi kuditshiha kua Munazi bua kudijidila kudi Yehowa, neajile muoyo ne maluvu makole kanu vinaigre wa nvinyo anyi vinaigre wa maluvu makole, kanu mai a tumuma tukese, kadi tumuma tubishe anyi tumuma tûme
Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, muakuidi neamutangile ne bikala disama ditampakane mu dikoba muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi
Bana ba Nafatale, Yasele ne Guni ne Yese ne Shilema
Bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa bakabalabo kudi Mose, muntu yonso ku mudimu wandi ne ku bujitu buandi, bakabalabo kudiye bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Yakoba wakamba ne, Nansha, ndi nkutendekena ne, Biwikala n anyi luse, witabushe matabisha a ku tshianza tshinyi, bualu bua nakumona mpala webe bu muntu udi umona mpala wa Nzambi, ne wewe wakusanka bua bualu buanyi
Bakumuka mu Alusha bakashikama mu Lefidima, ne bantu kabakadi ne mai a kunua
Bidimu bia tshiole muanda mutekete biakabanga kulua bu muakamba Yosefe, biole biakadi mu maloba onso, kadi mu Ejipitu muakadi mushale bintu bia kudia

Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi mwa kwelangana mvita mu olodonase mushintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, panyima pa bamana kweebeja Kapangu ka ku mutu ka bilwilu ne bamana kupeta dianyisha dia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne dia batshipwita bakulumpe, bilondeshila kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi
Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi,mianda idi ilonda eyi idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene:
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne nyama nebanshihe bulelela

Numuambile ne, Mona, muntu webe Yakoba udi kabidi ku nyima kuetu Bualu bua yeye wakabambila munda ne, Nemmutokeshe munda ne matabisha akaya ku mpala kuanyi, ne hatuatangilangana n andi ku mesu, bumue yeye neangitabushe
Dibeenga edi diaatambi kusunguluka ne mvita ivwa misunsulula ditunga kutwadijila ku too ne ku

Dilondangana Mulombodi wa Ditunga Ndumbulwilu wa ku tubadi Tshidiidi a manyooka Mweena tshimwangi Didila Ndudiki Dibadika dia bantu Dieebeja dia dianyisha dia beena ditunga Ditunga Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa Disungudibwa kudi bantu bonso
Nenja dike tshihungidi tshianyi hankatshi hetu n ebe, nenkukumbashe ba bu ngi
Tangilai, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakateka buloba ku mpala kuenu: yai bienu, nubuhiane, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu enu; kanutshinyi, kanuikadi ne buowa
Bakidika muaba au ne, Kibelota hatawa, bualu bua bakajikamu bantu bakadi ne lukuka
Hashishe, hakadiye wakula, tangilai, Lebeka wakadi mulela kudi Betuele, muana mulume wa Mileka, mukashi wa Naho, muan abo ne Abalahama, wakaluhuka ne mulondo wa mai ha diaha diandi
Balaka Wakenza muakamba Belâma, wakosha ngombe ne tshimpanga ku tshioshelu ne ku tshioshelu
Muntu nansha umwe keena mwa kubumbusha mu njila wabo bwa kumwenzelabo mudimu yêye nkayende anyi bwa kwenzabu midimu idi imusankisha yêye

Mu dituku ba disanka dienu, ne mu bikondo binudi nudia bidia bia Yehowa, ne mu tshibangidilu tshia ngondo yenu, nenuele mpungi ku milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, ne ku milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, neyikale bu tshivulukidi ku mesu kua Nzambi wenu meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Nunku tuakashikama mu tshibanda tshitangilangane ne Bete peô
Heshebona wakadi tshimenga tshia Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi uluangana ne mukelenge mukuabo wa Moaba, wakanyenga buloba buandi buonso mu tshianza tshiandi to ne ku mai a Ânona
Yeye wakela di diandi nunku kudi muntu muibidi ne muisatu ne kudi bonso bakadi balonda ne bisumbu bia bintu ne, Nuambile Esau nunku hanuasangakena n andi
Mose wakamba ne, Bualu buakukukuata bua kufila nyama mu bianza bietu ya kuoshila Nzambi, tudi basue kuyishihela Yehowa Nzambi wetu
Yehowa Nzambi wakamba ne, Kambimpe bua mulume ashale nkayandi nansha, nemmufukile mukuatshishi bu mudiye
Hakanumusha Yehowa ku Kadeshe bânea ne, Yai bienu, nuhiane buloba bunakanuha; hashishe nuakahidia dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kanuakamuitabusha, kanuakunvua di diandi
Yeye wakababanyina bidia biakadi ku mpala kuandi, kadi tshituha tshia Benyamina tshiakahita tshituha tshiabo misangu itanu
Nuenu mumane ku mbelu ne muntu uwakusombesha tshintu nealuhuke kûdi ne tshieya
Meme ne nsangakene n ebe aha, nensombe n ebe ha mutu ha tshibuikilu tshia mushete, hankatshi ha bakeluba badi ha mutu ha mushete, nenkumanyishe malu onso andi nkuhesha bu mikenji kudi Bena Isalele
Abalahama wakakukuila ku mpala kua bena buloba
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Ebu mbuloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba ne, Nembuhe tunkanunuina tuenu, nakukuleshabu ne mesu ebe, kadi wewe kuena usabukaku
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanualua mu buloba bundi ngamba kunuha, ne hanuadia bintu bia mu buloba abu, nenufile mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa
Ndi nnusengelela ne, Nubingambile

Kanuena nuhiana buloba buabo bualu bua buakane buenu anyi bua dijalama dia mitshima yenu: kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ubihata ku mpala kuenu bualu bua bubi buabo; bualu bua kuakasha n enu dî diakalaya Yehowa kudi batatu benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba

Enzelai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshioshelu ne mabue adibo kabayi basonge; nuenu nenuoshilehu Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, milambu; nenufile kabidi milambu yenu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, nenudieku; nenusanke ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Salai wakadi nkumba, kakadi ne muana nansha

Kanungu ka Dieela dia tukanda bwa kusungula Mulombodi wa Ditunga badi badilongolola kudi Kasumbu ka ditunga kadikadile komekela Mianda ya Masungulangana, matuku makumi tshiteema kumpala kwa dijika dia matuku a mudimu a Mfumu udi mu nkwaasa
Bakamona Nzambi wa Isalele, muinshi mua makasa andi muakadi mabue a saphir, akadi matoke tô bu mubidi wa diulu
Wewe neutele tshikowelu tshia efoda ne bilulu bia bleu

Edome Udi Uhidia bua Bena Isalele Bahite Mose wakatuma miloho ku Kadesha kudi mukelenge wa Edome ne, Muan enu Isalele udi wamba ne, Wewe udi mumanye makenga onso akutukuata: bankambua betu bakaya mu Ejipitu, ne tuetu tuakashikama mu Ejipitu musangu mule, Bena Ejipitu bakadienzela bibi ne bankambua betu kabidi: ne hatuakadila kudi Yehowa, yeye wakumpa dî dietu, wakatuma muanjelo wakatuhatula mu Ejipitu, ne tangila, tudi mu Kadesha, musoko udi ku butshika bua buloba buenu mene

Nomba Badi Bihata Badi Kabayi Bakane mu Tshitudilu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wele dî kudi Bena Isalele bua bobo bihate bena nsudi mu tshitudilu, ne muntu yonso udi ne mputa wa luhangu ne muntu yonso udi munyanguke ku dilenga dia muntu mufue nebihate nansha mulume nansha mukashi ku tshitudilu, kabanyangi tshitudilu tshiabo, mundi mushikame

Bakenza tshitekelu tshia muinda ne tshiamu tshia or tshiakafulabo, bakatula tshitaku tshiatshi ne bilongo biatshi ne tshiamu tshia or tshijima, bakenza tshitekelu bu tshidikishilu tshiakalesha Yehowa Mose
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Nakuitabusha bualu ebu kabidi, tshiena nshiha musoko eu uwakulombela
Kadi biashaleye ne muoyo nansha dituku dimue nansha matuku abidi, kabena bamukengesha bualu bua yeye udi biuma biandi

Kadi bikala bualu ebu bulelela, kabakamusangana ne bimanyinu bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama, hashishe nebalue ne mushikankunde eu ku tshibi tshia nsubu wa tatu wandi, ne balume ba mu musoko nebamukume ne mabue tô ne hafileye, bualu bua yeye wakuenza bualu bua tshikama mu Isalele, wakuenza bu mukashi wa masandi mu nsubu wa tatu wandi: nunku nenûmushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Ekesode Mai Adi Ahatuka ku Dibue Bena Isalele bakabisha luendu luabo mu tshihela tshia Sinai, bakashikama mu Lefidima bu muakamba Yehowa, kabakasanganamu mai a kunua
MUTU WA MUKANDA VIII: Bidi bitangila ditangilula dia Dîyi dikulu
Nansha umue wabo wakashala anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna
Di didi Nzambi uteka mukana muanyi, nenkuambiledi
Kanungu kibîdi Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata ndikumbajija kudi tshimenga tshia Kinshasa ne kudi polovensa mikala ne bwikadi bwa pa mêyi ne mikandu

Bua Yosefe yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa avudishile buloba buandi disanka, bua bintu bia mushinga mukole bia mu diulu, bua mume, ne bua mai adi muinshi mua buloba; ne bua bintu biakakuama mamuma bualu bua diba, ne bua bintu bidi belangana ku ngondo ku ngondo; bua bintu bimpe bia mu mikuna, ne bua mabue a mushinga mukole a mu mikuna ya tshiendelele; ne bua bintu bimpe bia ha buloba ne tshiuwidi tshiabu, ne bua diakalengele dia bantu badi bashikama muitu
Yeye wakamuvudishilaku disanka Yakoba wakidika muaba au ne, Peniele bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Nakumonangana ne Nzambi mpala ha mpala ne muoyo wanyi wakuhanduka

MALU lyrics Maalu katonda bakole Kutonda nkumba, kutonda ne balela Kutonda ntontodi wa nyingala pankatshi Udi kayi ne maalu ela munu mulu e Taatù wa kafwa, maamù wakaya kwabu Bana bakashala batangula ntàngu Taatù wanyì musumbi dya bilamba Muntu yônso udi ne maalu e Maamù wakafua, Taatù kutubenga Bana bakashala batangula ntàngu Maamù wanyì, mulami dya cisenga Muntu yônso udi ne maalu e Kusekiseki mwineba Maria Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Kabulu kwamba kusekiseki mwineba Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Maalu akudia ne akulwata Maalu a basanka ne makenge Maalu akulala ne kubika kwee Akwata baluma ne bakaji e Akwata babanji ne bapele Maalu akwata banfumu ba matunga Yoyoyo Kemayi Ngabilayi kwakalwa maalu Mulùme nganyi wa ditanta
Mose wakenza nunku, wakenza malu onso akamuambila Yehowa
Bikala nyama muhandibue bihese, yeye nealue ne munyinyi wandi bu tshimanymu tshia bualu, ne yeye kena ufuta bua nyama muhandibue
Kanungu kisâtu Polovensa ne bitupa bia teletwale bidikadile bia Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata bidi ne bwikadi bwa pa mêyi ne mikandu ne badi babiludika kudi biâpu bia munda mwabi
Bana ba balume ba Lea bakadi Lubena, muan a bute wa Yakoba, ne Shimeona ne Lewi ne Yuda ne Yisaka ne Zebuluna
Makunshi a tshibi akadi anai, ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku mai, ne bitubuidi bia argent, bakalengesha makunshi ne tshiamu tshia argent

Bienza Bena Isalele bonso bualu bubi, ne bikala bualu ebu busokome ku mesu kuabo, bienzabo bualu budi Yehowa uhidia ne biahilabo, ne hamanyabo bualu bubi buakenzabo, bantu bonso ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele nebafile muana mulume wa ngombe bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, balue n andi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Amu padibu baatwa tshiâla , mapangadika aa adi atumibwa ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi, maalu ônso mimanyika , kamba ne adi asesuka anyi kaena asesuka ku Dîyi dikulu edi
Nenudie bintu binuakahuola kale, nenumushe bia kale bua kushila bihia bihia muaba
Bena Awa bakadi bashikama mu misoko tô ne ku Gaza ne Bena Kafetô bakafuma ku Kafetô, bakabashiha, bakashikama mu muaba wabo
Tuye n ebe, tuhunge tshihungidi, wewe ne meme, tshihungidi etshi tshikale bu kuditshiha kua bualu munkatshi muetu
Muntu yonso udi wela tatu andi anyi mamu andi mulau nebamushihe bulelela, wakela tatu andi anyi mamu andi mulau mashi andi neikale ham bidi handi
Balami ba bimuna bia Bena Gelâ bakatandangana ne balami ba bimuna bia Isaka, bakamba ne, Dina dia mai edi ndietu
Bena Isalele buonso buabo bakajiana Mose ne Alona mu tshihela

Yakalua kudi Belâma, yakamuambila ne, Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, udi wamba ne, Kuitabusha bua bualu buonso bukuhumbishe bua kulua kundi, bualu bua meme nenkuhe butumbi bunene, nengenze mei onso audi wamba, lua biebe, ndi nkusengelela, ungelele bantu aba mulau

Neafile dianyi dionso ne mukala udi ne dianyi ne dianyi didi dibuikila bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi diatu didi hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne lua tumuma yeye neanumushe, neabioshe ha tshioshelu bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia eu udi mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji
Bobo nebanshihe meme, nebakushiye wewe ne muoyo

Muntu yonso udi ulenga muntu mufue bianza, mubidi wa muntu mumane kufua, ne kena udilengesha, yeye udi wona nsubu wa Yehowa, nebamumushe munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bualu bua kabakamumiamina mai a kumulengesha n au, yeye kena wikala muakane, ne bubi buandi butshidi ham bidi handi
Ntu ngalesha bihungu tshinunu badi bansue ne badi benza mikenji yanyi luse lujalame
Hashishe Yosefe wakambila bantu ne, Monai, nakunusumbila Palo lelu, nuenu ne buloba buenu ka maminu adi aha bua bualu buenu, nuakune mu buloba
Nenumulame tô ne ku dituku dia dikumi ne anai dia ngondo eu, bantu bonso ba mu Isalele nebamushihe dilolo

Nakumana kuamba ne, Nennuhatule mu dikenga dia Ejipitu, nendue n enu mu buloba bua Bena Kanana ne bua Bena Hiti ne bua Bena Amole ne bua Bena Pelese ne bua Bena Hiwi ne bua Bena Yebuse, mu buloba budi ne mabele ne buitshi bia bungi
Nenkuvuishe tshisamba tshinene, nenkusankishe, nenvuishe dina diebe dinene, ne wewe neuvudishile bakuabo disanka
Kadi mundi udi kayi muakane ne kena udilengesha, nebamumushe munkatshi mua tshisumbu, bualu bua yeye wakuona nsubu wa tshitendelelu, kabakamumiamina mai a kumulengesha n au, yeye kena muakane
Nuenu nulonde Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numutshine, nutumikile mikenji yandi, numuenzele yeye nkayandi mudimu, nulamate kudiye
Padi dibeenga kumvwangana ditungununka, Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshidi tshikosa bwaalu ebu kashidi
Hakamanya muntu ne, Tshiena mumuhite bukole wakalenga tshianza ha tshikundukundu tshiandi ne tshikundukundu tshia Yakoba tshiakakoyoboka hakadiye uluangana n andi bibula
Edi ndituku dia lumingu dia dikisha dienu, nujinge mu mitshima yenu, eu mmukenji kunudi tshiendelele

Bana ba Yosefe ba mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima binunu makumi anai ne nkama itanu

Bakasemena ha buihi ne mulami wa nsubu wa Yosefe, bakayikila n andi ku tshibi tshia nsubu, bakamba ne, Mukelenge wetu, tuakalua kunoko diambedi bua kusumba bia kudia, ne hatuakafika ku nsubu wa tshilala benyi, tuakasulula bibombi bietu, tuakamona argent yetu yonso munda mua tshibombi tshia muntu ne muntu, tuakulua n ai kabidi mu tshianza tshietu
Kanungu ka Budikadidi bwa kuleeja tshiji badi babwaanyishe

Kadi yeye wakajanguluka bantu bakamukuata ku tshianza tshiandi, ne tshianza tshia mukashi wandi, ne bianza bia bana bandi bakashi babidi bualu bua Yehowa wakamufuila luse, bobo bakalua n andi, bakamuteka ku butshika bua musoko

Mudi dipeeja dia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga padi, ku nkonku miela kudi Tshibambalu tshimwe anyi tshikwabo tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga pa bidi bitangila midimu ya Bukalenga bunene, Minisitika kavulambedi kayi ufila diandamuna nansha dimwe mu tshipungu tshia matuku makumi asatu

Yeye neimane ku mpala kua Eleazâ muakuidi, yeye neamukonkele kulumbulula kua Ulima ku mpala kua Yehowa, ku dî diandi bobo nebaluhuke, ne ku dî diandi bobo nebabuelemu, ne yeye ne Bena Isalele bonso badi n andi
Nebateke dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Dana ku luseke lua ku nôde

Yakoba Udi Uluangana Bibula ne Muntu ku Peniele Butuku abu wakabika biandi wakangata bakashi bandi babidi ne bakashi babidi benji ba mudimu ne bana bandi dikumi ne umue, bakasabuka ku dilobo dia Yaboka

Hanuatshintshimika musoko musangu mule, hanualuangana n abo bua kûnyenga, kanushihi mitshi ya tumuma ne tusui; nudi mua kudia tumuma atu, kanushihi mitshi, bualu bua mitshi ei idi bu bantu banudi uluangana n abo, anyi
Bakamufuisha mukau ne nzambi ya bende; bakamufikisha munda ne malu mabi
Yehowa wakamba ne, Tangilai, bantu bonso badi bantu bamue, bonso badi ne muaku umue, au mmalu akabangabo kuenza, ne katataka kakuena bualu budibo basue kuenza budi mua kubakolela
Genese Yakoba Udi Uvudishila Efelayima ne Manashe Disanka Hakashika malu a bakambila Yosefe ne, Mona tatu webe udi usama; yeye wakaya kudiye ne bana bandi ba balume babidi, Manashe ne Efelayima
Esau Udi Uhana Bintu bia Buan a Bute Bana aba bakadiunda, Esau wakadi tshilembi tshidi ne budimu bua bungi, Yakoba wakadi biandi munda mukole, wakashikama mu ntenta
Alona wakabambila mei onso akadi Yehowa wambila Mose, ne yeye wakenza bimanyinu ku mesu kua bantu
Yehowa neanuhingashe mu Ejipitu kabidi mu matu mu nshila unakanuambila ne, Kanuena numutangila kabidi

Nuoshe mpingu yabo yakasongabo ne kahia: kanukumi mitshima yenu kudi argent anyi or idi ha mutu hai, kanuyidiangatshidi, kanudionyi mu buteyi ebu; bualu ebu budi butonda mutshima wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Yehowa Nzambi wakaladika mulume tulu tukole, ne yeye wakalala tulu, wakangata lubale luandi lumue, Wakabikila musunyi kabidi, ne lubale luakangata Yehowa Nzambi kudi mulume, yeye Wakenza n alu mukashi, wakalua n andi kudi mulume
dibangisha dia midimu ya didimukila mvula, ya mwinshi mwa buloba, ya dizola dia misoko ne dizola dia misulu;
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, Netanaele muana mulume wa Sua
Biahidia tatu wa mukashi kumufila kudiye, yeye neafute biuma bu bia dibaka dia bakashi batshidi kamama
Kabadi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi udibo balue n au ne mashi mu ntenta wa kusangakena bua kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu mu muaba wa tshijila, nebawoshe ne kahia
Tshibambalu tshidi tshipeta mukanda mumana kweelela tukanda kudi Tshibambalu tshikwabo tshidi tshijooja amu mukanda udibo batshitumina
Yakoba, tatu wabo, wakabambila ne, Nuenu nuakunjimishila bana banyi Yosefe kenaku, ne Shimeona kenaku, ne nudi nuamba kuya ne Benyamina, malu au onso adi mantonde

Kabakanji kutangila bualu buakenzeye masalayi a mu Ejipitu, ne tubalu tuabo ne makalu abo; muakahingisheye mai a Dishiba Dikunze ha mitu yabo, hakadibo banulonda ku nyima, ne muakabashiha Yehowa tô ne ku dituku edi; ne muakanuenzeleye mu tshihela tô ne hanuakalua ku muaba eu
Uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu, udijidile, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bualu bua dibue diabo kadiena bu Dibue dietu nansha bikala bena lukuna balumbuluishi ba bualu
Tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu bakuabo tshiakaya n abo, ne mikoko ne ngombe ne bimuna bia bungi
Meme nda Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bua kuikala Nzambi wenumeme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila bilumbulwilu bia beena mwabo bôbo nkayabu
Kadi nebahaule Bena Kene tô ne haya Bena Ashû n abo bu bena lukanu
Bena Isalele bonso bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose ne Alona
Abalahama waka bika, wakakukuila bana ba Hete, bena buloba
Hawela mpungi bikole, bantu ba mu bitudilu bia ku esete nebaye ku luendu luabo

Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Bantu kabena mua kulua ku mukuna wa Sinai bualu bua wewe wakamba ne, Ujidike mukuna, ûjidile Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Ya, hueka biebe, wewe neuhingane, wewe ne Alona kadi bakuidi ne bantu kabalu ha buihi nansha, bua Yehowa kabashihi
Bakashiha bakelenge ba mu Midiyana kabidi: Evi ne Lekeme ne Sû ne Hû ne Leba bakelenge batanu ba Midiyana bakashiha Belama, muana mulume wa Beô, ne muele wa nvita kabidi
Dutelonone Mose Udi Uvudishila Bisamba bia Bena Isalele Masanka Â mmasanka akavudishila Mose, muntu wa Nzambi, Bena Isalele, diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua
Dîyi dilongolodi didi ne tshia kuleeja mishindu ya kulonda mapa aa
Bobo nebalame bintu biandi ne bintu bia bantu bonso ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bua kuenzelabo mudimu wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu

Hakabidikishabo ne tshihiminu, muntu wakadi usangisha bia bungi bintu kabiakashala kudiye, ne muntu wakadi usangisha bikese kakadi ne nzala, muntu ne muntu wakadisangishilabi bu muakamanyeye mudiadieye

ngendu ya mu njila, ditambakana dia mashinyi, diibaka ne dilongolwesha dia njila idi yambulwisha bantu bônso, difutshisha ne diabanya dia lupetu lwa bitadi bia mu njila idibo bibaka kudi bukalenga bunene ne anyi kudi polovensa;
Aba mbantu bakabikilabo ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele, bakelenge ba bisamba bia batatu abo, bakadi ku mutu kua binunu bia Bena Isalele
Kadi kanudi muoyo wa munyinyi wonso, mmashi mene mene
Nensankishe bantu badi bakuvudishila wewe disanka, nengele muntu mulau udi ukuela wewe mulau Bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bua bualu buebe

Kanungu ka Ngenzelu yônso, diumvwangana diônso, tshipungidi tshiônso anyi bwaalu bukwabo bônso budi bufikisha ku dipangisha ditunga, bantu bendende anyi nsanga bantu, bujima anyi tshitupa tshia mishindu yaabu ya kupandila mifumina ku makookeshi aabu anyi ku bubanji bwaabo bwa kwa nzambi, kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bwa pankatshi pa matunga butangila bibawo bia mianda ya bubanji, badi babwangata bu tshibawu tshia tshinyangu tshidi mêyi a ditunga anyooka
Yeye wakamba ne, Kulengi nsongalume tshianza nansha, kumuenzedi bualu, bualu bua katataka ndi mumanye ne wewe udi utshina Nzambi, bualu bua wewe kuakumpidia muan ebe, muana umuehele mene
Mabaya au akadi bu mabaya abidi hanshi, kadi akadi matuangasha ku mutu ne biamu bia masoso, Wakenza bubidi buau ku matumba abidi

Bana ba Manashe ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Manashe binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi ne nkama ibidi
Yehowa Nzambi wakangata mulume, wakamuteka mu budimi bua Edene bua kubuihileye ne bua kubulama
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Lubena, Elisu muana mulume wa Shedeu
Udimuke ku mpala kuandi, unvue di diandi, kumufuishishi tshiji, yeye kena ukubuikidila bubi buebe bualu bua dina dianyi didi munda muandi
Mu dituku adi Yakoba wakumusha mbushi ya bimpanga yakadi ne matoba, ne mashina a mbushi akadi ne matoba, ne mikoko yonso yakadi mifike, wakabika mu bianza bia bana bandi balume
Bualu bua Yehowa wakakumbamisha bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa Abimeleke, bualu bua Sala, mukashi wa Abalahama
Yeye wakatshisulula, wakamona muana, ne muana wakadila Yeye wakafuka muana luse, wakamba ne, Yeye udi muana wa Bena Ebelu
Yeye wakateka tshianza mu tshiadi kabidi, hakatshiumusheye mu tshiadi, tshianza tshiandi tshiakakudimuka bu muakadi mubidi wandi
